But e tok say e get sometin to do for inside di city.
Naija pipo don carry knock give FG, and oda politics pipo concerning di kilin
Naija pipo wey dey for inside social media sef don put hand for ear give federel goment and polical leader dem ova di kilin.
One pesin wey comment for di Facebook link wey carry di tori wey Daily Trust publish, Ifeanyi Maduako, as e tok say di death of Gulak dey bitter, kom link am with politics.
Di kilin bitter for my mouth welwel.
E be like say na politiks dem take am do, and di pipo wey do, make we open dem face.
Di killin go expose pipo wey behind di security wahala for Imo state.
Na who invite am kom, and why dem go kill northerner for Imo state.
I dey fear wetin go do innocent Imo pipo in some days for di hand of security people wey north dey control, na so he write am.
Another pesin wey comment for di thread, Olurombi Micheal Omo, tok say as police report don prove say na political kilin, say dem suppose investigate am welwel.
E dey thingk say police pipo sef get question to nswer to.
For im own part, Comr Hassan Ahmad write say di soul of innocent pipo dey important pass di scam wey dem dey call Unity for naija.
We no go gree dis illiteracy, enof is enof, na peacemaker we be
but doe wey dey push us go meet wall dey see say we no fit kontinu wit di peace
I dey send warning, we go retaliate and e go worst.
Buhari you don fail us woefully, and we face di Imo police pipo to follow di jaguda pipo.
Nasiru Inuwa sef write say na wake up call to di big pipo wey dey for north, dem begin wit innocent Fulani herders, now dem don turn to northern goment officials, plus prominent politicians.
Emma Powerful wey be secretary for IPOB joinbodi wey government no support, don tok for statement say make dem no link IPOB to di murder of Gulak. E tok say to kill politician dem no dey di agenda of di joinbodi
So, we tok am say IPOB no sabi anytin about di killin wey apun.
To beging with sef, how Gulak dey take threatin awa mission wey don warrant make we kill am.
We no get anytin with am, and we no for don kill am.
To dey point hand for IPOB for dis kin barbaric act na just to divert attention away from di real pipo wey do am.
Na di same way wey terrorist wey wera security uniform dey take komit atrocities for inside south east, and dem go kom IPOB for dem crime, sekk of say dem wan spoil awa reputation.
Na opportunate wey dem don dey find for long be dis to take start anoda special military operation for inside Eastern Region to take more Biafra pipo wey dey innocent.
Instead make scurity pipo for do proper investigate on top di incident and things wey cause am, dem don face IPOB ova crime wey dem no do.
Shey IPOB get di informate for di movement of di late Gulak reach say make dem stop am for airport road?
Di group tok say make security pipo first investigate pesin wey host Gulak, dat one na Hope Uzordinma, and im political opponent, to establish if dem dey involve.
Dos wey kill Gulak no go escape punishment.
Presido, Muhammadu Buhari don tok say di pipo wey kill Gulak and oda wahala for inside we obodo no go go scot free.
Presido, Buhari, for one statement wey in toktok persin, Garba Shehu, don express im outrage and disgust ova di heinous murder.
Di president, wey don show say di incident make am sad, tok say: I dey repulsed by di gruesome murder of Gulak wey dey premeditated by evil pipo, wey be say dem don detrmine to dabaru di peace, unity and teritorial integriti of awa kontri.
Make I kom warn say nobodi, or joinbodi wey dey do dat kind thing wey dey despicable go expect to go free. 
We go use evritin wey we get to see say pipo wey do dis kind calous and criminal thing go face justice.
Akeredolu tok say di kilin of Gulak dey unacceptable.
Governor for Ondo state wey be Olwarotimi akeredolu be describe di news of di kilin as shockin and disturbin
Inside one statement wey di Governor imsef sign, he tok say dis one na murder too many, say do thing dey senseless and wicked.
Di pipo wey do dis kind bad thing na enemy of di kontri dem be.
Di corner-corner way na to mislead, confuse and destroy.
he get di  unmistakable, despicable imprints of fifth columnists bent on setin di kontri on di path of conflagration.
dey must not allow dis criminal dem to succeed. 
We wan use dis medium to tell awa brother, Governor of Imo state, Hope Uzordinma say we dey with am.
We encourage am and oda Governor dem for South Eastern states to brace up, make dem confront di security wahala to take end bloodbath for dem lan.
Di enemy of di pipo dey always use weapon of fear to create disaffection.
Di coward act na to instigate Naija pipo make dem for face each oda, make northerners for face Igbo pipo wey dey live outside South East
We must face di enemy of di pipo, to see say we komot power for dem hand.
Dis one no be time to dey argue who sabi politiks pass.
We no suppose allow bandit waka spoil di legitimacy of dis goment for all level.
we dey call on all security pipo dem to kolabo to see say dem show di criminal pipo wey dey sponsor, and dos wey dey do terorist waka.
Dey must to punish dem severely.
Lewandowski don score 41 goals, e break 49 year old record.
Robert Lewandowski, for Sunday, don break Gerd Muellera 49 year old record wen e score hin 41st Bundesliga goal for the season small seconds before refree blow final whistle for last week of di season.
Mueller, wey be 75 year old, dey suffer from severe dementia, but The Bombera still dey among di iconic figure for German football as di Bundesliga all time top scorer wit 365 goals, e dey ahead of Lewandowski tally of 277
plenty thinking
Mueller 40 goals for Bayern Munich wey be record for 1971/72 neva dey match until Lewandowski rounded di goalkeeper to score for di same club
Lewandowski break di record on Saturday afta equalling di record last week
E dey serious until the last second, I go like to don score tey-tey, Lewandowski tell Sky
Sometimes you need to dey patient, wey dey difficult
I dey always believe say chance go kom
dat be one special and historic moment
Halilu Mohammed na im be di Secretary of di joinbodi of Onion dealer dem for Imo.
For Inside dis tori, he yan how pipo wey dem suspect say dem be member of Indigenous Pipo of Biafra (IPOB) take attack and marsh-leg ontop two truck wey carry onion go east of di kontri.
You go fit yan us how di mata take hapun?
Well, e get two trucks weykari onion from Kano State.
Di pipo stop di moto, kom hold driver and di moto for hand, dem kom drive di moto go one corner wia dem dey rebag and dem sell di onions finish before security pipo rish di area.
One bag of onions be, e small patapata N15,000 for market but dem sell dem N9,000 for one bag.
Na which pipo do di attack?
Na Biafria Area-bois (IPOB), wey dey wakawaka wit dia flag.
Dem attack, tif and sell all di market, all di onion wey dey inside di moto.
Na wia dem take do di attack?
Na market dem do di attack, wey dem stop and tiftif for di moto.
Dem tok price kom sell all di onion N9,000 for one bag and dem carry di moni japa.
Before security pipo come, dem don sell all di onion inside di moto finish.
Na wen security pipo kom na im we shift di second moto go corner wey gbege nor dey, make dem nor attack again or carry d moto japa patapata.
Who get di market?
Na Alhaji Bello get di onion plus di truck wey carry am from Kano to Imo state.
Wetin di onion wey dey inside di moto fit rish?   
We don calcu say e small patapata one moto dey carry 470 bag of onion.
Almost 500 bags of onions na im dem tifitif for inside Imo Market oga-patapata truck wey dem attack.
Fintiri dey mourn
Di Governor for Adamawa state, dat na Umara Ahmadu Fintiri don tok say di way dem kill Gulak shock am, say e be former speaker for Adamawa state.
Governor Fintiri tok say di death dey painful, how wicked pipo take wicked reach.
Governor Fintiri tok say Late Gulak na pesin wey dey witty, determined, and politician wey dey practical, wey be say as im take rise, na result of im hardwork.
E dey unfortunate say di death don kolekt from us
Hon Ahmed Gulak in day kind gruesome manner.
Gulak be dis kind lively politicin wey follow evribodi work, and he dey always get di interest of di kontri for im mind.
As he dey remember im interaction with late Gulak, Governor Ahmadu Umaru Fintiri tok say na broda and mentor e be, and seek of say na lawter, na human right fighter e be.
Madagali community don loss better son.
For inside one statement wey im Chief Press Secretary Hunwashi Wanisoukou release for inside Yola yesterday, di governor tok say we kontri don loss one of di strong persin wey dey fight for human right.
We all remember how passionate he fight for di pipo wey insurgency jaguda don send komot for house,  and pipo wey no too get means.
ACF condenm di kilin
Arewa Consultative Forum (ACF) don condenm di kilin of Gulak, dem tok say na big loss for we kontri.
Di ACF for one statement wey di national publicity secretary, Emmanuel Yawe carry komot, tok say dem dey sad to hear di kilin of Gulak, dem describe as one politician wey dey dynamic, and progressive politician wey from notrth komot.
If you like am, or you no like am, na your business be dat.
Make God bless, and make he give im family and state, Adamawa, di ability to take bear di loss.
Di kilin na part of di plan to take repeat do coup wey apun for 1966 CNG
Di coalition for Norther Groups (CNG) don describe di kilin of northern politician Ahmed Gulak wey be before before political adviser to former presido Goodluck Jonathan, say na sometin wey dem plan, and all di attack wey dem dey attack police pipo for inside Southeast of Naija, na to try repeat di coup wey apun for 1966.
Di CNg for inside one statement wey dem toktok pesin Abdul-Azeez Suleiman sign tok say  na di reason why norther part of di kontri no fit live with southeast as one kontri, as dem allege say di violent way of di Indigenous Pipo of Biafra, Di eastern Security network (ESN), and oda Igbo gand dey fund, get confidence, by everi part of di Igbo society, both pipo wey home and di one wey dem dey obodo oyinbo.
As Mueller score hin 40 goal for 34 league games for 1971/72, injury and squad rotation mean say Lewandowski break di record for just 29 matches.
Bayern score 101 goals for league for 1971/72 and dem score 99 dis season.
Physically, di 32 year old Lewandowski dey very different to Mueller, wey be 26 for di 1971/72 season.
wetin be your name?
Robert be athlete, Gerd be artist, Mueller wife Uschi Mueller tell magazine wey name be Sport Bild
For 1.84m and 79kgs, Lewandowski be model athlete, e dey renowned for hin strict diet and programme.
Mueller, for 1.76m and 80kgs wen e dey young, get di nickname short fat Mueller by hin former Bayern cochi Zlatko Cajkovski
Di pair share dey always dey hungry for goals.
Lewandowski don score on average of 60 minutes for dis season, Te Bomber score evri 77 minutes for 1971/72
Lewandowski be one ogbonge star player.
Mueller be ogbonge role model striker, wey fit pass ball from hin right leg to left leg sharperly.
Hin low centre of gravity help Mueller dey ahead of defenders for di first few meters
Wen hin see chance to score, hin be ogbonge finisher.
Lewandowski dey dynamic, but hin also dey different from Mueller, hin dey always dey hapi to shoot from outside box eighteen or make hin use speed pass defenders.
Dem share same sense wen ball don reach level wey e fit turn goal, dem always dey dey alert for rebound and dey ready for pounce, like how Lewandowski do am on Saturday
How e take start.
Lewandowski start 2020/21 wit a bang, hin score a penalty and provide two assit for dia 8-0 win over Schalke, a record result for first game for Bundesliga season.
Hin no score for the next game, dem scock as dem lose 4-1 for Hoffenheim, but hin score all di four goals, plus di late match-winning penalty for dia 4-3 home win against Hertha Berlin for October.
Dem rest am for one game, for last October afta scoring ten goals for hin first five games, before hin kom reach 25 goals for 20 league games.
Lewandowski get knee injury wen hin dey play for poland wen hin dey 35 goals afta hat-trick against Stuttgart.
Afta three weeks out, hin kom back wit a goal in shock loss for Mainz before hin hit hat-trick of 6-0 for home against Moenchengladbach wey win Bayern the title.
While Lewandowski don score consistently, Mueller get sporadic purple patches, dey score just three goals for di first nine games for 1971/72 season.
Hin don score 18 goals by halfway point, plus four for 11-1 thrashing of Dortmund for November 1971
Hin den score 5 goals for 7-0 beating of Oberhausen wey reach 16 goals for just seven games, finishing di season wit six goals for three games.
BPE, education ministry wey dey among 20 outstanding MDAs
Di Bureau of Public Enterprises (BEP), Ministry of Education, and di Ministry of Transpotation dey among di Ministries, Departments and Agencies (MDAs) wey dem name as di 20 Most Outstanding MDAs for Nigeria dis year.
Na di CEO, Profiles & Biographies, Mr. Kammonke Abam, tok am, for one statement for Abuja, as part of update on the company research and compilation of di accomplishments of MDAs to celebrate di sisth anniversary.
Hin tok say di assessment result dey relative to di MDAs fulfiling dia ministerial mandate in line wit di administration 9-point development agenda, and him firm evaluation benchmark.
Abam tok say di firm adopt an evaluation benchmark based on five criteria of relevance, efficiency, effectiveness, impact and sustainability in assessing all di MDAs in line wit best practice.
Dem don point am out, wit som justification too, say sake of say dis kontrol and dominance work to dia advantage, Fulani political aristocracy dey always work against di attempt of oda  ethnic group for di enthronement of a just, equitable and inclusive Nigeria for all.
Even say dis accusation against Fulani don dey for years now, no time wey e dey more pronounced pass dis present time unda di administration of President Muhammadu Buhari wey be Fulani man.
Even say som go troway dis as part of di stuff of politiks for Nigeria, di claim say Fulani dey kontrol and retain large amount of political power in a way wey e affect and komot odas, no dey totally wrong. No be lie say di Fulani political aristocracy don find way to prolong dis kontrolthroughmago-mago agenda of exclusive empowerment and appointment for di strategic areas of di kontri polity and economy.
Dis fulanisation agenda, as we expect, don turn oda ethnic group includin Hausa wey be di closest, against di Fulani, especially as dem don point am say na Fulani bin dey responsible for di banditry, kidnappin and oda violent crimes for North-West of di kontri.
In di current situation wey Nigeria dey, e no dey feasible again for Fulani to kontinue dey exercise di skewered and large kontrol of political power.
Dis no go only create a dangerous imbalance in di polity; e go also bring up a feelin, and tendency by di ethnic groups wey dem komot for politiks, to find ways wey dem go take disrupt di polity as we dey get am now.
For Nigeria to kommot for di dangerous situation of doubt wey dey build up currently, we must to address di issue of a bias political and economic kontrol of Nigeria, wey di powerful and influential ethnic groups dey show, to di exclusion of odas.
Anoda mata wey hang around Nigerian politiks and governance like burden wey dey pesin neck, get to do wit awa dangerous attachment to ethnic and religious ways, and awa effort to interpret evritin for awa kontri along dose lines.
We no be Nigerians for di true sense of di word.
Awa sense of togedaness as Nigerians to a large extent dey defined only by di land wey join all of us togeda rada dan by di value and identity wey we share togeda.
Na base on my-pipo, una-pipo and my-religion una-religion level we take dey relate wit eachoda, rada dan as Nigerians wey we all be. 
Di proclivity to play di ethnic and religious card don becom so pervasively sef-perpetuatin to di extent say wia e no even dey necessari, we go try to invoke am jus to assure awaself say dis na di normal tin to do.
If my-pipo, una-pipo card no wok, we go use my-religion, una-religion card, and for wia dat wan no work, we go use di my-pipo una-pipo own. 
We don too biliv dis factors as yardstick for almost evritin wey we do, sotey like addict wey dey deceive e sef on di happiness of takin substance, we just fit no gada di courage to kick di habit. Even say we sabi how harmful e be to awa bodi politic.
Swiatek go face befor-befor champion Pliskova for Rome final.
French Open champion Iga Swiatek don yarn say she dey ready for anybodi, as she and befor-befor winner Karolina Pliskova go face each-oda for Italian Open final for Sunday.
Befor-befor world.
Pliskova beat Croatia.
Petra Martic 6-1, 3-6, 6-2 don qualify for anoda final of di tournament wey she win for 2019 and finish second last year.
Ninth seed Pliskova na di only top 10 player wey remain wey go face battle wit 19-year-old Swiatek, wey kontinue her Roland Garros warm-up wit back-to-back win for Saturday.
Swiatek first komot fifth seed Elina Svitolina, wey be two-time Rome winner, 6-2, 7-5 for 1hr 36min in dia quarterfinal match wey dem postpone from Friday becos of rain.
She kom win 17-year-old American Coco Gauff 7-6 (7/3), 6-3 in di semifinals for 1hr 45min.
I sabi say e go tough, na di numba 15-seed of her marathon day tok am.
I no get mind to win or loose as I dey play. 
I dey take am step by step.
Beatin Elina show say my game dey hia, I ready for anybodi.
E really gimme confidence.
If my game go dey dere tomorro, I fit do anytin.
Make Politicians wey get analogue ideas no rule Nigeria again - Sowore
Befor-befor presidential aspirant of di Afrikan Action Congress (AAC), Omoyele Sowore, don tok say di inability of President Muhammadu Buhari to meet up wit him campaign promises to make Nigeria a beta nation na wake-up call for us to stop to dey elect leaders wit analogue ideas.
Sowore, durin di 3rd NEC meetin of AAC for Abuja, tok say di inaction of di president on top security mata for di kontri show say e lack new ideas on how to confront di situation wey dey face di kontri.
For di progress of di kontri, pipo wey get completely old and analogue ideas no fit kontinue to rule a digital kontri like Nigeria.
Nigeria dey go down for di hand of incompetent leaders wey no get compassion for im citizens and kom refuse to deliver on dia duties,  e tok.
Police don yarn say members of di public no go get access to di Capitol floor durin Biden inauguration.
Actin oga pata-pata of Capitol Police, Yogananda Pittman tok say public access no go dey to di Capitol floor durin Joe Biden inauguration as U.S. president on Jan. 20. 
Pittman take over leadership from Steven Sund afta Sund step down becos of plenti criticism on how police take handle pipo wey riot for di Capitol building last week.
She tok say law enforcement agents from di federal, state and local level dey work togeda, and comprehensive, coordinated plan don dey ground to ensure safety.
She tok say dem don suspend plenti police officers as dem continue to dey investigate di January 6 riot.
Reason why Zuba fruit market need kia-kia intervention.
For traders and farmers wey dey sell fruit and vegetables in di kontri, di Zuba international market, as dem dey call am, na major selling place.
No be only di Federal Capital Territory (FCT) dis market dey serve but all di states wey dey around too.
No be lie say di market na wia thouands of pipo dey see moni, most of dis pipo be women and small pikin wey dey buy and sell fresh produce inside and around Abuja wey be di nation capital.
Na plenti tonnes of fruits like orange, pawpaw, banana, plantain, pineapple, coconut, watermelon, vegetable and odas, dey enta di market evriday.
Awa tori-pesin wey go di market on Tuesday see say buying and selling plenti for imported apple and coconut business, and di market na major wholesale ground for people wey wan re-sell. 
Na dis market over 70 percent of di fruits wey dem dey chop inside di FCT and states wey dey around dey from kom. Pipo gada as earli as 5am evriday to do business.
Plenti tonnes of plantain na im dem display to sell in di market on Tuesday.
Even say dis market get big potentials to strengthen di agric business locally and internationally, e get plenti challenges wey don dey for many years.
Di market still dey very rough, and na dirty ground dem dey put all di fruits. Dis dey make pipo worri on di health implication, especially as di kontri dey follow di rest of di world fight COVID-19  disease.
Also, na di same place dem dey pack fresh fruits and rotten ones put, and even di ones wey be wastage wey don get germs and diseases.
Plenti pipo also dey open to germs wey dey cause diseases becos of di dust from many legs wey dey walk for di dirty environment.
Again, di lack of necessary tins like cold room, gud road, water, standard shops, clean ground wey dem go dey put di fruits, and odas dey increase pipo concern on how safe di fruits dey, and e dey put evribodi wey dey chop fruits for Abuja and nearby at high risk.
But even as dis challenges dey so, activities for di market dey put moni for many pipo pocket, and e dey generate revenue for di government too.
Awa tori-pesin follow som farmers and dealers who don dey do business for di area for plenti years tok.
Tarsoo Alex, who get orange farm for Vandikya, Benue State, tok say e supply more dan 60 bag of orange to di market on Tuesday.
But na about five bag e loose becos of too much heat, wey di plenti sun cause.
E dey fear say if buyers no kom early, e fit loose more.
As e tok, 1 bag of orange na between N6,000 and N7,500, but im profit don too reduce becos of transportation wey cost from im farm for Benue to Zuba.
To stop di issue of wastage, e tok say plenti of di farmers don dey use jute bags, wey go allow air enter, instead of nylon bag wey go cause plenti heat for di fruits.
Unlike orange, plantain dey evriwia now becos na di season be dis, one young man wey go like make dem call am just Pastor na im tell awa tori-pesin dis.
E tok say befor aftanoon, dem go don buy all di plantain finish.
E dey help farmers sell dia market.
Na for dozen  (12 bunch) dem dey sell am, and na between N5,000 and N8,000, as each one big reach. 
Na grade by grade dem dey select Watermelons, from grade 1, 2 and 3, and na 50 pieces dey for each dozen.
Dia price also depend on d grade, u fit get di smallest one for N9,000.
Regular customer fit get am for lower price.
Na di same way dem dey sell pawpaw and pineapple, but na for bag dem dey sell coconut, while na for carton dem dey sell apple, but na grade dem dey grade am too. 
On one Sunday for 2018, Daily Trust discover plenti place wia dem dey use carbide to make fruit ripe for di market. Plenti health expert don yarn say dis fit cause cancer.
Di report na im make di market union leaders go use dia task force arrest di culprits.
Awa tori-pesin observe say big improvement dey, as dem no see anybodi dey use di chemical like befor again.
As di committee be don conclude dem sitting, Gulak be saty back when oda member of di committee be komot di city for Friday.
Pesin wey dey close to Senator Orji Uzor kalu, wey be chairman for di public hearing wey apun for inside Owerri, tok say dem offer di deceased private wey be Kalu own afta di siddon tok, but e refuse am.
According to di source, Kalu team be leave di city di day wey di public hearin end, but Gulak stay back, tok say e get things to do for di city.
Di source tok say " we komot Owerri di day wey di publik hearin finish, and we tell am say make e join us inside awa private jet, say we get enough security with us.
 How dem take see dedi bodi of pesin wey be civil defence officer for grave wey no deep.
di dead bodi of woman officer wey dey work for Nigeria  Security and Civil Defence Corps (NSCDC) wey dem don dey find for 18 month, na im dem don see for grave wey no deep inside Obi Local Goment area for inside Benue state.
until by di time wey dem no see am again, Josephine Cynthia Inalegwu Onche, dey work for NSCDC office wey dey for Otukpo.
Cynthia na Idoma, and na Otukpo she for come, just miss wen dem be dey plan her marriage.
some of her work pipo wey no want make we write dem name tok say na her family pipo kom report say dem no fit find am again when her marriage remain small days.
Wetin dem tok be say she be go market go buy things as she dey prepare for her marriage, but she no return home since. 
one of di office pipo of di pesin wey die tok say as dem try to find am reach, dem no see am until one okada man kom show dem wia dem burry am.
Di okadaman na im tell di family pipo say na di oga wey wan marry dem pikin kill am, use am do rotual for money.
Afta na im di okadaman carry di family pipo and security dem go arrest di man, di man kom carry dem go the baba wey do the ritual for Obi local goment, before im waka enter South-West state.
wen police don catch di husband and im herbalist for Otukpo, di family pipo of di pesin wey die don go komot di bodi for wia dem bury am, kom organise burial for am on to June 1, 2021.
Call, or answer message wey dem sent give am on top di thing wey apun. DSP Catherine Anene, wey be toktok pesin for Benue police dem no gree carry.
Di toktok persin for NSCDC for di state, Asc Ejelikwu Micheal no gree tok anytin when we meet am, he tok sya he go tok when time reach.
But persin wey be insider tok say di news of di dedibodi wey dem find don put sadness for di security pipo mind again.
For di review wey wan do for constitution: MURIC tok say sharia don dey for SouthWest  before Christianity enter.
Di joinbodi wey be Muslim Right Concern don tell di Penticostal Fellowship of Nigeria (PFN) say make dem stop to dey oppose muslim, make dem mind dem business.
Di director of MURIC, Professor Ishaq Akintola na im tok  am on Sunday.
He tok dis one afa di warnin wey  PFN give say make any group no use di review of constitution wey senate dey do carry shariah law enter south-west.
PFN and oda Christian joinbodi know say shariah be dey for south-west before christianity enter for 1842.
Dem be dey practice shariah for Ede, during by di time of oba Abeeb Olagunju (Abbeb na muslim name) and say
Di shariah court for Ede still dey work enter 1913, for Agbeni inside di town.
Dem carry am go Agbongbon for 1914.
Dem use shariah for Iwo durin by Di time of Oba Momodu Lamuye (Muhammad Lamuye), wey die for 1906.
Even sef, di nomba svevn Akirun of Ikirun, wey be oba Aliyu Oyewole (wey die for 1912) carry shariah enter Ikirun for 1910.
All dis na example say shariah don dey, and e don dey spread for Yorubaland, and to tok say di christian people sef sabi say na christian people stop shariah for Yorubaland, wey dem comeimpose christian common law. As Akintola tok am.
He tok say PFN and some oda christian joinbodi sef sabi say islamic waka don dey grow for south west, and na fear dey catch dem say di giant wey dey sleep don wake to kom carry wetin belong to am.
He tok say di christian dem know say shariah na di right wey Allah don carry dash Muslims.
But dem don determin say dem no go allow Muslims use am, say na di new way dem go dey use.
Dem get am for mind say na war dem dey follow muslim people fight, and say nothingg bad for war.
Dem dey use both good and bad ways to take do wetin dey dem mind.
Dem don dey call Naija pipo say make dem follow understand di mentality of di Christian pipo wey dey here.
As e dey be for evribodi wey dey quick vex, dem belif say na to dey attack pipo, na di only way wey dem fit take defend be dat.
As per say na dem gain from di colonial jaguda wey reach a century that time,  dem wan kip all di things wey dem colonial oga fit carry give dem.
dem don get am for mind say dem go put muslim pipo inside di place wey colonial dem dem be chase dem put.
Di joinbodi wey dey review constitution don tok say make Nigeria pipo write wetin dem want for inside constitution kom.
Each group suppose bring di things wey dem need kom.
Instead make PFN tell di joinbodi wetin  di christians dem want, na wetin dem think say make di christians no ask dem dey tok.
Dem wanuse am block muslim pipo wey dey for south, but e no go work.
E tok say as dem dey tok say religious tolerance dey for south, say na lie, and dem dey tok am to put Yoruba pipo wey be muslim for inside slavery.
Muslim pipo wey dey for di region don dey open eye, kom dye ask for freedom.
we deamnd say make dem stop as dem dey force us to dey wear christian school uniform, to dey go christian school, to dey use christian law.
we want shariah wey no dey cut pipo hand, but di shariah wey go dey regulate muslim marriage dem, inherritance and family affair dem. 
Di thing no concern christians at all.
We go use all di way wey no go kos fight, wey follow law, to do di thing. As e take tok am.
stakeholder dem for Edo don tok say Obaseki na parti leader.
As di People's Democratic Party for Edo state get crisis of who go dey control di parti, member or Edo South of the parti, dem don tok say na di state govnro, Godwin Obaseki and im deputy, Philip Shaibu dey good.
Edo South PDP for iside one communique wey dem issue at di end of di stakeholder meetin for weekend inside Benin city, tok say Godwin Obaseki na leader of di parti for inside di state.
For di communiques wey di secretary, Wilson Evbuonwam read, he tok say dem support di harmonization and integration of new pipo into di executive committee of di parti, say make di state for develop welwel.
police don catch persin wey dem thingk say na kidnapper for Abuja, dem even kolekt guns.
Di Police komand wey dey for FCT don arrest eight suspected kidnappers for Shenegu-Tunga Maje, Gwagwalada, Kabusa village and Durumi axis of Abuja.
Di toktok persin for di comand, dat ona na ASP Maryam Yusuf, wey tok am one siddon tok for inside Abuja, tok say di name of di suspect na Yakubu Ahmadu, Ibrahim Mallam Musa, and Bello Haruna.
She tok say di suspect dem be  member of a syndicate wey dem  also link join the kidnap attempt on di Vice President of di Nigerian Bar Association (NBA)
Gwagwalada branch, Barrister David Aigbefoh.
She tok say dem be arrest di suspect during one coordinated intelligence operation wey police pipo from di command anti-kidnapping squad for Shenegu mountain on di border of di FCT and Niger State.
She tok say di  suspect dem don give beta informate on di things wey dem do for dem group..
Yusuf later tok say dem arrest one Nwite Jideofor wey stage im kidnap from Durumi area, sey di suspect confess say im conive with pipo wey come kidnap am to collekt reach 5 million from im sister as ransom.
she tok some of di exhibit wey dem kolekt from di suspect na three dane guns, seven cutlas, one Honda Accord wey dem paint bleck, four mobile fone and oda item dem. She add am say dem don dey work on top how dem go arrest other member of di group wey don run.
she tok say dem go carry all di suspect go court when dem don investigate welwel, as she dey warn pipo wey dey stay for FCT, especially parent and guardian say make dem draw ear fro dem children not do crime.
Suarez strike, Atletico sef kom  win La Liga title
Di goal wey Luiz Suarez score don make Athletico Mardrid beat Real Valladolid 2-1 on Saturday, na im make di team get anoda remarkable La Liga victory.
Suarez be dey crying for di begiing of di season seek of say Barcelona force am komot, but as di season go end, na im 21st goal for di season make Athleticoto win first league since 2014, dis one wey dem win ahead of Real Madrid
Athletico know say if dem, dem go win di trophy, e no matter wetin Madrid do for Villareal for dem home. 
But no be say e dey comfortable, as Valladolid take early lead.
Real Madrid sef be dey behind fr di game, before Karim Benzema kom equalize for 87 minute, and Luka Modric kom score late winner for 2-1 at Valdebebas, na dat one hang Athletico for a long time, as e remain small make dem scatter di thing with just one goal.
when dem blow final whistle, players dem run enter field, red and white shirt cover Suarez, seek of say di title race wey tight pass, wey even dey unpredictable don end.
Suarez Zone
E just pass one week small
coach Diego Simone tok say na di Suarez zone be dis
and na so e take prove am, as na di Uruguayan score di wey kip title for Athletico hand last week, na im kom score on di last day again make dem for write dem name for trophy.
dis na di second time in 17 years wey anoda team apart from Barcelona or Real Madrid don win di league, na Athleti still win di oda one under Simeone for 2014.
Athletico start di game, say na dem dey top table since December, and as dem take score two goals for inside di last eight minutes to beat Osasuna, 
But di thhing no easy for Athletico dis season, as dem get 10 point lead for February, and di point reduce to 2 for May, and dem position as nomba one for table dey rely on top make Real Madrid and Barcelona slip.
So e no surprise pesin say as dem wan face Valladolid wey dey 19 for table, na still patch patch dem do.
Plenty Athletico fan dem don gather for Valladolid Plaza Mayor to dey sing song, and plenty fan dem also reach outside of di stadium, wia dem komot dem make e for no kos wahala.
Di kilin wey dem kil Gulak don kos make pipo dey shout.
people dey shout and mourn on sunday as dem take kill barr. 
Ahmed Gullak, wey be before before adviser to former presido Goodluck Jonathan on top  politiks matter, by pipo wey carry gun.
Na pipo wey dey follow Gulak shoot am for Obiangwu village as e dey try enter Sam Mbakwe airport for Owerri, wey be capital of Imo state, say e wan enter Abuja.
Na yesterday evening dem do funeral paryer for di politician wey from Adamawa kom inside national mosque for Abuja, na afta dat one dem burry im bodi for inside Gudu cemetary around 8pm 
Police pipo for inside Imo state tok say dem don kill at least six of di pipo wey kill di All Progressives Congress (APC) oga, afta dem follow dem fight.
One statement wey Police Public Relation Officer, SP Bala Elkana, tok say on 30 may, 2021, as police pipo receive call say jaguda pipo don kill Ahmed Gulak, special force for police pipo, wey include Intellingence Response Team (IRT), Police Mobile Force (PMF), and tactical unit wey from di command kom, na im dem send go di place for Obiagwu junction, for Ngorokpala LGA of Imo state.
DI instruction wey dem give di team be say make dem catch di pipo wey do di thing, make dem fit face justice.
Di mot wey dem thingk say na pipo wey kill Gulak get am, na im Imo police pipo don stop since yesterday.
wetin pipo wey dey dere tok, especially di driver of di moto wey Gulak dey inside, wey dey carry am go airport, don describe di jaguda pipo, and di kin moto wey dem use carry out di jaguda waka.
Dem tok say na Toyota Camry wey be 2005 model, wey be silver color di jaguda pipo use, with sienna wey be 1998 medel and  golden color.
Toyota Hilux wey dem paint white, and one Lexus 330, wey dem paint gold.
(Dem no put registration number, because of security matter)
As dem don sabi di kind pipo wey di killer be, and di kind motor wey dem carry out di attack, dem later tell dem di way wey di killer pipo follow komot. 
with some kind lead, di team kom later establish wia di killer pipo dey.
Na for Afor Enyiogugu dem for catch di suspect dem, inside Anoh-Mbaise local goment area.
na as di jaguda pipo dey dustribute onion wey dey inside trailer wey dem confisticate dem catch dem.
Na onions full inside di trailer wey from Northern Naija kom.
as dem see di police pipo, di jaguda pipo wey dey protect dem fellow jaguda begin shoot gun to polic pipo, 
Di gallant and one wey don ready for battle
police officer sef return with gun shoot too.
Di six jaguda pipo wey follow do di killin, and four other member of di group get serious injury.
dem don kolekt three out of di four moto wey dem take attack Gulak.
Three Ak47 riffle, one pistol, five AK47 magazine wey get 92 round of live amunation, and criminal charm na im dem kolekt from dem.
Dem identify di jaguda pipo as member of IPOB and ESN wey dem don ban.
Di driver wey drive late Ahmed Gulak, and di victim wey survive don identify di dedi bodi of di IPOB/ESN member as say na dem attack dem, and di motor wey dem kolekt as di same motor wey dem use. 
During di face to face with di jaguda pipo, two armored personel carriers wey belong to police pipo na im dem take gun scater, but dem no spoil finish.
and Di video wey dem make afta di afta di attack show say Gulak wear jean trouser, and a blue shirt as im dey sleep inside im own blood, near di car wey dem abandon.
Na Gulak be di chairman of di Imo All Progressives Congress (APC) governorship primary election wey carry Hope Uzodinma enter as persin wey go represent di parti.
Dem even tok say e close to di governor, e dey visit di state welwel.
Why im dey for Owerri
Though dem tok say Gulak dey visit Owerri welwel since Uzodinma don enter sit, na to attend di public hearing of review of constitution wey dem do for di city carry am go di last time.
Westham hope make dem fit reach top-four don spoil wit how dem lose to Everton
Westham hope to reach top-four don spoil bikos dem no play wella against Everton wey dey hope to enta European league for Sunday
Di goal wey Dominic Caivert-Lewin score for di 24th minute of dia game show say dey don determine to win Westham wey don make mouth finish say dem go score for dat serious afternoon
Di closest wey Westham reach to equalize na wen Vladmir Coufal go shoot ball wey chop bar and Jerron Bowenno no fit hit am back enta post upon say hin dey the goal post front.
Pipo wey dey support Vice-president Yemi Osinbajo don show say dey still dey hin back as dem dey showcase am as pesin wey go be presidential candidate for di election wey dey kom.
Osinbajo tok tok pesin say hin no tok say he wan be president
Vice-president Osinbajo tok say all di small tok say hin get mind to be president for 2023 Presidential Election na distraction
Tori wey no dey confam don dey town say Osinbajo eye dey President post for di land
Laolu Akande, wey be Vice-president tok tok pesin tok say Vice-president neva declare hin interest to be president for hin statement on Monday 
Di Vice-president office don put dia eye for one Website bodi
supportosinbajo.ng wey dey call Nigeria pipo dem make dey join volunteer group to use support Prof. Yemi Osinbajo, SAN, dey prepare for di 2023 Presidential election
Details of di website and how dem dey beg don full Whatsapp plus di fact say dem dey tok say Osinbajo don declare interest for di 2023 election  
Di vice president office no get any konnet wit di group or di website wey stand for am and dey feel say di whole thin na distraction wey no necessary
Prof Osinbajo neva tok say he wan be president for di 2023 election, hin dey focus to dey work as Vice president for di current administration to dey face serious mata for di kontri
Di statement tok say; We dey ask awa pipo make dem stop all di wahala, make we dey face di challenges wey dey face us as Nigeria pipo, make we do well for awa pipo, make peace and prosperity dey we land.
Ndidi and Iheanacho don make Nigeria proud again for Leicester City wey dem dey play as dem carry di Kontri flag dey show off, as e be say na dia team win FA Cup.
NFF don congratulate Ndidi Iheanacho for di FA cup wey hin win for Leichester City
President of di Nigerian Football Federation (NFF)
Mr Amaju Melvin Pinnick, don send messasge wey hin use congratulate Super Eagles Midfielder Wilfred Ndidi and Forward Kelechi Iheanacho for dia win for Leichester city against Chealsea wey pipo been dey hype for Saturday
FA Cup final for England
Di two of dem dey di march for Wembley and dey celebrate afta di march wit Nigeria flag as dey join di list of di oda seven Nigerian Players wey been carry di England Cup
I dey veri hapi for Ndidi and Iheanacho
Dey work wella for Leichester City throughout di campaign and both dem and dia team deserve di honor.
I get believe say dis win go work as high morale for dem for di friendly march wey we wan play dis summer and di FIFA World Cup wey  wan start for September
I also dey hapi wit di Nigeria Flag wey two of dem use celebrate wen evrithin finish
Dat one dey awesome
Ndidi and Iheanacho kom be di second pair of pipo from Nigeria wey celebrate FA Cup wey dem win for England, dat one na afta Nwankwo Kanu and John Utaka win for Portsmouth against Cardiff for 2008 
Before dat time, Daniel Amokachi don win for Everton for 1995; Celestine Babayaro sef for Chelsea for year 2000, Kanu for Arsenal for year 2002 and John Mikel Obi for Chelsea for 2007
Afta Kanu/Utaka win for 2008, John Mikel Obi win again for Chelsea for 2009, 2010 and 2012, Alex Iwobi win for Arsernal for 2017, Victor Moses too join dem win for 2018.

Di herder-farmer kasala for Nigeria don turn to wetin dey show face for news evriday now.
To end Nigeria herder-farmer kasala: Di Livestock reform Plan
Nigeria federal and state goment dey struggle to implement one National Livestock Transformation Plan wey dey wan use control cattle movement throughout di kontri wey go kom turn to herder and farmer fight
Many state goment don endorse am, but e dey face some kind challenge.
Political leadership wey o dey work well, perception about hin purpose wey no korrect, budget constraints wey increase bikos of COVID-19 pandemic,  experts wey no dey to do di work and insecurity wey dey evriwer, dey block di progress
If di plan go fail as like di oda plans to modernise livestock management, di farmer and herder fight go increase
National Economic Council approve am for January 2019, di plan na to represent di effort wey pipo go understand pass to examine di livestock system wey no dey work well 
Di main part of di strategy na to fit kontrol wia grazin dey  apun, so dem go fit reduce di fight wey go wan happen between herders and farmers
Di movement get hope say afta 10 years,herders wey dey waka up and down mainly go get mind to dey put dey put dia cattle inside ranch and reserve for public grazin, wia breedin farms and oda mechanised livestock management go support wetin di sector go produce
By di time wey 2028 go end, di authority get am for mind to  don build like 119 ranch for all di state wey dey involve, make dem use am create like two million job for di livestock production, processin and market chain
president Muhammadu Buhari administration na hin make di plan afta one period wia herders and farmers  dey fight,  particilarly wen  di fight to much and he dey affect pipo for ghetto for 2018
Di Federal Goment wey get mind to drop moni wey go carry like 80 percent of di Transformation proposal wey di states wey dey involve submit, don dey take di first step to practice wetin dem plan, wey go include technical support wey go help dem state prepare to start work, tins like field survey and site mappin.
Plenti state don dey reactivate grazin reserve wey dem demarcate, dey open office, dey kom set up steerin committee wey go dey manage di plan join.
Di authority dem don dey do workshop and oda work wey dem go use teach pipo di benefit wey livestock reform get
As two years don comot for di 10-year plan wey dem do, dey neva build any ranch and dia obstacles plenti
Di kain kwanta wey I get wit di king
Abi you no gree?
Na dem dey responsible for veri high proportions for food and crop production
Subsistence farmers na di smallholders wey dey  consume di majority of dia farm output wey dey don hol back say make dem no participate actively for commercially oriented agriculture by a variety of constraints
no energy for nobody wey no hapi for me
Na me get am
na dis bring me kom conclusion say evribodi dey evil
dem don characterise dis system say e dey complex,diverse and risk-prone
farm dey always dey small, dem dey do am under traditinal or informal tenure, and e dey marginal risk-prone environments
Yields don low and farmers don dey lack di capacity wey go increase yields
we yarn life and prosperity for dis day
waya your aza
di emphasis dey on agricultural productivity, production enhancement and commercialising farming as an enterprise
i sabi evri-evri
Akpos and hin friend sit-down dey yarn
di yields wey di smallholder farmers dey get dey profitable
you dey kom
diz challenges don lead make plenti smallholder farmers , make dem pursue livelihood wey get lower-risk and lower-yielding agricultural activities
You be witch?
I dey my  road to sabo I dey go buy food suff
make I go call my papa
As developing kontries dey grow larger, richer, and more urban, di intensification of agricultural production go  occur in rapidly changing agri-food value chains.
aw far wetin dey sup se make i dey come ni
Dis development dey shift di competitive advantage away from petty farmers.
e dey important make we find solution to di problem
dis go require an intergrated approach of methodologies
di loan sharks don dey him neck
dis kain thing
dem send me errand for where  I dey work
di water don flood di whole farm
farmers plenti battle for 2020
for plenti farmers and oda stakeholders for di agro-sector, di year 2020 go remain as one of di years wey worse pass for di history of Naija unto say e introduced new dynamics wey millions of smallholder farmers go contend with
plenti challenges don dey confront di agricultural sector wey dey range from di issues wey dey climate change-related, conflicts and di complications wey don exacerbate from di global COVID-19 pandemic, wey bring come pain and heartbreak to farmers and agribusiness players
first, di COVID-19 lockdown and restrictions happen for di time wey dry season farmers suppose dey harvest dia crops and wet season farmers suppose begin cultivation
plenti farmers no fit go dia farms while odas wey get labourers wey go harvest dia farms since mechanization be huge challenge and harvest wey be manual, be di problem.
dem don introduce movement restrictions wey go curb di spread for di coronavirus locked-down markets wey don disrupt di rural economy
plenti farmers no fit sell dia produce wey go enable dem to buy seed and fertilizer, pay labourers/tractor services
even when dem don lift di lockdown for di agricultural sector, di price of fertilizer don rise so tey plenti smallholders no fit afford am
for some place di price don rise reach N13,000 for a bag of Indorama and Notore Urea
NPK 15-15-15 don rise reach N25,000 when di federal goment NPK20-10-10 wey dey under di presidential fertilizer initiative, wey dem suppose sell for farmers for N5000 no dey available for plenti places and areas where dey di price don rise reach N7,000 and e high pass dis for some places
for farmer wey dey Zamfara, Katsina, southern kaduna, some parts of kebbi and sokoto states, bandits activities no only deny dem access to dia farms but di men dey  also kill plenti for dia farms
dem raze down plenti farming communities
dem kidnap people  and dey demand ransom
plenti people pay large sum of money or surrender large portions of dia harvest for di bandits
plenti villages for those states don bekom desolate
di agric sector don witness one of di worst disasters wen one of di worst disaster wen flood wipe out 450,000 hectares of rice and maize fields  wey dem estimate at ova N3.5 billion for kebbi, Sokoto and kano states.
plenti of di farmers wey e affect are yet to be compensated as dia livelihood don destroy
di flood don worse since di 2012 disater wey wreck havoc across most of Naija's coastal and flood-prone areas wey dey kill people and e dey wash away farmland
meanwhile, as di flood dey bring pain for farmers heart up  for di North, na drought dey confront farmers  wey dey down south
for two months , farmers no get joy but watch as dia investments for crop don wither away
no dey disguise
anoda subsector wey di thing hit badly na poultry and feeds
di scarcity of maize for di begining don cause make price dey increase
e don also force poultry association for Naija make e send save awa soul appeal to di federal goment for urgent atention
di federal government don respond for di appeal and release 5,000 metric tons of maize from di nations strategic reserve for farmers in addition say dem go grant some of di big players licence wey dem go use import about 222 metric tons of maize wey dem go use augment di shortfall for di feed industry
howeva, dis na just short-term solution unto say three months don pass, di scarcity of soyabean struck, na dis make di farmers  dey express dia fear say by january 2021, di industry go shut down completely.
di scarcity result for serious feed crisis for di industry as prices don reach high record for hin history as e dey  rise from N2,600 for February to about N5,500
di poultry industry don lose an estimate of say N7 million jobs with figures wey project reach 10 million by january 2021 whereas  dem estimate di loss for investments conservatively say e dey about N1.5 trillion
while di poultry farmers still dey struggle with di challenges wey mar di sector, di crop farmers despite di daunting challenges wey confront di sector for di 2020 farming year, get buyers komin right up to dia farms even before harvest to make bulk purchase arrangements
dis na di first time wey di price of grain no gree come down for harvest time,  as e dey spark fear for hunger wey dey loom and di call make dem reopen di border, wey go allow influx for products wey dem smuggle through di kontri's porous borders
Di name of di lord na strong tower
3,000 youths go benefit from NALDA's farm estate for Ebonyi
di National Agricultural Land Development Authority (NALDA) don tok say di agency go engage at least 3,000 youths for Ebonyi state for hin proposed intergrated farm estate for di state
di intergrated farm estate go dey completed and commissioned by october dis year
di executive secretary of di agency, Prince Paul Ikonne, wey announce am for Tuesday tok say di proposed integrated farm estate go dey established for 104 hectares of land wey di state government donate
Prince Ikonne wey also dey Ebonyi state for a courtesy visit to di governor for Monday, Engr David Umahi, tok say dem go complete di intergrated farm estate for october 2021
we don see say di governor don key into Mr Presidents agenda wey concern achieving food security for di kontri
we dey establish an intergrated farm estate for Ebonyi state as we dey do am for oda states
di scheme go engage Naija pipo and e go draw dia attention to agriculture
From Jude Owuamanam (Owerri), Lami Sadiq (Kaduna), Bola Ojuola (Akure), Abdullateef Salau, Muideen Olaniyi, Abbas Jimoh & Idowu Isamotu
New oga Presido for inside Niger Republic don chook hand for terrorist eye on top crime wey dem commit.
Niger Republic new oga Presido Mohamed Bazoum don put hand for terrorist dem wey dem barbaric act don pass limit afta im enter power for Friday inside kontri wey dey face two jihadist insurgency dem.
Bazoum tok say di groups dem dey kill plenty innocent pipo, and by dat, say na real war crimes dem dey commit.
He tok say di leaders of di groups kom from oda kontri dem, say dem just dey attack Niger for nothing.
He tok say no terrorist leader don get any vex with dem kontri
Bazoum, wey be 61 years old, na im dem elect for two rounds wey apun for December and february.
right hand pesin of Mahamadou Issoufou, wey be 68 years, im step down by imsef afta im soend two fove yaer term for office.
Na im inauguartion be di first time wey elected leaders dey handova give each oda for Niger history for over 60 years wey dem don get independence, but di attack from jihadist and some kind plan to do coup don spoil di celebrate.
Niger dey suffer insurgency wey get close conect to Al-qaeda or Islami State (IS), wey dem dey enter west from Burkina Faso and Mali, and from nigeria as Boko haram dey enter from southeast.
E pass 300 pipo wey dem don kill for inside three attacks for di west since di year start.
Di one wey recent pass na when dem kill 141 member of di Tuareg community for march 21, inside Tahoua, one big desert wey enter Mali.
Bazoum tok di effort of Niger Rebuplic under am as di presido go focus on top Mali.
He tok say di current situation for inside Mali get direct impact on top security for dem own country.
Insurgents wey dem don link to IS get dem base for Menaka and Gao, for eastern and central Mali as Bazoum don tok am.
He tok say to fight dem go dey very difficult as long say Mali as a kontri no get full charge ova di region dem.
For early hours inside Wednesday, afta dem begin shoot gun near presidency for Niamey, di goment tok say dem don stop di coup wey dem wan do.
E describe di thing as act of of a coward and regressive wey be treath to democracy and state of di law. 
Na four coup di kontri wey dey for West Africa don suffer, di one wey recent pass apun for Februry 2010, and im komot Presido Mamadou Tandja.
Google tok say dem fit komot from Australia
Google don carry threat give Australia say dem go komot di search engine for inside di kontri, as di kontri don tell dem to dey share gain with pipo wey dey publish news.
Australia wan introduce di kind law wey be di first of im kind as dem wan make Google, Facebook, and oda tech companies dem to dey pay news pipo for di content wey dem dey bring.
But di firm wey dey for inside US don fight back, dem warn say dem fit komot dem service inside di kontri.
Oga Prime Minister for inside Australia, dat na Scott Morrison tok say lamakers no go listen to any threat.
Although Australia no be one of di big places wey Google dey take market dem things, dis news code wey dem dey propose fit be global test of how goment go begin regulate big tech firms dem.
Dis code for Australia go tie Google and Facebook, to negotiate wit publishers over di worth of dem news content if dem no fit reach agreement for di beginin. 
Di managing Director of Google for insde Australia, Mel Silva tell one senate siddon tok on Friday say di law no go work.
She tok say if dem pass dis kind version of di code to bikom law, Google no go get choice pass say make dem pack komot for inside Australia. 
But lawmakers dem attack am, dem tok say na blackmail and bully Google wan do for Australia seek of say dem raise di reform.
E go rech evriwia for di world
Shet una go komt for evri market, una go komot?
Senator Rex Patrick ask say shey dem wan stop di precedence ni?
Silva reply dem say di code na risk wey no dey tenable for dem operation for inside Australia.
Morrison tok say im goment dey committed make di law for get progress through parliament dis year.
Make I tok am clear: Na Australia dey make rule of wetin you fit do for inside Australia.
Na for awa parliament we dey do dat one, as im take tell news people on Friday.
Why Australia dey push for dis kind law?
Google na di dominant search engine for inside Australia, and di government don describe as essential utility wey no really get any market competition.
Di goment argument be say bkos di tech giant det get customer among pipo wey wan read news, make dem dey pay amount wey dey good to newsroom for dem journalism.
In addition, dem argue say di financial support dey necessary or dem embattled news industry bkos strong media dey vital to democracy.
Accordi to wetin Government tok, print media for inside Australia don suffer 75% reduction for money since 2005.
Na di thret wey Google tok say dem go remove dem entire seach engine na im tough pass.
Di lawmakers tok say news dey only account for 12.5% of di search wey pipo dey take Google do for inside Australia.
Poultry farmers don dey beg say make dem begin import animal grade maize and soya meal dem.
Dr. Olalekan Odunsi wey be General Secretary for South West Poultry Association of Nigeria (PAN) don call goment make dem facilitate as dem go dey take import animal grade maize and soya meal.
Odunsi tok say na di importation fit save di poultry business from collapse.
He tok say di importation of feed grade maize go  sustain di ova 500 million layers, 100 million broilers, 1 million breeders and oda class of poultry  until next harvest.
He also urge government say, for di main time, make dem no allow dem to export soya, seed and soya bean meal wey dem don process.
He beg governors for di region make dem pu effort for di production of maize as dem do for di production of rice.
Odunsi put mouth say maize farmers, soya bean farmers and di ones wey remain for Naija need to collabo to take work.
He tok say if government no intervene, say scarcity and hish price of maize and soya go threaten anoda five million poultry jobs if government no do anytin about am.
Today, na 210,000/MT dem dey sell maize for inside most state for South West, soye bena na 240,000/MT.
As di two item take important reach, di price for poultry feed just dey increaese from from N2750 to N3000 for April N2020 to N4850 to N5300 now.
For December, most farmer no fit sell dem broilers bkos of di cost of production don pass wetin ordinary Naija pesin fit buy.
Presently, egg don dey pass wetin average pesin fit buy, di price na around 1,300
so we really need make goment intervene to save di remaining ten million jobs for inside di poultry value chain for di economy.
as he take tok
Dem don suspend rep wey dey support Buhari fom APC
Di All Progressives Congress (APC) don suspend di member of house of Representative wey dey represent Kazaure federal constituency for inside Jigawa state, Muhammad Gudaji Danbaffa for six month.
In addition, dem don form one panel wey get seven member to probe di allegation of insurbordination wey dem charge di member with, plus make dem make recommendation inside ten days.
Na Hamza Dand head di committee, wey Sanusi Kaaure be secretary.
For di leta wey dem take suspend di lawmaker, di oga chairmo for di local government, claim say as dem take decide to suspend Gudaji, say na im constituent pipo for Kazaure Yama ward start am, and local goment sef put hand.
Our correspondent report say dem suspend di lawmaker bikos dem accuse am say he criticise di governor, say di governor go change di candidate wey di pipo want for di chaimanship and councilorship primariy wey dem just vote. 
Serena don cruise pass teenager Pigato for Parma Wta.
Serena Williams be brush aside di challenge of local teenager Lisa Pigato for di opening round of di WTA tournament inside Parma on Monday.
Williams wey be nomba for di world na im beat Pigato wey rank 572 and wey dey make her WTA debut 6-3,6-2, for di first meeting wey apun between di two of dem.
How North-Central govs dem fit optimize open grazing ban from South APC leader
As open grazing controversy don trend enter public domain, wey Southern governor dem don hit am with ban  durin dem meeting inside Asaba, di president, Farmers Empowerment Association in Nigeria (FEAN), plus Chairman of All Progressives Congress (APC) North-Central Forum in FCT, Honourable Obaje David, don examine how di North-Central governors fit respond to di ban.
Recently, di  governor dem for Southern state be meet for Asaba, Delta State, and dem ban open grazing to take cut farmers-herders crisis plus includin oda form of criminality dem.
Wetin be your take on top  di  controversy wey dis  decision generate?
evri human being get right for action and opinion.
But di most important thing be say once you take your own action, make you know consequence go dey.
You suppose fit consider di advantage and disadvantage.
I no be one of dose wey go tok say e good or e bad.
As a Nigerian, na your  right and liberty to live for anywia for inside di kontri with good faith and enjoy di freedom of association.
For  dis basis, I no go tell you say na good thing.
But as a leader for North Central, I go tok say na good thing, especially for North central zone, as per di potential economic benefit for us and di nation.
Di ban na advantage to us.
We need to tap into it and see how we fit make am real venture and make money from am.
Luckily for us, we get a landmass wey dey enough to accommodate di herder dem, no matter di nomba wey troop from di South enter di North Central.
Wetin beyour position about open grazing?
I no be one of di pipo wey dey support open grazing.
I believe more in ranching, bikos na im I de do.
I believe say if we begin do ranching, e go work out for us.
Make di governors for  North Central allow di national programme on top ranching.
Dis kind move fit make Nortj Central di place wey cow plenty pass, wia pipo fit dey buy cow and some allied products
E go kom bikom means of economic empowerment, for north central pipo.
We get di land wey southern states dem fit no get.
See for Kogi, Niger, Kwara, plus oda state dem. 
We fut give di herder pipo house, and ranch make e for be awa own advantage.
Di challenges wey dey follow di Fulani herders no be bikos dem no wan adopt ranching.
Di problem be say dem no really educate dem on top di advantage.
Dem culture dey nomadic.
As aresult, dem need beta education make dem for accept ranching.
We fit also adopt di method for Kenya, wey almost all family get cow, but you no fit  still see open grazing, as cow take plenty there reach.
Na wetin di southern governor dem dey tok be dat.
Di governor dem no show wia dem belong  in dis regard.
Dem no call for ranching or to say make federal government for put mouth.
Wetin dem dey tok be say di herder pipo don bikom problem for us, and make dem komot.
Dem tok say make herders kom apply for land, say herding na personal business.
But shey dem don ask dem pipo to apply for land like di herders?
As one of di pesin wey join for youth empowerment, especially for agriculture and value chain waka, why some government policy no really work, wetin be di way out?
Firstly, no other administration don touch  able to touch di lives of individual like one of President Muhammadu Buhari, wey you fit sit for your house without wahala and apply for facility and you go get am.
Also some credit facility wey dem dey call COVID-19 loan sef dey.
Many Naija pipo don dey collect di loan for plenty hundred of thousands of naira from inside of dem house without sat dem dey go offices.
Also, with say dem don dey expand some SMEs like di Bank of Industry (BOI), Bank of Agriculture (BOA) and di remaining.
Di challenge be say, we get two sides, dos wey go believe you and dos wey no go believe.
So, for dos wey no get believe for di administration of Buhari, notin get benefit.
But for us wey believe in Buhari, we dey benefit, and we thank god for am.
Kidnapper dem don kill driver, carry 13 pipo for inside Nasarawa.
Kidnapper don kill Adamu Usman, and dem don carry 13 pipo near  Shafa-Abakpa -Umaisha road for Toto Local Government Council of Nasarawa State.
Daily Trust hear say dem shoot am three times for im abdomen and e die around 9pm for university fo Abuja Teaching Hospital wia im and anoda driver Atahiru Abukwo wey dem shoot too be dey receive treatment together.
Another driver wey narrowly escape di attack Ibrahim Saidu tok say na aound 5pm on tuesday di incident apun, when plenty kidnapper with AK47 kom from inside bush to waylay four moto wey from Ugya village kom.
As e take tok am, di kidnapper waylay di vehicle and begin shoot gun for moto wey dey carry pipo from Ugya enter Abaji.
E tok say di kidnapper be surround di vehicle afta driver dem don loss control drive enter bush.
Dem carry 13 passengers wey include one woman wey neva too old inside bush as dem point gun to dem.
In fact, u be dey drive behind di four moto, na God save me say I carry persin for one of di village.
As I dey kom na im I hear say dem dey shoot gun, na so I turn back.
Di Ohimegye of Opanda-Umaisha, His Royal Majesty (HRM), Usman Abdullahi, tok say na some bandits wey remain for inside di forest dey responsible for kidnapping of travelers, resident and some farmer for di area.
he tok say some bandit dem still remain and dem dey do terror for di  community, beg state and federal government to collaborate take flush dem out patapata.
As we  contact di spokesman for di Nasarawa State police command, ASP Ramhan Nansel, he tok say dem neva tell am naything about di latest kidnap incident, he tok say he go follow di Divisional Police Officer for inside Toto Local Goment Area tok, and e go follow news pipo tok again.

di incident wey dem record for video wey enter internet for social media kom go viral on Saturday April 17.

Gbajabiamila don welkom as Ayade take defect  as PDP dey urge member say make dem stay unite.
Di Speaker for inside  House of Representatives, Rep. Femi Gbajabiamila, don show say e hapi as di Governor of Cross River State, Prof. Ben Ayade,  take defect enter di All Progressives Congress (APC), im tok say di parti open to evribodi.
