Di forensic Bill wey National Assembly wan pass: E dey relevant to di fight against corruption wey Buhari dey do
Di National Assembly of di Federal Republic of Nigeria for  Wednesday 19th
May 2021 for di House of Representatives and Tuesday 2nd
March 2021 for di Senate made history wen dem pass  into law, di Chartered Institute of Forensic and Investigative Professionals of Nigeria Bill, 2021 (SB.615 and HB.
791), afta dem read am for di Third Time for di both Chambers (SENATE AND HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVE).
Dis act na clear demonstration of  di patriotism and direct response of di National Assembly, wey dem take target, plus strengthening and re-invigorating national frontiers for di fight against fraud, corruption and cybercrimes, wey don enter awa kontri waka welwel.
As dem don pass dis bill, di 9th Assembly under di distinguished and able leadership of His Excellency, Senator Ahmad Ibrahim Lawan, PhD, CON and Rt Hon Femi Gbajabiala don show clearly say, say dem don carry dem legislative function for head, as e take be for inside di Constitution of di Federal Republic of Nigeria 1999, as dem take amend am.
And dis also attests to di fact say di National Assembly don wake to di performance of dem complementary role with oda arms of Goment for di fight against corruption.
Na wit hapi mind  and wit deep sense of gratitude dat I write dis, which has been put togeda as a platform for us to let Nigerians and indeed the whole world know what di Chartered Institute of Forensic and Investigative Professionals of Nigeria is all about and di unique concept we are bringing on board in order to complement national efforts in its quest to ride di kontri of corruption, fraud and Cyber-Crimes and oda related crimes.
Afta di senate dem don pass di Bill, and for view say na bi-cameral Legislature we dey operate, di  House of Representatives we dey always ready and resilient, under di able leadership of His Excellency, Rt.
Femi Gbajabiamila, wey  be di Hon.
Di speaker sef follow wetin dem do and he pass di Bill on Wednesday 19th May, 2021.
As una fit don hear before, di Bill wey dem wan take establish di Chartered Institute of Forensic and Investigative Professionals of Nigeria (CIFIPN) dey among di bill wey dem don tok NO to for inside National Assembly.
Di sad thing be say na pipo wey suppose dey put mouth for di fight against corrupt waka for inside Naija dey attack di bill, dem don turn to enemy for common ood.
Gud thing na gud thing, e no get substitute, na so bad thing sef be.
No mata as e take long reach, good go always prevails ova bad just as di light superior ova darknes take dey constant and unquestionable
e dey important say say make we see small of how e take happen for di National Assembly.
E dey interestin say, di Chartered Institute of Forensic and Investigative Professionals of Nigeria (Est) Bill 2021 (CIFIPN) na di 9th Senate first pass am into law  on di 2nd day of March, 2021 as e done pass di  legislative processes of 1st Reading, 2nd Reading and eventual for di 3rd Reading on di 2nd March, 2021 senate dem pass di Bill  into law  wit one voice when dem don consider di urgent need  for di noble legislation, of kos no be sauy e apun without plenty  thunder bolts from detractors  wey no go stop at any lenght to see say any legislation wey go help di administration wey Buhari lead to fight corruption no see see light of day but senate stand welwel and dem see am through. 
E dey very important for make public know say (CIFIPN) no be just any noble bodi but a new one for Naija wey dem target say make e bridge di gap wey don dey for long for di forensics space.
Today, di waka to get one standard bodi wey go dey regulate di practice of forensics for Naija for im peak and make Naija pipo rise make dem challenge di few anti-goment bodi wey fit intend to sabotage dis step. 
Dis bill wey National Assembly don pass, show say clearly dem demonstrate say dem dey patriotic and di need to strengthen national efforts against corruption, wey don stand dey block development for evri aspect of awa national live.
Dis beta step for inside legislation , wey di two Chambers of di National Assembly take, dey historic and symbolic, e dey happen at a time wey Nigeria dey need legislation welwel.
dat one go give beta way for im anti-corruption drive as di spate of criminal and corrupt waka don rise across di globe.
As we all sabi, crime don enter anoda level as science and technology don improve for 21st century.
Therefore, as dem pass di bill dey gud and e apun for beta time, plus e don show clearly say we get flexible and responive legislature wey sabi di thing wey dey apun for di world, and dem dey redi to do legislation wey go meet wetin Nigeria pipo dey talk.
Make we also tok say di journey wey dey for inside as dem take pass di bill make e for turn to law, don start since di 8th National Assembly, wia Distinguished Senator Ahmad Ibrahim Lawan Ph.D, CON wey be current Senate President sponsor awa bill, when he be senate Leader, bikos e dey important to di anti corruption waka of dis admiistration.
For beta understandin, when we be introduce awa bill for inside di two chamber durin di 8th Assembly, dem do public hearin wey carry evribodi along for inside di chamber.
Thereafter, and ontop say minority pipo wey be stakeholder oppose am, na Institute of Chatered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN) lead dem, di National Assembly pass di bill, with view of how e take get significance and di part wey go play for di fight against corruption.
Afterward, dem forward di bill give oga Presido, make e for put hand, but e neva put hand before dem scatter di 8th Assembly for inside June 2019.
Na on dis stregth dem take bring di bill abck for di 9th National Assembly, na Distinguished Senator Abdullahi A. Yahaya, di current Leader for di Senate, in view of as e take dey important.
We dey pushed to make dis clarification in order to clear di air on di cheap cheap propaganda wey pipo wey dey distract us dey tok say di 8th Assembly don reject awa bill.
 Also we suppose mention di fact say dem don mistake awa bill with abother bill dem wey dey similar wey dem just introduce for both di senate and House of Represntative Chambers. 
Dis bill dem, as we don scrutize dem with close eye, we discover say dem just copy awa intention and di thing wey awa bill stand for.
We suppose draw hear tok am say dem no introduce any of di bills dem for inside 8th Assembly, na only awa bill.
As such, na we be di first to carry bill wey big reach like dis (Forensic)
As we don see say e dey very urgent to establish dat kind great Institute.
Dem take di decision wey dem take establish di Institute afta dem study how di Institute dey take operate for other jurisdiction and how dem don take help crime detection, investigation and prosecution.
Na part of instruction make dem for know say awa Institute don dey since 2009.
And over di years, And over di years, we don train professionala to sabi forensic science technology, targeted at inculcatin di requisite skil dem for di pragmatic areas of forensic investigation and management, to wit:
 make dem fit take forensic analysis eliminate material misstatement, whether na by error or fraud; voice recognition analysis; fingerprint/signature analysis; digital forensic and cybersecurity; crime scene investigation; global anti-corruption compliance and enforcement; litigation support, forensic investigation capacities, preparation of forensic reports, fraud risk management, corporate fraud analysis, fraud prevention, detection and investigation etc.
You go follow me reason say for inside di obodo world wey we dey today, di normal way wey we dey take investigate crime, on to say we want stop am don bikom old something.
As such, make we as a kontri for do something wey get meanin for dis matter, e dey paramount say make we follow global trend and new innovations, wey dem put for ground to take fight corruption.
Na dis kind way we take reason to establish dis Institute wey get betta objective dat is relevant to di anti-corruption agenda of dis administration.
Time no too dey for me to tok about evrithing wey dey inside di bill for here.
However, I wan make you allow me to mention few of wetin di Bill go do, for di purpose of dis tok, as e take be like dis:
say make we for establish Chartered Institute of Forensic and Investigative Professionals in Nigeria, to develop and train professional for inside dis specialised field, with systemic and professional examination and certification wey go give better skil inside use of science and technology for fraud detection, investigation and detection;
To provide platform wey dem go dey take train and retrain of pipo wey wan bikom professional on top how dem dey take use Forensic Science and Technology tools and techniques dey investigate fraud for both public and private sector of di economy, as dem dey take do evriwia;
To promote high professional standards, ethics and etiquettes among pipo wey dey do di, in a bid to cut fraudul and corruption waka, and as well develop a mechanism for fraud prevention, as a proactive measure against corruption generally;  
To take fill di huge vacuum wey dey exist for awa  normal system of investigation weu don old with di introduction of a unique operation of forensic science to help di country from expending im scarce foreign exchange to hire foreign expatriates to do forensic investigations for inside Naija; 
To develop broad-based mechanism and training programmes wey go cut across all di strata of awa investigation architecture, involving professionals such as Lawyers, Criminologists, Security Experts, Judicial Officers, Court Registrars, and Economists. 
Dis one go enhance effective plus efficient disposition of cases as dem dey take do am globally; and
To take enhance anti-fraud mechanism for Naija, through di provision of a legal framework for di professional development and discipline of forensic and investigative professionals for Naija, among odas.
From di foregoing, e don show say di role of dis Institute dey strategic and important.
E also dey important make we tok say forensic science dey very wide and na field wey involve many oda, and e require effective and efficient regulation make we for attain and sustain high level professionalism and ethical standard.
Di broad spectrum of di scope and focal point of di Institute, includes but no be only forensic toxicology; forensic investigation; forensic auditing; digital forensics and cybercrimes, forensic autopsy; forensic law; forensic accounting; forensic nursing; forensic pathology; forensic engineering; forensic psychology; forensic DNA analysis; forensic anthropology; forensic linguistics; forensic deontology; forensic dentistry; forensic archeology; forensic graphology, forensic entomology, etc.
Accordingly, you go agree say awa Institute don bring unique concept enter crime detection and investigation wey follow international best practices.
Di concept pass as myopic pipo dey take thingk about awa bill don cover dem sense of thingkin, due to narrow-mindedness and inordinate desire to monopolise a system, wey don pass dem jurisdiction and scope of operation.
 On a lighter note, I wan draw di attention of evrione to di funny scenario dat is playin out now, and as a matter of fact, e suppose be a source of concern for all beta Naija pipo.
Wen dem introduce di Chartered Institute of Forensic and Investigative Professionals of Nigeria Bill for di 8th National Assembly, di Institute of Chartered Accountants of Nigeria (ICAN), kom out wit anger to oppose di passage bikos according to dem, na unnecessary duplication of function wey dem Institute don dey do. 
However, as dem don take introduce awa bill again for dis 9th National Assembly, and as we don see di overwhelmin and accelerated legislative support wey di two Chambers don give awa bill, ICAn don realize say forensic science na uniques field of practice, and as we dey talk, dem don bring similar Bill kom meet di House of Representative, as dem don fail wofully for dem attempt to stop di passage of dis awa bill. 
One fit ask, wetin don change between now and di past, wia ICAN get di view say make any oda Institute no dey regulate di practices of forensic science?
Your answer na di same thing with my own.
I for also like inform you say di Association of National Accountants of Nigeria (ANAN), also dey part of dis di episode.
 which was initiated and being promoted by ANAN. Just as dem ICAN counterpart, dey sef don introduce one bill for inside House of Representative wey di same structure with di Chartered Institute of Forensic and Certified Fraud Examiners of Nigeria Bill, wey be na ANAN initiate am, and na dem promote am.
I decide say make I tok all di fact dem make Nigeria pipo and even international community for understand di extent to which some pipo fit go say make dem for achieve dem aim.
However, dis development no disturb us at all, bikos we believe ontop credibility and ability of di National Assembly and also for di Presidency to do di correct thing, make dem no enter manipulate in any way, with dis unnecessarydistractions dem, make dem for no make mockery of do whole thing.
Na ICAN be di practical and antagonist for dis bill and we don dey see di reason now. 
Dem engage several bystanders into make dem write bad petition, dem even target di leadership for inside Senate, and e sound like say na bleckmail.
As dem don fail for inside Senate, di antagonist shift attention go House of Representative with di same bystanders as dem just dey write many many publication.
and again, dem fail.
Ordinarily according to legislative procedure, bill wey Senate don passgo only need concurrence by di House except wen dem get observation.
But for di case of di CIFIPN Bill, di pipo wey dey against am fight am until truth win for 19 day of May, 2021 wey House of Representative pass di Bill establishment of the Chartered Institute of Forensic and Investigative Professionals of Nigeria for Effective Regulation, Registration of Members and Determination of wetin di Standard Knowledge and Skil dem wey pesin wey wan bikom rigistered member must get and Qualify to Practice as Forensic and Investigative Professionals; and for Related Matter (HB. 791)
ICAN don register dem own Bill for inside di House of Respresentatives wey dem title  (REPEALING AND RE-ENACTMENT OF ICANS ACT.
Di new Bill wey ICAn bring get contain full provision to dey take practice forensic, plus say dem wan establish forensic university for inside Nigeria, and without am, nobodi go fit practice forensics for Nigeria, and pesin wey violate am go enter prison for some years.
Dis wan dey strange for ear for inside kontri wey plenty oepn eye pipo dey.
D tin wey make me api be say Nigeria no be Banana Republic
No mata di level of coruption wey dey dere.
We don dey challenge as House of Representatives take pass bill.
We suppose note am say, as we dey challenge di bill no be for bad belle, but bikos say we dey certain say di purpose of di bill na to stop presidential assent under di disguise say similar legislation don dey before.
We no go gree make dem deceive us and Naija people with dem wayo.
You go remember how ICAn take open eye oppose di CIFIPN and for inside one pubication wey dem sponsor by di Association of professional Bodies of Nigeria led by Engr.(Chief)
Olumuyiwa Alade on 24th May, 2019 make plenty effort to tell us say di law wey dey enable ICAN don give am power to do forensics and to pass di CIFIPN Bill go be like dem just dey duplicate law, but today ICAN don dey present dem law say make dem for include forensics inside di new law. 
Di question is, wetin don change?
Di same law wey ICAN wey ICAN don tell di public say e get forensics kom dey seek say make dem re-enact am.
As always, as we no dey oppose any group wey dey propose say make dem include forensics fot dem law, awa concern be say make one bodi no try perpetuate imsef.
ICAN and dem cohorts don realise dem inability to stop di passage of CIFIPN 
So dem wan get one union for demsef.
Na checks and balances dey fear dem, dem no go want want make anoda professional bodi to investigate dia activities bikos dem know wetin dem dey do to di economy of dis nation.
How dem go wan dey judge dem own case by demsef?
Dis one sound strange welwel.
On dis note, we dey  call on di National Assembly to beware of di wayo wey dis group get, dey no suppose dey talk from both sides of dem mouth,make dem kom dey  expect to use am cajole National Assembly.
Once again, we wan appreciate di commit wey di 9th Assembly put to make sure say dem pass di Bill, Naija pipo don know say dis administration dey ready to fight corruption by evri means and dem go encourage legislation wey dem aim say fit help dem achieve dis goal
We get confident say His Excellency, President Muhammadu Buhari no got hesitate to put hand for di Bill as soon as e enter im table
We dey call Naija peipo make dem kom take part for Forensic Profession.
Di profession dey open to all professional pipo for different area dem.
Di Institute get trainig section wey go guide and equip una.
I wan thank all of una, and also talk am again say we dey commited to stand with ethical standards as e take follow di way dem do am worlwide, as we dey give awa professional services, plus trainin wey go give us new ways to take fight corruption and crime wey be money matter generally.
I wan appeal give stakeholders and better Naija pipo say make dem support dis noble course, and to beg all of us to make efforts, so dat we go fit finish corruption together, di plenty security wahala, all ova di kontri and oda crises wey follow am.
Dr (Mrs) Enape Victoria Ayishetu, PhD, Pro-tem President, (CIFIPN) www.cifipn.org
Air peace don do test test flight with dem new Aircraft wey be E195-E2
Air Peace don beging test flight for dem two new Embraer 195-E2 aircraft as dem dey take prepare to begin use dem.
Daily Trust be report say di two aircraft na di first set among the 13 brand new 195-E2 aircraft wey di airline buy to helep dem route expansion.
 One toktok pesin for di airline, Stanley Olisa, tell news pipo on Friday say dem fly one di aircrafts empty from Lagos enter Owerri, Abuja and Port Harcourt make e for dey familiar on Thursday.
Olisa give hint say test flight to other destination go continue, and e add that e no go take long di planes dem go start schedule flight and dem go offer better travel experience to dem customers.
He tok say
Di brand new E195-E2 aircraft wey be di third go enter veri soon, dem tok say di reason why dem dey expand dem fleet ni di commitment to take satisfy di air travel need of Naija pipo.
As dem dey take do test flight na regulatory requirement wey dem must to dob before dem carry di aircraft put for regular operation.
We go fit remember say Air Peace kollekt di two brand new ultramordern Embraer 195-E2 aircraft wey get 124 sits for January and March dis year, as dem go kollkt 11 more.
Tela Maize harvest get potential to give 8 tons for inside one hectare
For di Tuesday wey just pass, di Institute for Agricultural Research (IAR), for Ahmadu Bello University Zaria, be invite relevant stakeholders, plus journalist, to kom witness di third harvest of di Tela Maize Variety Confined Field Trials (CFT) under im Tela Maize Research Project wey di  Africa Agricultural Technology Foundation (AATF) dey fund.
Dem derive di name for di maize variety TELA for Latin TUTELA wey mean protection.
Dis kind maize na im get protection against pest and draught for im breed.
Professor Rabiu Adamu wey be Principal Investigator, plus oda scientist wey carry journalists round d harvest, tok say di idea of di project na to produce maize variety wey dey resistance or wey dey protected against two major insect pest: stalk (stem) borers and Fall Army Worm plus another protection against moderate draught.
Dis is all about producing crops that are high yielding under stressed conditions; di stresses are Fall Army Warm and stem borers, which are major constraints to maize production. Na to dey produce crop wey dey yield welwel under hard condition wey dey do; di stresses dem be Fall Army Warm and stem borers, wey be major block to maize production.
If dem no control am, if fit cause loss wey reach 80 percent, plus drought if you no manage rain shortage welwel, you fit no get any yield.
Na di third time be dis wey don do dis trial,
Na for under dry season for march we do di first trial, and durin di rainy season, we do anoda one from june go enter November.
Na di third trial be dis from November go enter April.
Di Principal researcher tok say na wetin dem dey try showcase be dat.
As di three CFT trial don dey successful, pipo wey dey do research go need to test and validate dem to show say wetin dem record for inside dem research station dey perform well for inside di farmers field for different locations and ecological conditions as e go start for di rainy season of 2021.
By di time wey 2022 go end, if all tins dem work wel, Naija farmers go expect say make all dis hybrids dem dey wit dem.
Dr. Muhyideen Ayekunle, wey be maize breeder under dis project tok say from di two trial wey dem do last, di transgenic variety wey dem record give 17 percent advantage ova di one wey no get BT despite say dem don infest am welwel.
We don infest di varieties wey we dey put for trial three times unlike di previous one make we for take look how di BT gene take dey effective reach for di maize product.
With di outcome, researcher dem don tok say di yield go increase reach 17 percent.
So afta, we go analyze di data, and go prepare document to take get approval for environmental release.
We go submit di dossier give National Biosafety Management Agency (NBMA) and dem go review am.
Once dem give us approval say dis product, we fit show face for outside
and then we go fit get national performing trial.
Di  Director General/CEO of di National Biotechnology Development Agency (NBDA), wey be Professor Abdullahi Mustapha, for di event, call di scientist  dem to dey kontinu to search for abiotic and biotic solution to di challenge wey dey face farmers for inside di kontri. 
We don test some technology wey dey capable of providing solution to problem wey farmer dem dey face, make we take advantage o am and move forward, as im tok.
Dr Rose Maxwell Gidado, wey be di Country Coordinator OFAB Nigeria, tok di impact go plenty welwel.
Farmer dem yield go increase by 17 percent and you know say na productivity and harvest be di koko for farming.
Once you don gree, you go get plenty harvest and profit.
She tok say by di time wey dis kind of maize go ready to enter farmer hand, e go increase dem livelihood, money, plus di price of maize would kom down.
Manchester United fight back to take win Aston Villa
Manchester United be fight back to take Aston Villa 3-1 for away inside di Premier League for Sunday as Bruno Fernandes, Mason Greenwood and Edinson Cavani score for second half  to take put di celebration of Manchester City for hold.
Di result leave United for 70 points from inside 34 games, 10 point behind City wey don play one game pass dem and dem miss di chance to win di title for Saturday afta dem Chelsea beat dem for home 2-1 for Saturday.
Na Bertrand Traore pu Villa ahead for inside 24th minute with one brilliant strike wey enter top corner from 15 metres afta some weak denfendin wey di visitors do, as dem troway ball for dem own half plenty times.
Fernandes equalise for inside 52 minute wit penaty, as e send di golie for Villa, Emiliano Martinez di wrong way  wit di spot-kick wey im coolee take, dis one follow one rough challenge from Douglas Luiz wey Paul Pogba tumble.
Grenwood turn di match on im head four minutes later with one neat shot on di turn from inside di penalty area afta im don shake off di centre back Tryone Mings.
Edinson Cavani wey be substitute na im seal win for United with di goal wey im take head score for inside 87 minute.
After di tori wey komot for inside Daily Trust, NCC don ban sale and use of mobile phone booster
Di Nigerian Communications Commission (NCC) don put  ban on top di sale and use of GSM network boosters (for mobile connectivity) especially by banks, residents, goment agencies, among others to take  improve telecommunications services.
Di Commission be give di 14-day Pre-Enfircement Notice on Tuesday, signed by di Director Public Affairs, wey be Ikechukwu Adinde.
E tok say di warnin go carry effect from Tuesday and as e dey expire for di deadline, NCC tok say e go begin take action against pipo wey no follow instruction.
Dis one dey apun less than one month wey Daily Trust report on April 24, 2021 say pipo wey dey do business for Sabon Gari market inside Kano plus other business area tok say dem dey buy booster to improve di reception of di bad telecommunication network for dem area.
Some of di traders tok say di service no good as telecommunication service providers dem no dey do much to improve service on top di gain wey dem dey make for such place.
According to dem, plenty traders and dem customers dey engage for digital and online financial transaction (data-based cashless services) plus oda telecommunication-based service dem and dem still get poor call/data services. 
For inside di notice, NCC tok say as dem dey sell, install and use GSm booster dey illegal.
For di notice, NCC tok say dem just dey do dem duty to make sure say dem protect consumers, to ensure good quality of service and maintenance of technical standard of communication equipmant, and na as e dey for di provision of section 131 (1) of di  Nigerian Communications Act (NCA) 2003.
Dat kind act fit lead to sanction wey go involve moneyplus/ or prison, or di two (fine plus prison) as well as dem fit seize any equipment wey dem use for di illegal enhancement of network coverage.
LG polls: dem begin protest ova as dem take dey impose candidate for inside APC
Some member for di All Progressives Congress (APC) for inside Ogun state don do protest against how di parti take adopt some consensus candidate for some local goment area  ahead of di July 24 local goment election for inside di state.
Top pipo for di parti don announce say di parti go adopt consensus candidate for some local goment area, and dem go conduct direct and or indirect primary votin make candidate take emmerge for some.
Di protesters dem wey enter di secretariat of Nigeria Union of Journalists (NUJ), for inside Ogun State, be accuse some leaders of APC for Abeokuta South LGA say dem impose a candidate for di post Chaiman put for dem.
Dem carry placards wey dem write many many things put wey include We Say No To Money Bags  
for Abeokuta South and
 Allow Member of di Parti to pick who dem want, and said dem preferred aspirant na Farouk Akintunde
One of di parti leader wey follow lead di protest waka, Balogun Ololade, tok say make Gov dapo Abiodun intervene for di matter to save democracy waka from jeopardy.
Between DSS and pipo wey wan separate for some region
As DSS don put hand for ear for group and pipo dem wey dey tok and do things wey fit provoke and distrupt di ethno-religious environment and threaten harmonous co-existence of di majority common folk of di kontri, don begin dey sound like say na one pesin tok until dem force dem komot for wia dem dey deceive pipo.
Question wey don dey linger about who or which pesin and group di security agent dey follow tok na im dem  promptly vapourized for di heated rhetorical outbust of di nation prominent geo-ethnic agitator dem.
Afenifere, Arewa Consultative Forum (ACF), Ohanaeze Ndigbo, Northern Elders Forum (NEF)and Pan Niger Delta Forum (PANDEF).
E kom clear for all of us eye say dis na di group of pipo wey don kontinu to dey resort to inciting, unguarded and divisive statement and act dem, to take set kontri pipo against demsef to take put fire of tribal and religious discord, as di DSS din charge for one of dem warning.
Interestingly, non for inside di major suspect dem for di exploitation of some fault line dem to take kos ethno-religious violence for some part of di kontri fit categorically distance demsef from di treacherous and subversive activity dem wey security agent detect.
Dem chorus di same conviction say di DSS sabi di pipo wey dey responsible, dem only differ for di direction wey dem dey point dem accusing finger.
AS Afenifere tok say dis pipo sabi di ones wey dey responsible for di acts, but dem no fit touch dem bikos of di connect wey dem get, PANDEV tok am again about plenty pipo wey dey run alienated and ACF dey do like say dem no know, dem dey ask who di pipo be?
Since di DSS know dem and dem satanic waka, make dem take action to take deal with dem.
Di NEF sound like pesin wey no dey convinced with if say pipo dey wey dey push di kontri enter deep crises  and dem know dem, make dem treat dem accordin to di law.
You no need to be spook to know wetin di DSS sabi about dis flag bearers of geo-ethnic politics for Nigeria or to understand why dem all know say DSS sabi dem yet dem insist to pass di buck outside dem clique.
 Di truth be say dis pipo wey dey champion ethnic politics no sabi any better solution to di problem wey Nigeria dey face than make dem sectional enclave and chief dey lord am ova di remainin of di kontri as rulers, not leaders!
Dem dey desperate and unscrupulous to pursue dem inordinate ambition dem dat dem dey agitate absurdly and frequently to take break Nigeria up.
Ambition-powered mind games intoxicate dia geographical consciousness to reduce all it takes to excising di territorial contours of dia enclaves with di frenzied ease of cutting dia portion of di remaining crumbs of di proverbial national cake. 
To put am simple, to break up or out of Nigeria as one ultimate political panacea or consolatory opportunity to achieve inordinate ambition of pipo or group wey dey undermine di ambition of majority wa-zo-bia Nigeria commoner restlessly for enduring peaceful coexistence, e easy to tok pass to do. 
All dis group be major block to di steady attainment of unity and to dey live together in peace wey Nigeria don dey labour for since flag of independence.
For as long as dem kontinu to parade di political terrain as ethnic champions, na for so long wey dem go regard Nigeria as an entitlement for dem ethnic stake for di population, to be claimed or seized, and if all fail, make dem deconstruct am and disown am as state wey don fail.
Whenever dem meet, di agenda no be for say make Nigeria for progress and develop, unless di leadership dey dem hand firmly, odawise na all about hecking and jostling around wit barely concealed determination to deploy di notorious Nigerian Ph.d, pull-him-down syndrome against di incumbent non-indigene President.
Whether na ACF, Afenifere, Ohanaeze, PANDEV or Northern Elders Forum, dem existence and activities go dey oppose di quest of Nigeria for unity, peace and development.
Anoda indicment wey we no fit deny for dis regional separatist be say all of dem na sel-styled political pressure groups wey dey pretend like representative of various ethnic groups dem.
From di membership, E dey plain to see dat dey consist of ex-this
Ironically, dis political deficiency give dem di ginger to kom togeda, desperate say make dem remain relevant for democratic system wey elected representative dey run through registered political parti dem wit  legislative and executive institution wey dem establish wit constitution to take dispense good governance and dividends of democracy.
Na only nasty nuisance value wey di geo-ethnic groups dem get for awa democratic setin as dem kontinu with mischief, sabotage, blackmail and subversion wey dem intend to take make Nigeria ungovernable as dem dey threaten and dem dey attempt so dat if dem get chance dem fit regain political relevance plus kontrol.
Na why dem frequesnt meetin don dey cause security alert!
Wit dis kind predator-politician dem wey dem dey waka ariund di perimeter of power wit dubious intent and dem dey undermine goment wey dem elect just bikos say dem no dey involved for di, e dey beyond reasonable doubt say convergence of interest dey wey dey link dem overt activity dem and di covert criminality of kidnappers, insurgents, armed robbers, bandits and allied terrorists, combine to take make Nigeria no dey governable.
Na double danger fit describe di tryin situation of di Buhari administration as dem get to handle such nomba of formidable enemy wey dey unleash plenty assaults on national security for di time wey economy dey face new difficult things. 
To dat extent, only two group of politician fit dey: dos wey dey participate with positive mind for di democratic dispensation wey dem be partner for movin di kontri forward against all odds and dos wey get negative mind wey dey bring discord and disorder to take distabilize di kontri.
By wetin dem dey tok and wetin dem dey do, we all sabi dem!
At di end of di day, di majority fo Naija pipo be ordinary citizen wey dem condition to take survive no dey follow or depend on top wia dem come from.
Dem struggle evri day to make livin dey follow dem submission to di will of one God even as dem faith dey different.
Nigeria na dem fatherland wey destiny don put dem, and dem remain loyal, dem dey follow and dem dey pray, bkos dem know say dem no get any othe kontri to call dem own, togeda dem dey show how citizenship go fit breed true patriotism.
Dem also know say Afenifere,  Arewa Consultative Forum (ACF), Ohanaeze Ndigbo, Northern Elders Forum (NEF) and Pan Niger Delta Forum (PANDEF) don dey use incitin, unguarded and divisive statements and activities to take put citizen against one anoda say make dem fit put fire for di tribal and religious wahala for di political ambition of dem leaders. 
Di prayer wey remain for poor man mouth na:
GOD DEY,
NIGERIA GO BETTER!
Manzo Reuben na youth leader for inside Lokoja
10 die as terrorist attempt to attack army formation
Troops for inside di Nigerian Army, for Saturday, dem netralise not less 10 Boko Haram terrorist member dem wey wan attack troop of Operation Hadin Kai for Rann, wey be headquarter of Kala Balge Local Goment Area for inside Borno state.
Dis one dey come when e neva too pass 24 hours wey di Chief of Army Staff wey dem just appoint, Maj.-Gen. 
Farouk Yahaya enter as leader for Nigerian Army.
Di toktok manfor di  Nigerian Army, Brig.-Gen.
Mohammed Yerima, for inside one statement wey dey available, explain say di terrorist, wey kom for plenty number,  carry  gun trucks put for ground and attempt to infiltrate di main entrance to di town.
Yerima tok say, di troops wey dey for high spirit dey right on hand to take counter di move and dem carry humiliatin defeat give di terrorists wey abandoned dem evil mission and run.
Di troops be chase di runaway terrorist and make sure say no threat dey fortown and pipo wey dey there.
Troops dem destroy one of dem gun truck successfully and dem kolekt plenty weapon wey include one anti-aircraft gun, two machine gun and eight AK-47 rifflr as dem neutralise ten terrorist inside di process.
Daily Trust be report say Chief of Defence Staff,  Gen. Lucky Irabor, for Friday charge di new COAS to make sure say he build on top di legacy of late Attahiru as e go defeat di enemy wey dey do terror inside Northesat and oda region for di kontri. 
Second U.S congresswoman don test positive to take get COVID-19 afta di Capitol wahala
Pramila Jayapal, wey be member for U.S. House of Representatives, tok say she contact di Coronavirus (COVID-19) afta dem lock am for di same room with some Republican lawmaker dem wey no wear mask durin di wahala for di Capitol last week.
I just kolekt COVID-19 test wey dey positive afta dem lock me down for one secure room fot di Capitol wia plenty Republican wey no be say dem wicked not to wear mask but dem mock colleagues and staff wey offer dem mask recklessly, Jayapal tok am for one post on top her official Twitter account.
Earlier for Monday, U.S. Congresswoman Bonnie Watson Coleman tok say she sef contract COVID-19 with possible exposure durin by di time of di lockdown for inside di Capitol for Jan. 6.
Jayapal, wey be member of di Democratic Parti accuse di lawmakers dem from di Republican say dem cause make COVID-19 spread welwel and tok say make dem punish dem.
Any member wey refuse to wear face mask na im dem go hold accountable say e dey put awa life for danger bikos of say e dey sefish and na idiot.
I dey call for every member wey refuse to wear mask for di Capitol say make dem fine dem and make Sergeant of Arms remove dem from di floor, na s she tok for one post on Twitter.
E no dey clear if di two congresswomen dem dey inside di same room durin di lockdown for inside di Capitol.
Jayapal no hapi as U.S Presido Donald Trump fail to contain di COVID-19 pandemic for inside di U.S and vow say she go do evritin for her power to remove am from office.
Dem don arraing one man wey be 30 years ova as dem take assault woman for Edo
Di police don arraign one Gabriel Fidelis wey be 30 years before Ogbeson chief magistrates court for Benin say dem allege say im assault one woman wey be Rebecca Izevbigie.
Dem accuse di man on three charges wey be conspiracy, unlaful assault and malicious damage wey dey punishable under section 516, 355, and 451 of di criminal code.
Di prosecutor, Sgt. Kehinde Iyare tell di court say di accuse join  oda pipo wey don run to take commit di offence for April 11, for Estate Quarters, along Benin-Agbor Road, for Benin City.
She tell di court further say di accuse, with oda wey don run assault one Rebecca Izevbigie unlawfully by hittin and bittin her.
She be add say di accussed also use iron rod to break her for leg.
She further tell di court say for March 31, 2021 di accuse intentionally and maliciously spoil wash hand basin wey be di complainant own and di thing na N8,000.
Di accuse beg say im no guilty as di counsel Mrs E. E Idahosaapply for im bail and she tok say he no go jump bail.
Wetin follow be say, Chief Magistrate Mutairu Oare grant bail for di accuse for di sum of N100,000 with one pesin wey go stand for am.
He tok say di pesin wey go stand with am must bring two recent passport photo of imsef and dat of di accuse.
He give order say make di court registrar verift di informate wey dem supply and di place wey di surety dey live, he kom adjourn di case to May 10 for hearin.
Why National Assembly no fit impeach Buhari Senator for Oyo
Di Senator wey dey represent Oyo North Senatorial District wey be Fatai Buhari don tok di National Assembly neva see reason to take impeach President Muhammadu Buhari.
Do senator tok dis one wen im be pay Salah visit to former govnor for inside Oyo state, Rashidi Ladoja, he tok say e get process wey dem take impeach president.
Senator Buhari submission dey kom one day afta Senator Yusuf Abubakar (APC Taraba) and Cahir for Senate committee on top special duty tok say to komot president Buhari no go end insecurity for di kontri.
Pipo don dey call say make President Buhari resign or make dem impeach am as insecurity dey di kontri.
But Senator Buhari don tell d pipo wey wey want make di kontri break say make dem no create problem wey no go easy to solve.
E get process wey dem dey take impeach president.
Make anibodi wey dey call say make dem impeach di president give better reason wey reach to do impeachement.
We neva see reasin to take impeach di president.
If need dey, we go table am, discuss am, and di two houses must kom togeda.
To impeach di president no be wetin one pesin go just wake up one day and begin tok.
E get procedure.
Why you wan cause problem plus confusion wey you no fit solve?
Na so e ask
On top di security wahala wey di kontri dey face, di lawmaker tok say; we no get anoda kontri pass Nigeria
Nigeria na awa kontri and home.
Make we try to do internal security
Make we play awa own part; make we no leave everothing give government alone.
We suppose put local police wey go know all di places dem.
No matter how e take be, we sabi each oda.
For early 80s, we dey travel for nite.
But for di level wey insecurity dey now, something wey dey fundamental dey miss.
He tok say di 9th National Assembly don discuss security , pass 59 times.
We be discuss security issue pass 30 times for di 8th Assembly, and dis 9th Assembly sef don discuss am pass 50 times.
Make evribodi dey vigilant, even if change service chief plenty times, e still no go solve di security problem, as di senator tok,
Ranchers dem don support as CBN take put restriction for forex on top import of dairy 
Di Commercial Ranchers Association of Nigeria (CODARAN) don show  support for di restriction wey dem carry give  foreign exchange for dairy products dem.
Remember say di Central Bank of Nigeria don issue one circular wey don pass one year now on top company dem wey dem don restrict from foreign exchange to take import milk and dairy product dem. 
But durin one visit wey dem do to di governo of Di CBN recently, di Director-General of di World Trade Organisation (WTO), Dr Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, tok say di European Union (EU) don complian against Nigeria ova dat restriction.
For inside one statement wey  Dianabasi Akpainyang, wey be di CORAN tok say Nigeria be get di potential to take harvest dairy products dem wey go provide job plus create investment for local production of milk.
Di CBN governor dey korekt.
True true Nigeria be get di potential to take meet, plus sustain di dairy requirement. 
Akpainyang tok say di milk wey ground for collection and processing no near that figure for now, but he note say since e dey likely, e dey necessary make evribodi put leg for fire seek of say di development of local dairy sector dey urgent.
As e dey cite one report wey komot for inside CBN say Nigeria dey spend $1.5 billion evri year to take import dairy products dem, he tok say di figure go increase as demand for dairy products sef dem dey increase.
He be mention issue like poor productivity of local cow dem, cow nutrition, animal disease management system, as dem no get better organised system to tke kolekt milk, as dem no dey too get finance,insecurity, poor infrastructure, insufficient extension services, inadequate processing and storage facilities, low investment in research and development and and as dem no dey too dey use modern technology say na dem be di major problem wey sector dey face.
However, he tok say di Advancing Local Dairy Development in Nigeria (ALDDN) programme wey dey run presently for inside four states Adamawa, Kaduna, Kano and Plateau  don dey tackle di problem.
PDP frown face as APC claim say dem don register 2.5m for inside Lagos.
Uproar dey follow as di All Progressives Congress (APC) don disclose say dem register 2.5m members for Lagos for dem nationwide and revalidation exercise.
Chaiman for di APC  Registration Supervisory Committee for inside Lagos  Dr. Muhammad Bashiru, tok for di closing of recommendation letter for di supervisor say about 2.5 million don register for di 20 local government area for inside di state.
But di People Democractic Parti (PDP) wey be di leading opposition parti, don describe di figure as false and fake.
PDP tok say APC get habit to dey cook figure to make pipo believe say dem dey popular.
Di toktok pesin for PDP, wey be Taofik Gani, for inside one chat with Daily Trust be describe di APC as a parti wey be say na liars full am, he tok say di parti no popular again for inside di state. 
Dis one no be di first time wey dem dey carry figures wey no be true komot.
Even for di last election, di total nomba of vote wey APC get dey around 600,000.
He tok say di claim say dem get 2.5 million na false and fake. 
Our correspondent report say APC candidate Babajide Sanwo-Olu win di governorship election for 2019 with 739,445 votes while President Muhammadu Buhari get 580,825 vote for di presidential election. 
Di state chairman of National Conscience Parti (NCP), Wey be Comrade Bayo Ogunleye, don describe di claim by di APC s di lie wey great pass for di century.
But di toktok pesin for APC Seye Oladejo tell awa correspondent say di parti go prove say dem get nomba for di local goment election wey dey kom for July 24.
FG tok say Geographical Indication go promote diversification of economy 
Di Federal Goment don stress say Geographical Indications (GIs) go help in promoting diversification of di economy and also support participation for di African Continental Free Trade Area.
Di Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development, wey be Sabo Nanono tok this one for inside di capacity building workshop on top GIs for public sector /policymakers for Nigeria in Abuja.
Nanono wey di Deputy Director of Irrigation and Crop Development, Hajia Sugra Mahmood represent, note say if dem use di initiative welwel,  go support di preservation of di biodiversity of di kontri wey don dey face existential threat as effect of climate change and di attendant destruction of di environment.
As e take talk, e fit assist for commercializin di product of food culture and oda culture and e go enable actors dem for  di value chain to benefit from commercialization, especially for women and youth wey dey for rural area who are mainly involved in di production of di products dem. 
Therefore, dis workshop dey happen for crucial moment when dis administration dey work tirelessly to take diversify di economy away from hydrocabons by oda sectors dem like agriculture, manufacturing, mining tourism etc.
Dis kind initiative wey dey promote GIs go help to fast track di process for diversification of di economy and also support awa participation for di African Continental Free Trade Area and also globally.
Gis fit kos to revive economy for rural area as we don see am apun for inside di case of some product dem wey dem don brand properly such as Ofada rice, kilishi, Dudu Osun, etc. 
E go also make am di documwntation of awa indigenous knowledge wey be say e sad as we dey loose over time.
Di current administration dey ready to partner wit all di stakeholder dem wey dey relevant both local and foreign in dem bid to preserve di natural and bio-cultural endowment for di kontri amd also exploit am to strengthen di resilience of di economy, so as to provide a decent livelyhood for all Nigeria pipo, as e state am.
Earlier, di Minister for Satte Industry, Trade and Investment, Haija Mariam Katagum, for her welkom address tok say dem design di workshop to specifically train public sector and pipo wey be policy maker for Nigeria, with view of say dem wan examine how e go take possible to adopt Geographical Indication (Gis) legislation and policy enter industrial property and agriculture landscape for Nigeria. 
She tok say we no fit avoid as di African Continental Free Trade Agreement (AfCFTA) dey kom into effect, wey dey put responsibility on top pipo wey dey make decision to begin dey tok about as dem go update legislation wey concern industrial property. 
President for Israel don hold tok to take find new govt
President for Israel Reuven Rivlin don dey prepare for tok wit top politics pipo on how t take form goment afta caretaker Prime Minister Benjamin Netanyahu no gree to do am afta election for match no dey conclusive.
According to Rivlins office, talks wit Naftali Bennett of di Yamina parti and former opposition leader Yair Lapid of di Yesh Atid (Future) parti dey schedule for wednesday morning. 
Di head of state also invite representatives dem from di oda parti wey dem represent for parliament to present dem positions on di progress of di process to take form government. 
Na last nite di deadline for Natanyahu weu be right-winger to form a governin coalition.
Dis one mean say di camp of pipo wey be opponent to Netanyahu dey face chance to end di era of di 71-year old as heaf for goment.
Whether dem go succeed, however, e still dey open.
New election still no dey out di question as Israel still dey inside political crisis.
Netanyahu go remain as head for di interim goment as time dey go.
E don dey for office for 12 years continously and na im be d longest serving head of goment for Israel history.
Dem don dey do trial for am say im corrupt, he don reject all di accuse wey dem accuse am. 
Dem dey expect say make Rilvin appoint Lapid wey be opposition leader to form head for di goment.
Na im parti be political centre; for di end of match, e don bikom di second-strongest force for di forth parliamentary election for inside two years.
Rivlin fit also give di mandate to di Knesset.
For dis case, each member for di parliament fit try to find di support of 61 of di 120 members withing 21 days.
Ganduje don free 123 prisoner for eid-el-Fitri
Gov. Abdullahi Ganduje of Kano don grant freedom to 123 prison inmates across di state. 
Ganduje wey witness di release of inmates from Goron Dutse Prison on Thursday tok say di gesture na for di spirit of Eid-El Fitr celebration.
He tok say na how dem offence wey dem commit take big reach plus how dem don show sign of reformation when dem dey prison na im dem take select pipo.
Di governor tok say e decide to show for di prison to tell di inmate say goment for di state know say dem dey exist and dem dey see dem as citizen for di state.
Ganduje tok say di gesture na to to compliment di Federal Goment effort to further reduce as pipo dey take jam for national prison dem
Im advice di former inmate dem say make dem change dem attitude to life and say make dem pray for peace and stability for Nigeria.
Di governor also give 5,000 to each of di inmate dem wey e free to take waka reach wia dem dey go.
Earlier, di comptroller of prisons for inside Kano, Suleiman Suleiman, thank di governor say im free thousands of inmate since im don enter office.
Suleiman be advse di inmate wey dem free say make dem stay away from crime to avoid coming back to prison.
Ganduje visit remand home dem too plus children home wey dey for Kano as part of im salah celebration. 
Korda breaks through for Parma clay
On di eve for Roland Garos, Sebastian Korda wey be 20-year old American score one career breakthrough when e beat Italian Marco Cecchinato  6-2, 6-4, for Parma for a first title.
Korda wey be son of former world
No 2 and Australian Open Winner Petr Korda wey neva enter ATP tour final before di event for Parma, e neva win consecutive matches on top clay.
Cecchinato, wey win all im three title on top clay, be come from Brescia, wey be 90 kilometres from Parma.
Di fan dem wey dem allow enter di event for di first time be support di local boy.
Today I play one tough opponent and di no easy, na so Korda tok.
 Dem continu to dey cheer am on, but I dey proud for mysef.
and how I  take handle am.
Although im papa na from Czech, Sebastian Korda, wey dem born for Florida decide say na US e go represent.
Di victory make am di first player wey from America kom to win clay court tournament since Sam Querrey for Belgrade afta 11 years.
Dis na sometin wey don dey for my dream, na so Korda tok, as e add say im don expect say im go win title soon as e name one event for Florida in January.
I be really thingk say I go do am for Delray Beach, and e break my heart small.
Wetin dem no suppose wear for public: Negatin Nigeria's multiculturalism
By Bashir Ibrahim Hassan
Shey na pure coincidence say, as trouble be dey smell for inside Kwara state recently, dem dey considr solution to am for lower House for inside di National Assembly for di capital territory wey be Abuja? 
DI trouble wey dey for Ilorin na as dem take refuse of some Christian faith school dem to allow dem muslim student to dey wear hijab kom school.
Di solution for this predicament na di debate on top Religious Discrimination (Prohibition, Prevention)
RDPP Bill, 2021, as dem ridicule Hijab Bill for a section of media for Nigeria.
Both event be spark heated argument and often emotional debate wey, at di bottom of evritin, dey threaten to negate multicultural identity and reality of Nigeria.
Di whole idea fpr Kwara of di proprietor of school dem as dem ban Muslim student dem wey dey wear hijab nd dem sympathiser dem fit dey reduced to wetin dem no suppose wear for public.
Dis na anoda major part of di concern of di RDPP Bill before di House of Representative di humiliation and denial of opportunities
Wey female for Nigeria dey face bikos of wetin dem dey wear for public.
E dey clear say di former clearly breach di fundamental human right of di muslim students to take express dem faith without discrimination; even though di school fit get defence or taking dat kind position.
Di latter dey try to assert dis right no be for Muslim dem alone but also for Christians wiaver or whenever dem threaten dem wit discrimination bikos of di fauth wey dem show.
To run through di argument wey proprietor of Christian faith schools inside Kwara, easy for pesin to understand di pragmatic appeal of di argument say make Muslim children go oda school dem fpr oda pleces if dem no wan conform.
Di problem wey die argument get many. 
First, to tok say make Muslim student dem go anoda place unless dem agree to rule of di school on top uniform dey do very little to promote inclusiveness, wey be di bedrock of awa multicultural and multi-religious society.
Secondaly, di position dey ask moral question: shey we fit justify to base rule for school on top di Christian majoritarian of di school?
Then, di third one, di argument o go elsewia appear say e don ignore di difficulty dem wey dey inside changing school for a pikin.
Di inconvenience plenty.
As dem dey change school for pikin dem, pipo wey dey education psychology go tell you say, e dey interfere negatively with not just emotional but academic development too.
Finally, di christian faith school by demselves risk wetin we dey call ghettorization by concentrating students with di same religious belief dem for particular schools.
Di social cost wey dis thing go get for society plebty.
Di Commissioner for Education, Kemi Adeosun, argue, when she dey follow press tok, say di goment dey convinced say dem policy to allow willing Muslim schoolgirls to wear dem hijab for public schools go lead to sustainable peace and communal harmony wey build on top mutual respect and understanding.
For inside kontri wey guarantee freedom of religion, wey sign di declaration of international Human Rights, di basic question to ask na: how justifiable e be to deny child for inside Nigeria access to school of dem choice on top di basis of dem religion?
Na great concern bikos Nigeria na signatory to di Universal Declaration on Human Rights (UDHR).
Di UDHR insists say  all human being dem dey  free and equal, say dem colour, creed or religion no matter.
E contain 30 article dem on top right and freedom wey include, among oda dem, like di rif=ght to life, free speech and privacy.
E include economy, social and cultural rights, like di right to get health and education.
I see article 18 and 26 of UDHR very relevant to di issue wey dey for consideration and we quote dem for full below:
evribodi get di freedom to thingk or believe wetin dem want, including belief wey be religion own.
We get right to change awa belief or religion any time, and di right to practice awa religion for public pr private, alone or with oda pipo.. 
evribodi suppose get right to education.
Primary school suppose dey free.
We suppose fit kontinu awa studies as far as we get di wish.
For school we suppose dem suppose help us develop awa talents, and make dem dey teach us how to respect evrione human right.
Dem also suppose teach us how we go take get on with oda pipo whatever dem ethnicity, religion, or kontri dem kom from.
Our parent get right to choose di kind school wey we go go.
 All dis kind law na dem be di instrument wey give Muslim woman dem like Ilhan Omar di equality to take sit for inside di House of Representative for inside US and she still dey wear Hijab without say dem molest or discriminate am.
Ilhan Abdullahi Omarna America politician wey dey serve for di U.S Representative for 5th congregation for  Minnesota district since 2019.
Na di Deputy Chairman for House of Representative Committee on top Finance matter, wey dey represent Bida/Gbako/Katcha Federal constituency for Niger state be sponsor di bill.
Saidu Musa Abdullahi.
Di bill dey to address discriminatory conduct dem, plus to prohibit  as dem dey discriminate on top religion matter when e concern as dem dey give pipo work and di terms and condition wey dey follow am.
E go stop qualifyin and proffesional joinbodi dem, education institution, pipo wey dey do employment and oda sector dem to dey discriminate against person, student or personnel based on dem religion or di manifestation.
When passed, di law will bury issues such as what we saw in Kwara for good. When dem pass am, di law go bury issue wey be like wetin we see for Kwara patapata.
E go also address di bigot behaviour of executive dem wey dey carry dem prejudice enter public office and dem go still allow am cover dem sense of judgement.
Dem Suppose welkom di law.
After all, na only to expand and expatiate di provision dem wey dey for inside di Nigeria constitution and for UDHR document as we take tok am above.
E follow line with similar law dem wey dem pass for di kontri to take tackle social wahal and cultural practice dem wey dey harmful di law wey dey Prohibit violence against pipo and disability law (VAPP). 
As disability dey try to komot any discrimination wey dey face pipo wey get disability, VAPP dey face domestic plus oda gender violence dem for inside di kontri. 
One by one, pipo wey dey represent us for inside di legislative chamber dem don dey use legal instrument dey  tackle all social wahala  wey dey face awa kontri.
Dem dey address all dis social roughness no be to say law be no dey before wey dey address dem, but dem wan carry evritin togeda make dem for no allow see finish.
As e be like say road still far for UDHR, and instrument to take enforce am neva dey, di RDPP law and oda law dem wey resemble am dey ground to carry punishment give offenders.
As e dey contradict di view of critics, as far as di RDPP Bill dey concerned, no prove dey say dem wan dem wan put state of religion on top any state wey fit domesticate di law.
E no go against Section 10 of di Constitution for Nigeria wey support make Di Goment of do Federation or for State fit no adopt any religion as State Religion.
To push di argument, bikos di bill dey call for general public to dey respect di right of womn dem wey be muslim wey dey wear Hijab for public place, say na to only quench Islamaphobia.
For di final analysis, e dey go against awa multicultural pretenses to dey deny any Nigerian be it male or female dem religios freedom.
E dey against equality, and basic human right as e take dey inside constitution for Nigeria and di legal document for Universal Declaration of Human Rghts.
Bill wey go make dat kind decimation on religion bikom criminal, like di RDPP bill go get welkom nod.
Na from Abuja Bashir dey write.

Ibrahim prize for African leadership.
Issoufou don serve two terms wey be five years each as president from 2011 go enter 2020.
Na Mohamed Bazoum wey be former interior minister go enter office afta am as e take win presidential election last month
Di committee wey dey give di prize be praise di leadership of di Niger president afta im meet di economy wey dey among di one wey poor pass for di world.
Im tok say he cause economy to grow, say e show better commitment to regional stability and di constitution, and im champion democracy for inside Africa.
Na Mr Issoufou be di nomba six pesin wey go kolekt di Ibrahim Prize.
He don send tweet say di prize dey honour evribodi for Nigeria.
I see dis award as ecncouragement to take kontinu to thingk and act in way wey be say e go dey promote democracy value and better goment, no be for Niger alone, but for Africa and di world, as e take tok. 
Pipo wey don win di prize before include Ellen Johnson Sirleaf of Liberia (2017), President Hifikepunye Pohamba of Namibia (2014), President Pedro Pires of Cabo Verde (2011), President Festus Mogae of Botswana (2008) and President Joaquim Chissano of Mozambique (2007).

Di taskforce go also dey check issue of bypass of metre, illegal connections dem, tif tif of energy and oda form of sabotage.
For dis regard, anybodi wey dem see say dem dey sabotage in any way, dem go deal wit dem as di law take tok.
