IBEDC don carry give pipo wey dey sell under powerline
Di Ibadan Electricity Distribution Company (IBEDC) don carry warnin out against to sell market under high-tension wire to avoid badness.
Chief Operating Officer (COO) wey be Engr John Ayodele give di charge against di backdrop of di increasing tradin activities wey dey unde high-tension wire.
For inside Oshogbo, wey be capital of Osun state, mechanic shop, block industry, car wash shops, POS shops and smallsmall tradin be common things wey we see under high-tension wire along Power Line and Ring road. 
Engr Ayodele don beg wit residents dem to take safety precautions dem veri important and advice pipo wey dey sell under high-tension wire to move to place wey dey safe.
He also beg residents say make dem no call pipo wey no sabi to kom repair light and he assure dem say technical crew for IBEDC go dey available to rectify any fault wey kom.
He caution say pipo wey get habit of harassin IBEDC staff when dem dey do dem duty as di law take tok to stop am, he tok say IBEDC go explore all available legal options to take seek redress if dem harass any of im staff.
He tok say, e also dey important say make dem dey take oda safety precaution, like make dem dey supervise childrem important, to take avoid eletrical accidents.
10 pikin dem wey dem just born don die for fire incident inside India hospital
Ten new pikin dem die on Saturday for inside fire wey happen for hospital wey state dey run inside western Idia, as officials dem take tok. 
Na 17 new pikin dey di unit wey dem put pikin dem wey sick when di fire break for early Saturday for di Bhandara District General Hospital in Maharashtra state.
Seven new pikin die as smoke choke dem, and three die bikos fire burn dem, Maharashtra health minister Rajesh Tope told reporters.
Nurses and ward staff dem rescue seven babies.
Di age of all di new pikin dem na from few days to three months, as Prashant Uike wey be health district official for inside Bhandara tok.
Di goment don order say make dem probe inside di incident and to do safety audit inside unit wey dem take care of new pkini for di kontri.
Initial report don indicate say di fire fit don apun bkos of one of di short circuit wey dey inside one of di incubators, as Tope take tok.
Di staff tok say plenty black smoke fill di ward quick quick , as di minister take add am.
Dem don waive legal requirement for post-mortem, and dem don carry di children bodi give dem family, as Tope take tok.
Family of di victim dem go get compensation of 500,000 rupees (wey reach 6,814 dollars) for each family.
Police don pursue pipo wey dey sell newspaper bikos of dem report on top IPOB
Police don dey harass pipo wey dey sell newspaer and pipo wey dey read am for inside Abia State. 
Daily Trust be get news say na since weekend police from Aba Area Command don dey arrest pipo wey dey sell newspaper and pipo wey dey read am concerning dem report on di Indigenous Pipo of Biafra (IPOB).
Resident tok say fear be dey for Ama-Ogbonna Junction inside di commercial city when police raid di place on Sunday.
One pesin wey di matter apun for im eye tok say residents dey run to safety, as police pipo dey shoot anyhow, when dem dey try to arrest pipo wey dey sell newspaper and pipo wey dey read am.
Dem accuse di pipo wey dey sell newspaper wey carry di tori wey contain di sit-at-home order wey di  Indigenous Pipo of Biafra (IPOB) give.
Dr. Elendu Ukoh, wey di matter apun for im eyes, beg di state goment and igbo leaders to call di police authority to call dem pipo make dem for no cause wahala for inside di city.
Di kind of pipo wey we dey put for police dey make me wonder f we want anything wey good to from dis kontri komot.
How pesin go dey pursue pipo wey dey sell newspaperfor Aba, inside di mordrn world?
If you stop pipo say make dem no read hard copy of newspaper, shey you go still stop dem say make dem no read di same tori on top Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, Telegram, plus oda pipo?
Which kind old police style be dis?
Dem cause panic on Sunday as dem dey shoot and make noise.
Di whole neighborhood thingk say dem dey chase kidnappers. 
Na later dem discover say kom arrest one vendor and pipo wey dey read, weu gather for im newspaper stand.
How police go dey follow pipo wey dey sell newspaper fight?
Which kind problem paper fit kos wey social media no fit kos time 20.
He tok say: dis pipo no normal.
Micheal Anorue wey be anoda resident tok say almost all di pipo wey dey sell newspaper wey im visit for Aba
Dem dey empty for Tuesday.
He tok say, we hear as dem dey tok for Saturday and Sunday say di newpaper dem carry tori wey concern di sit-at-hom order wey dem take honour hero for Biafra matter, and my question be say, wetin wrong with am?
Di early political leaders dem for South East, dey remind dis reckless police officers say Biafra big pas IPOB, di better for dem. 
Shey as dem proscribe IPOB mean say dem don proscribe Biafra too?
All of us na Biafra pipo.
On di 30th of May, do World Igbo Congress (WIC) hold zoom conversation, wehere dem dey tok about hero wey fall for Biafra.
Why police no go Youtube, Zoom and oda social media wey carry di matter for air?
All di thing wey dem do na to kom street and begin make trouble wey no necessary.
I wish say di leader for Igboland go warn dis reckless police officer dem make dem no allow wetin dey apun for inside Imo State to enter Aba, bikos e go worst for evribodi.
SP Geoffrey Ogbonna, wey be Abia State Police Public Relations Officer (PPRO), deny say police dey arrest pipo wey dey sell newspaper and pipo wey dey read am.
NAMA dey frown face as air traffic controller dey lament poor tools
Air Traffic Controllers (ATC)) for Nigeria on Sunday cry out concernin di dilapitated navigational equipment wey dey for most airport inside di kontri.
Di ATCs wey dey under di National Air Traffic Controllers Association (NATCA) tok say di situation na threat for air safety.
Dem also tok say di International Airport wey dey for inside Kaduna o get control tower wey fit help aircraft to navigate without wahala.
Yomi Agoro wey be President for NATCA or one chat with news pipo for di weekend, to say di thing wey dey for Kaduna airport na watchroom wey oda aviation personnel dey use, say no be control tower wey dey for only air traffic controllers.
E also tok say oda airport for di kontri no get di equipment wey dey necessary to take navigate without wahala.
He explain say some airport no even get equipment wey dey function.
Even Kaduna no get control tower.
Wetin deym dey use dere na watch room (for firefighters), and no be dat purpose dem build am for, and we don dey call goment to do something.
We enter Sokoto, if rain fall, controller go carry umbrella to sit for di control tower, and wetin apun, dem don seed some of di control tower wey dem attach to di terminal building give FAAN, while di one wey dey stand alone dey with NAMA, but we don follow di two organisations dem tok.
We all still follow terrestial radio frequency fight, communication here and there.
Calabar dey dere; no airport wey you fit go today wey you go fit tok say dey work up to 80 per cent.
NAMA don employ and train 40 new controllers recently, but NATCA said di nomba dey too low to meet di shortfall.
However, di Managing Director of di Nigerian Airspace Management Agency (NAMA), Capt Fola Akinkuotu, tell Daily Trust say di claim dem no be true.
He tok say federal goment don put huge investment to take improve navigational aids and to take help safe flight operations.
He said, It is mere politics. Im tok say na ordinary politics.
Goment don spend plenty not too long to take improve aviation infrastructure.
I no just dey tok dis thing bikos say I be MD for NAMA.
If you wan hear di true tori, my suggestion always be say, ask pipo wey dey street, ask pipo for NAMA, dem go tell you, dem neva see good wey reach like dis under dis administration.
E dey painful say pipo go dey tok like dis.
We neva any Category Three (CAT3), dis goment don put two for ground, anoda two still dey come.
Goment don spend N1.7bn on top mobile control tower.
Also revitalisation of di safe tower sef dey ongoin.
We don dey reconstruct di TRACON (Total Radar Coverage of Nigeria) system. 
Oda sector dem suppose dey jealous us.
E-commerce for Nigeria: Legal framework, challenges and prospect
E-commerce dey refer to di use of communication technology especially di internet to buy, sell and market goods and services to customers.
As  per say we bi committed member of APC we dey convinced since May 29, 2015 wey di government of president Muhammadu Buhari just start, di wey dem dey put am on top pipo head.
If we for compare, President Buhari goment don record more achievement within di six years wey hin don use pass all di former goment wey dey under PDP around 1999 and 2015.  
We get am for mind to show all di achievement wey he don do with better evidence and experience for hin regime.
Na every week we go dey invite Nigerians to kom talk about di issue as per di work wey he don do.
As he dey so, we go  invite all di pipo wey dey committee for di party to kom put mouth for di campaign. 
We go even invite di other parti wey dey tackle, especially PDP make dem kom tok about di issue and make dem tok wetin dey don do wen dem dey power abi di state wey dem don control wen dem dey for power.
Di PDP National Publicity Secretary wey him name bi Kola Olagbondiyan and hin deputy wey him bi Diran  Odeyemi and anoda man wey dey for top wey he no gree show for comment
Goment don put hand for road and other housing project.
One land developer and di Chief Executive Officer of Perfect Estate Developers Limited, Arch
Dayo Babatunde don tell di government to shuk deep hand for di provision of infrastructure so dat di estate developers go deliver better housing project
Di tori wit di pressman for Abuja bi say, di real estate developer tok say infrastructure like road, drainage, electricity and water supply go open up sites where di developers fit leverage, wey go make house available and affordable for Nigerians. 
He continue hin tok say, he dey important make di goment get dat kind infrastructure as politicians go won claim am.
Babatunde shuk in one mata of one access road wey dey for Kuje town for di Federal Capital Territory (FCT) wey dem see as political achievement
He tok say na hin firm build di road for #200 million to connect di 600 unit Perfect Estate wey  dey for di area 
And di Corporate Social Responsibility (CSR) Project wey we do afta di goment no fit show bitter result.
Di developer wey dey for housing lament say, di money for di infrastructure wey kom from di private sectors to kom gain urban development. 
Di financial aspect na yawa.  
Out of wetin we dey use do di project, we go also cari plenty moni do di road.
if we no get better road you go see say to advertise di estate go kom bi a big kasala
We kom dey under pressure say make di road dey ready and make we build di houses too as per Babatunde tok.
Na  seven things go make or destroy Nigeria for 2023. 
Buffeted by deep  seated existence challenge wey di leaders no fit tackle, many people don belief say di future survival of Nigeria no dey sure. 
Di sign don dey certain and clear for di aspect of life; Many people wey dey under di country don dey under di control of non  state  actors , shrinking economy wey result to rising of inflation and poverty and social sector wey don fall yakata. 
But  di one wey dangerous pass na di lack of trust wey dey among our leaders, pipo and all di ethnic groups and di social class of pipo wey make up di kontri.
Di fact say currently Nigeria don dey go toward a delicate moment of hin existence as a kontri wey no fit bi denied. 
To dey sure, no kontri wey dem no face challenges from di start.
But di different wey dey between success and failure na di leaders wey no sabi manage di challenges and di way dem dey cope wit issues of di nation.
As he dey go, as we dey look di soso deteriorate wahala including di mata of our life all failure of our leaders of all levels of situations make dem take better hand hold di mata  wey dey face the kontri make he better.
Soso many Nigerians dey doubt say di future of di kontri fit no bitter again. 
Di thought of di people bi say di election wey go take place for 2023 go get plenty palava pass the ones wey we don get before.
Dey notice say di problem wey we see na him dey get solution, I don gather seven problems wey dey cause wahala wey need quick attention to solve and failing to solve doz problem fit make di kontri fall apart.
Di Fulani problem na him bi di number one koko wey of di matter wey dey cause kasala wey we gat take eye look into. 
Di soso fight we don dey hear about di Fulani herders and di farmers in kontri dey cause contradictory and hatred between normal pipo and di aimless families of di Fulanis.
We gat put mouth for di position wey Fulani hold in di histrorical, political and social evolution of  Nigeria. 
We fit describe Nigeria as country of joint legacy of nineteenth century Fulani Jihadist Sheilk Usman dan Foldio and Sir Frederick Lugard wey bi di architect of amalgamation and di first British colonial Governor-General of Nigeria
Sheilk dan Fodio 
na di first person wey establish Fulani dominance for an area wey get di size of two  third of di Northern Nigeria for di Fulanis wey lead di Jihad of 1804
Na for di political and social structure of dis dan Fodio creation wey di Britons build dia colonial enterprise for Nigeria, a legacy wey subsists to a large extent to dis day.
As a group, di Fulani wey bi single most powerful and influential factors for Nigeria politics.
Na dem dey control one half of di traditional/spiritual realm through di Islamic religion as well as di temporal turf of Nigeria politics and governance. 
Di Fulani don arrange dis special advantage in di struggle for di control of di soul of Nigeria politics opens dem to accusation wit some reason wey dey one use to control forever for political power in di kontri to comot and damage other ethnic groups
Now who kom put dat thing for they?
I dey so heavy Ladena and to say i go see dis kind for here!
Dis place nah d place wey people wey get plenty face-value dey reason than I despair and dis fact no make me dey balance.
I kon realize wetin dey before me. 
I fit fly and run away with oda people sweat.
I fit surrender fighting and my life go kon dey comfortable. 
But nah here I dey and I con see say I no fit stand alone. 
Shey make I stand alone
I fit fly, live and die. 
But na, here before me, on my ancestors land di aspect of not wanting to die.
Here I fit live life wey go full of event and so so enjoyment, of building and breaking to record and d barriers wey pesin neva break anywhere and to dey live to defeat hopelessness.  
Where people fit defeat hopelessness expect in d heart of darkness?
Maybe I go die while trying, but how man go die better wen he dey face challenges wey dey fear pesin like d one wey I dey face? 
We no need to build skyscrapers, d station for nuclear power or maglev trains, Nah we go build d next best thing. Maybe Conrad fit want a piece of doz things.
He don reach his highest satisfactions but we dey ten percent.
We fit rise and rise sote Lambs go turn to Lions and by dat time d sun go dey shine on my generation, I go kon bikom a fulfilled man
I go endure di  whole thing and maybe I fit see something chop from ham. 
If no be so, I go still be a fulfilled man even if I dey on my death bed oneday. 
Nothing sweet pass d happiness and joy wey person dey feel on deathbed. 
Nah him make me bring out new terms of my surrender.
We go dey fight dey go.
Huzaifa na di management consultant wey dey write from Abuja.  
Officer wey dey carry drugs and phones inside d prison nabbed Kano operative of Nigeria.
Correctional service (NCoS) don catch one of their officers who dey always carry hard drugs wey dey weight over 4.8kgs and eight big phones inside d correctional facility wey dey Kano
Yawa dey dI correctional centre on Thursday afta di warders wey dey di prison see and collect di hard drugs wey dem dey bring for d prisoners wey dey death row for kurmawa prison.
As per di report wey dem gather  wen di warder collect d hard drugs from d prisoners, d prisoners dey shout up and down and di authority don promise say dem go look into d matter wella  to know how doz things take enter di facility.
Di person wey dey tok to di NCoS wey dey Kano, wey be Musbahu Lawal Kofar Nassarawa, tok to di daily trust say na one of dia staff (wey dem no tok hin name) na di person wey dey steal for d oda pipo wey dey outside to dey carry di hard drugs outside di prison
He tok  say dem don arrest one of dia staff wey dey among di pipo wey dey carry di hard drugs wey reach 4.8kg and di eight  android phone go give di prisoners wey dey death row, say na di reason why yawa dey on Thursday afta dI police don collect ham.
He tok say dI staff wey dey among dem just get work for two years ago in 2019. 
We don hand ham over to di NDLEA so dat dem go fit carry out further action on di matter. 
Dem go carry him matter go court and if he dey guilty dem go suspend ham from work
Kofar Nassarawa tok say dem go find out since wen doz things  don dey apun and check if oda pipo dey involve in di yawa. 
He add to hin tok say di service go continue to work hard  to see if dat kind thing still dey apun for di facility. 
Daily trust even note ham say in 2020, dey arrest one woman wey dem see as she dey carry phone for di prisoner wey dey death row
He also tok say dem catch one man wey dem see with hard drugs wey she put inside noodles carton.
Di centre dey hapi as INEC create gender inclusivity department 
The centre for transparency advocacy (CTA) give kudos to di pipo wey dey INEC for di rearrangement wey dem do, wey kom lead to di creation of gender and inclusivity department (GID)
say dem dey unit for di commission.
Faith Ossai Nwadishi  wey be di Executive director for di centre tok say she dey hapi say INEC don reposition itself, she know say di need to promote very well dey di operation wey dem just start. 
She tok say di new arrangement wey INEC just create so, say dem (INEC) don create two department from di wey dey di department of Legal service, di department of clearance and complaint (LSC&CC) and tok di new department, na department of Litigation & prosecution (DL&P) and di department of legal drafting 
wit small days to di start of Ramadan fast for di Islamic lunar year of 1442AH, e no be news again say di holy month don dey near.
Na for dis sacred month wey di holy Quran get revealed to Prophet Muhammad (Salla-llahu Alayhi Wa Sallam, SAW) for di guidance of humanity.
For inside di month of Ramadan be one night wey dey better than thousands of month.
Bikos say Ramadan be one unique spiritual season, e dey important to effectively prepare hawasef for am so dat evri opportunity wey dey Ramadan dey optimally utilized; make we no take anything wit sipini hand.
Ramadan be di month wey Musllims always dey hapi to look up to.
Im be month wey no get contender.
Im be holy month wey Allah (SWT) promise say hin go forgive evri Muslim wey don repent; give mercy to evri seeker of clemency; and hin go forgive dos wey ask for forgiveness.
Make person dey prepare for Ramadan require make we know wen to dey watch out for di cresent of di Islamic lunar month of Ramadan.
By di current count of di month of Shaban on di Timing Chapter calendar, to dey look for di cresent is expected to start for Monday April 12, 2021 wey dey equivalent to 29th day of Shaban.
Abu Hurayrah (RA) report say di Prophet (SAW) di gates to hell fire go dey close for evri Ramadan period just like how di gates to paradise go dey open durin the same period make di wish and prayer of dos wey like paradise get answerd.
For place wey di cresent of Ramadan no dey sighted on the 29th day of Shaaban, di month go count say im don complete im circle of 30th day where Ramadan fast automatically start di next day, wey go be 1st of Ramadan.
We no suppose begin Ramadan fast until we hear say dem don see di cresent from correct sources.
For Naija, di tradition be say Muslims go wait for di announcement say dem don see cresent from His Eminence di Sultan of Sokoto, Alhaji Muhammadu Saad Abubakar.
Allah (SWT) tok for Quran 4:59 say
All of una wey believe!
Obey Allah, obey di Messenger, and dos wey dey places of authority among una.
Di more we dey kampe and we dey patient and wait and obey Sultan tok, di more united and strong we go dey as Muslim community.
We advise pipu wey dey part of di Muslim community to dey wary of unsubstantiated pieces of information wey fit show face for social media on wen Ramadan go start.
We advise di general public make dem stay away from news wey dem no sabi who tok am wy dey tok about seeing di moon.
Information wey no correct fit throw Muslim communities inside confusion.
Remember say Allah wrath dey wait for rumour mongers.
Di teaching of di Prophet Muhammed (SAW) discourage di observance of voluntary fast wey dey close to di start of Ramadan fast.
Dis na to avoid situation where voluntary fast, wey be prophetic injunction, is seen to dey part of Ramadan fast; di latter wey be obligatory act of worship sanctioned by Allah (SWT)
For dos wey dey observe di voluntary fast evri Monday, e dey advise make dem skip Monday next week bikos of di closeness to Ramadan; bikos e be 29th day of Shaaban.
As part of delibrate preparation for Ramadan and make we see chance take advantage of the spiritual benefits of Ramadan, e dey important make we review awa daily routines to create plenty time for engaging in devolutional activities.
Dis go allow us have more time to take recite di Glorious Quran (for dos wey no get am as routine) or more time to dey recite and understand the Quran.
Make we decide quick quick to observe Tarawih prayers in consultations wit individuals wey traditionally make up di prayer congregation for di family level or conventionally for public mosque.
Make we also define di kain task wey we dey engage during the day for Ramadan period, make we no miss out from observing Tarawih prayers afta we break fast or Tahajjud prayers afta midnight.
For us to preserve di sancuary of awa Ramadan fast, need dey to review awa usual interaction wit ICT platforms especially di social media.
The goment don ban Twitter
Im dey important to indentify and avoid some kain websites, television channels and radio programmes wey fit bring negative impact on awa Ramadan fast
Make we dey prepare to also avoid some kain toks for awa respective work place, make e prevent us for toking and hearing some bad toks.
Dem advise Muslim scholars, preachers, prayer leaders, presenters and anchors of radio and television programmes to avoid di use of provocative and discourteous expressions durin preaching sessions.
Dem suppose exhibit good sense of maturity as dem dey educate dia audience on how dem dey teach Islam
Wisdom and good tok, do yeye or insult, be central to effective and popular religious proselyzation.
Di kontri still dey struggle to overkom plenty wahala, e dey wise for Muslim clerics to abstain from sandwiching dia religion preaching wit politica and ethnic sentiment.
We advise dealers and retailers of consumer goods make dem no do yeye inflation of market price bikos of Ramadan season.
E dey wicked for any trader to dey see Ramadan as opportunity to dey skyrocket food price bikos demand of food plenty, especially sugar and fruits durin Ramadan
Make we dey fear God for evrithing wey we dey do and say to make moni.
We encourage philanthropic individuals, groups and NGOs to dey organise or support public breaking of Ramadan fast, at least for less priviledge Muslims.
Na time be dis for Ramadan for evri Muslim to extend hand of friendship, charity, and kindness to dia fellow muslims.
May Allah guide us to start and end di Ramadan fast in peace and wit ease. Amin.
Di leaders of some socio-cultural groups wey kom from South and Middle Belt part of the kontri for Monday don tok wit one voice say make emergency national conference dey wey go lead to di emergence of a new constitution and restucturing of Nigeria
Di groups, wey include Afenifere, di Ohanaeze Ndigbo, di Middle Belt and di Southern Kadunaa pipo Union (SOKAPU) tok am in Abuja for one dialogue session wey dem call Di Nigeria's 2023 Presidential Transition inter-ethnic Peace Dialogue.
According to wetin dem tok, e dey possible to reverse di current challenges wey dey face and dey prevent Nigeria from breaking into pieces if Federal goment listen and dey do wetin pipo recommend as solutions to dem.
Hin tok say moving forward, make all Nigerians get chance to dey exercise dia mandate and soverneignty on how dey wan live together and how evribodi go benefit from am.
Hin tok say the wahala wey we dey see for di kontri don start wen di military grab power in 1966 and remove di federal constitution wey for don guide di kontri to a viable economic and political entity.
Di leader of di Northern Consensus Initiative, Dr Awal Abdullahi tok say : Di North before now dey tok say dem no believe in seperation.
but as I dey tok, I dey tell you say if seperation go apun tomorrow, di North dey ready for am, we dey ready, make we all waka our different ways
and I dey tell you dis wit all sincerity.
Northern Nigeria before now no wan hear anythin seperation, but today, as I dey tok, di North sef don ready.
Wetin I dey tok fit dey controversial, but I dey tok di mind of northerners.
and I no get any apology wey I wan give anyone wey dey dis hall.
In reply, the president of di Middle Belt Forum, Pgu Bitrus, tok say Middle Belt no go pull out of di kontri wit di core north.
in tok say: if hin brother dey tok say di north is going, make dem dey inform say Middle Belt no dey follow dem waka togeda, una dey on your own.
We don serve and sacrifice for dis kontri
Di war wey apun, di middle belt dey di fight wit full bodi but di north dey dia area dey enjoy.
Former speaker of di House of Repesentative, Umar Ghali Naabah observe say leaders of di kontri no dey serve di pipo properly.
We get weak and irresponsible leadership for dis kontri.
We need to dey tok as one Nigeria, no be like pipo from di North or from the South, Naabah, wey also be chairman of di National Consultative Forum (NCF) tok.
Smoking dey kil 29,472 Nigerians evri year, FG tok am.
Di minister of Health, Osagie Ehanire for Monday tok say the research wey dem publish for 2021 by di Centre of di Study of di Economies of Africa showed dat 29,472 deaths for Nigeria wey attributed to smoking.
He tok am for Abuja as e dey quote di 2018 Tobacco Atlas report, durin di commemoration of di World no Tobacco Day.
Hin tok say di theme of dis year Woled no Tobacco Day , ' Commit to Quit' kom for better time wen di global community dey battle COVID-19 pandemic.
Na wetin dey apun be dis, as evidence don show say pipo wey dey use tobacco and pipo wey get underlying non communicable diseases (NCDs) get high risk of severe Covid-19 outkoms.
To assit pipo wey dey use tobacco to quit go improve Covid-19 treatment outkom, he tok.
According to wetin hin tok, over 16,000 pipo don die for Nigeria from diseases wey dey reated to tobacco evri year,
E tok say tobacco use or exposure to second-hand smoke be di leading preventable risk factor for non-communicable diseases like hypertension, stroke, cancer, diabetics and chronic obstructive pulmonary diseases.
she tok say make minister identify a space for ministry to set-up call center office wey councellors go dey respond to caller need.
France don suspend di use of AstraZeneca COVID vaccine.
president Emmanuel Macron of France don suspend di use of AstraZeneca COVID-19 vaccine in di kontri, pending di time wey Europen Medicines Agency go finish di review of it safety.
Di decision to suspend di AstraZeneca vaccine be precaution, hoping say we go resume back quick quick if EMA stamp am say e good, Macron tok am for press conference, also tok say EMA suppose give announcement on Tuesday afternoon.
We get simple guide, make we dey inform by science and di competent health authorities and to do am as part of European strategy, he tok.
Hin tok say di suspension go dey ground till tomorrow (Tuesday) afternoon wen di EMA go make where e stand show.
Plenty European kontri, includin Germany, Ireland, di Netherlands, don suspend make pipo dey use di shot afta report show blood clotting incidents.
For dis stage we suppose getv confidence in dis vaccine, Castex tok on Sunday.
If not, we go get delay wit awa vaccinations and French pipo go dey less protected and di health crisis go last long.
Macron also tok say di French goment go take decisions for next few days in order to control di spread of COVID-19 cases afta an uptick in cases and a rise in hospitalisation.
We go probably get new decision to take for di coming days, Macron tok.
He tok say goment need  look at di reality of di pandemic, town by town, regioin by region: na wetin we dey do.
Hospitals for paris region don dey full, dem dey transfer patient out of di capital region to oda parts of France, oda hotspots of infection dey for di north area for Calais and di Cote d'Azur.
Macron decide agasint third national lockdown for end of january, hin tok say instead of 6pm nation-wide curfew and partial shutdown of bar, make restaurants and oda social and entertainment meeting places continue.
Fiscal discipline, be key to our success Okowa
Delta Governor, Sen. (Dr.) Ifeanyi Okowa, tok say adherence to e fiscal discipline and superior planning account for di success wey hin administation get for di last six years.
Okowa tok am in Asaba on Saturday
Hin tok say hin administration success durin di period be out of great coordination in administation and superior thought-process.
E recall say prior hin administation, di budget wey di state get dey around N400 billion, wey naira dey change for N180 per dollar wey dey against current budget of di state wey be N300 billion wit changing of dollar for N492
Okowa tok say following di devaluation of di naira over di years, di value wey naira fit impact on project dey less.
E tok say before before we get bigger budget and gretaer value for moni bikos say di naira sey strong at N180 to a dollar but now we dey N492 to one dollar and budget be N300 billion per year
Unfortunately, di current budget wey dey related to salaries dem don skyrocket, e don kos kasala to recurrent budget wey don make awa capital portfolio smaller.
Say devaluation don dey on naira don make am have less value on projects and as we don know dis now, we need dey plan.
Di governor tok say early passage and implementation of di state budget as part of di thing wey make hin administation dey sucessful.
We monitor di seasons and act by di season, dat sef help us
We make sure say awa budget get pass on time and we do watin we suppose do on time
We sign awa budget for december so we go get chance use window of january to May do most of di contruction jobs wey we wan do.
e mean say you go contend wit di rain to deliver project, e tok.
e add say di strategy don help but e dey take lpot of prudence, you go need to think well and get time to be able to do all dis thing well.
On di two years wey remain for hin tenure, Okowa assure Deltans say e go continue to work well till e leave office so e go fit leave a stronger Delta.
Okowa tok say hin administation go continue to dey do good for health, agreiculture and education.
He tok say he know say politics dey distract person, but by the grace of God, e get di capacity to manage di two well.
Make di stuggle continue even if e take hin life, Sowore tok
Omoyele Sowore, wey be human rights activist don tell hin supporters to carry on even if e die
As e dey react to wetin apun for Unity Fountain in Abuja on Monday morning, Sowore identify di officer wey shot am as ACP Etine
Inibehe Effiong wey be one of Sowore lawyer, don tok say di officer fire teargas at di right tight of di activist.
Na for facebook I watch as dem take shot Sowore
Na wetin dem turn Nigeria to be dis under Buhari
Dem don declare war on di Civic Space
Di FCT Police Commissioner don fence Unity Fountain wit iron and cable to prrevent make protest apun.
Dis be criminal offence under di Anti-Touture Act of 2017
Dem tok say dem don carry Sowore go hospital
NIHORT oga don tok reason why tomato dey glot
Dr Abayomi Olaniyan wey be di ExecutiveDirector National Hoeticultureal Research Institute, don pinpoint inadequte expertise for tomato processing as di main kos of di seasonal glut and why di product no dey too dey for market.
Olaniyan tok for di just concluded empowerment training wey dem do for youth in areas of tomato and telfaria production.
E tok say di kontri dey produce 2.3million metric tonnes against 1.8 milllion tonnes wey dem produce two years ago while di national demand be 3 million
Ossai, wey Ambassador Chibuzor Okereke kom represent, advice dos wey benefit to take advcantage of di programme by expanding di skil wey dem don get before for farming
Chairman, NIHORT Governing Board, Major General Mohammed A. Garba, don describe agriculture as tool wey we fit use achieve economic development for Nigeria.
Di three reason why dey sack Mourinho
Afta we don look dis well well for Tottenham, I fit tell you say e no dey true.
Mourinho no take training bikos say e don sabi say hin time for Spurs don kom to an end
Di training session apun but hin no attend
Daniel Levy wey be Chief Executive arrive eaarly and e summon Mourinho to hin office wey dey training facility
Na dia he give Mourinho di news say dey don sack am
Daniel Levy wey be Managing Director no dey hapi wit Mourinho criticising plenty players afta dem no too do well for pitch
Di players dey angry ay Mourinho no dey support dem and for dressing room, things no dey go well.
Dem sack am for Chealsea, sack am for Manchester United and now Tottnham don sack am bikos say e turn on hin players and e no wan take blame for di bad results wey dem get.
Again, dey don prove di point say id players no dey hapi, managers must go.
Dem send di players text message say Mourunho no dey in charge again
Levy sef dey vex say mourinho don spend seventeen months for White Hart Lane and hin no produce team wey better pass wetin Mauricio Pochettino build.
Levy dey vex say players wey get quality like Gareth Bale and Dele Alli dey sit for bench as odas sef dey stuggle to get good result.
Di big kasala be say Mourinho don fail to deliver European Champions League football for next season.
Na di three reasons why Jose dey go back to Portugal wit hin family.
Premier League don finish
One thing wey bring smile to hin face be say Spurs need hand am over two years salary wey represent di time wey dey left on hin contract
Na cool 200 million
Lingard decide on hin future
As Arsenal and Tottenham dey approch am, Jesse Lingard don decide say e wan sign permanently for West Ham where e don score 13 goals for 10 match since e join on loan from Manchester United.
For di Hammers, manager David Moyes don allow Jesse get free role, e dey move across di pitch as attacking striker and midfielder
E don respond wit plenty man of the match performance
Unityed manager, Ole Gunner Solskjaer don tok say e go like Jesse kum back but no fir guarantee am a permanent first team place
Dem don tell me say United do set fee of 21.5million.
West Ham don pay 3million loan fee dis season which mean say dem go pay 24.5million. Wey dey more than wetin media outlets don report.

Uruguan superstar Edinson Cavani and Mason Greenwood don form elite club despite di wahala of languauge barrier
Togeda, dem don work to improve
Mason and Manager Ole Gunner Solskjaer tok say e be natural 9 and di 19 year old don develop bodily and mentally.
Solskjaer tok dis week say, e see say Edi dey appreciate Mason talent, e hunger and willingness to learn.
And in Edinson Cavani e dey learn from one of di best.
I no wan see Mount play wit hin back to di goal
Despite all diz good tok, I don learn say Solskjaer go play Mason out wide for di foreseeable future and believe e go move inside during di next couple of years.
e tok say maybe for futore e go fit play central striker
but I still think e dey years away
To be contre-forward for Premier League be probably di hardest position to play
I think say Mason dey more suitable to play dat wide role
Aguero don top di list of big clubs afta Haaland as e dey sure say  Sergio Aruero go leave Manchester City for di end of di season
plenty big clubs dey line up wan buy am
Chelsea be di latest wey show interest and di owner Roman Abramovich don tell di Blues say e go endorse any approach by making di moni available.
Howeva, e despirately want make di Blues sign Erling Haaland and e dey make am one personal endeavour to sign di Norwegian
For di same period, Juventus don contact Aguero agent to see if e go like link up wit Cristiano Ronaldo for Italy
Barcelona dey also keep tab on di Argentine and dem dey draw up big contract wey be performance base and e include huge win bonuses and appearance moni.
Chelsea and Barca dey see Aguero as dia fall-back position if any of dem no see di Norwegian super sign Erling Haaland sign.
Wijnaldum wan play alongside Memphis Depay
Di dream of Gini Wijnaldum to play for Barcelona for di end of di season no dey sure bikos cash no too dey at di Spanish club.
Manager Ronald Koeman dey try sign Memphis Depay from French club Lyon and e don form bound wit Gini wey dey play for Holland.
Gini amnition na to link up wit Depay for Barcelona and e pay alongside Lionel Messi
Both Wijnaldum and Depay dey out of contract dis summer and e mean say dey fit negotiate dia wages directly wit di club.
Gini agent don already work out a deal wey suit Barca and Gini
Depay future stil no dey settle.
Liverpool coach, Jurgen Klopp want make Gini stay but go only offer am twi-year contract but Barca don offer 3 years
How Guardiola teach Tuchel to flog am
Wen Chealsea flog Manchester City for FA Cup last week, many fans no know di big influence wey Pep Guardiola don be on Thomas Tuchel
E apun seven years ago for Munich wen two of dem dey work for Germany, dem two dey chop dinner one night and di tok divert go football side
Dem tok tactics and Pep cleared di table
E use di pepper and salt pots and oda things wey dey dia meal show positions for field and best ways wey dem fit ue players.
Pep tok how he change Barcelona, one of di club wey e don coach before, wen hin but Cesc Fabregas from Arsenal and change Lionel Messi to use am as false 9
E show Thomas how to dey create space on di field wit back three and back four
Until last week, di two don play each oda five times and Pep neva lose but last week, di tactic tok and lesson no no go to waste by Tuchel as e win di match wey dem play.
Kane pgbonge record
Fact wey dey sad but e be true
Harry Kane don break Liverpool record wey Robbie Fowler wey score di most Premier League goals witout winning trophy
Na why Fowler and odas dey call Harry make e leave Spurs and play for anoda place before e go be too late for am
Jude, you be di best
E dey ironic how sharpally things dey move for football
Twelve month ago, plenty clubs dey watch and dey think to bid for 17 years old Jude Bellingham
Manchester United invite and accept am for tour for Old Trafford and di new Carrington Training Centre
Last last, na German club, Dortmund Jude sign for becauise dem promise am first team appearance dan United
Bellingham dominate di midfield for Dortmund against Manchester City for Champions League.
E dey play wit confidence like a star player.
E don do same thing for Dortmund previous European macth wey dem play against Spanish Club Sevilla
So dis one no too dey new
Na Erling Haaland evrione wan watch but na Jude dem dy tok about
Awa correspondent report say street dey completeloy deserted for all cities as residents shelter for house.
IPOB through em spokeperson, Emma, throw twale for governors from di South-East for press statement as dem support di stay at home directives to commemorate di lives of doz wey dem kil during Nigerian Civil War.
Daily Trust report say tension don dey for five states of di South-East zone for di kontri ahead of di sit at home order.
Prof. Jibril Ibrahim wey be political scientist and public affairs tok say unity of purpose between secessionist and political leaders from di region
e predict say di relationship go dey short-lived
Prof Ibrahim tok say di proscribe group has, by now, show in a total attack against di Nigerian state though year of effective pursaunce of em agenda
According to wetin e tok, di major wahala be say dia elite don keep quiet for too long, and e dey very disappointing bikos di pipo of di South-East are spread all over Nigeria
Dem get fruitful investment all ova di kontri which dem go lose if dem go to war
E tok say e feel say dem no really care
Di pipo dey question di impose model of politicak leadership for di region
All ova for di region, na politician wey dem manufacture into office full dia
Imo State, for example, na governor wey finish fouth for election but e bikom first by di Supreme Court verdit
Di case of Okigwe North Central zone where a man wey dem disqualify succeed to dey manufacture into office
part of di narrative dey about di functionality or legitimacy of di political leadership for di region, Odinkalu tok
E point to di failure of di Nigeria kontri; di plenty non-state pipo like IPOB dey giove directives and di directives dey dey successful na di more we go dey see dis failure by di state.
E no tok well about awa national security at all at all
Wetin we know be say wen IPOB attack and dem dey force pipo to do things against dia wish and security agencies no fit prevent am
E just dey wetin we know say pipo dey comply bikos of safety reasons.
On governors dem, e tok say dem dey play politics card; dey tok say e think say dem dey dey politically correct mainly to help demsef and to avoid issues wey fit kom dia way
Di governors dem dey sit on fence but wetin I go like remind dem be say dis na one phase for insurgency.
E be like say dis chapter na to target security infrastucture.
Phase two go be to target pipo and e dey be like say phase three to be to target goment officials
South-East don shut down
di streets for five states wey form di southeast of Nigeria dey deserted on Monday as residents comply wit di sit at home order by di Indigenous pipo of Biafra
Awa correspondents report say goment officials, schools, hotels, shopping malls, and banks dey lock and market and roads sef dey empty for major cities of Aba, Owerri, Awka, Ebonyi and Enugu and odas join
IPOB throw twale for di pipo as dem comply, dey tok say soon dem go do dia referendum wey go decide dia fate
Daily Trust report say four pipo na em die for Ebonyi as security operatives fight wit IPOM wey dey enforce sit-at-home order for di area
Pipo wey dey essential duty such as doctors, nurses, journalist dey dey checked by security operatives before dem allow dem to continue dia journey
Like so, di streets of Owerri, di Imo State capital and oda places for dat area dey empty as resident observe di sit-at-home order.
Awa tori pipo ear say heavy mioitary presence dey along Aba Owerri Road, specifically for Naze
No 1, Akachi Road wey dem tok say dem kil some air force pipo for Saturday
Plenty security presence also dey Okigwe Road and for Imo State University round about.
Men of anti-kidnapping unit for dia patrol vans take ova Umezurike Hospital off Royce Road.
Heavy security presence also dey Airport Junction Aba-Owerri Road and Obiagwu-Ngor Okpala, wey dem kil former presidential aide, Ahmed Gulak, on Sunday
North Korea comot for World Cup qualifiers
North Korea don comot for next month qualifying match for di 2022 World Cup for Qatar, di Asian Football Confederation tok am on Sunday
Di Asian Football Confederation confirm today di witdrawal of di DPR Korea Football Association from di Asian Qualifiers for di Fifa World Cup Qatar 2022, na di AFC tok am
Dem no give any reason for why dem witdraw but South Korean media tok for early dis month say Pyongyang don tok say e go skip qualifier over corona virus fears.
Di covid-19 pandemic don force most of di second round of Asia preliminary tournament for di Qatar World to dey postpone until June
Di AFC for last month tok say e go change di format of di tournament make each group of five nations go play for one host kontri
Dem don pick South Korea as di centralise venue make dem host Group H, wey Turkmenistan lead and di two korean dey dia too, Lebanon and Sri Lanka
na fourth North Korea dey for Asian qualifying Group H, but na one point dem dey behind Turkenistan wey be Group H leader wit three game wey remain to play before dem witdraw.
AFC tok say dem go take decision later on di standings for Group H afta dem refer di matter to FIFA organising committee for competitions.
Di tournament double as qualifiers for di 2023 Asian Cup, wey go apun for China
Na almost a month afta Pyongyang tok say dem no go go dis year Tokyo Olympics afta dem tok say di reason na di pandemic na em dem decide to pull out
North Korea  be one of di first kontri wey close em border more dan one year ago to protect emself from di virus wey first emerge for neighbouring China
Di sit for house order also gain compliance for Aba, Abia State
Awa tori pipo wey monitor di situation for di three major area in di city
Heavy shoot dey apun for Nnodo for Ebonyi Local goment Area of Ebonyi State between members of di indigenous pipo of Biafra (IPOB) wey be suspect and di Police
Daily Trust also gather say di shooting skyrocket between di Police and members of di IPOB wen de dey enforce di dit at home order in residents for di area.
A reliable source wey no wan make hin name dey mention for print tell awa correspondent say motorbikes and cars were set ablaze durin di attack
Awa tori pipo hear say residents of Oyigbo no go market in compliance wit di ait-at-home directives.
Dey also notice say di gate of di popular Eke Oyigbo Market, wey Igbo pipo plenty for dia, dey open for business but many of di traders no open dia shop
For Poer Harcourt, di popular Diobu Market wey most of di trader dia be Igbo no open dia shop in compliance wit di order
One trader for Oyigbo Market, Ikechukwu Ibe tok say dey decide to close dia business for Monday to pay respect to heros wey die durin Biafra war
For anoda area for Jos, di Plateau State capital, awa correspondent report say shop owners especially Igbo close dia business area for fear of reprisal attack ova wetin dey apun for South East
Security agents, wey including Police and SSS, plenty for popular Ahmadu Bello Way, as dem dey try avoid violence wey fit occure for di area and oda locations wey dey di state capital
Awa correspondent wey go round Ahmadu Bello Way, Katako Market and oda area wey dey inside di state capital report say apart di Igbo, oda business owner also close dia business for fear violence wey dem no see say e dey kom wey fit kos kasala for di city.
Dem observe say igbo especially doz wey get dia business witin di heart of di heart of di city no open dia business for morning, as doz wey open later close for afternoon
E don reach two years since wen dem start di implementation of di free compulsory basic and post basic education for Kano State wey dem introduce for di beginning of Governor Abdullahi Ganduje second term in office.
For 2021, na N37.8 billion wey represent 25% of di budget na em dem allocate, less than 5% for last year for education wey dem plan to use improve and sustain di good things wey dem don achive on di implrmentation of di education policy for di state.
Di 2020 budget, wey dem need revise to capture di reality wey cushion du distruption wey di adverse effect of Covid 19 pandemic case, Ganduje goment wanr make sure say education sector carry 30% for di budget
E no be sweet tok to say di implementation of di free and compulsory basic and secondary education for di last two years for all pikin wey dey di state don record big success
E dey expensive, if we chock eyes for di amount of moni wey dem dey send, Ganduje believe say na di good time be dis to build strong foundation for di future of Kano children
Dis na wetin di governor promise and e don do am
For di period under review, di state goment big investment for di sector in di area of infracstucture, staff development and di provision of teaching
Di state goment don distribute instructional materials wey worth N1.5 billion to primary and junior secondary schools for di 44 Local goment Area for di state.
Di administation don distribute, for di last exercise, ova N880million to Community Promotion Council (CPC) wey dey for renovation of primary schools wey dey di 44 local goment for di state.
Di goment commitment dey renewed for plenty oda things wen for Tuesday, April 13, 2021, Governor Ganduje launch di disbursement of N148 million for grant to 1,400 public schools wey dey di state as aprt of di state Education Day activities.
Di grant dey also to make di state dey improve
Free education for di Almajiri pikin and integration policy
Since dem enter office for 2015, di Ganduje administation neva fail to provide moni for di development of education, even as di state don already pay part of di 2021 funding
Di state goment don dey strenghthening oda source of funding for di policy wey include resources from Education Trust Fund
Today, for Kano, 98% of teacher wey dey primary school for di state dey qualified.
Na through sustainable training and re-training dey take achieve di feat for primary school teachers for hin administration
Na almost all primary school teachers don obtain di lowest teaching qualification wey dem dey call Nigerian Certificate of Education (NCE)
di free education policy don provide opportunity to all school-age pikin make dem gain access to quality education for one full cycle of basic education
true true, as dem launch di free, compulsory basic and secoundary education policy, e don make serious impact as di data for out-of -school for Kano don reduce
Ova 5000,000 out of school pikin for di state don go back to school, as di schools wey dey di state don enrol dem well well.
Di state see big increase for school enrolment, as plenty intensive intervention don enter di education sector.
Muhammad Garba be di commissioner for Information, for Kano State
afta 6 years, Buhari neva see hin campaign promise do
E don reach six years wey Muhammadu Buhari All Progressives Congress (APC) administation enter power as dem comot pipo Domocratic parti (PDP), wey dey power for di kontri for 16 years
Di thing apun as plenty Nierians believe say a federal goment wey Buhari go be president go do wetin dem promise
Di incumbent president put hin 2015 campaigns for three major matta wey dey affect di kontri, corruption, insecurity and di need to make di economy dey good again
Two for di three campaign promise dey well arrange for di eight point agenda wey APC carry kom wey dem wan do for Nigerians if dem vote dem inside offive for 2015
Di agenda include war against corruption , food security, better power supply, better transport, free education, devoluton of power, fast and better economy and better heath care
Even as di three campaign promise wey Mr president promise neva too show, as Nigerians think say e go be, Buhari dey re-elected for di second term wey be four years for 2019.
Na anoda PDP candidate e defeat wey be former Vice President, Atiku Abubakar for election wey dey tight.
Buhari tok diz same promise again for di re-election campaign and e beg for Nigerian understanding for di mistake wey dem do in di past and for thing wey affect hin first term for office.
Analysts tok say di re-election dey possible bikos hin die hard supporters wey believe say make dem give am more time, and power rotation to di southern part of di kontri.
As six years don pass, di three promise wey Buhari tok neva dey show
Buhari goment no perform well, na em Dr. Kari tok
Wen we call am, a political analyst, Dr Abubakar Kari, wen hin dey tok about di current goment on wetin dey tok say dey go do for campaign, tok say Buhari administration no perform well for economy, fight against corruption and make dem fight insecurity.
Dr Kari, wey tok say president Buhari no do well for di past six years, tok say e neva deliver on wetin e promise to evribodi on matter wey e choose as hin signature project
Lekki seaport go create 2,000 direct job
Pipo wey dey drive moto plenty for fuel station inside Kaduna as NUPENG join warning strike
Di kontri sef enta recession two times as recession apun all ova di world
Make we ok am finish, di wahala wey Covid-19 kos, pipo still dey feel am
Beyond wetin apun, di management of di economy no too di good bikos na inconsistent and contradicting policy full evriwhere.
Di consequence, make we tok am simple be say, Nigerians no dey enjoy again at all as dem dey enjoy six years ago
Di verdict dey out on wetin be di true situation on di fight against corruption matter
For insecurity, even dem Buhari die hard fans know say Nigeria no too dey secure than 2015
Dem no fit track di Boko Haram insurgency again evenif na only for battle field  bomb dey blow
E dey frightening and unbelievable say dis kin thing fit apun under Buhari
Mr Osita Okechukwu wey be di director-general of Voice of Nigeria (VON) and wey be chieftain of APC wey kom from Enugu State, give Buhari administation above average score
Okechukwu tok say di administation don invest and commit plenty human and material resources for agriculture pass any oda regime for di post 1970 Nigeria
E tok say di process be step to economic growth
E kom admit say security worse for dis administation as Buhari sef no like as insecurity plenty all ova di land
Okechukwu tok say if we look at president Buhari regime for di past six years, if person no do ojoro, hin score am above average
Howeva, make we no pretend say e no get bad side
secondly, e don construct more road, railway and oda infracstucture wey we fit see more dan di 16 years wey PDP use for power.
Diz, to me, be foundation for how we go take diverse awa economy and make awa economy better
Di bad side be say insecurity dey di land
di insecurity wey dey awa dear kontri dey irritate Mr. President just as e dey irritate Nigerians sef
We need accept some error wey we do
Howeva, no be Mr. President kos why oil price go down
As hin resume office for 2015 nor di covid, wey give awa economy big blow and e worsen di security situation for Nigeria
Dr A. Babalola wey be senior lecturer and di head of Department of Economics for Al-Hikmah University, Ilorin tok say inflation be one of di KPI
No be all Nigerians need di National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) or Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) data
On security matter, Dr Babalola tok say er no need security threat index to know di level wey insecurity don reach for di kontri
Before 2015, banditry and kidnapping dey insignificat, but today, even piken for house know wetin di word mean and wetin ransom mean more dan wetin dem dey teach dem for school
Wetin kos am?
Na bikos insecurity don turn di tok of di kontri
Di present administation don reduce corruption and dey don do di economy well but e neva dey significant
On insecurity matter, plenty work still dey to do as e dey kos rumple on Nigeria economy.
Motorist go petrol stations go fuel dia vehicle for Kaduna on Sunday as di five-days warning strike wey di Nigeria Labour Congress announce start.
Di NLC on May 10 don tok say dem go ground all activities for di state from May 16, as dem start a warning strike ova di sack of civil servant by di goment
Di Nigeria Union of Petroleum and Natural Gas Workers (NUPENG) sef tell dia members say make dem shut down work for Kaduna State from May 16
Na wetin kos why motorist dey buy fuel be dis in preparation for di five days warning strike wey wan apun
One tori person fo News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) wey dey watch petrol stations for some area report say long queues dey most of di station wey em visit
Residents sef carry containers go buy petrol for different petrol stations and dem dey stuggle to buy di product
Some of di petrol station wey dem visit na A. M. Yola Petrol Station, Katsina Road, Mobil Petrol Station, Waff Road,  A. Y. M Ashafa Petrol Station, Ahmadu Bello Way, Edi- Jen Petrol Station, Ahmadu Bello Way and plenty odas
Mr James Audu, wey be one of di motorist for A. M Yolla filling station, Katsina Road, tell NAN say e decide to fill hin vehicle bikos say e dey fear say dem fit no work for Monday.
You dey aware say NLC go do five days warning strike for Kaduna start from Monday and you sabi say petrol dey important for awa movement and survival
I dey here to fill my tank and 25 liter keg wey I go use for my generator for house to make sure say light dey for house wen dem dey do dia strike bikos say eletricity sef no go dey.
Anoda motorist, Mr. Ibrahim Rasheed tok say make work no stop na e make am kom buy di petrol
I be fashion designer and I need power to dey do my work
light no dey, na em be say pipo like us need dey use generator and we no fit use am if petrol no dey, he tok
Mr, Rayyanu Ahmad wey be Station Manger, tell NAN say dem dey sell di product bikos say e neva hear anything from em ogas at di top
Na wetin dem tok say na why Ibrahim Magu get sacked as di acting EFCC boss afta dem probe on alledge diversion of recovered loot and dem replace am wit Abdulrasheed Bawa
As dem dey pursuit economic growth, na di drop in crude oil price dey inder di target, resession and Covid-19 pandemic in di midst of skyrocketing increase for di price of commodities.
Resurgence of insurgency terrorist don dey apun for North-East, banditry and cattle rustling for North-West and North-Central, dem dey kidnap farmers-herders clashes in di South-West
Di economy don remain in di doldrum
But make we dey fair to Buhari, e dey unlucky to face big and daunting challenges e clearly neva enviage
At di start of hin first time, elements from di Niger Delta embarked on willful blowing and destrucion of pipeline and flow station.
I assure you we go close once I hear anythin from my oga, e fit be later in di day
E go dey painful for evrione but we dey hope for positive response from di state goment at di end of di warning strike, Ahmed tok
Dem don take light for di state since 12:00am for Sunday
For one statement wey di management of Kaduna Electric release, dem infirm dia customers say di Transmission Company of Nigeria don knock off al dia 33kv lines wey dey di state in comliance wit wetin NLC tell dem.
Kogi police don catch tricyle operator wey dey rob passagers
Di Kogo State Police Command don arrest tricycle operator, Abdulmumin Jimoh, wey rob hin passagers of two andriod phone, moni and ATM card for inside Lokoja metropolis
DSP Williamns Ovye Aya wey be toktok pesin for di Kogi State Police Command, wey tok dis for Thursday, tok say dem arrest  di suspect by operatives of Operation Puff Adder, e tok say vigilante memebers sef help dem
E tok say report of di bad thing wey di suspect wit hin gang don na em kos why dem go arrest dem, dem rob a passager wey enter di suspect tricycle from Dumani Church Junction, wey dey along Ganaja road to Ganaja, inside Lokoja metropolis
E tok say na immediately afta di 200 units junction, one of di gang wey dey do like passenger na em cover di victim mouth and e put knife for her neck, and dem collect her Andriod, voters card, ATM card and N100, 000 cash.
Na afta dem kom push am out of di keke and dem run away
Na immediately di victim stop anoda keke and she narrate her palava gove dem
And nah N15,000 dem dey sell one bag of onion for market.
Wetin dis mata fit kos and how e fit take affect business for dat area?
Di mata don affect pipo wey dey di area join wit pipo wey dey sell di market.
Now pipo don dey fear and dos drivers dem to get mind carry onion go Imo state.
Evribodi dey fear di kasala.
We get moto ful ground wey nor greekari onion go Imo state.
Na wetin una dey do?
We dey follow we oga dem dey talk, we traditional rulers dem wit goment say make dem touch line di mata to do somtin put.
How North-pipo wey dey east take dey, wit dis kasala for dat area?
E be like say evrithing  don normal.
Di garagara don go down, e nor be like wen di mata take hapun.
Jaguda-pipo kill one women wey get belle, kidnap lawmaker.
Jaguda-pipo na im dem tok say dem kill one women wey get belle for inside one attack for Abebe village, for Keana Local goment  Area, inside Nasarawa State.
Dem say di mata hapun early momo on Saturday, wey di jaguda enta di village wit bigbig weapon, kom dey shoot shoot, wey kom  kos gbege as di village-pipo dey run for dia life.
President of Tiv Development Association, Comrade Peter Ahemba, wey konfam di mata, tok say di attack and as dem dey kill Tiv pipo for Nasarawa na to chase dem comot for di state.
For inside anoda mata, jaguda pipo don kidnap one member of Nasarawa State House of Assembly, Mr. Ismail Danbaba wit in driver and anoda two pipo.
E hapun say Danbaba wey dey represent Nasarawa Central constituency for di State Assembly, and anoda three pipo na im dem kidnap for Saturday evenin as dem dey travel go Jos, di capital of Plateau for one workshop. 
One member of di assembly pipo Mr. Mohammed Omadefu wey Konfam di mata say na Akwanga/Jos road, wey near Sanga Local goment  Area for Kaduna State di mata take hapun.
Omadefu tell awa  news pipo say di kidnappa don follow di assembly pipo talk, but dem neva tok wetin dem go kolet.
Wen dem ask di tori, di Public Relation Officer for di police command, Nasarawa State, ASP Rahman Nansel yan say as di mata nor take hapun for Nassarawa, e no go shuk mouth.
Abeg follow di Public Relation Officer for Kaduna talk.
E tok say Nasarawa State Command nor hear about di mata.
Cement wey cost; Dangote wan raise Gboko plant up. 
Di management of Dangote Cement don redi to make cement plenty more more for market as dem wan raise Gboko plant up, wey stop to dey work four years ago.
Di Group Sales and Marketing Director (GSMD) of Dangote Cement, Rabi Umar na im tok dis one on Thursday wen e dey follow professional dem for building industry dey yan.
The company don wake and dey work to make cement plenty yafuyafu across di state dem.
Dangote wan add 2000 trucks put wetin dem dey supply as dem wan raise Gboko Plant and add put wetin dem dey produce.
Di Oga patatata for Council for di Regulation of Engineering in Nigeria (COREN), Prof. Joseph Odigwe tell pipo wey folo say Nigeria Cement industry dey produce cement weyrish international standard.
Engr. Aliyu Aliyu, tok say Dangote cement don gain di mind of pipo for di contri, he add say  brand specification go good so dat pipo go fit dey use am wella
3 name disappear comot for U.S. Intel report ontop Khashoggi after Report wey dem first give ontop release.
Di U.S. Intelligence community onto di report wey dem dey wait since don carry anoda version of report wey no carry di name of three men replace d beforebefore ontop di kill wey dem kill Saudi journalist Jamal Khashoggi. CNN yan on monday say; E don dey dey one kain.
On Friday, di U.S. intelligence community drag one report comot, dem say di Saudi crown prince don approve di operation wey kill Khashoggi in 2018.
Later dat day, di U.S. Treasury announce punishment give di former deputy head of Saudi intelligence, Ahmed al-Asiri, and di personal protective detail of di crown prince.
Saudi Arabia, don yan back say di information wey say di kingdom leadership get hand for di mata na lie, dem add say di kingdom don send pipo we wey get hand for di mata go prison.
As news pipo take yan am, di three men wey dem comot dia name for di report sabi somtin or get hand for di death of Jamal Khashoggi.
The first name na Abdulla Mohammed Alhoeriny, wey be di broda of General Abdulaziz bin Mohammed al-Howraini wey still be oga for Security for di State, as di news pipo take tok, dem still tok persin wey sabi how Saudi Intelligence dem take dey work.
Dem mesion Abdulla name join di tori as pesin wey dey assist di Oga patapata of state security ontop counterterrorism.
The two oda name wey later disappear comot be Yasir Khalid Alsalem and Ibrahim al-Salim, CNN yan say, who dem be no dey clear.
The Office of di Director of National Intelligence declined to clarify to di broadcaster why di names were initially included in di report, while a senior U.S. administration official said on Friday before di change was noticed dat there was no new information in di report.
We comot di document wey dey website becos di one wey dey before do mistake carry three names wey nor suppose dey. One ODNI spokespersin na im yan CNN like that.
Khahoggi miss in 2018 after im enter Saudi travel house for Istanbul.
Riyadh first tok say im nor sabi anytin about wia Khashoggi dey but kom later gree say na kill dem kill am for inside on mission we dey diplomatic.
Saudi goment send many pipo go gbaga ontop kill wey dem kill Khashoggi as dem deny allegations say member of di royal family get hand for di mata. 
Wetin Saudi Arabia tok don dey support by a many kontri for Arab, plus United Arab Emirates, Bahrain and Kuwait, wit Arab League join.
Reason why wheat still dey cost.
For uncountable years, di tori of wheat for Nigeria dey dey well even as federal goment and task force take tok say take add join wheat wey dem dey produce.  
Di shallenge now don force many farmers wey dey plant wheat carry dia power go dey plant rice wey dey enjoy funding and policies wey sweat body. 
Wheat wey dem dey demand for we domot don rish over 6 million tonnes (MTs) as we take dey plenty more more wey dem estimate say na over 200 million.
For example, di demand of pipo wey dey do flour dey na like 5.1 MTs while odas wey still dey use am dey use about 1m MTs.
Di rice wey dem dey produce now as Wheat Farmers Association of Nigeria (WFAN) take estimate am na 420,000 MTs, and e go climb rish 600,000 MTs wen dem start to dey plug rice next two months. 
Few month ago, di price of wheat rish N32,000 for one 100kg bag wey force flour and wetin dem dey carry am do like bread put money.
As dem take dey produce wheat dey waka slow because e get one wahala wey dey am drag am since 2018.
ABP not role.
Since 2018, farmer wey dem plant wheat, dem nor enjoy wetin Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) dey give dem again
Anchor Borrower Programme (ABP) after dem enjoy about N2.3 billion dat year.
This year about 285,000 farmers na im CBN done put hand but di moni palava wey show face as dem dey recover moni wey dem borrow for 2018, wey be about 40 percent, nor help mata.
The President of WFAN, Alhaji Salim Mohammed Sale, tell Daily Trust say dem no gree put dem for ABP even as dem get about 285,000 farmers wey dem don put hand and dey qualify. 
Alhaji Sale tok say as dem take dey recover take dey poor, first participating financial institution witidrewcomeot hand for mata and CBN nor gree make dem shange to anoda bank. 
Na di same hapun for 2019 wia dem don put hand for 11,000 farmers but dem not fit kolet di fund bicos of di recover of 2018. 
Alhaji Sale still tok say, dis year dem engage 285,000 farmer dem and CBN don put hand for di list.
Afta we follow Unity Bank talk, dem say dem nor wan follow us work, we kom waka go Keystone Bank.
Afta we don meet evri requirement, Keystone write letter to kolet moni for di programme, but some kain palava dey because e get one gbese wey we nor get moni pay for. 
So dem say make we waka go Unity Bank wia we get di gbese.
We draw out like three or four point say make dem continue di programme wit us so dat one; We go fit produce wheat wella; two, nor be di farmer wey march law dey go di programme so e go teach dem lesson and go make dem pay backcome join again; three, we go don learn from wetin don happun and we go bring something wey beta to take dey recover; four, to bring katapila wey go make di programme get head. 
He tok di best way nor be to stop di programme patapata but to luk as dom fit take improve recovery, e add say nor be all farmer wey dey plant rice, maize and cotton pay all their gbese but programme still continue for dem. 
E tok say dis go affect to dy produce wheat, tok say, as di ABP take dey, plenti farmer no go still wan go into production
Alhaji Sale tok say,na di joinbodi dey give farmers mind go plant becos of di agreement wey dem get wit pipo wey dey buy.  
You nor fit plant somtin wey u nor go fit sell.
We try make market dey between we anddimillers. 
Even each persin deycome tru di joinbodicome sell dia market to milling plants and dem dey find am easy.
Now we di programme nor dey, di farmer dey find am hard to sell their market inside di market. 
Two, E norish don dey for subsector of wheat.
Di only way wey you fit take cut import moni wey we dey pay down na to tok to plenty farmer make dem produce.
Seed wey dem tif for Jos
Daily Trust gather from reliable sources for di Federal Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development say during di #EndSARS protest about 3,600 bags of wheat seed wey don dey improve nah im dem tif.  
Na for Jos di capital of plateau dem put di food because di weather march am for bodi.
Since dis tiftif mata, nor farmer don see any assistance collect whether cash of material to take plant.
Even as seed nor deyrish, some farmers dem dey get seed tru di community seed production system wia farmers go save seed to take plant d following season.   
Price of food suppose dey one place CEO, Titan Farms.
As tins take cost fot di kontri, one Rice farmer wey base for Ibadan and di Chief Executive Officer of Titan Farms, Engr Gbenga Eyiolawi, don beg goment fordilevel say make dem try make price of food dey one place for di kontri.
Eyiolawi yan say as price of food nor take dey one place, e dey koba plan and budget of family as e dey beg goment for all level make dey more responsible, make dem dey amswer put for di thing wey nor beta.
E dey yan durin for di time wey dem dey launch Titan Farm City, we joinbodi wit Titan Farms, wekari estate and agriculture togeda, he yan say imcomepany for see say dem supply food year round and for price wey rukuruku.
Titan Farm City wey join join real estate and agriculture na wia  we dey plant instead of only to process.
As e dey now, na only process we dey dey do.
Na so, we wan ensure di supply of food year round; so nor all are food go dey process for here.
On top how to tackle food wey dey cost, he tok say, we nor fit bring kiakia solution, but we fit do wetin for be solution for near future.
Na why we get Titan Farm City to see say market and raw material for processin dey yafuyafu, make dem still see say price dey di same for many time.
We dey work and we dey do collabo wit farmer wey don dey before.
As e dey, we get wey do put hand for paper wit us to help dem process their havest dem.
Jaguda pipo attack bullion van,kari moni wey dem nor tok di amount go.
Two pipo die after jaguda pipo attack bullion van of one bank for Elemosho Village along Akure-Ondo Expreeway for Ondo East Local goment  Area inside Ondo on Thursday evening.
Witiness dem yan say di jaguda pipo carry Lexus come, stop and attack dis bullion van wey dey go Akure around dat kain 5pm and demkari moni wey dem nor tok di amount go. 
Witiness dem tok say; Dem shot three pipo for inside di operation wey take some minutes before di jaguda run enta bush.
One ofdiwitiness tok say one of di victim dey alive but im nor dey sure whether di other two dey alive.
Pipo wey dey live there run enta bush as shoot shoot dey plenti more.
Bullet enta inside two for inside di three moto wey join-waka.
Pesin wey see am korokoro tok join say dem call Ondo State Security Network Agency pipo Amotekuncome there and demkari di victim go hospital.
Kommander of di Amotekun, Adetunji Adeleye, say trutru di mata hapun.
Wen me hear di tori, my men enta dia and dem see one pesin wey dem shoot for di place and wekari am go hospital. 
E add join say; nor one die.
Like so,di,distate Police Public Relations Officer, Mr Tee-Leo Ikoro tok say di jaguda pipo don tear race befor police enta di place.
E say dicomemand do begin dey touchline di mata and di touchline pipo from dicomemand don dey follow di jaguda pipo for leg.  
First UAE ambassador to Israel kolet post.
The president  of Isreal on Monday, koletdifirst-for dis life ambassador from di United Arab Emirates to di Jewish state follow di historical agreement for di two countries to make thingscome normal.
UAE envoy, Mohamed Al Khaja, weyrish Israel early momo on Monday,kari im credential give prasido of Reuven Rivlin, for one ceremony for Jerusalem.
After imkari Arabic salute Khaja, Rivlin say: All Israeli pipo welkom you wit joy.
Na dis ko be di koko of your mission na, to welkom di hand wey deyrish you, di president  yan say na leaders dem sign we gree we gree but di big peacecome from di pipo, face to face.
Khaja say im gokari body work to put power join di tie wey in dem, to take serve di pipo and to put power join dia region.
Na UAE first gree to start full rapor wit dis Jewish state under di Abraham Accords, a pact brokered by former US president  Donald Trump.
Di we-gree-we-gree make UAE be di third plenti Arab nation to rob hand wit Isreal, follow Egypt for 1979 and Jordan for 1994.
Bahrain, Morocco and Sudan don join di Abraham Accords now.
Dis we-gree break di long Arab consensus wey say nor make we-gree nor dey for any Arab wit Isreal until dem go do ogbonge peace tok wit di Palestinians.
Earlimomo on Monday, Khaja meet Foreign Minister Gabi Ashkenazi for Jerusalem, wey wish am success in im mission wey make history.
Khaja tell Ashkenazi say im dey very proud to be di first ambassador di di State of Israel.
Israel open im UAE embassy for January, as  sabi man Eitan Naeh take head dis Abu Dhabi mission.
Isreal and UAE don sign we-gree on direct waka and visa-free travel wit oda na we-we on investment protection, science and technology.
On Tuesday, Khaja don dey plan to visit Yad Vashem, Israels national Holocaust memorial and education centre.(AFP)
US Congress confam Joe Biden election win.
The US Congress, on Thursday, don confm Joe Biden as di next US president , wey slap Donald Trump wey im supporters burst entadicapitol earli momo, and dey cause kasala and gbege for inside dat place wey America democracy sitdown put.
Lawmaker Senate and House of Representatives now do push backdieffort of di Republican to deny di pipo votes from swing states Arizona and Pennsylvania.
Afta angri pipo burst enta di US Capitol to send lawmakers as dem sef run for dia lives dis member of Congress don go back to do dia job as dem comefam Biden win of 306-232 for Electoral College.
Lawmakers do votecomeot di two tackle wey dey Biden winin, as Trump supporter demcome spoil mata wit violence wey surprise pipo dem for di around di world.
Rally start for all di town by Trump supporter dem, pipo wey dey vex wey stillkari flag dey wave break break barricade wey dey outside ti Capitol and dey enta inside beging dey scatascata offices and were lawmakers dey sitdown put. 
Security pipo shootshoot teargas inside dis four hours gbege to clearclear di Capital. 
Police yan say, one woman wey dem tok say na Trump supporter from southern California n aim dem shoot die and  anoda three pipo still die for inside wetin nor dey clear for eye.
Iheanacho wey dey hot, Onuachu, Osimhen enta Super Eagles list for Cameroon friendly.
Technical Adviser fo Nigeria .
Football team of di senior, Gernot Rohr, don do squad list of 31 players for di Super big international friendly against five-time African champions Cameroon for Austria on Friday, 4th June 2021.
Na Wiener Neustadt for di Austrian capital, Vienna start from 8.30 pm Austria time n aim di game go hapun
The joinbodi of Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester City, England), Victor Osimhen (Napoli, Italy) and Paul Onuachu (KRC Genk, Belgium), wey dey fly for up for dia different club dem, dey up as dem take upon di list on Friday as e still get Captain Ahmed Musa join.
Oda big player dem for di list na deputy captain William Ekong, goalkeeper Maduka Okoye, defenders Kenneth Omeruo and Chidozie Awaziem, midfielders Wilfred Ndidi and Oghenekaro Etebo and forward Samuel Chukwueze.
Super Eagles small pikin dem, Victor Osimhen (L) and Samuel Chukuweze jubilate afta dem win bronze for di 2019 AFCON for Egypt.
Abraham Marcus wey base for Portugal na im dem don call for di first time wit Enyimba iron body forward Anayo Iwuala wey im power don helpdiPipos Elephant qualify enta quarter-finals ofdiCAF Confederation Cup don get chance to drag space to continue dey leg for international as dem take show against Benin Republic and Lesotho inside AFCON qualifiers for March.
Di big list of 31 na im dem go bring downrish 23 beforediSuper Eagles fly go Vienna for di battle wit teytey rivals Indomitable Lions.
Cameroon march di Eagles thruway for three inside dia five AFCON title (1984, 1988, 2000) but dem never beat Nigeria for di Time gangan for match since dem win 1-0 for one 1990 FIFA World Cup qualifying match for di Stade Omnisports for Yaounde on 27th August 1989.
Di Eagles flog di Lions 4-0 for one 2018 FIFA World Cup qualifying match for Uyo for September 2017 and deykari by force enta 1-1 draw for dicome back for Yaounde, wey make Nigeria qualify enta patapata for Russia.
Francis Uzoho (APOEL Nicosia, Cyprus); John Noble (Enyimba FC); Maduka Okoye (Sparta Rotterdam,diNetherlands); Ikechukwu Ezenwa (Heartland FC)
Defenders: 
Kenneth Omeruo (CD Leganes, Spain); Kevin Akpoguma (Hoffenheim, Germany); Chidozie Awaziem (FC Boavista, Portugal); William Ekong (Watford FC, England); Olaoluwa Aina (Fulham FC, England); Jamilu Collins (SC Padeborn 07, Germany); Zaidu Sanusi (FC Porto, Portugal); Tyronne Ebuehi (FC Twente,diNetherlands); Oluwasemilogo Ajayi (West Bromwich Albion, England)
Midfielders: Oghenekaro Etebo (Galatasaray FC, Turkey); Wilfred Ndidi (Leicester City, England); Abdullahi Shehu (Omonia Nicosa, Cyprus); Joseph Ayodele-Aribo (Glasgow Rangers, Scotland); Abraham Marcus (CD Feirense, Portugal)
Forwards: Ahmed Musa (Kano Pillars FC); Alex Iwobi (Everton FC, England); Sadiq Umar (Almeria FC, Spain); Samuel Chukwueze (Villarreal FC, Spain); Victor Osimhen (Napoli FC, Italy); Kelechi Iheanacho (Leicester City, England); Moses Simon (FC Nantes, France); Henry Onyekuru (Galatasaray FC, Turkey); Anayo Iwuala (Enyimba FC); Peter Olayinka (Slavia Praha, Czech Republic); Terem Moffi (FC Lorient, France); Paul Onuachu (KRC Genk, Belgium); Simy Nwankwo (Crotone FC, Italy)
E dey drag Nigeria comeot for up.
Security mata wey don spoil for di contri don pass normal.
Pipo wey don tok on top di mata don tok say hope nor dey.
To tok di wan wey small, e don shoke as persin, Nigeria pipo don dey doubt if we fit survive am and live togeda again as area wey get peace. 
Big big pipo inside di kontri n aim e be like say dem doncomeot mind wey make dem tok say di only way wey tocomet dia palava na for federal goment to find foreign assistance to fit tackle security kasala.
Di opposition political parti inside di contri, PDP, join mouth put dey tell All Progressives Congress,APC we dey led say Nigeria need outside help to fit tackle security kasala wey don dis.
As e dey tok im own, di president  of senate wey just pass, Bukola Saraki say president  Muhammadu Buhari don dey taya ontop di security kasala, he de tanda say federal goment need sharpsharp help and make dem find am wit out nor waste time.
He also advise  di president  say make ekari all beforebefore president  and heads of state, beforebefore and nownow chief justices, serving and oga dem for National Assembly, beforebefore and nownow oga dem for security agencies, traditional rulers dem wey get experience wey good, oga for private sector dem, development partners, friends of Nigeria for internationalcomemunity wit odas wey fit find solution for dimata wey dey ground.
