Dis beforebefore Senate president  still call di National Assembly say make dem find solution to di issue of insecurity as im add say di legislature nor gep dey help dis Buhari administration if dem nor add to dia tanda and decision for dia approach to take see di security palava tackle kiakia.
Di National Leader of di All Progressives Congress, APC, Sen. Bola Ahmed Tinubu, say Nigeria need joinhand to tackle di security shallenge,dey tok say evri contri go pass tru hard time and we must dey united to take succeed.
He had put say nor president  wan make kontri dey inside palava, e note say na only join hand response fit end dis plenty security kasala.
Di best way na wetin we dey do. Tocome togeda take reduce banditry, to move for unity and fit to  bring a beta Nigeria give pipo.
The welfare of awa  pipo dey very important.
And yes, everi contri go pass di hard and difficult time.
How we take dey tell am to pipo, na which area to take make am easy for pipo; na dem dat area on top how to fit change di leader for di contri; na im he tok.
The truth be say, mata neva spoil too spoil as many stakeholders take dey show am.
Hope neva lost finish.
Di one nor be say dem nor dey right for wetin dem see and wetin dem tok.
We fit savage dimata wit colabo wit all stakeholders especiallyditraditional rulers dem, religious leaders,joinjoin among security pipo and for federal goment to fit provide solution of tribe abi political interest.
Time doncome again wey be saydiwork of tradional ruler to make peace must dey recognized for every corner.
Na dem get culture of di pipo fo hand and dia religion to one place.
Traditional rulers becos of say dem dey close to di pipo, fit do big tin to take solve di security gbege if dem gather and follow dem tok wella from local goment go statecomerish federal.
If dem follow traditional ruler dem for every angle for di state yarn wella, dem fit be di koko of wia  secutity pipo go dey get information as to take know criminal tin wey dey dia area because dem sabi dem wey dey di area
E dey needed for security agencies to work together as to take fight insecurity for di land.
To joinhand must dey among dem so dat one side gocomeot ahnd from wetin d other side dey do to avoid to dey two work and to shine eyes put information wey dem sendcome from every angle.
The bad mata hapun for Maiduguri some days ago as fighting jet we be dem Nigeria Airforce own take bomb Nigeria Soldiers wey dem go double cross boko haram na mata we open say beta information and coordination between two agencies nor dey.
All di agencies wey be koko for war mata must dey gather tori and spread am to dia sef to take sabi wen, wia  and how enimies wan tackle wit di tori, dia plan go scatter and dem nor go fit attack not to tok of say dem go attack.
Religious leaders tru dia various organisations like Christian Association of Nigeria, CAN, Supreme Council of Islamic Affairs, SCIA, Pentecostal Fellowship of Nigeria, PFN, and others must dey follow and eye open ontop wetin dem go preach give dia pipo and how to take follow follow dia ways. 
Dis men of God dem dey dey respect by dia piporish level say anything wey dem tok dem dey swallow go down whether di word go cause gbege or e nor go cause gbege.
Make dem mobilise dem well and sensitise dem on top danger wey dey for wrong preaching wey fit make one religion pipo dey fight di other.
Examples deon dey wey be say wen palava start from place wey dem dey worship becos of wetin leaders dem tell dia pipo say make dem do, whether to fight back because of one injustice or  anoda one.
Witi beta training, dat kai tin nor go hapun becos dem go don train dem ontop wetin dem go preach and wetin dem nor go preach for dia pipo.
E dey koko to tok am here say all dis nor gocome for vain if goment for every level nor bring wey for peace to dey.
Goment for every level must provide beta beta tins wey youths go dey do to takecomeot their mind from crime.
As to dey try solve security yawa, goment sef suppose see say dem nor do partial ontop tribe, religion or politics as dem dey try solve security kasala.
Pipo wey do crime must dey treat disame disame as di law of di land we im dey take be.
Example of treating some criminals wit small hand na di arrest of some pipo wey dey do Bureau De Change for Kano wey dem say dem dey sponsor Boko Haram gbege.
Till now, how dem be never dey open, wey dey get bad way ontop to fight crime.
Goment must see say dem dey always get in touch wit pipo especially for di downdown for dem to sabi wetin bin dey hapun in di contri in oda not to gree for rumour to get power.  
Witi dis one, Nigeria go fit bit di security kasala wey dey fight am for over 10 years wit easy.
Dr. Emmanuel Nkemdi na public affairs analyst, dey live for Abuja
NDLEA, Customs double-cross 4.9million Tramadol capsules for Onne Port
Officer dem of di National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) and di Nigeria Customs Service (NCS) don double-cross one container weykari 4,996,200 capsules of Tramadol wey weigh 2,498.2 kg for Onne Port, Port Harcourt, Rivers State.
For inside separate tokpersin for NDLEA, Femi Babafemi, and NCS own.
Area IIcomemand, Onne Port, Mrs Ifeoma Ojukwu, say dem double-cross di tin on Tuesday.
Dem package dis bad drug inside 1,387 cartons and hide am inside 1,000 cartons of ceramic tiles.
Ojukwu tok say di sieze wey dem seize am dey possible wit di help of international patners.
Millawella, di NDLEA say one 42-year-old Muntari Hamidu dey arrested for Nyibango, Jimeta, Yola, Adamawa State, wit 13 sacks of cannabis sativa we weigh 166kg.
Dis one na like as 35-year-old Sani Musa dey nab wit 16.1kg of skunk for Ngurore, Yola South LGA for di state.
Babafemi yan say dem arrest di two of dem on Sunday, 16 May, 2021.
As wetin e tok, dat same day, a team of NDLEA operative from Ondo Statecomemand still arrest one James Godspower wit 36.5kg of cannabis sativa in Faloye, Ogbese, Akure North LGA for Ondo State.
Chairman/Chief Executive Officer of NDLEA, Brig-Gen.
Mohammad Buba Marwa (Rtd), praise di new pali weydiagency and other security agencies pali in dia operations, as e take deycomemend di officers dem and men of di Port Harcourtcomemand, and well as those of Adamawa and Ondo states for their resilience andcomemitment to work, while chargingdem to remain vigilant.
IPOB: Residents shun sidown-for-house order for Ebonyi.
Residents for Ebonyi State, on Saturday, shun di sitdown-for-house order wey di supreme leader ofdiIndigenous Pipo of Biafra (lPOB), Nnamdi Kanu proposed. 
Daily Trust gather  say markets, hotels, Abakiliki Rice mill, motor parks and shops dey open for business for Saturday.
Taxi, keke and okada sef work.
Our newspersin, wey waka round corner-corner for Abakiliki and place wey near am, still observe say security agencies patrol some major road for di city on Saturday.
Kanu don tok on Thursday, warn pipo for Southeast ontop to take May 29 sidown-for-house order do yanga.
Though fear dey wey still dey count ontop rumour say dem shift di exercise go Monday.
IPOB don tok say: We, di global family ofdiIndigenous Pipo of Biafra (IPOB), wey di prophet of we time, Mazi Nnamdi Kanu dey led, wan  announce once again, say dis years annual Biafra Remembrance Day and candlelight procession go  happun on Sunday night 30th of May, while a sidoen-for-house and total lockdown go happun on Monday, 31st May, 2021, and nor be May 30th as dem  announce before.
Tottenham hope to enta top-four don dey inside danger after Leeds beating. 
Leeds beat Tottenham wey nor get manager 3-1 on Saturday to put big dent for dia ambitions to secure Premier League top-four place.
Son Heung-min cancel Stuart Dallass early goal for Leeds midway for first half but Patrick Bamford bring back di home side winning andcome substitute Rodrigo struck after.
Spurs, wey sack Jose Mourinho last month, still dey eight point behind Chelsea wey dey third but get only three game remaining weycomeot one insidedigame wey dem London rival get. 
E mean say Tottenham wey enta final for 2019 fit notrish to play inside Europes.
Big club shallenges for two season wey followfollow.
Dem even go face shallenge to qualify enta Europe league after first lose for league under interim oga Ryan Mason.
Leeds sabi wetin dem dey do, dem play one kain and he take time for we game to enta we body nah wetin Mason tell BT sport.
For di second half, na we do beta pass.
As mata take be, una go take am like dat for di game dem
Today nor be moimoi for us, to lose pain body.
E dey hard to win for premier league.
But we doncome tokari all awa  eyes put for next week now.
Big six Leeds wey climb ontop Arsenal for ninth position, do anoda wonder against one of di big six
Marcelo Bielsa pipo, wey dem promote last season, start well as dem quick dey lead as Dallas tear am inside for 13th minite.
Jack Harrison throw ball cross box 18 from left side as Tottenham goalkeeper Hugo Lloris do beta to savediball make Sergio Reguilon nor score own goal.
But e norish to disturb Dallas make e nak di ball enta from place wey dey close for back of post.
Tottenham fire back tocome equalize wit dia first shot to post inside one counter for 25th minute. 
Dele Allikari sence throw ball pass lead and Son speed to net am from side. 
Harry Kane think say im don give dis away pipo lead wen throwboy inside after im wit Alli and Son don do some make-sense but im beta finishin dey thruway afta VAR confirm say im dey offside.
Leadcome lead back for 42nd  minute as Bamford do finishing from place we close to gain im 15 premier league goal after Ezgjan Alioskis cut-back.
Kan still put  anoda power wey dem stillkari offsidecomeot earlymomo for second half as Spur dey find to take equalize and dem hit bar for one free-kick as e norish 20 minutes make match finish.
But nah leeds still net again to gain three points wit Rodrigo finishing after one cross from im pesin Raphinha for six minutes remain. 
Na Leeds bedifirst time to dey unbeaten for home for a season inside premier league against Arsenal, Chelsea, Liverpool, Manchester City, Manchester United and Spurs since West Ham do am for 2015/16.
Di Africa wey we dey try dey possible inside one-hand and we-we.
By Mevlt avusoglu
I go like congratulate all we African friends on May 25 to mark di African dayrish down-down for mind.
We remember as we dey appreciate di African Kontri countries weycome together underdished of Organization of African Unity (OAU), wey later be African Union (AU), on May 25, 1963, predicating on independence and wey stand for independence and freedom, and dey show di same sence on top we-we and one hand.
The success tori wey demrish for di pass 10 years for dis spirit and understanding give us hope for bright future fordicontinent.
As colonial nor take get hand and as dem get full independence witiout wahala against occupation forces wen dem dey fight for independence, turkey dey among one ofdikontri wey first to quick take dem koko of di mata.
We dey hapi  today to share dis disame-disame joy, we dey ontop to di koko for remember ofdiwahala to take kolet independence by Africa pipo for freedom, equality, justice and bi wetin AU care dey look for eyes. 
Our way to Africa pipo countries dem tali wit dia principles dem of AU and dem build am ontop to do join-join wey pass wetin dey ground, we go dey for all ontop to respect and for win-win idea.
Na di same 1963 spirit wekari and di vision of Africa and ecome attach great importance to agenda 2063 and UN 2030 Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).
Inside awa  ogbonge journey wey gain power wit awa  membership status for awa  observer dem for AU for 2005, we don covered plenty ground wit di First Turkey-Africa Partnership Summit wey bin host for Istanbul, and as dem bin declare us  strategic partner of di union for 2008.
After di Second Turkey-Africa Partnership Summit wey we bin do for Malabo for 2014,our rope wit African countries demcome strong more more. 
We dey hope to host third summit for we kontri for September wey we believe say e go bring chance for cooperation wey strong and big between Turkey and Africa.
We continue to dey contribute put for peace and strong-leg and economic and social development for Africa tru awa  public institutions dem, Non-Governmental Organisations (NGOs) dem and di private pipo. 
Our Africa Initiative and Africa Partnership policies; dem see am among or foreign policy initiative wey dey success pass,come add value join as we dey relate wit  di continent.
We don see di beta sence for area like trade, investment, culture, security, military cooperation and development, and especially as we put mind and as we dey develop political relations wit Africa for ten years wey pass.
We dey happi to see say Africa pipo countries dem sef see beta inside make dem tight to cooperate wit awa  kontri.
We go continue to dey join join Turkey and Africa for every mata.
As diplomatic mission for di continent nor pass 12 for 2002, we increasedinumber to 43, as awa  embassy open for Togo last month.
African countries dem sef  top embassies wey dem get  for Ankara from 10 in 2008 go 37.
Turkey wey dey fifth for world inside di countries dem  wey get diplomatic mission pass continue to dey bring Africa mata enta agenda for global level wit im big sense and e continue to dey cooperate wit Africa pipo countries dem for regional and international platforms.
We continue to dey develop awa  commercial and economic relations wit win-win style.
Despite say pandemic dey, we bin try make awa  trade volume dey close to last year own.
Di total for awa  investment  inside Africa we kom direct pass $6bn.
Our turkey pipo kontrator  contribute give Africa develop as dem stand for project wey pass 1,150.
We thanksdiAfrican Continental Free Trade Area Agreement (AfCFTA), wey dem see as project wey dey important pass for Agenda 2063.
We dey redi to tell awa  friends inside Africa pipo about awa  experience, make we still do supports for di tin.
Development and humanitarian aid of Turkey continue to dey contribute give to create condition wey sweet body to establish Africa wey go dey prosperous.
This Ogbonge develop dey awa  public institution dem bin provide to Africa between 2005 to 2015 donrish almost $3.5bn
Follow di action agenda commitments, awa  total develop for 46 Least Developed Countries (LDCs), wey 33 dey for Africa na $8.7bn between 2009 go 2019.
We still hapi  say di sustainable development projects ofdiTurkish Cooperation and Coordination Agency (TKA), wey dem office wey dey represent dem donrish 22 for Africa dem develop assistance for di continent don pass $500m dey accept everywhere for di continent.
Turkish Maarif Foundation (TMF) don provide education to 14,000 students dem wit 144 schools and 16 dormitories all over Africa.
Di nomba of awa  African students dem wey graduat wit di Turkiye Scholarships programme don pass 15,000.
Wey kom hold di honour to be di only foreign company dat wey don fly go many place, including 60 city for Africa, Turkish Airlines go continue to contribute put Africa todireunion wit di remaining of di world.
We nor leave of Africa friends dem during  COVID-19 pandemic. 
Wen di pandemic dey , we do dem medical material donation, moni donation or pay collect assist to export and to buy medical material give 44 Africa pipo countries.
The approximate of material to easy things wey we giverish $12m, anddiamount for awa  help to dey give moneyrish $6m.
Turkey work do develop vaccines against COVID-19 still dey continue.
We hold am for mind to finish awa  vaccine tin for autumn make we kom offer am as service give pipo especially give Africa countries dem.
The topic To silence di Gun: To Create beta condition for development for Africa and put power join to fight against COVID-19 Epidemic wey dem set for Africa Day celebrations wey dem go do online dis year becos of di pandemic dey join-join wit Turkey humanitarian and entrepreneur foreign policy agenda.
To tanda wit various violence, tok to settle wahala jejeli and to do program wey go dey remain for brain wen e need, awa  kontri support goal of silencingdiguns wit power.
Turkey wit im program wey go dey remain for brain and facilitation role wey dem dey do for di whole world still be Co-Chair for program wey go dey remain for brain wey dem establish put for under UN, di OSCE and di OIC.
We believe say awa  joinbody effort wit di AU, wey be member fordifriends group in UN, go contribute put security and strong leg inside Africa.
With dis betabeta, nor be only today diplomacy Turkey dey shape, dem dey shape for di future too.
For 2019, we announce di Digital Diplomacy initiative as we take chance of di transformative power of technology.
We believe di focus of Africa ontop digitalization for development wey go last dey correct.
Inside dis mata, we donkari eyes look wit pleasure  say digital transformation be koko to take achieve target for agenda 2063 and to see say economic wey im leg strong  dey kampe for di Africas Development Dynamics:
Digital Transformation for Quality Jobs dis tori dey publish by di AU dis year despite say COVID-19 dey.
We dey redi to work wit awa  Africa friends inside field for  digital transformation.
We go continue to dey cooperate and stand wit Africa pipo countries dem anddiAU wit di power and inspiration wey dey see from inside awa  old history, culture and human relation wit Africa.
I hapi  on my own to take congratulate Africa pipo today wit sweet mind.
avusoglu be di Minister for Foreign Affairs for di Republic of Turkey
Blackmail dey kill development and economic growth   Gov Emmanuel
Governor of Akwa Ibom state Mr. Udom Emmanuel don urge di pipo say make dem throwway eyes for Blackmail say dat kain na evil and dey kill economic growth and development wit many things wey nor go sweet body.
Di Governor give dis beta spirit wen he front bigbig pipo for goment go one church thankgiving service wey be for every church denomination to take mark 6years of im tenure on Sunday for  Believers Assembly of Nigeria, Uyo.
Governor Emmanuel wey dey tok about mercy of God wey im say e give am wisdom to take lead di state tru economic palava we Covid-19 cos, appreciate di support of Akwa Ibom pipo say dem be partner for him success tori for di state
We stand here to dey give God glory, psalmist go tell you say, Oya give thanks to di Lord for im mercy go dey forever
We dey thank God for strong tough six years for economic, we don dey shallenge for every corner but we nor lose mind.
So we wan give thanks to God for di six tough year wey God bin lead us put, he don help us keep faith na so im yarn am.
He make am sure give di pipo ontop to deliver im promises dem, say im commitment to take to development for di state na number one and e go continue to serve beta and wit mind.
I wan make am sure to my pipo say I go continue to serve God tru all of una and abeg we need every to join us cooperate to dey pray wit us.
Make Godkari usrish wia  we dey go.
Make I wan una small, stop to dey spoil Governor name say im bin don build International Worship Center, you nor understand wetin I dey do, I dey raise altar wey go cancel all oda talk.
I dey raise di altar wey gokari us go wia  we dey go. Na so he yarn.
As e dey speak morning for Saturday, for inside a state broadcast to take mark im 6th anniversary, di Governor list many beta impact wey im economy and industrialization policy don get ontop di economy for di state, as im still tok wetin him admistration get for mind to do im campaign promises dem to di pipo wit power and strong mind, say im dey hurry to industrialize and change watin di statekari for mind wey be goment  worker state to place wey dey industrialize. 
As e dey tok im achievements for office one one, di Governor say for agricultural sector, im bin don do all wetin im promise to see say di state dey produce food for shekel moni to feed di pipo.
Im tok back say ontop im inauguration of di Technical Committee on Agriculture and Food Sufficiency don bring beta fruit.
Our own food like garri, rice, yam etc dey dey produce by awa  pipo for here.
For di rice mill wey dey Ini Local goment  Area, enta plenty garri mill wey scatter put for di three senatorial district wey dey di area, enta small interest loan wey we give farmers to take plant casava through FADAMA 3 program, we dey work ontop make awa  pipo get food to dey chop wit sekele money.
Our investment for dis kind wahala time pass to see say food dey for everybody, we still dey try for di big change wey we don get for agriculture to take create Directorate of Agriculture and Agro-Allied Investments wey go dey function. Naso e yarn. 
For health sector, di Governor tok wit joy say wen in bin kom in, many of di general hospitals dey very bad as sick pipo and staff dem for hospital dey digga snake and other animal wahala everyday.
He tok say im tenure don buy material put for Ibom Specialist Hospital and most of dis new-school material  bin dey shallenge ICU and dis big moni work kom inside Covid-19 pandemic asdimedical pipo dem wey sabi work do well to see say dem cut di hand of dis dangerous virus.
As in bin dey list di achievement of im industrialization policy, Governor Emmanuel tok say, through di effort of di Technical Committee on Foreign Direct Investments, im don get over twenty economic company pipo wey redi to work and employ  wey create industries for di state including di Coconut Virgin Oil Refinery, one digital flour mill wey dey produce flour wey we need for awa  small small foods industry, company wey dey measure, Liberty Oil and Gas Free Zone wey dem start,diopen ceremony wey shake ground to take construct Sterling petrochemicals and Fertilizer production factory, di $1.4 billion Ammonia and Fertilizer plant and Ibom Air wey im tok say everybody for di kontri dey tok am
Explainer: Wetin you suppose sabi konsain cattle-ranching.
With evri day attack between farmers and heldmen, state goment dem, especially from South don conclude to ban open grazing and to kolet ranching as watin dem go dey use instead of di wakawaka of herdsmen wit their cattle wey don long. 
As dem say put voice out ontop to dey grow ranch, herdsmen wey be say na Fulani pipo plenty dia pass don tok open mouth ontop how di tin go work for dem as dem nor take abi.
Dis one dey inside one tori wey di Sarkin Fulani of Iwo for Osun State Alhaji Momodu Adamu yarn for inside one summit wia im bin dey tok say Many Fulani nor sabi watin ranching mean
Ranching dey strange to us
We bin wan learn.
We wan make goment teach us about am.
We go continue to dey live wit peace.
Wetin be ranching
Di National Geographic pipo tok say ranching na to dey rear livestocks, especially cattle ontop big land
This thing, weykari business sense go, go make livestocks dey chop for a land wey get control for grass and water  ontop contract and to dey plant grass
This way nor dey function as grazing mode as chance dey for herdsmen to dey waka up and down wit dia cow to dey chop things wey dey any area wey dem go. 
But, to dey grow grass for area fit dey easy because rain shortage or water shortage nor go make am do well.
Overgrazing sef dey among wetin nor go make am deyrish.
To focus on livestock for one area, ranching dey give, reduce di reduce hunger among cattle dem sef and to add join livestock subsector.
National Geographic pipo tok say Ranching na di beta way to take dey raise livestock to provide meat, milk and raw material for fabrics.
Na ogbonge part for economies and rural development around di world.
But di livestock industry dey get effects on di environment for contribute put for air and water pollution.
Harmful product wey dem fit see for ranches fit be manure, antibiotics, and hormones wey dem dey give animals dem join wit fertilizer and pesticides.
Like dat one, chemical from wia  animal dey sleep put wey fit treat animal fit good to put inside water for dem.
Material
For inside one tori for Encyclopedia Britannica e tok say barn wey be wia  animal dey live be di koko inside all wetin join ranch.
This material still closed for dis, e nor go sweetbodi for herdsmen dem wen wakawaka don master.
For this, wia  animal go dey stay don do so eyes go dey dia bodi. 
Oda facilities na wetin take dey do milk, watin dem take dey cut grass, wetin dem take dey pour water and small barn for animal to dey rest, chop kotet dia milk and put water.
As light leg nor strong, solar fit dey beta for ranches for Nigeria .
Ranching and di National Livestock Transformation Plan
One human right lawyer Femi Falana said dat ranching nor be new development for Nigeria as dem establish di first ranch fro Nigeria for Obudu, Cross River State in 1951 by British dem but by Eastern Regional goment  take over am after independence.
E add join say Awolowo regime get one rance for Akunnu wey be Ondo State now ad Ahmadu Bello sef dey establish one for Mokwa, Niger State.
During Yakubu Gowons regime, Audu Bako get di best ranches for di kontri for Kano.
And, grazing reserve wey dey permanent ontop big land wey be house for herdmen and dia family for some part of di north.
As di ranches nor longer function, federal goment for 2018 introduced di National Livestock Transformation Plan (NLTP).
The plan wey dem test for Adamawa for 2019 get di backing ofdiNational Economic Council wey be governors for di 36 States governors and di Vice President, Yemi Osinbajo be di chair
The NLTP na one N100 billion 10-year initiative (2019-2027) wey ensure say Economic dey grow and prevent di farmers/herdsmen kasala.
Di plan go see to create four ranch size wey go contain 30, 60, 150 and 300 cows wit food facilities, water facilities, and market and a breeder ranch of 1,000 cattle for minimum
Osinbajo wen im bin dey give speech wen dem dey launch di programme saydiranch go add put for join-join business centre for crop production for business, di supply of livestock materials and help to improved access to basic services for herdsmen.
As im take tok, state go provide land as dia own contribution for di project
The Federal goment only support di project.
Na plan to take design ranches wia  dem go dey raise cattle, meat and milk wey dem go produce go dey wit newschool livestock.
When e present, he bin cut NLTP commot fromdidat ranching colony wey wan bring wahala, RUGA, wey some pipo see as as federal goment wan force kolet land to keep heldsmen and their families for a particular area. 
2023: Wahala fo Kwara APC ontop governor sister.
Di teytey leadership palava wey dey hapun for Kwara  State chapter of di All Progressives Congress (APC) wear new cloth as dem some founding members wey dey vex open mouth say make dem comot  Senator Khairat Gwadabe, wey be sister to Governor Abdulrahman Abdulrazaq, from di Membership Registration Appeal Panel Caretaker Committee wey Governor Mai Mala Buni dey lead.
Di call say make dem remove Khairat dey kom from di wahala of who go dey control di parti for di state between governor and some members wey dey vex ontop second term ticket for 2023 di next electioneering campaign beckons.
Di governor and some leader wey get mouth for di parti don dey digger something since dis tenure enta power in 2019 for di state ontop style wey im dey take rule. 
But ontop all power to take bring everybody togeda under one umbrella, as one insider for di take tok am,dimata dey hot more more wit dis new wahala wey fit chop di parti comot for dis top seat for 2023 if dem nor dom am somtin by joining alldipower wey fall Peoples Democratic parti (PDP) administration for di state, wey former Senate President Bukola Saraki dey lead.
Many members of di group wey dey vex wey get di support of big parti leader like di Minister of Information and Culture, Alhaji Lai Mohammed and im fellow for transport (state), Gbemisola Saraki, under di factional caretaker chairman, Hon Bashiru Omolaja Bolarinwa (BOB), Khairat wey dem put dey among plan for di governor to hijack parti man-machine for di state as im dey build-up 2023 election.
Some of di top leaders and parti supporters inside di state, wey tok say dem don do dem ojoro ontop registration/revalidation process don accuse di former senator say im bin dey work wit Senator John Danboi committee wey head di last exercise for di state to do ojoro for members wey dem believe say dem dey fight di governor.
Im status for di committee, as dem dey drag am, bi to go finish work wey im bin start inside state for national level to clear road for di second term ticket ofdigovernor and open road wey roku for  im to be di parti candidate for di next governor election.
One of di press release weu yarn d mata small, one faction of di APC for di state believe say dem loyal to di camp of Lai Mohammed and other members wey dey vex, and tok am korokoro say dem nor want make dem add Senator Gwadabe join di 61-member committee.
Di group wey pipo know as Integrity Group, inside on tok wey Comrade Abdul-Rahoof Bello sign yarn am kom outside dey dem nor acceptdiemployment.
As di group take talk, One governor sister dey do double mind  work wit didiDanboi committee to kos many wahala and some wuruwuru against watin di parti want for inside Kwara
Anoda voice still kom outside wey dem believe say e dey front for di minister, ontop APC Youth Stakeholder, petitioned di national secretariat of di parti wey Caretaker Extraordinary Convention Planning Committee (CECPC) dey run ontop di issue, say dem don do over 600,000 of dia member ojoro wit di wuruwuru of Senator Khairat.
Sometime after dem tok dia own, some governor men and supporters sef scatter full town dey wit trumpet dey drum and support for di governor and im sister ontop dimata.
Na di publicity secretary ofdiparty, Alhaji Folaranmi Aro, a strong loyalist of di governor first fire say; pipo wey dey against say dem put di senator nor get tok. 
Under di supporter for di Reformist Progressive Forum, di group wey dey support governor inside one quick reply to di statement of integrity group, tok say di rejection of Senator Gwadabe by group of political small pikin for kwara nor get head and norish tok.
Dis one nah mumu criticism wey nor get sense and fit destroy.
When dem go meet am for tori, Saheed Popoola, one of di pipo wey dey loyal wella todiminister and im still be lawmaker for Kwara State House of Assembly from Offa, tell Daily Trust Saturday say im nor dey town.
But one top member of di parti and diehard supporter of di minister from Kwara Central tok say though Alhaji Lai Mohammed and few odas still register despite say dem condemn di exercise. Di action na to demo and to show we dey wit you give big big leaders dem for di parti like Chief Bisi Akande and Bola Ahmed Tinubu wey still tok say di process dey wonkain, make dem do am well.
But ontopmata on how di tin fit take affect di parti chance for 2023, dem Oga for di parti say; dimata long gan-an and dem fit put manymata ontop table before dat time. 
Our workings now na to first get di wayo wey bend di last exercise and to get di hand of National leader dem to do fresh exercise for di state.
For Kunle Suleiman, lawyer wey be pioneer chairman of PDP for di state, wey still be one pesin wey sabi vex  and beg di Governor and go still vex am, watin dey hapun na politics and di parti go grow pass am.
Im still tok say dia konsain na  how dem go take make life beta wey di governor promise dem.
One member ofdiAA group wey still be Governor supporter for Ilorin west tell Daily Trust Saturday say di vexvex parti members dem wey dey tackle as dem take put Senator Khairat na playplay pipo.
He add join say di parti don move ontop di exercise.
For God sake, pipo wey dey complain nor sabi wetin dem dey do and wetin  dem dey tok.
Khairat na member of APC and fit be member for any committee onto her contributions and recognition inside di party.
She dey entitle give am.
If she be sister to governor, shey dat one suppose deny her right?
For inside politices wey many factions dey, dis kain tin dey hapun.
Person wey dem nor give somtin go complain; and pipo wey dey complain be BOB and Lai group.
Dem think say dem fit controldiregistration exercise and parti politics but now kom see say e don comot for dia hand.
Dem dey complain because dem don lost for di power game of di parti now. E add join.
He kom tok say di parti go get im sef for inside dis two years wey remain as im still add say  We kom inside APC faction faction
Dis same pipo wey say di governor nor go get ticket still tok like dat for im first time and dem nor vote for am, e still get am; and e go get am again.
Na ontop make you use sense and get your politics koret.
We nor dey fear
Also, di mata of how d governor dey do politics don bi watin dey kos palava as big big pipo like Professor Abdulraheem Shuaib Oba and Akogun Iyiola Oyedepo dey tok about di governor say im bi politician wey im weight dey like feather wey go dey easy to blow comot for 2023.
For di eyes of some pipo wey sabi watch politics, watin don hapun ontop how governor take deal wit Lai group and how e take handle di registration exercise show how mata fit no take get head to control di parti  before 2023.
Thug pipo cut some part of Warri-Itapke rail line.
Thug pipo don cut many part comot for Warri-Itapke rail line.
Inside one video wey dey waka, di thug pipo, wey dem still neva sabi, use watin bi like saw take slice di rail wia  dem fit take comot some, wey kom put like of passengers dem for danger.
Di trouble, as awa  news pipo take gather, e hapun along di Warri-Itakpe standard gauge line around KM 30 Adogo, for Kogi State section for di rail.
Di managing director/CEO, Di Nigeria Railway Corporation, Engr.
Fidet Okhiria, confirm di trouble give awa  news pipo
E, still, tok say train still dey work bicos, anoda way dey.
Di trouble hapun like two days ago.
But we still dey work because we get anoda way. Na so im tok.
Pillars diga wit Nasarawa Utd for clash of pipo wey dey top for di table
Kano Pillars go diga wit dia evritime rival, Nasarawa United dis afternoon for di Nigeria Professional Football League week 23 of  clash of pipo wey dey top for di table for Ahmadu Bello Stadium Kaduna.
As e be, if tighttight go dey, pesin wey win inside Kwara United and Rivers United for Ilorin go go  di top of di table.
As Pillars dey 41 points, Kwara United, Nasarawa United and Rivers United dey 39 points all of dem get chance to enta top.
Mean say, If di two match for Kaduna and Ilorin go finish for draw, Pillars go enta top first before we sabi di result of tomoro match between Abia Warriors and Akwa United for Okigwe 
Though Pillars go dey motivated wit di Captain of Super Eagles Ahmed Musa and their captain wey get influence Rabiu Ali, but dem must fear Nasarawa United wey spoil dia 12-year unbeaten for home wit wining of 2-1 for 2015.
For today match, Pillar go wan put eyes for Adamu Hassan wey as e comot go join im town club for 2020 nor sweet am and e don dey score dem evri time.
We go remember say dis striker wey get experience score two enta pillar wen Nasarawa United waya dem 5-0 for one friendly match last year.
And wen dem meet for di first round of dis season for Lafia, na dis same player no gree make Pillars win wen e score equaliser for di 1-1 tight tight .
Hassan now, don get mind say im go score im former club as im bin tell Daily Trust yesterday say im normally score anytime he play against Pillars.
I sabi say dem go don do dia plan against me but e dey dey hard for dem to stop me. 
Dem think say dem sabi me.
But I still dey score dem.
Tomorrows (today) match no go dey different.
I sabi say by di grace of almighty Allah, I go score again, Na so im tok
Inside other week 23 match wey dem put for today, Adamawa United go host Katsina United for Gombe, FC IfeanyiUbah visit Dakkada for Uyo, Lobi Stars go move from Lagos wia  they lost 0-1 against MFM to go play Wolves in Ozoro, MFM go go face Sunshine Stars wey no him light no too shine for Akure while Wikki Tourists wey get challenges go challenge Enyimba for Bauchi.
Power: Nigeria pipo dey spend $21bn ontop generators  Reps
Di House of Representatives don tok say pipo wey dey manufacture lost $200 billion as other Nigeria pipo spend $21 billion ontop generators between 2015 and 2021 ontop light wey pesin generate for im sef ontop say light no good for di nation. 
Di House also don call Di Nigeria Electricity Regulatory Commission (NERC) to suspend di increase wey dem wan do ontop price for light.
According to Aniekan Umanah wey moved di motion for di plenary for Thursday, NERC, dey work wit Distribution Companies (DisCos), and dem increased electricity tariff five times since 2015, di last one na January1, 2021.
As e take talk, despite say dem increases, Nigeria pipo neva enjoy beta ontop light, but dey suffer wit on and off light and poor service wey dem DisCos dey give.
Poor service wey DisCos pipo dey give don get bad way ontop to grow di economy of di kontri as di International Monetary Fund (IMF) Report for 2020 ontop Nigeria show say di manufacturing sector lost moni wey pass $200bn to light wey nor good and big $21bn n aim dem say Nigeria pipo don spend on top to generator inside dat time wey dem review.
Di House, now don beg di federal goment  make dem direct NERC to cancel dia plan to still put moni join wey dem put for June 2021 bikos of dis hard time wey Nigeria pipo dey.
Di house don make di committees for power, poverty alleviation and labour, employment and productivity see say dem do am.
Border wey dem open back spoil to dey keepkeep tins for Katsina markets.
But e dey important to protect di health of pipo wey dey patronise di market.
Sultan don tell Nigerians say make dem no dey blame di military for Konstitutional crisis.
Alhaji Saad Abubakar III, di Sultan of Sokoto, don tell Nigerians say make dem stop to dey blame di military for konstitutional crisis.
Pipo wey be social commentator, activist, government critic, and many odas for different time don see wetin dem consida as gap for di konstitution, and dem don blame di military for dis development.
Durin im tok for di North West Zonal Public Hearing on Konstitution Review wey di House of Representatives organise for Stakeholders wey com from Sokoto, Kebbi and Zamfara, na im di monarch advise Nigerians say make dem face di reality, and make dem tok weda to get a new constitution or amend di one wey we dey use befor di 2023 general election.
Di monarch beg say make we stop to dey abuse di military, make we forget wetin di military don do and face di reality wey dey.
We get di konstitution wey di military give us, and na di military create di konstitution; na dis same military create di 36 states, create Abuja, kom move di capital from Lagos to Abuja.
Di military don set up government for plenti state, and na 99 percent civilians dem put for inside di government, and na all of una agree laidat.
So, make una no dey abuse di military, look di konstitution, if e gud for us abi e no gud; Na im be dat.
If una tink say we need change di constitution, na di time be dis.
If una tink say na amend we need amend am, na di time be dis; but na jus two years remain for 2023 election.
Shey we fit afford a new konstitution abi make we jus do som amendment so dat when di new government enta, dey fit bring new face and mind to create awa new konstitution?
Na di question wey I wan make una dey tink about for hia be dat, di Sultan yarn for di meeting.
Na from di Nigerian Army di monarch retire afta he don reach di rank of Brigadier General.
2023: PDP, APC quarrel on top INEC offices wey dem dey born.
Di Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) and di All Progressives Congress (APC) dey quarrel on top di office of di Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) wey dem dey burn for som part of di kontri.
Di PDP,throughdia tok-tok pesin, Kola Ologbondiyan, yarn say di APC don dey promote different act of violence, including di burning of INEC offices to create trouble wey go scatter di easy conduct of di 2023 general election.
E dey veri evil say becos dem don sabi say dem no get leg for 2023 election, becos of dia bad failure for governance, APC leaders wan put fire for awa kontri and block di demokracy wey we suffer for.
Di PDP dey call on Nigerians to note di failure of di APC and im leaders, and to seriously condemn dis violent attack on dis important institution of awa demokracy.
Dem tok say di APC administration no take step to ensure say INEC facilities dey protected from attackers.
Awa party wan make di APC sabi say May 29, 2023 na unchangeable day for dem to kommot for office, free awa nation from dier grip and disapear from awa politikal space.
In reaction, di APC tokthroughdi Secretary of dia Caretaker Committee, Senator John James Akpanudoedehe say di PDP get undemocratik plans.
Di part tok saythroughlies and sponsored media attacks on di President Muhammadu Buhari APC government, di PDP don show say na dem dey sponsor di politikally-motivated attack on som of awa public and democratik institution for di kontri, and na clear attempt to destabilise dis government by fire by force.
The APC said, Perhaps, the PDP thinks Nigerians have forgotten its long and documented penchant of eroding and destroying democratic institutions.
For example, no be di same PDP wey try discredit INEC and di whole 2019 election wit fake tori of server wey no dey, na dem still employ hackers to scatter di communication network of di electoral bodi during di 2019 election?
Di APC no fit dey e house com burn di house.
A winner no fit scatter di process wey bring am success.
From di 2015 to 2019 election, Nigerians don talk clearlythroughdia vote for di APC, and dem don give us di authority to rescue di kontri from di PDP 16-year problem.
Make di PDP accept di reality say di electorate don reject am.
Dia undemocratik plan no dey favourable, and e go fail badly.
som thugs dey trow stones on top di police but di police overpower dem befor di pipo fit pass.
Fast intervention by di police don save thousands of pipo wey go Hawan Daushe, a traditional Sallah festival, from somtin wey for don be a big attack by a gang of lawless youths for Kano.
Di plenti youths block di road som few meters from Kofar Kudu wey be di venue of di durbar to launch attack on di crowd of pipo wey dey kom back, befor di police quickly intervene wit teargas.
Som thugs dey trow stones on top di police but di police overpower dem befor di pipo fit pass.
Di incident don hold many of di pipo wey com watch di durbar for di emir palace till about 7 pm.
Na immediately di governor convoy comot for di emir palace afta di ceremony, na im di incident start. 
Di gang mobilize and block di road to rob di pipo and cause kasala for di area.
E don becom normal tin for thugs to fight and injure pipo evritime dem do Hawan Daushe.
But we no hear say anybodi injure from di incident on Friday.
Na di first Sallah durbar wey Alhaji Aminu Ado Bayero go organise as di Emir of Kano, since wey he don climb di throne last year.
Dem cancel di event last year as a way to stop di spread of COVID-19 pandemic for di state.
Na plenty pipo kom di event from different part of Kano society after e start by 5pm. 
Governor Abdullahi Umar Ganduje and plenti political big-men sef dey dere.
As e dey always be, di event start from Kofar Kwaru wia di emir go climb horse inside im traditional regalia, wit dem royal guard to Gidan Mai Babban Daki, wia e go pay Sallah homage to e stepmothers, as replacement for e own mama who die som weeks ago. 
Afta di visit to Gidan Mai Babban Daki, di Emir climb e horse back to di palacethroughKofar Kudu wia e receive homage from e district heads and oda pipo wey get title in a show of traditional horsemanship befor e go back to di palace. And dis na im be di end of di popular Hawan Daushe.
Chadian rebels don clash wit government forces for area wia dem shoot Deby.
Government troops don clash wit rebels on Thursday for one place in di Western region of Chad wia dem kill president Idriss Deby Itno earlier dis month.
Di fight for di desert region of Kanem, near Chad border wit Niger, put Libya-based rebels against forces wey dey loyal to di new military junta wey Deby son dey lead.
Na many western kontries including di former colonial power France, strongly criticise Deby for total control of power and inequality, and dem see am trusty ally. 
Dem see am as a stabilising force in di fight against jihadism in di wider Sahel region for di southern part of di Sahara desert.
Junta tok-tok pesin General Azem Bermandoa Agouna tell AFP say fighting go kontinue for Kanem, e tok say dem go need kontinue dey fight, if not, dem go scatta dem .
Na 37-year-old Mahamat Idriss Deby head di Military Transition Council (CMT).
For now, di fight against di Front for Change and Concord for Chad (FACT), wey kom mainly from di Goran ethnic group, dey go on about 300 kilometres (180 miles) north of di kapital N'Djamena.
Security pipo tok say Chadian army bombard FACT positions. Dem no give plenti tori for di matta.
Accordin to di authorities, Deby, wey be 68 die on April 19, due to di wound wey he carry wen e dey fight di Libya-based rebels. 
Di insurgents don launch one offensive attack for di northern Tibesti region for April 11 as dem dey prepare for presidential election.
As a career soldier wey seize power for 1990 kom use am anyhow for 30 years, Deby die for di day wey di electoral commission confam say e win.
Dem arrest ova hundred pipo for protests.
FACT leader na Mahamat Mahadi Ali wey be ogbologbo insurgent wey don live for France befor. 
Di group swear say dem go kontinue dia attack, afta dem don wait small say make dem do Deby burial on April 23.
Experts believe say FACT get between 1,500 and 2,000 fighters.
Di Chadian army claim for April 19 say dem don kill 300 rebels, and dem don catch 246 odas, wey dem dey carry go di kapital for N'Djamena to go face trial. But dem neva announce au many soldiers die. 
Security forces tok say e neva tey wey di armed forces send reinforcements go Kanem.
On Sunday, di CMT announce say mediation or negotiation no go apun wit FACT, and e don call on Niger to help dem catch di leader of di group.
Di CMT take over on April 20, immediately dem announce di death of Deby, wey dem kom scatta parliament and government.
E don promise 18-month transition period befor dem go conduct free and transparent election.
As di authorities tok, up to six pipo die on Tuesday for we-no-go-gree against di junta, but as one local NGO tok, na nine pipo loose dia lives.
Prosecutors tok on Thursday say dem dey interview ova 700 pipo wey dem arrest for we-no-go-gree on Tuesday and Wednesday.
Many dozens of protesters wey dem arrest na im dem bring inside police motor kom high court for Thursday from different police stations around di city.
Dem don clear many of dem, and dem don release plenti. ,N'Djamena prosecutor Youssouf Tom tell AFP.
On Monday, di military junta appoint Albert Pahimi Padacke as di transitional prime minister.
E call for a nationwide effort to make di return to civilian rule quick.(AFP)
Make Politicians no overheat di polity ova insecurity.
Befor-befor Deputy National Chairman of di former Congress for Progressive Change (CPC), Alhaji Salihu Mustapha, don tell top politicians make dem stop to dey tok tins wey go overheat di polity, cause crises and push Nigeria into anoda civil war.
Alhaji Mustapha wey dey contest for di chairmanship of di ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) ahead of di party national convention, tok on Sunday say, awa consign suppose be di Nigeria wey evribodi dey united so dat di kontri go fit conduct a successful transition for 2023.
E explain say no kontri don eva survive civil war two times, so e dey beg Nigerians, make dem support di President Muhammadu Buhari government to provide solution to di problems wey dey face di nation.
E tok say make we condemn di attempt by som pipo to turn awa security matta into politiks .
As Nigerians, we suppose learn from di my-pipo, una-pipo crises wey apun for Rwanda and oda place.
Violence neva eva solve any kontri problem befor.
War or violence no dey recognise religion or tribe.
Na fire wey dey destroy tins.
E no respect anybodi, weda di poor or rich, old or young.
Make Nigerians wey dem born afta di civil war learn lesson from Rwanda in 1994.
War no gud, war na evil.
Make all of us dey well guided.
Pesin wey dey rush go war, or pesin wey dey call for war suppose sabi say na death and destruction war dey bring.
Serena don loose for historic 1000th match
Serena Williams, wey play di 1000th Tour-level match of her glittering career, don suffer a shock 7-6(6)
7-5 defeat by Argentina
Nadia Podoroska for di Italian Open second round on Wednesday.
Na di first competitive match wey she go play for up to three months, di 23-times Grand Slam champion kom back twice from a break down but struggle for her first serve as Podoroska take di opening set in di tiebreak.
Podoroska, wey reach di French Open semifinal last year, produce a string of heavy topspin forehands to take control of di match wit early break in di second set.
Even say Podoroska brake to love for her first attempt to serve out di match, she maintain her composure to break again and secure a place in di round of 16.
Defeat for Williams, wey receive an opening round bye for Rome, na big blow to her preparation for di French Open, wey go start on 30 May.
Na di American 149th defeat wey she go get for her 1000 career WTA match.
World numba two, Naomi Osaka sef don komot for di tournament, afta she loose 7-6(2) 6-2 to American Jessica Pegula.
Osaka, wey be four-times Grand Slam winner, dey struggle for clay most times, and her defeat for Rome kom afta she loose second-round for di Madrid Open dis month.
Dem don arrest one man, sake of say e threaten im oga
Di police for Edo State don arrest one 25-year-old man, wey e name be Mike Ashien, sake of say e threaten to kidnap and kill im oga.
We hear say di suspect na employee of one domestic oil company wey dey Ugbogui community, for Ovia South-West LG of di state.
We also hear say di suspect hide im fone number, kom call im employer begin dey ask for N10 million, if not e go kidnap and kill am.
We still hear say afta di threat, e oga report di matta to di state police Commissioner, Philip Ogbadu, who give order say make dem investigate di matta.
Wen jurnalists dey follo di suspect yarn, e tok say na family problem wey hold am for neck force am commit di crime.
As e tok; My oga dey pay me N20,000 evri month but e no dey reach me, and I
jus shakara am to get more moni from e hand. But I don learn my lesson and I don dey regret am.
IAR don dey do research on Tela maize as a way to tackle pests and drought
For 2019, Nigeria join six oda African kontri Kenya, Mozambique, Tanzania, Uganda, South Africa and Ethiopia to enta a Tela maize project.
Di Tela maize project na public-private partnership wey go develop and commercialise di transgenic insect-protected and drought-tolerant variety  of maize to increase di productivity of farmers.
Tela maize na double-dose (moderate drought and insect resistance) maize variety wey dem design to help farmers get beta yield.
For di Institute of Agricultural Research (IAR), Ahmadu Bello University (ABU), Zaria, a join-bodi of scientists dey work on di maize variety to ensure say by 2022, farmers all ova di kontri go fit get am afta e don follow all di necessari regulation.
Professor Mohammed Faguji wey be seed breeder and di executive director of di IAR, tok say na two bad condition global warming bring (drought and flooding), plus pest wey make farming difficult for many small-scale farmers.
He tok say na dose problem di Tela maize go solve.
Daily Trust visit di farm on Sunday wia dem dey do different confined field trials to evaluate di efficacy and efficiency of di drought and pest-resistant quality befor dem collect di approval of di necessari authorities to release am to di environmental and afta, begin dey sell am for 2022.
Professor Rabiu Adamu na di principal investigator (lead researcher) of di genetically modified Tela maize project.
E tell Daily Trust on Sunday for di experiment farm wey dey Zaria say di research get two strong pupose: to produce transgenic hybrid variety of maize for di first time in Nigeria,
wey dey resistant to most maize pest, especially di major ones, stem borers and di fall army worms, and to produce maize hybrid
wey also dey tolerant to drought.
Dis hybrids dey genetically modified, and na biotechnology dem use make dem resistant.
Dem get gene from bacteria we dey live for soil wey dem put inside di maize gene, and e include resistance to insect pests, especially dose ones wey dey spoil maize, di fall army worm and di complex of stem borers, wey be three: di pink stem borer and di oda specie, di maize stalk-borer -Busseolafusca and Sesamiacalamistis.
Dis na di two main stem borers of maize for dis part of di kontri.
Dis hybrid wey we dey test dey genetically modified to resist damage by insect pests, especially stem borers and fall army worms as u don see for di farm, e explain.
E tok say di current crop wey dey di farm na di third Confined Field Trials (CFT).
No be only hia we dey hope to realise dis hybrid, but for Nigerian farm, for oda research institute and some out station to test dem to confam and validate di implication of di gene.
E kontinue say, afta, we go write memo to di regulator say make e allow us conduct more trails outside di conferment, for oda pipo farm and oda research institute.
On wen di farmers go fit get di seeds, e tok say afta one year wey di result don ready, dem go submit di report to di National Biosafety Management Agency (NBMA) for permission to take am to di farmers to do national multiplication trail.
Out of di 16 entry, dem go evaluate and submit di report of di best hybrid wey di famers select to di National Varietal Release Committee for Ibadan.
E tok say once dem accept say di varieties don meet di minimum requirement for dem to release dem as hybrid, dem go fit release am to  di farmers.
If possible, di scientists dey reason December 2022 for di release so dat in about three years, farmers for evriwia go get access to di seed.
Dr Muhyideen Oyekunle, di leader, Trial and Pipeline Testing, wey carry awa tori-pesin waka explain di biotic and abiotic attribute of di ongoing progress of di Tela maize research wey dem plant for three plots to evaluate di efficacy of di resistance to drought, fall army worm and stem borers.
For di farm, plenty difference dey, di one wey no be GM maize, get infected wit pests, di fall army worm, stem borers, almost finish am completely, but notin touch di GM variety, even say dem plant di two (Tela Maize and di traditional seed wey no get biotech protection) side-by-side.
Di ongoing field result wey awa tori-pesin see show say great prospect dey, even say dem go still need see and evaluate di yield.
Until then, solution to pests and drought problems dey road.
Som of di varieties na yellow but most of dem be white. For di trial, more dan 90 percent na white maize becos na im industry players prefer.
But di scientists major problem na COVID-19 pandemic and di issue of misperception and misinformation about di technology.
Pipo wey no sabi how di technology dey work like to dey use social media and oda non-scientific way to confuse and mislead di public and oda scientists. Di lead researcher, Professor Adamu na im tok so.
Di Tela maize scheme na join-bodi between di Afrikan Agricultural Technology Foundation (AATF) and di IAR under di Tela maize project wey dey happun for seven Afrikan kontris.
E dey build on di success on breeding work under di Water Efficient Maize for Afrika (WEMA) project wey dem design to develop different type of maize wey dey resistant to drought and wey dey protected from insect.
2023: Middle Belt and Southern leaders don tell APC and PDP say make dem zone presidential ticket to di South.
Di Southern and Middle Belt Leaders Forum (SMBLF) don tell di ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) and di Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) say make dem zone dia 2023 presidential tickets to di South.
Even say Podoroska brake to love for her first attempt to serve out di match, she maintain her composure to break again and secure a place in di round of 16.
Dis suggestion dey inside one statement wey di National Leader of di Forum and former minister of Information, Chief Edwin Clark;
Afenifere leader, Chief Ayo Adebanjo; President General of Ohaneze.
Ndigbo Worldwide, Prof George Obiozor; National President, Middle Belt  Forum, Dr Pogu Bitrus; and National Chairman, PANDEF, Senator Emmanuel Ebok Essien, and odas sign.
As e dey for di statement, di leaders dey ask for restructuring of di kontri befor 2023, also dem tell di federal government say make e declare a national emergency on security.
We insist say e dey very important to immediately restructure di kontri, due to di prevailing insecure atmosphere befor any further election.
We dey remind all di leading politikal party especially di APC, PDP and odas, say di basis of any viable demokracy, especially for diverse and complex kontri like Nigeria, na equal sharing of power 
Say di Northern part of di kontri go fully enjoy di Office of di Presidency, for di full statutory period of right years, by 2023, make dem surrender to di South.
Encourage politikal stakeholders from di South say make dem no for allow anybodi deceive dem to take di unpatriotic step of contesting for oda position like national chairmen and vice president of di main politikal parties, instead, make dem join hand demand and ensure say presidency move to di South for 2023.
E emphasize say, if dem no deal wit di security situation to allow banditry stop or dey reduced to di barest minimum, e no go possible to hold proper election for 2023.
Di statement insist say cattle rearing na private business, and so, make di federal government no try use di nation resources to promote any particular business, apart from say make e provide di enabling environment, for di performance of e regulatory roles.
Di leaders reaffirm dia commitment to di unity of Nigeria, dem tok say na only on di principle of equity, fairness and justice we fit sustain awa unity.
But, di Ambassador Aminu Wali faction of di Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) for Kano State don tok say na di North-East suppose produce di next president.
Di chairman of di faction, Mamina Bako Lamido, wey tok on behalf of oda executive members tok say Bala Mohammed dey fit for di job.
Di PDP faction show dia support wen di executive members of a group wey dey gada support for di governor, wey be Bala Abdulkadir Mohammed Vanguard (BAM-V), visit dem for di party secretariat wey dey Kano durin di weekend.
Lamido tok say for fairness and equity, make di party zone im presidential ticket to both North-East and South-East, say if di ticket go di North-East, make dem give Bala Mohammed di mandate.
As e don tok befor, BAM-V Director-General, Mohammed Abubakar Jibo, tok say di group go di party secretariat to gada support for Mohammed ahead of 2023.
We fit commission Lagos-Ibadan rail on June 10 - FG
Di Federal Government don fixed June 10 as di date wey dem fit commission di Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge rail.
Minista of Information and Culture, Alhaji Lai Mohammed, na im announce am wen e go inspect di project wit di Minista of Transportation, Mr. Rotimi Amaechi, on Sunday.
Mohammed, wey tok small wit tori-pipo for di Wole Soyinka Station wey dey Abeokuta, say di inspection on Sunday na to make sure say everytin don set.
befor di commissioning.
Daily Trust don tok am befor, au dem pressure di China Civil Engineering and Construction Corporation (CCECC), di kontractor wey dey handle di project, say make e deliver all di 10 stations befor di commissioning.
Di stations na Ebute-Metta, Apapa, Agege, Agbado, Kajola, Papalanto, Abeokuta, Omi Adio, Olodo and Moniya.
Most of di stations wey we don reach dey between 90 and 100 percent completion stage.
Di Ministas and di Permanent Secretary of di Ministri of Transport, Dr. Magdalene Ajani, Managing Director of di Nigerian Railway Corporation (NRC), Engr.
Fidet Okhiria and oda officials of di Ministri start di inspection from di Mobolaji Johnson Station (Ebute-Metta) befor dem go di Bola Tinubu Station (Apapa).
Di Ebute-Metta Station na di biggest station for di train corridor.
Dem see dis station as di most magnificent government building for Nigeria.
Accordin to di Transportation Minista, dem don put all di equipment and facilities wey di place need befor di takeoff of operation.
Di Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge rail na di lot 2 of di 2,700km Lagos-Kano standard gauge wey dem start di construction for 2017 wit extension to Nigeria
Premier Port for Apapa to ensure massive cargo movement and decongest di ports.
Mohammed tok say tentatively, dem go commission di Lagos-Ibadan standard gauge on June 10.
Wetin di Honourable Minista dey do na to ensure say evritin don set befor di commissioning on June 10.
Una go see say we don waka from Apapa to Agege, Papalanto reach hia, and una see say we don go follow di contractor dem yarn say evritin must set.
Di reason be say dis na one of di flagship of dis administration, one of di landmark achievement of dis administration.
No be only say na di first time wey we go get double standard gauge but una dey see di passion wey di Minista dey use supervise di project.
Gunmen don shoot herbalist, and kidnap two women
Som gunmen wey pipo feel say dem be kidnappers don shoot one popular traditional medicine producer, Alhaji Laminu Jibrin, afta dem attack e house wey dey Tafa town along Abuja-Kaduna highway, for Kaduna State.
Di attackers, wey be about 20 for numba, burst inside di man house around 1:00 am on Monday, afta dem force di house gate open.
One of di neighbour wey dey live for di area, wey no go like mention e name tok say di attackers meet di herbalist wen e dey package som herbal product, but dey tink say na one of di worker of di company.
Som of dem beat e wife as dem dey ask wia her husband for dey, di neighbour tok.
We hear say di man attack di gunmen wit one stick wey dey e hand, but di men respond wit di shooting wey injure am for e shoulder.
Di gunmen later kindnap di man wife, and anoda woman wey be one of e neighbours. Dem don carry di man go one hospital wia e dey collect treatment wit e small pikin wey bullet nack for belle.
All awa effort say make we follo di police area commander for Jere,
ACP Faruk Umar, tok no dey successful, sake of say e no gree pick any of awa tori-pesin call.
Poultry feed crisis: Why we need more intervention.
Di crisis wey dey di poultry feed industry pass be careful late last year wen many poultry farmers begin dey close down dia farms, sake of say price of feed don high, and dis don make dia cost of operation too much.
Di leadership of di Poultry Association of Nigeria, di association wey all di poultry farmers for di kontri dey under, do emergency meeting for Abuja, to warn say if dem no do sometin kia-kia, di poultry industry fit die.
Di director-general of di association, Onallo S. Akpa, wen e dey call for immediate intervention by di federal government, tok say maize wey be N80,000 per ton and soybeans wey be N120,000 per ton for January 2020, don be N200,000 per ton (maize) and N250,000 per ton
(soybeans) for January 2021.
Clearly, as a way to prevent crisis for di feed distribution industry, di Central Bank of Nigeria put bodi quickly, as dem don agree to release about 300,000 metric ton of maize to di industry batch by batch.
Dis intervention, wey di stakeholders believe say e dey on time, be like say e don reduce di earlier tension wey dey di sector.
Di target, accordin to di bank, na to ensure say di poultry industry dey sustainable, job retention dey, circular flow of income kontinue, cheaper nutrition dey possible and poverty reduce. 
Last month, about 50,000MT na im dem give stakeholders for di feed milling industry, and dem go release di remaining small time.
Stakeholders believe say quick release of di remaining tonnes go solve more of di feed challenges wey dey di sector befor di Easter celebration wey dey come.
Di current intervention na join-bodi between di CBN and partners like AFEX Commodities Exchange Ltd, wey dey kontrol di release of di grains.
Di reduction for maize production don be one of di major challenges for agricultural sector, becos as di PAN DG tok, dis na di food wey dem dey chop pass for northern Nigeria.
Dis na di reason why many feed producers wit oda stakeholders dey ask for more support from di CBN in di area of maize and soybeans production.
Di General Manager of Premier Feeds Ltd, Austin Daylop, wey be one of di beneficiary of di intervention, tok say as di new farming season for maize and soybean dey kom, we go need take quick action to meet di demand of di growing population, and also ensure say e no scarce for Nigeria. 
Di Anchor Borrowers Programme wey CBN join bodi with di Rice Farmers Association of Nigeria (RIFAN) do na one of dat solution.
We go need establish dat kind programme for maize and soybean production too.
E go surely help us reduce rural-urban migration of di farmers wey insecurity cause, especially for di Northern states wia dem dey plant maize and soybeans.
If we kontinue di join-bodi between di concerned government authorities and industry stakeholders like di Maize Growers Association of Nigeria (MAGPAMAN) and Poultry Association of Nigeria (PAN) we go fit provide important field data, so dat policymakers go fit undastand di input wey dem need to expand di product capacity of local farmers.
Ayodeji Balogun wey be di CEO of AFEX, tok say: Wit di release of 300,000MT of maize,throughdi support from credible players for di ecosystem, plus awa team for AFEX, di CBN go fit give ova 35,000 farmers and agro processors a channel wey dem go fit dey buy and sell maize for subsidized rate, and laidat, dem go fit increase local demand, improve di way of life of di farmers and reduce di negative effect of di increase for maize price.

Oil price don go down on Monday as Coronavirus cases dey go up, tighter restriction of movement for Europe and China don increase di worry ontop weda improvement go dey for fuel demand.
Industrial production data and beta gross domestic product (GDP) from China na e help to reduce di downside small.

Also, U.S. oil future drop by 0.1 percent at 52.36 dollars afta e drop more dan 2 percent for di session befor.
Di total numba of Coronavirus case fo di world don pass 95 million, and di numba of death don pass 2 million.

Dem tok say di suspects dump di dead animals for pit.

E tok say di police command no go fit relax dey look, make criminals take justice to dia own hand. E also yarn say di command no go kommot face for anytin we go make sure say dem do beta investigation, so dat dis kind evil act no go happun again. 
He add am join say, On di 24th of March, 2021 around 10:00am
som herdsmen report for di Divisional Police Headquarter wey dey Zonkwa, for Kaduna, say som pipo don attack, kill and dump about 706 of dia cows and 75 of dia sheep for inside pit.

Di danger signs dey evriwia; even blind man fit see am.

Di Agriculture and Agro-Allied Group of di Lagos Chamber of Commerce and Industry (LCCI) don elect Mrs. Edobong Akpabio as di new chairman wey go drive di ship of di group and take charge of e affairs for di next two years.
Dis one happun afta di term of office of di former executives of di group don expire.
LCCI na di lead Chamber of Commerce and one of di leading voices for di organised private sector (OPS) for Nigeria.
Mrs. Edobong Akpabio na di Co-Founder/Chief Executive Officer (CEO) of Visionage Agrotech Farms Limited and Organic Green Animalia Farms Limited, wey be two respected Agribusiness organisation.
She graduate from di University of Uyo, wia she collect Bachelor of Arts Degree for English in 1988 and Post-Graduate Diploma for Logistics and Supply Chain Management from Obafemi Awolowo University, Ile-Ife for 2005.
Akpabio don contribute well well for di reversal of importation of agric products, and she don assist for local content drive and sustainability.
Di Director General of LCCI, Dr. Muda Yusuf tok say di election of Mrs. Akpabio go ensure and improve di role of di Chamber as a leading advocate of best business policy and practice, wit di aim to promote and protect Small and Medium Enterprises, wey go also impact di economy positively.
INEC don fix June 19 for Jigawa and Kaduna bye-elections
Di Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) don fix Saturday, 19 June 2021 as di day wey dem go do di bye-election for Gwaram Federal Konstituency, Jigawa State and Sabon Gari state konstituency for Kaduna State.
Di National Commissioner and Chairman for Information and Voter Education Committee (IVEC), Festus Okoye, wey tok dis for different statements on Friday for Abuja, say dem go publish di official notifications for di elections on 17th, May 2021.
Dis one happun afta di member wey dey represent Gwaram Federal Konstituency of Jigawa State for di House of Representatives, Hon.
Yuguda Hassan Kila die on 4th March 2021, and di announcement say di seat of di member wey dey represent Sabon Gari state konstituency for Kaduna Assembly, Hon.
Aminu Abdullahi Shagali, don vacant.
As di chairman tok, politikal parties go conduct dia primaries between May 18 and 24, 2021. E add am join say di access code for online submission of nomination forms go dey available for collection from May 24, 2021, for di commission headquarters wey dey Abuja, while di last day for submission of di list of candidates wey dem nominate na 28 May 2021 by 6.00 pm.
All di politikal party must pay attention to Section 87 of di Electoral Act wey relate to di nomination process, and submit di name and particulars of candidates wey get di majority of lawful votes and emerge from valid party primaries to di commission. 
Politikal parties must submit di name of dia polling agents for di election to di INEC Electoral Officer for Gwaram Local Government Area on/or befor June 1, 2021, and campaigns by politikal parties go end on June 17, 2021.
We don upload di details of di timetable and schedule of activities for di bye-election on di website of di commission and oda social media platform.
Di commission go like tok am again say since work dey go on di expansion of voter access to polling units for di kontri, di bye-election go hold for di existing polling units and voting points across di konstituency wey  cover Gwaram Local Government Area of Jigawa State and Sabon Gari Local Government Area of Kaduna State, - Okoye tok.
E also encourage all di politikal parties to strictly follow di timetable and schedule of activities and make dem avoid hate primaries and violence durin di campaign and tru-out di electoral process.

Di Senate on Tuesday tell di Department of Petroleum Resources (DPR) say make dem clamp down illegal roadside retailers wey dey sell liquefied petroleum gas, dose we dey operate for residential areas and gas plants wey get license but lack di basic and standard minimum requirement.
Di Senate also mandate im committees on Gas and Industries say make dem investigate di causes of recent cases of gas explosion across di kontri, and make dem suggest how to find permanent and sustainable solution wey go save di live of di pipo. 
Di Senate tok dis afta dem adopt di motion by Senator Ibikunle Amosun, wey express e sadness ova di loss of at least eight lives for gas-related explosion and fire incidence for Abeokuta metropolis, Ogun State, within two weeks last month.
Di Senate, also call on di Federal and State Fire Service to enforce di compulsory use of fire safety equipment for homes and places of work.
Dem also encourage di Standard Organization of Nigeria, di DPR, di National Orientation Agency and marketers of gas and highly inflammable products to embark on aggressive, consistent sensitization and awareness campaigns on di safe ways to use gas cylinders and oda inflammable materials.
But the England captain secured the consolation prize of winning the Golden Boot as he slammed home his 23rd Premier League goal of the campaign four minutes before half-time.
