Dangote Sugar Refinery tell federal goment say make dem implement the Backward Integration Policy (BIP) for sugar industry as di kontri fit earn $700 million inside evri year from local production
Aliko Dangote wey be Dangote Refinery Chairman tok for Thursday for em Annual General Meeting (AGM) for Lagos.
Dangote tok say if dem follow di National Sugar Master Plan and di player follow di rule, di kontri go dey better as Nigeria go save $600m and $700m for inside evri year as forex
E tok say di backward integration policy of Dangote Sugar Refinery record progress
Dangote tell shareholder dem say even as covid-19 pandemic dey, Dangote Sugar raise em population volume by 13.7% to 743,858 tonnes for financial year end for December 31,2020, compare to 654,071 tonne for 2019

she neva reply di text message wey dey send give am
Di word ranching wey we dey tok so neva get clearly define for dis kontry wey we dey so, na why intensive or enclosed livestock production system dem as ranching
Ranch be big area of rangeland wey dey enclose where animal dey waka and dey openly graze
Na reason why, di Land Use Act recommend allocation of 5,000 make dem dey use do livestock farming
If state goment believe for ranching, make dem put dia moni where dia mouth dey and allocate di recommend hectare to rancher dem
Di tok say states dey go into ranching bikos say land no dey dey

policeman dem wey carry gun take ova PDP secretariat
Armed policeman dem don dey deploye to di premise of pipo Democratic parti wey dey Calabar
Na since Saturday morning we don notice dia unusual presence for there
Dia presence fit be say make dem avart backlash as di landlord don dey out to evict di parti wey dey indebted to am

We don find new new and plenty way wey we fit use overkom awa challenges
Awa sale revenue and profit dem for 2020 dey high dat previous year, Ren tell journalist dem
Ren tok say di Intelligent Mining Innovation Lab go result for better service for mines wit 5G
As dem dey support di mining industry, we fit grow awa business and support plenty efficient and safer production for mines
We fit allow coal worker dem wear suit and tie for work, Ren tok
To dey connect business be di main goal for di 5G era
Plenty industry dey wey we no too dey familiar wit, like airport,ports, coal mining, iron and steel production, automotive manufacturing, and aircraft manufacturing.
Na why we build joint lab to take learn about di need of diz industry
Huawei business result for di first nine month of di year 2020 show say di revenue total 671.3 billion yuan (98.57billion), up 9.9% for di same period for 2019
We go continue to dey do awa customer well well as we go dey create plenty better value
We want make dem get lasting faith in us, and we hope say dem no go go away bikos say political pressure dey, Ren tok

Iliyasu Nazifi wey be engineer and young entrepreneur tok say rice don get di boost wey em neva get before for di last five years for di history of agriculture for Nigeria, wey allow many milling factory dem start for Kano State
Nazifi be chief executive officer for Golden Star Rice Mill and e be member of Rice Processors Association of Nigeria (RIPAN)
Dem tok say di thing no go dey possible witout di commitment and support of member and leaderhip of di RIFAN wey dey different states inside Nigeria
Alhaji Abubakar Haruna wey be chairman of di RIFAN for Kano State tok say dem don estimate say Nigerians dey consume more than five million metric ton of rice evri year, wey most dey kom from import
He tok say deman d wey dey grow than supply, wey be say population growth and urbanisation be parts of factor wey dey drive am, na em give birth to di strategy wey goment adopt to make sure say production increase wey go lead to self-sufficiency
E add say na few of di industry dey work full capacity
85% of industry wey dey Kano no dey work
Di expansion wey dem record na only for rice mill, and na bikos goment policy dem dey favourable to di operators
Aregbesola dey lament say di year 2020 wey go inside 2021 don see fire incident wey dey fear person, from market to gas and pipeline fire for evriwhere for di kontri
Di statistics wey we get dey show say di FFS for 2020 reach first quarter for 2021 receive 4,541 fire call wey 158 pipo lost dia live dem and property for fire incident wey dey occur for di kontri
Aregbesola advise state giverment and local goment chairmo make dem invest inside firefighting to allow make dem reduce how pipo dey change adress go heaven and how property dey destroy for fire incident for di kontri
Controller General of FFS wey don tok before, Dr Liman Ibrahim, tok say di service operational scope don span all ova di state wey dey di kontri and di FCT
E tok say di FFS go start to dey deploy personnel and asset to di 72 senetorial district wey remain before di year end
DCG Quintus G. Azogu and DCG Callistus Agu dem wey be Deputy Controller-Generals and  ACG Thompson Mohammed wey be Assistant Controller-General na dem coomot and dem mark dia retirement from service
Di development wey don apun for rice value chain for Nigeria don reduce urban-city migration and youth restiveness as plenty youth don dey engage in agreicultural practices, na Haruna tok am
Malam Hussaini Shuaiu wey be treasurer of RIFAN for di state, tok say di decision of di Federal goment to close border against rice importation don create big demand and em don create awearness for more deomestic mills
Dem also tok say di capacity of di state for rice production don increase, na why den fit establish mills
E no go tey, Kano State go move from center of commenrce to farming and processing, na wetin Shuaibu tok
Kano State Chamber of Commerce, Industries, Mines and Agriculture (KACCIMA)  dey worry say na only for rice milling di state don record boom and oda sector dem no dey too grow
According to wetin Ambassador Usman Darma wey be first deputy president of KACCIMA tok, plenty industry dem for Kano don close down bikos say electricity palava and financial challenges wey dey associated wit policy dem wey some commercial bank dey do
As combine team from National Assembly and Ministry of industry, Trade and Investment don visit, we hope say di issue go dey addredded for due course, e tok
We believe say GID go get deeper engagement and inclusion of women, outh, PWDs, IDPs, and oda group dem wey dey  marginalized  for di electoral process.
Dis suppose uphold  principles of participation, inclusion, and representation wey good representative democracy dey on top
As we dey hop say di department wey we just create go promote integrity and credibility of awa electoral process, wey want make INEC review oda recommendation for di advisory
She ok say em include make dem upload result for ward, local goment and state level to di result viewing portal, make dem upload electoral material for INEC website.
Hamman-Obels add say as dem dey look at 2023 election, di organisation believe say diz recommendation go help dem strengthen di integrity and credibility of di nation electoral process

NDLEA don raise alarm ova drug addiction for Jigawa
Di National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) wey dey Jigawa State don raise concern ova hard drug consumption wey dey go up especially among student dem wey dey tertiary institution wey dey di state
Hajiya Maryam Gambo Sani, wey be di state Commander of NDLEA,  wen e dey tok to Daily Trust decry drug consumption wey dey go up, wey she tok say em don heighten case of delinquency for di state
Sge tok say between February and May, di agency wey dey di state sieze 21.63 kilogramme of ban substance, and dem catch 108 suspect dem: 103 male and 5 female
She tok say di rate of consumption of drug among youth dem wey dey dio state no dey go down at all
Anytime dem officer go out go arrest pipo, dem wey always kom back station  wit plenty pipo wey dey use am
Before you fit catch dealer or baron, you go domn catch hundred of pipo wey be user, na why we fit say di rate wey pipo dey use drug don dey increase
She add say as both secondary school and tertiary institution student dem dey use illicit drug, na tertiary institution student dem dey use am pass
she tok say anytime wey dey commot, dem wey arrest student
I dey hope say I go meet management of versity to take discuss di issue of student wey dey involve wit drug abuse
she write say one young Nigerian kom back from UAE dis morning; e carry uber from airport to estac and a em e enter police officer dem hand.

Di virtue of open grazing for inside Nigeria
as dem dey tok am for inside one popular adage, if you dey inside tunnel, na light wey you need, no be sound
light for end of turnnel on palava wey dey on top cattle husbandary don tay
Na true say population don increase ova di years, and plenty land don dey use for farming and infracstructure, but wetin analysis show be say for 20 million cattle dem and 200 million Nigerians, land go dtill dey plenty
To take start, Kano State wey be one of di place wey pipo plenty pass get about one million cattle and tranquility dey.
na 92.3m landmass Nigeria get, wit 70.8 ha wey dem dey use do agriculture but na only 34 million to 35 million dem don use since last year
bikos say we dey tok, make we look maize production
data wey dey available show say inside 2020, na only 12m tonnes dem produce
research don touchlight say 86% of cereal biomass na em be say na material wey human no dey consume dem take do am.
According to wetin FAO tok, 33% of land wey dey dis world na em dem dey use for animal feeds while 30% of di earth surface dey permanently under pature to dey support global intensive livestock producton
Ethiopia get 100 million hectares landmass wit 60 million cattle, e plenty three times pass Nigeria own wey dey under open grazing
Ethiopia be one of di economy for Africa wey dey grow fast fast wit livestock production wey cover 40% of Agricultural output and e dey contribute 13-16% to di total GDP
Cattle production dey face myraid of challenge dem wey dey associated wit husbandry, di misconduct of herder dem, climate change and local politics
For today world, technology be weapon of first choice wey fit help overkom plenty challenge dem wey dey face livestock production
Na about N10 trillion (PAN) di industry worth and na em big pass for Africa
Commercial and free-range rural poultry dey for al state wey dey give commercial poultry di all-important Federal character.
Di poultry revolution no just apun laidat, na goment policy make am apun, public-private sector partnership and di entrepreneurship spirit wey Nigerian get .
Na di same technology fit transform di cattle industry wey evribodi go benefit.
Dr Junaidu Maina wey be former Director, Federal Livestock Department
Di president don direct State Department say make dem resume visa processing foe kontri dem and make dem develop plan wey go address pipo wey e affect, like doz wey dem deny make dem enter U.S.A
Di travel ban dey devastating to pipo wey get family dem for inside USA.
Mr. Du Ruogang wey be Managing Director for Lekki Port LFTZ Enterprise Limited (LPLEL), wey  be promoters of di Lekki Deep Sea Port tok say di port go generate like 2000 direct job and ova 10,000 indirect job wen dem complete am for 2022
Ruogang tok am wen e dey tok give journalist on a tour to assess di level of progress on di construction work for Lekki Port project site
E tok say di construction work dey move at fast rate, as em don reach 51% completion, e add say major milestone like completion of Eastern breakwater don be achieve
E tok say na all hand dey deck to deliver di first ogbonge Deep Sea Port for Nigeria as one of di shareholder, wey be Nigeria Port Authority, don commence to dey initiate maritime service for inside di site
E tok say e get confidence say dio Lekki Deep Sea Port go change di narrative for Nigeria maritime sector and em go impact economic development for Nigeria
According to wetin e tok, dem don estimate say Lekki Port go generate economic impact of $361bilion ova 45 years, wey go create 169,972 jobs and revenue for state and federal goment agency dem through taxes, royalties and duties in di process.
Di MD explain say di project don suceed to dey provide employment opportunity for about 1200 Nigerians wit 50 of dem wey kom from di host community dem
Huawei CEO: We no go give up di ideal of globalization
Ren Zhengfei wey be Huawei CEO don pledge say dem go stick to globalization strategy despite di pressure wey dem dey get from outside
E don call di new US administration make dem do more open policy dem wey dey wit di interest of US company dem and US economy as a whole
Na wetin di Huawei founder first tok be dis since di change of di US administration
Ren dey tok for one press briefing for Taiyuan, di capital city of China northern Shanxi Province, afta dey launch di intelligent Mining Innovation Lab
Trade dey benefit di two side dem
To dey allow US company dem supply goods to chineses customers dey conducive to dia own financial performance
If Huawei production capacity expand, US company dem go fit sell plenty
Na win-win situation di thing be
I believe say di new administation go weigh dis interest as dem dey consider dia policy, ana wetin Ren tok
Ren tok say Huawei create value to di whole ecosystem and di wider economy
E cite example say Huawei don build 5G network for many city dem wey dey Europe, Asia and di Middle East.
As humanity dey make progress, no konpany fit develop gloibalise economy alone
Na wetin wey require effort from around di world, na wetin Ren tok
Di United State goment don dey campaign against Huawei for di last two years dey tok say Huawei equipment fit dey use to dey spy on America and dem no present evidence.
Huawei don deny di claim ova and ova, and few oda kontri dem don give in to US pressure
Farmer and Herder dem for Ekiti go resgister wit goment or make dem expel dem
Ekiti State goment don give farmer and herder dem two weeks chance to use resgiter wit di state goment or make dem get ready to leave di state.
Na Sunday, March 22 di two weeks state.
Di state conduct two weeks registration for farmer and herder dem for february, but no be evri bodi seize di opportunity
E add say di registration na also to ensure peace between di two group and bring end to clashes wey dey apun netween dem
E note say di exercise dey consonance wit di National Livestock Transformation Programme wey di Federal goment dey do
Dr. Adetoye observe say di clash wey dey apun between farmer and herder dem be danger to humanity and food security.
retired Brig.-Gen. Ebenezer Ogundana wey be Special Adviser to Gov. Kayode Fayemi on security matters and chairman, herders-farmers peace committee warn say persin wey no register, dem go do am like criminal
Pipo like dat go commot di state, na wetin e tok
Prof. Mobolaji Aluko wey be Director-General, Office of Transformation and Service Delivery, tok give  di News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) say identity card go dey issue to farmer and herder dem wey register for free of charge.
President Muhammadu Buhari for  October 13, 2020, nominate one of hin aide, Lauretta Onochie and three oda pipo for commissioner in di National Electoral Commission
Apart from the chairman of di commission, Professor Mahmoud Yakubu, na 12 national commissioner dey wey dey run di administation of di electoral umpire
Yakubu, wey em first tenure finish for Monday, Novermber 9, 2020, dey re-appointed as chairmo of di commission for second term for insode office
Voluntary retirement of Abubakar Nahuche wey be engineer sef dey, which mean say six vacant seats dey for di electoral impire for national commissioners
dis fit prompt President Buharis nomination of hin Special Assistant on Social Media, Lauretta Onochie, for confirmation by di senate for national commissioner wey dey represent Delta State.
Oda pipo wey dem nominate be Professor Mohammed Sani (Katsina), Professor Kunle Ajayi (Ekiti) and Seidu Ahmed (Jigawa).
October 13,  2020 wen  Ahmad Lawan wey be Senate President, dey read di president letter of request at plenary in the Senate, tok say di nomination dey  pursuant to paragraph 14 of part 1F of the First Schedule of the 1999 Constitution.
Civil society organisation member dem wey tok wit Daily Trust dey unanimous say President Buhari should respect di provisions of Nigeria constitution and make e no delay.

According to wetin e tok, if di president dey get difficulty to find di correct candidate to fill di vancancies, make e advertise di position make pipo wey dey qualified apply.
To allow vacuum for institution wey dey important to awa democracy sey send worrisome signal
On di nomination of hin aide, wey pipo conderm, di president dey look like person wey no know popi for outside hin circle wey dey goment
Cynthia Mbamalu wey be di director of programmes, Yiaga Africa, tok give Daily Trust say INEC neva dey fully constituted since di seat of some national commissioner don dey vacant
Di National Assembly get power to decline and to confirm persin wey meet di require criteria to serve as national commissioner
Di lawmaker dem should screen oda nominee wey pass di test of non-partisanship and integrity as dem dey wait for replacement for pipo wey no pass di test
Dis delay get impact on di operations of INEC wit 21 months away from 2023 elections
Wen we contact dem, di Presidency dey quiet on di decision of di senate not to confirm di nominees
Senator Babajide Omoworarewey be Senior Special Assistant to the President on National Assembly Matters (Senate), no pick hin calls and e no reply di text message wey awa correspondent send give am.
A similar message wey we send to di Senior Special Assistant to the President on Media and Publicity, Garba Shehu, afta phone calls, no get reply at di time of going to press.
Dem accuse Secondus of N10bn fraud for fresh crises wey dey apun for inside PDP
Fresh crises don burst for inside pipo Demoratic parti (PDP) as dem don accuse di Prince Uche Secondus-led National Working Committee (NWC) of mismanagement of N10bn wey dem generate from di slaes of forms for years ago
EFCC and ICPC wey be di anti-corruption agencies for di kontri don get petition wey one of di chieftain dem for di parti write ova di matter.
The petitioner, Prince Kassim Afegbua, allege say di leadership don mismanage close to N10bn wey dem get from di sale of nomination form dem for the presidential, gubernatorial, house of assembly and senatorial elections wey apun for 2017 to date.
the National Publicity Secretary of the PDP, Kola Ologbondiyan wey respond to di petitioner tok say di claim dey asspurious andirresponsible.
PDP no raise N10bn as Afegbua allege am
To take remove doubt, PDP generate di sum of N4.6 billion and dem raise di budget of dia expenditure.
She add say di appointmentof di commisonner wey remain dey crucial for a duly constituted INEC, wey go ensure successful conduct of di 2023 election.
she tok say e dey crucial make di president reconsider hin nomination and make e increase di number of woman dem for national commissioner

dem give Nigerian dem one of di strictest visa regimes to di UAE and dem exclude dem entirely from certain type of long-stay visa

For last week, we get news say $601 million of airline fund dey stuck for inside Africa
For December 2019, I write article about Thomas Cook, wey be di first-eva travel agency and how dat firm accidentally establish tourism as we know am today
opposition wey dey kom from di herders, though na from di Fulani pipo e plenti pass, e kom still dey among di farmers wey no want make pastolist dem enjoy di benefit of di plan sef, dey spoil di reform effort 
Distrust don plenti for Middle belt, place wey be say fight between farmers and herders too plenti bikos of land, even though peacemakin and effort wey di military dey take since 2018 don reduce di blood shed
Shortage don dey federal and state goment budget, small part na bikos of di economy wey spoil bikos of di pandemic, and bikos di kontri no get technical experts wey know how dem take dey manage ranch and grazin reserve
For many states, especially for North-West, di way wey criminal gang and group dem wey get arm dey grow dey spoil access to grazin reserves and e dey make pipo wey wan invest before no do am again
unless dey do somethin about am, dis kasala and oda ones fit delay or make e spoil di plan, wey go make di kontri dey helpless wen di fight between farmers and herders dey serious pass before own, wey fit kom turn fight between ethnic group, region and religion
To tackle dis kasala,e go dey important make Federal and State authority join hand make effort, wit donors and investors help.
First, make Abuja and oda states wey dey support am provide political leadership wey strong pass before, make dey kom increase dia communication wit public, so dem go fit spoil pipo doubt and wrong understanding of di plan
Dis one dey common pass for pastoralists dia side, wey go ask dem make dem change dia nomadic lifestlye wey dey wit dia pipo for centuries, wey still get serious doubt say di plan promise about pasture na lie.
But many farmers dey fear say dem go lose dia land give pipo wey dey produce livestock.
Many pipo for di middle Belt and oda states for di South still dey suspect di plan long-term goals, wey dem dey see as opportunity for herders and di Fulani people particularly
Wit di support from Abuja and oda partners, state goments go need find pipo wey go be expert, wey go know technical aspect of thins, especially pipo wey go dey manage di ranch and grazin reserve, dairy production and meat processin
Make Federal and State goment sef increase dia budget for di plan, release di fund quick and make dey kom create financial transparency to make sure say evrithin dey accounted for, to dey work wit donors and investors wey necessary
E dey important sef to dey deal wit insecurities wey dey rural area, to dey curb impunity and to dey kom rehabilitate communities wey di fight affect seriously for di states wey dey participate.
Authorities go need consider weather change mata join, make dem decide if herders from oda kontris sometimes go benefit from di plan sef
As some of dis step go take time,make di pipo wey dey plan am focus on how dem go fit bring result wey strong, wey pipo go fit see for small time
less dan two years from now, di kontri go hold general election
if di plan go survive di change of goment wey go follow, Politians go need bring proof wey clear say e get benefit (Change dey certain, as president Buhari and many state governor dem no go fit compete again as dey don serve two term)
By di time wey champaign for election don dey hot for 2022 endin , di pipo wey dey back di plan suppose fit show some of di ranch wey dem build or di reserve wey dem repair,strong donor wey dem get and dia investors commitment and di first group of pipo wey dey don train to be professional for Livestock mamagement
Nothin for dis thin dey easy but di plan worth di effort
No be say e perfect, but e bring chance wey dey important, chance to change Nigeria livestock system wit strategy wey go address wetin both herders and small-scale farmers need.
About 70 percent  pipo wey dey work for Nigeria dey get moni from Agriculture
To modernise di Livestock sector go boost di kontri prosperity and for di same time, na one big way to solve one of Nigeria kasala wey dangerous
As time dey reach for di 2023 election, both federal and state authority go need do quick so pipo go see wetin dem dey do, or else all dia work to create dis kind moment of opportunity go spoil.
Dis na executive summary of di report on top di National Livestock Transformation Plan (NLTP) and how dia work go fast, na International Crisis Group publish am
Nigeria Contitution of 1999 na di one wey dem hurry do and e no deserve di trust wey pipo get on top am.
Gbaja: 1999 constitution na product of national consensus wey dem do quick quick 
Di Speaker, House of Assembly, Femi Gbajabiamila, tok say di 1999 constitution wey dey wan correct recently na to tok about di place dem wey no good.
Dem quote Gbajabiamila say hin tok am for hin address for di Zonal public hearing on top constitution review mata wey dey apun for Lagos state
He tok say di constitution na product of national consensus wey dem rush do to return di kontri go democracy back.
he tok say awa constitution no dey standard bikos 1999 constitution na national compromise wey dem rush do two decades ago bikos dey wan send soldiers dem go barracks back make we for return go democratic goment
As he take note say no be di first time wey dem go change constitution be dis, he tok say na dis one wey di 9th assembly do be dey important pass for how di constitution amendent dey go for di kontri recent history as e be say di decision wey dem go take go get plenti consequence for Nigeria future.
National constitution na di foundation of hin existence
E suppose set terms of how awa nation go be, make e define wu we be for manner wey go show awa common truth and aspiration wey high pass
To kom back kom change di constitution as one pipo and one kontri na wetin dem get for mind dat time so e go hep di pipo get wetin dem want and e go hep show di kind way wey we want awa kontri be for detail.
He tok say; E dey important make di 9th National Assembly take responsibilty, make dem write dat kind constitution for Nigeria pipo
If no be say Nigeria future no dey luk good, to dey travel out no go be wetin many youth put for mind as dia next stop
2023: Offa don back Kwara goment for second term.
Pipo from Offa LGA for Kwara state on Thursday don tok say dem support Governor Abdulrahman AbdulRazaq for hin second term
Dis na afta one week wey di Olofa of Offa, Oba Mufutua Gbadamosi Esuwoye II, tok say hin back am for public and months afta some important pipo for Kaiama, Kwara North tok di same thin.
Accordin to di indegenes wey tok say dey support wetin dia monarch do, dia endorsement na bikos of wetin dey describe as di superlative performance of AbdulRazaq for di past two years
Dem describe AbdulRazaq as goal-getter, di pipo tok say di difference for development for di state dey veri clear compared to wetin dey der for di past
As he dey tok for one town hall meetin, APC chairman for Offa, Abdullateef Afolayan tok say for 2023
Chance no dey for di Kwara Goment house as all di pipo don get di mind to put govenor Abdulrahman AbdulRazaq for office again
important pipo for di mata dem wey concern Offa dey der, like di representative of Olofa, di Chief Imam of Offa, Christain Association of Nigeria
(CAN) and Muslim leaders, youths and business community dey der
wetin Kayode Alabi declare make di Deputy goment, Kayode Alabi, Special Advisers on top Political Communications and Strategy, Gidado Alakawa, Bashir Adigun, Saadu Salau, respectively, wey kom di event dey veri hapi
Pesin wey represent Olofa, di Asalofa of Offa, Alhaji Isiaka Shittu tok on top di development mata wey dey ground for di state wey di governor do, especially for Offa town say na good work, e kom add di Offa General Hosital, di road wey dem repair and Offa water works na some of di area wia di governor done hep di town.
Di women, wey di Market women leader,  Alhaja Idiat Yesufu dey represent, tok say di pipo know di level of development wey di present administration don achieve since dey enta office
chance no dey for di Kwara Goment house as all di pipo don get di mind to put government Abdulrahman AbdulRazaq for office again.
She tok say Offa women follow support di endorsement wey  di Olofa give di goment, bikos we know how Kwara be before and how e be now.
Di kasala wey big pass for Nigeria na di fact say na fanatic dey rule am.
5 years afta: why Nigeria no still see beans export 
Nigeria hope to dey export dry cowpea(beans) to kontri dem wey dey European Union don spoil  
Dis na bikos of di extension of di ban wey dey ground before on top di kontri dry beans by European Union wey go end by 2022
Di EU food safety authority don ban Nigeria beans for 2015 bikos he get like 0.3mg per kg to 4.6mg per kg Dichlorvos, one pesticide, wey be say di type wey suppose remain no suppose pass na 0.01mg per kg
Dey consider say Dichlorvos get poison wey fit kos diffuculty for breathin, diarrhoea,vomitin, convulsion, dizziness  and oda sickness sef
experts tok say like many organophosphate (OP) insecticide,e get enzyme cholinesterase sef wey dey kos disruption of di nervous system and muscular system
some expert sef claim say some farmers and middlemen dey use Sniper, anoda chemical wey dey deadly use preserve dia beans
Independent investigation wey dis paper conduct last year show say most of di beans for di kontri dey perserved wit chemical wey dey dangerous to human health
One food scientist, Idowu Amusa , list di consequences wey dey di consumption of food wey dem use sniper and oda harmful chemical preserve wey include gastro-intestinal issues, brain and oda internal damage, blood poisonin, food poisonin and e fit kos death
Di EU don extend di ban from 2018 on importation of dry beans from Nigeria until June 2019 bikos of di pesticide wey dey always dey der
Nigeria Agricultural Quarantine Service (NAQS), di kontri produce regulator, don assure di farmers and oda stakeholders before say di kontri dey work hard to ensure say dem lift di ban for 2021
One recent document from EU don announce extension of di ban, he tok say Nigeria no implement di Union food safety plan wey dem submit for 2018
wit di extension, beans wey dem produce for Nigeria  no go fit enta any member kontri for European Union.
Na like dis e don be for five years
How e take start
For 2015, dem reject some beans from Nigeria bikos of di Eu export regulations
One official for NAQS tell awa Agric Editor say as e reach Tin Can Island, di NAQS team go check di consignment and dey discover say some of di containers don dey turn power and dey reject am bikos of di chemical residue 
We take awa own analysis from there, kom discover say aside from di pesticide residue wey dey, pest sef dey and na dem kos di powder form of di beans
He tok say di agency don dey carry out serious campaign to explain how and di reason for farmers and middlemen make dem dey preserve dia beans wit acceptable chemical level
Di official, wey no write hin name down, tok say aside from export wahala, to dey chop beans wey dey don too preserve dey dangerous to human and animal health.
Expert tok say Nigeria dey lose billions 
One agric economist, Mr Segun Ayeni, tell Daily trust yesterday say Nigeria dey lose billions of naira sake of di ban wey dey kontri beans mata wey EU give dem for 2015.
He tok say traders and goment no dey see moni from beans value chain bikos of di ban
He tok say all traders wey dey between, di warehouse pipo, di transporters and we, wey dey involve for di inspection and certification, dat aspect don dey broken down bikos e dey no fit generate any revenue for di value chain.
Pipo reaction dem
Di National president of All Farmers Association Nigeria (AFAN), Architect Kabiru Ibrahim, as he react to di ban wey EU give dem, tok say he fit say he no dey connected wit di kontri noncomformity wit di Global Good Agricultural Practice Protocol
For di production, we need deploy good agricultural practice, and for di preservation, make we no use plenti volume of chemicals wey go dey leave residual content wey dem no go accept as wholesome foods for Europe
Dem no think di general ban for EU well bikos some farmers don already dey comply wit di GAP standard dem
He add say dem dey work wit some farmers to ensure  say dey comply wit GAP
As di National president of AFAN, I be di Chairman of di National Technical Working Group on Global GAP for Nigeria wey dem inaugurate for 2017 by Di Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development dat time
He tok say various exporters, agribusiness groups, Ministry of Trade and Invesment, SON, NAFDAC, Quarantine Department go need work together, make dem act as one to make wetin we produce acceptable globally
Mr Idowu Amusa, one food scientist, don advice say make farmers dey grow only organic food and if na must make dem use pesticide on top dia farm, make dem use only pesticide brand and di dosage wey dem recommend
He tok say make dem dey allow time between wen dey use di pesticide and wen dey use food produce, and if he possible, make dem label di food product wit information wey dey relevant about di food cultivation for consumers
I love Nigeria, things go change, still remain di same evritime.
Tuchel dey eye Chelsea first Trophy as Leichester dey chase FA Cup history
Thomas Tuchel plan make hin win Leichester as dey wan make history, as hin be Chelsea manager, he dey eye di First Trophy fo hin reign on Saturday
FA Cup for Wembley
Tuche don enjoy hin work wella since hin replace Frank Lampard for January
Di German don lead Chelsea go FA Cup aand Champions League final, as he dey take dem go Champions League top-four back
If hin win hin Maiden Silverware for English football, e go be evidence of Tuchel impact
But Leichester wey get two points pass Chelsea for Champions League, go be serious threat for Tuchel ambition, as he be say na under dia boss Brendan Rogers correct guidance dem dey
Foxes dey aim to win FA Cup for the first time for dia first appearance since 1969
No club don reach plenti FA Cup final  wey no kom carry Trophy pass Leichester, dey don lose four times for the showpiece match
For di oda hand, Chelsea don win di FA Cup eight times, dia last win na against Manchester United for 2018
Blues wey Arsenal beat for last year final, go show face di fourth time for the competition final for di last five years
Afta he don beat star manager dem like Pep Guardiola, Jurgen Klopp, Jose Mawainho, Diego Shineon, Zinedine Zidane, Carlo Ancelotti since he reach Chelsea, Tuchel go go against Rodgers for di first time as Chelsea boss
Afta one frustratin end for hin spell for Paris Saint-Germain, wer hin win French Title, wey hin reach last season join
Champions league final before dey force am comot afta one power struggle wit Sport Director Leonardo, Tuchel quick comot any doubt for hin mind about hin sustainability for Chelsea
He no dey answer pipo wey dey attack or abuse di kind person wey hin be, upon say he get plenti agbero and wobe pikin under hin control.
New tecnology, wetin dem find wey fit reduce yawa wey dey farm labor.
For many farmers for Nigeria, improved technology dem wey go make farming easy and smooth, wey no dey before, especially for di young pipo, na serious challenge
Upon say na 16 agriculral Institutes and four conventional University dey di kontri, research and development don dey veri slow
Recently, Daily trust speak wit Professor Ishiyaku Mohammed, di executive director for di Institute for Agricultural research(IAR), Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria and he
explain some of di new research and technology wey di Institute develop for farmers
Recent variety wey dem release
For di most recent situation, na like 28 different Sorghum dem release
Na like di same number dem release for groundnut sef
Di institute release like 20 variety for cowpea sef and 66 different maize variety, afta, 13 different variety of cotton
Dey get economic attributes wey dey veri important wey go increase di income of farmers and provide different product for utilisation, whether na as food, fiber, or for makin textile products for cotton case, or even if na to provide oil groundnut and cotton case.
Di IAR don wake di concience of farmers generally make dem know say modern technologies dey
awa scientists dem don dey create machine and tool wey we go fit use reduce drudgery for some years now
For example, planter and tractors don dey wey dem fit use hand hold
And we don dey find way wey we go use perfect rollin weeders bikos pipo don dey complain say farmers dey use hoe wey dem dey use hand hold comot weed 
Na so we answer dem wit di mechanical weeder wey we dey develop
we get thresher dem for maize, beans, sorghum and groundnut
Dryers dey important wen you produce crop wen rain still dey fall, so you need find place wia you go fit dry dem
hin tok say dryin sef dey important if you wan store product like tomato
somethin new for ginger seed
He kom continue tok say IAR sef enta one area for science wey just dey emerge wey dem call biotechnology
awa scientists don dey develop wetin dem go use propagate crops fast
For example, we get order make we for micro-propagate ginger .
Na how your plantin material plenti reach go determine di ginger production, di plantin material dem dey veri expensive, na hin make awa scientist dem develop way wey be say you fit develop like 1 to 2 inches of ginger piece inside bottle
You fit produce more dan 200  plantlets wey dem fit grow for field
Right now, we dey receive order from some farmer wey dey find am.
We dey do am for sugarcane sef
Dis technique dey help to propagate disease-free crop, sometimes, plantin materials fit don get disease
Na as your plant reach, na hin di disease sef dey propagate for odas
But dis technique dey try purify material make dem dey disease-free
Na Tissue Cultural Technique dey call am, na der dem dey plant for bottle, make e for proliferate
Each plantet fit give rise to plenti plantet now etc.
New technology for bio-fertiliser, Irrigation
Technology as we develop am dey go through two stage
Di first stage dey scientific
For this part, scientist dem go don dey sure say dis technique get di kind technology or tool wey dem go fit use solve di kasala, afta, di farmers go test am diasef.
Den, based on farmers opinion, dem fit still propagate am
So, for di area crop variety wey i don dey count give you for di last few years now, we don release variety of cowpea wey dey insect-resistant.
Na SAMPEA20T dem call maize own; na di same year wey we release six different maize wey get potential to yield 6-8 tonne per hectare and for 2020 den.
Dem release three types for improved sorghum (sweet sorghum), wit anoda six type of maize
For dis recent time, na wetin we release be dat
We wan release one technology for bio-fertiliser, na capsule wey get of some kind material,wey kom still get some kind microorganism wey dey useful as e be say dem fit help fix nitrogen, wey go benefit how plants take dey grow and develop as dem add fertilizer sef
He tok say we don develop develop technique for irrigation wey we improve so e go dey reduce how farmers take dey waste water. 
One rule wey Journalists dey use na to use short sentence instead of long one if e go work.
Di Guild at 60, inspirin di livin, honorin di dead
Wey Lanre Idowu write.
Sixty years ago,on Saturday, May 20,1961, dem born Di Nigerian Guide of Editors, Pikin wey get great hope for di old National Press Club wey dey Abibu Oki for di heart of Lagos den
Dem name am Di Guild of Nigerian Editors
Dey don sideline di editors well from di Nigerian Union of Jornalists wey don dey exist like six years before Guild, bikos dem bi management staff, dey no fit trust dem make dem represent di interest of di rank and file journalists
As answer for di reverse discrimination wey NUJ dey do, dia need to make Professional Guidance, make dey kom stil protect dia interest for di socio-economic development wey dey unfold for the early days of nigeria wey dey independent, di Guild emerge make dem fit occupy middle ground of professional managers wey dey strategic between owner and di general rank of journalist dem
Lateef Jakande (1929-2021) for Nigerian Tribune be di first foundin president
hin Cabinet get pipo like Babatunde Jones (1925-2008) of Di Daily times as Vice president, Abiodun Aloba (1921-2001) of mornin Post as di Secretary and Nelson Ottah of Di Drum as vice Secretary
Dem establish Di Guild make dem use advance di interest of di profession, make e deepen editors dem relationship wit public, from media, goment, association wey dey professional and di one for trade and oda groups wey dey civil society
Na make e for be proactive agent for development, wey go dey expect kasala, dey tackle am and make e clarify issues before e too serious.
Dey test di promise of hin birth soon for di crisis wey start for di early time of di First Republic
some editor kom be di casualty of di cat-and-mouse politics for dat era
Jakande go court wit Chief Obafemi Awolowo for Treasonable Felony and dey jail am for 1963
Dat same year dem appoint Jose as managing Director for Daily times, he no fit be executive again for Di Guild again technically as e be say na only defacto editor dey executive position
Dat time sef, Aloba dey fight for hin job as e be say dem dey probe di Post bikos of dia finance
As di leaders of di Guild don get challenge for different levels, Di guild soon lose dia way, dey no know right or wrong thin again
Di Guild be wan change dia name so dem go fit accomodate electronic media, e kom add for dia identity kasala for years later
Di Guild continue under military rule, 1966-1979, dey continue dey play active role for press freedom stuggle, dey kom enhance di respect wey dey for journalists and journalism
Sake of say dia members dey increase, and dem introduce different job title dem, di Guild don continue to dey struggle on top di question of who dem fit call editor.
Dis issue dey di crisis wey dem table for Minna convention for 1982
As di Guild affairs dey sttuggle wit partisan political interest wey dey kom from Geopolitical and sectional interest wey dey creep, di Guild no work for six years before dey kom start am back for 1988.
Di membership question kom back for 2008 and 2017
Dey neva stop.
In nine days, Nigeria editors go meet for Kano to elect new team wey go dey lead dia dem, especially for dia member issue and moni mata wey dey neva resolve
Sake of di major development for di industry,
For now, he dey proper to congratulate di industry say dey try wella to make di Guild still dey relevant till now.
Tomorrow, di Guild na major part for di industry effort to honour di memory of nine media leader wey die last year
Di newspaper proprietors association of Nigeria, di broadcastin association of Nigeria, di Nigerian Guild of editors, di Nigerian union of journalists go celebrate Alhaji Lateef Jakande togeda, foundin president of NPAN, NGE, Prince Tony Momoh, former NGE president, Mr John Egbuna, former director general for FRCN, Mr Eddie Aderinokun, former editor for morningg Post, Mr Sam Nda-Isaiah, Chairman wey depart for Leadership newspaper, Chiel Gbolabo Ogunsanwo, former editor for Sunday times, Mr Bisi Lawrence, former general manager for Lagos State broadcasting Corporation, Malam Wada Maida, former president for di Guild and Chairman for News Agency Of Nigeria,and Malam Ismail Isa, former president and life Patron of NPAN for one aftanoon wey dem dey give tribute for Lagos, honour pipo wey don dia, dey kom still inspire di pipo dey alive
Hapi diamond anniversary to di Nigeria Guild of editors
We need more quality interventiom programme wey go maintain di relevance of media as pipo wey dey shape and guide awa public morality
Idowu na editor in chief for media review and di trustee wey dey supervise di Diamond Award for Media Excellence (DAME)
Aithough he get moni, he no still dey hapi.
Presidential transition bill don pass second readin
DI bill for presidential transition don pass second readin for House of Representatives.
Di bill wey dem call, Transiton and Assumption of Office Bill 2020, wey Kpam Sokpo sponsor, be want provide for di procedure and ceremony for di change and assumption of di Office of president and Vice-president by di president and Vice-president wey dem elect
Di bill dey tok say afta di Independent National Electoral Commision(INEC) don declare who win presidential election, di transition comittee go make sure say di president-elect and vice-president-elect get security wey sure
Daily trust report say go e fit send pipo go jail if dey breach hin comtact
One part for di bill tok say, di committee go make sure say di president-elect and Vice president-elect go  collect security briefin from National Security Agency wey dey relevant
Di president-elect and Vice president-elect go follow di committee tok, make dem prepare all di tin wey dey necessary bikos dey wan enta office .
She return di komputa afta she notice say e don spoil.
Small gbege dey for Ogun bikos of di moni for dia LG Nomination form
Stakeholders dey against di nomination form moni for aspirant for july 24 Local Goment election for Ogun State
Di Chairman for di state electoral bodi, Babatunde Osibodu, tok on Tuesday say moni for Chairman form na N200,000 and Councillor form na N100,000
Osibodu kom still announce say di female candidates wey dey contest fit no pay di nomination form moni
Di state chairman for New Nigeria Peoples Party, Oginni Olaposi, tok say di moni na fraud
Di NNPC sef accuse governor Dapo Abiodun say e dey spoil Democracy Principle, as e dey don turn di free, fare, credible election to anoda thin.
One politician and Philanthropist wey dem born for Egba, Olumide Aderinokun sef tok say moni wey dem dey use buy Nomination form dey barbaric, e kom warn goment say make dem no turn election to opportunity take collect moni
Action Alliance (AA), Sanyaolu Abayomi don threaten di commission say hin parti go sue dem if dey still go do di election
Abayomi wey tok afta di stakeholders meething tok say di commission do mistake as dey no allow like four political parti tok dia own about di election wey dey wan do before and wen dem dey do di stakeholder meetin
He tok say; we no gree di 30 days ultiatum wey dey give us
bikos, I think say di timetable wey dem release before, dey giv us 90 days, na wetin we wan challenge today be dat
E don clear now say one power dey somewer for awa side
Dat one na di ovaall power wey dey control dem
But, if dey wan good for di political party dem, and if dey want make local goment election dey free and fair, make dem hear us, guide di date wey dem give us, make dey kom follow di constitution wey dey guide OGSIEC
If dey no do dat one, we no go mind follow dem go court
Meanwhile, governor Abiodun don promise say the election wey dey wan do for 24 July, no go favour di party wey dey rule
Abiodun tell di parti leaders say hin no go give pipo wey dey loyal for hin parti for election time political position, but  ay hin go promote equal participation, he add say, di leaders for di rulin parti must show say dem practice photographer
We must dey consistent, we must show say we don learn from oda pipo lesson, and we be wetin democracy produce
We don do primary wen one pesin no wan do am
We surrender awasef for di parti process, we kom change through di process wey di general election kom later confirm, despite all di odds
Make we make sure say all di process wey we do dey democratic, na must make dem see us as true progressive democrats.
Wen e be say na dis kind process, wetin we need na to encourage awa women make dem participate, make dem kom front kom participate, we go vote dem
But we no go share am say bikos you be woman, you take dis one
No, e no go be democracy
He tok say; we no go do dat one, evrithin go dey fair
Anytime wey thin dem cost, customers no dey buy plenti product.

Friesland record N199.5bn turnova
FrieslandCampina WAMCO Nigeria PLC, company wey dey manufacture premium milk brand like Peak, Three Crowns, Coast, Nunu and Olympic milk don report say dey get turnova of N199.5billion
Di company tok am for dia 48th Annual General Meetin wey dem dey do for Lagos
As he dey tok for di AGM, Di Chairman, Mr Moyo Ajekigbe, tok say: Di operatin environment wey dey challengin for 2020 plus di company commercial and financial performace for di year show big improvement if you compare am to last year own
Di turnova increase wit 23% for 2020 to 199.5 billion from 161.8 billion for 2019
He tok say di growth na bikos of organic and inorganic growth wey dem get afta dey buy Nutricima dairy business.
As dey break di financial down, e show say di profit wey dem get before dey pay tax decrease wit 20.3% from N18.8billion for 2019 go N14.9billion for 2020 bikos of high input cost and naira wey don devalue
Di shareholders approve all di resolution wey dey submit
Di Managing Director, Mr. Ben Langat for hin presentation tok say di year 2020 be like dat bikos di company focus on top sustainable business symptoms wey continue.

Unknown Gunmen kil Ahmed Gulak for Owerri
Unknown Gunmen kil Former Special adviser (Politics) for President Goodluck Jonathan, Ahmed Gulak for Owerri, Imo state.
Dey found out say dey kill Gulak for Obiangwu along Aba-Owerri road as he dey go airport go enta plane wey dey go Abuja for Sunday mornin.
One of hin friend, Umar Ardo, post for facebook say: I just confirm di sad and gruesome death of my friend and former classmate, di Former Hon.
Speaker for Adamawa state Assembly, Former Special Assistant Political for President Goodluck Jonathan
Barr. Ahmad Ali Gulak, na hin dem tok say unknown Gunmen kil for Owerri, Imo state, yesterday night.
One statement wey di Police Public Relations Officer for state command sigh confirm say na kil dem kil Gulak, he kom add say di security agency go probe di situation
On di 30/5/2021, around 7:30 am, arm robbers block and attack one Toyota Camry Cab wey dey carry Ahmed Gulak and three oda pipo go Sam Mbakwe Airport go enta plane
Di statement tok say di commissioner of Police Imo, CP Abutu Yaro, don direct discreet investigation for di mata as  he don put tactical and special force circle di area, make dem fit arrest di bad pipo dem.
Newspaper language wey be part of journalism language no be di same wit Medicine, Law and Engineerin language.
To tame Nigeria oil spillage and gas flarin scourge
E kom from Jerome Mario-Utami
Di recent news report say Okordia-Rumekpe 14-inch crude truck line wey Shell Petroleum Development Company (SPDC) dey operate discharge 213 barrel crude oil for Ikarama community for Bayelsa don reach awa side say though Nigeria wey been dey proud say dey be giant of Africa and di black kontri wey get pipo pass for di world stil dey get plenti third world kasala
As dem dey clarify say na like 1.34 hectare land dem pollute wit di leakage wey rupture for di pipeline follow, SPDC confirm say dey finish di investigation of di incident, dey tok say out of 213 of SPDC bonny light crude leak, na like 110 barrel dem see recover for di recovery exercise wey dem dey do for di site, e kom remain 109.12 barrel of di volume wey spill.
Admittedly, wetin Dutch oil giant claim na fact wey dem fit verify but e fit no be di only explanation
Notwitstandin dia clarification,reasons dey wey qualify dis kind apunin for Nigeria oil and gas industry as reality wey dey suppose analyse generally
Make we start wit reality
Aside from di awareness say spillage dey happen, communal right for environment wey clean and access for clean water supply na hin dey don violate for dat kind case, wit dia admission, dey don abandon thousands of site wey dey don pollute for di region, wey dem nid identify and study for detail as dey compensate di community wey e affect well for dia loss wella, dis lastest spill apun weeks afta one wey resemble am for one pipeline facility wey rupture wey one International Oil company wey dey  operate for Niger Delta dey manage, wey dem report say destroy Benikrukru and commuinty wey dey around am for Warri South-west local goment Area for Delta state.
And anoda one for early momo on Sunday, March 14,2021 for Polubobu / Opuama, Warri North local Goment Area for di state, go fit settle.
Dis kind big scale set of spillage also include but e no dey limited to; di big spillage wey dey history for place like Ogini land, Rivers State and Erovie community for Ozoro, Isoko North Local Goment for Delta state for 1990s, di two for Nigeria south south zone and negative impact still dey der.
Shey na di only explanation /example dem be dis?
Di answer na ogbonge
no, as oda ones dey
Oda critical reason / concern dem why we suppose see di situation as crisis.
Di first and veri important na di inability of Nigeria and hin pipo to appreciate and treat activity wey relate to crude oil spillage and environment pollution wey dey kom from exploration/crude oil production as national calamity
Di second na di stunnin conciousness wey gas flarin/ environment degradation dey apun bikos of activities wey dey related to crude oil prospectin/ production for di kontri dey under-reported.
Dis second concern dey kom from one recent comment, wey be say from media report na from di Director-General, National Oil Spill Detection and Response Agency (NOSDRA), Idris Musa, wey tok say wetin hin agency find show say average of five oil spills na hin Nigeria dey record evriday.
Musa, wey follow journalists tok for Abuja, tok say for 2018, we get 600 oil spill incident and for 2019, we get about 700 oil spill-impacted site actross di kontri.
Dis comment wey dey open brain dey more important for wetin we dey discourse if pesin remember say Nigeria accordin to report don get about 139 place wey gas don flare across Niger Delta both for di oil fields wey dey water and di one wey no dey, wer gas wey dey flare dey reach 11% of evrithin wey dem dey produce.
Pass anything, na di question dem wey e bring kom mind be; wetin dey stop di development of petroleum sector and Niger Delta region
Shey Legislative work no dey?
Why dis kind legislative framework no dey provide strong source of solution for pipo and community wey oil exploration and production affect badly for coastal comminity dem?
If dis framework dey, why e no dey work or make dem do am?
Shey di framework get evrithin  like legal solution for di issues of violations wey relate to oil?
Why di nation neva learn serious lesson from Dutch goment wia all di pipo wey dey operate must restore wia dem dey operate back to how dey meet am?
Regardless of wetin oda pipo tok, di truth be say if all of us get am for mind to develop policy wey go bring prosperity for oil and gas sector, while we go still save di pipo for di region, we ready to find di strategic triangles wey hold di key to success for hand.
Apart from di fact say success need make dem analyse am wit care, of di different kind of knowledge wey dem need to make innovation possible, e don necessary for di nation make dem hold di middle ground since both di ministry and sector don dey manifest signs for long time now say dem go be institution wey no get potential wey strong.
And as we know, any organization, whether private or public wey no gree search for hin potential, hin survival na by chance.
For dis level, if we luk di operational template of di ministry, and how dey don know say di up, mid and down stream players of di petroleum industry say dem no dey follow rules, e no go dey wrong make pesin conclude say dem fit divide di serious reasons wey dey kos Crude oil spillage/gas flarin to; regulatory framework wey plenti wey no dey work, oil and gas exploration and production for Nigeria dey; federal goment failure to make di kontri refineries dey work to dia full capacity back ; petroleum ministry inability to make International Oil Companies dey follow di international best practices as e relate to di environment wey dem dey work; Di last one, clear responsibility/work details wey no dey and action plans for agencies and parastatals wey dey function under di ministry.
Di failures dem wey dey up get direct consequence, na bad influence for di sector, di ministry and di region.
To take explain dis points, make we use di first challenge start, e dey important to dey tok about di law dem wey regulate crude oil exploration and oil production issue wey plenti law dey regulate but too dey weak and di Acts wey dey law wey no dey just complicate how e dey work, but e don too old as time don dey change, e dey create corner corner way for pipo wey dey operate for der especially the International Oil Companies (IOC)  make dem fit use exploit both di goment and host communities.
some of dis laws/acts wey we dey tok about don dey since 1960 but dey no dey achieve dia purpose wey Di Petroleum Act of 1969, Di Harmful Waste(Special Criminal Positions etc), Act 1988, Mineral Oil Safety Regulation 1963, Petroleum(Drillin and Production) Regulation 1969 dey but no be oly dis one dem.
(Subsidiary Legislation to Petroleum Act) and di off-shore Oil Revenue (Registration of Grants) Acts 1971 among odas.
As dey no mind di number, concept, provision and definition dem, dis law dem no dey useful again, dey don old to di extent say dem dey give pipo wey dey work for di sector corner corner to dey chop both di goment and host community dem.
Utomi na di Programme Coordinator (Media and Policy), Social and Econnomic Justice Advocacy (SEJA) , Lagos.
Crystal and Davy (1969) explain say di language wey journalist dem dey use dey important for di journalism work.
SEC ban CMO wey dey no register from operation May 31
Di Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) tok say dem go stop Capital Market Operators (CMOs) operation wey neva renew dia registration for May 31
Di commission tok am for one circular wey di management sign on Monday for Abuja
Di commission tok say any CMO wey no renew dia registration before late fillin expire for May 31 no go fit operate for capital market.
Bikos of wetin dey apun, di commission tok say to dey fill di renewal of registration late go dey between May 1 to May 30
E tok say di CMOs need complete renewal process on or before April 30.
Di commission note say dem go publish di name of di CMOs wey renew dia registration of SEC website and national newspapers dem.
E kom add say dem go declare di name of CMOs wey dey eligible give relevant security exchange and Trade Associations.
Di News Agency of Nigeria (NAN) report say SEC for March don share circular give general public and di CMOs for di periodic renewal of registration by di operator wey dey wan introduce again
Di simple quality wey journalism language get na to dey clear, and wetin e wan show pass na make pipo fit understand am.
Kano Pillars dey top afta 1-1 draw for Katsina United
Former Champions, Kano Pillars don dey top chart back for 2021 NPFL as Katsina United force dem go 1-1 draw for week 22 match wey dey play on Sunday for Muhammed Dikko Stadium for Katsina.
Five minute afta Suraj Ayeleso save di penalty wey Ahmed Rasheed play, Pillars captain wey dey Inspirational, Rabiu Ali show for di oda side score wey make Masu gida boys dey lead from one direct free kick as e reach 26 minute
Pillars win no tey as Ahmed Rasheed kom later score di goal wey he lose before from di spot as he dey go home, Usman Bara cross to go level scores for di 34th minute.
Di draw put Kano Pillars for di top wit 41 points but dia reign fit no last 24 hours, if Akwa United wey dey 40 points beat Rangers for Uyo today.
For Jos, na beta day for Plateau United as dey put pepe for Wikki Tourist eye wit dia 4-1 victory.
Ibrahin Muhammed score for di 3rd minute from one bad corner take start di game, before Jibrin Abubakar Equalise for di yeye Tourists wen e reach 9 minute.
Na one way traffic as Muhammed Zulkifilu score brace (17, 55) before Oche Ohowechi kom show dem who di baba be as he score for 90 minite for Plateau United
Nasarawa United sef pepe Heartland wey dey visit 3-1 afta Aliyu Abdullah score brace (27, 50) and Martins Owolijah score di third one wen e reach 61 minute, before Chijioke Akuneto kom boost hin team morale as he score wen e reach 85 minute.
For Gombe, Adamawa United wey dey host pursue Wolves go 3-3 draw, FC Ifeanyi Ubah win Sunshine stars 1-0 for Nnewi for di battle of Relegation team, MFM sama Lobi stars 1-0 for Lagos and Abia Warriors
Force Rivers United go 0-0 draw for Port-Harcourt
For Ahmadu Bello Stadium Kaduna, Jigawa Stars follow Dakkada Fc wey dey visit draw.
As Enyimba and Kwara United no play dia match bikos of Enyimba continential engagement, Akwa united go find way reclaim dia top-spot from Pillars wen dey host Rangers dis aftanoon.
Di way wey journalism language simple reach na hin dey make pesin wey dey read am get confidence chose di kind newspaper wey he go read.
Oyinlola tok say Golf no dey depend on goment for foreign journey.
Di Chairman, caretaker committee, Nigeria Golf Federation (NGF), Prince Olugunsoye Oyinlola don tok say since hin and hin pipo enta post for 2017, hin federation been dey attend International competition witout goment support
As  he dey tok for di inarguration of Caretaker committee by di Minister of youth nd spot development, Sunday Dare on Tuesday, Oyinlola tok say, since we don dey administer di federation, we dey do evrithin, we dey take part for international competition and we dey ensure say awa golfers dey exposed well.
As President, I don always take part for international competition.
He tok say; we don take awa players go Morroco, Ireland, Botswana, Argentinga and Mauritius on awa own.
He kom still tok say di standard of di game improve and dey done make effort  to find new talent and na to improve am.
I think say we don dey high pass wen we first start.
We don dey use age-grade competition wey we organise take find new talent.
We still get faith wit awa program for golf mata.
He tok say; If we fit reach Olympics, I dey sure say we get golfers wey go play well.
Na di plenti special tins wey di work get make am different from di rest.
Cult Clash: Dem arrest one man for Edo say he kil hin cousin
Pipo wey dey operate for Edo State Police command don arrest one man wey hin name na Igboje Victor, bikos dem think say he get hand for di kilin of hin cousin brother wen two rival cult dey fight.
Igboje dey among di 54 suspect wey Edo state Police Commissioner parade, Phillips Aliyu Ogbadu, say dem dey various crime for di state.
As per wetin di Comissioner tok, dey arrest di suspect for armed robbery, kidnappin, murder, cultism, rape and oda tins.
Dey later know say di incident apun for Sabogida-Ora Opuje community for Owan west local goment for Edo state
I dey innocent
For one interview wit Daily trust, Igboje deny say he get hand for di kilin
I no get hand for my brother death but dem arrest me bikos I be Eiye cult group member while my late brother dey Aiye group.
For awa community, we been dey sell Igbo take make moni, but Aiye group use di drug business use police arrest Eiye members.
He tok say di leader of di two group plan to meet dat night solve di gbege
He kom later add say, For di night of di meeting, Aiye members set trap for dem, dey kom shot Eiye members as dem dey go di meetin venue, dey kil one of dem wey dey later carry go mortuary.
Di pesin wey die brother na soldier, he say make dey go bury am bikos of hin mama.
Afta di burial,  I go di neighbourin community go buy food but wen I kom back, I hear say Eiye boys don go attack one Aiye guy and di guy na my cousin, he die bikos of di injury wey hin get
He tok say he no dey for di group wey attack hin brother, he add say na bikos dem dey different group make dem tok say na hin kil am
And police kom arrest me wit di rest
I no even dey der wen dey attack my brother
He tok say: I no kil my brother
Di commissioner of police kom tok say, dem go go court if dey don finish dia investigation
Economy kasala for Nigeria don worse as plenti food item don double dia price for di weekend and pipo wey dey bake sef join dem as dey add 30% for evritin wey dem dey use flour do.
Economy kasala dey plenti as bakers increase bread and biscuit wit 30%
Di kontri economy wey hard don show face for anoda mata as di Association of Masters Bakers and Caterers of Nigeria (AMBCN) don tell dia members say make dem increase bread, biscuit and any oda tin wey dem dey bake price wit 30 percent bikos of di cost of production wey don high.
Bread and biscuit na food wey common for plenti house for Nigeria, and before di association announce wetin dem tok, plenti pipo for di kontri don dey complain bikos of how tins cost.
For di National Executive Council (NEC) meeting wey di association do for Abuja recently, dia members dey complain about how tins cost and dey gree say make dem increase di price of wetin dem dey sell.
AMBCN national president, Mansur Umar, tok say di price wey dem change na bikos of  di way wey cost of production take increase suddenly and how sugar, butter, yeast and flour moni sef increase
As dem dey commend federal goment say dey revive di cassava flour programme, di association dey complain bad bad about regular flour price wey just increase anyhow since di last six month, wey be say one flour truck no reach 6 million before kom be 9 million now.
He tok say; afta we consider di bakin/ingredient and material price wey don too increase, sake of say make dis awa noble work wey dey bleed fit survive, di association conclude say make we just increase awa price wit 30 percent
Di association sef conclude say dem go ask federal goment make dem reverse di tariff regime wey National Agency for Food Administration and Control (NAFDAC) force dem dey pay and make only NAFDAC dey steamline bakers regulation.
Dia national secretary , Jude Okafor wey tok sef say he dey hope say feredal goment do wetin dey want so dem go fit avoid di moni wey dey wan increase.
Nigeria senior male basketball team don prove say na from Giant of Africa dey take kom as dey collect Highest rank African team title for Olympics.
Tigers follow Kenya, Mali, Cote d'Ivoire for 2021 Afrobasket.
Nigeria senior male basketball team don follow Kenya, Mali and Cote d'Ivoire draw for di group stage for 2021 FIBA Afrobasket.
For di cermony wey dem do yesterday briefly, di 2015 Afrobasket champion land for Group C for di tournament wey dem go do between August 24 and September 5.
As many pipo don dey tok say Tigers na strong team wey fit win di title, Nigeria go still face Cote d'Ivoire wey dey number 50 for rank, Mali wey be number 77 and Kenya wey beat Angola anyhow afta dey don wait 28 years bikos of dia Coach Liz Mills.
Di team wey go go Tokyo Olypmics for 2021, go nid play well pass wetin dey play for 2017 wen dey win Silver medal.
Di team lose to Tunisia wey dey host dat time and since dat time, dey be number one for Africa and number 22 for di world.
Tigers na hin be di first kontri wey go qualify for FIBA World Cup for 2019.
Although e remain small wey dem go enta quarter finals, di team collect di Olympic ticket say na dem be di oga for Africa for di tournament.
NDLEA work don pay: Drug traffickin and de rate wey dem dey use am don show as NDLEA don see N30bn illegal moni collect and N90bn illegal drug sef join. 
Illicit drugs: NDLEA reveal N30bn unlawful moni.
National Drug Law Enforcement Agency Chairman, Buba Marwa, tok say NDLEA dey investigate N30bn slush fund wey dem feel say na moni for drugs.
He tok am for Abuja on Monday mornin wen hin give 45 officers wey dey work well commendation letter and best performing command award for March and April, 2021.
He tok say di strong action wey di agency dey take no go stop until  all di street,community, town and city wey dey di kontri no get drugs wey dey illegal again
He tok say: As we continue to dey fight how dem dey use illegal drugs for outside, awa leaders for di agency go dey find how dem go maintain di situation.
Na di reaseon why we don make awa Directorate of asset and Finanacial Investigations, go make sure say dem collect all di moni and property wey get link wit drug traffickin, wey lead dem go meet di pipo dem and final order to forfeit property and moni wey worth plenti billion naira wey get link wit di pipo wey dey traffick di drugs and dia baron dem.
Marwa tok say di strength wey di agency dey use target drug cartel don make dem fit seize different illegal drug wey reach 2,050,766.33kg, moni wey reach N90bn and dey don arrest 2,175 pipo wey dey carry di drug.
He emphasize on top di fact say e dey important make di criminals dem no go fit collect any moni wey dem get from dia drugs dey go still kom go jail.
kidnappin mata for Zaria and whole kontri don dey worse.
Vigilante arrest 2 kidnappers for Zaria
Daily trust tok say vigilante don arrest two pipo wey dem suspect say be kidnapper for one ghetto area for Zaria, Kaduna State.
Di incident apun around 10 on Sunday wen some kidnappers enta di place wit force say dey wan kidnap pipo wey dey stay for der but local vigilante face dem.
One pesin wey dey stay der wey no wan tok hin name, tok say di kidnappers dey shoot anyhow to make pipo fear but di vigilante face dem wit dia gun before police kom later.
Daily trust later find out say some of di kidnappers dem kidnap four pipo wey dey der as some youth injure diasef for wen e apun, di kidnappin last for about two hours.
Kaduna State Police Command Spokeman ASP Muhammad Jalige tok say dem dey interrogate di two pipo wey dem arrest and police dey find di oda ones wey run.
IPOB leader don threaten pipo say hin go dey kil pipo wey no reason wit am
IPOB Emma Powerful don threaten pipo say he go spill blood.
Emma Powerful wey be media and publicity secretary for IPOB threat to dey kil any Igbo pesin wey no follow hin warning don dey too serious, and dey no suppose ignore am except say we no get goment, wer small small fascist like Mr Emma Powerful as he call himsef go dey tok say hin go dey drag pipo kom out, dey send dem go meet Baba God as he tok bikos dey no follow am or hin organization.
Di mouth wey hin dey run no be play; as e be say di kasala for Nigeria South-east show say na plan dey plan am.
As he no understand how simple Igbo leadership dey be, wey be say dia leader na Onye-oje ozi or servant of hin pipo, wey make di pipo agree wit am afta he don consult plenti pipo, Emma Powerful wey prefer one thug title, Onye-ike, wey be say na to dey force dem, make dem fear am and now he dey threaten to kil di same Ndigbo wey he say he dey fight for.
For man wey be say he no dey tolarate, wey be say to kil pipo take push hin cause no be kasala, di question be say who go wan stay tru tru for Cave Republic wey be say na thug dey run am
Di Biafra wey pipo know for history no be Ndigbo choice; Na di only choice wey dem force Ndigbo do be dat for dat time, wey dem face bravely wit plenti courage and sacrifice so dem go fit defend and uphold
Biafra no too oppose authority reach how dey try make di pipo right dey valid, no be say make dem just exist, but na to live wit dignity.
Di Biafra wey dey history na like safety precaution for all Igbo pipo wey suppose don too suffer dat time fit kom, place wey dey fit stay safely.
Di declaration and di struggle of di old Biafra no be show or avenue to make moni wey di pipo wey dey lead am dey do pass now.
Before dem declare Biafra for 1967, Eastern Consultative assembly, one group wey dey represent, still dey advice for all di opinion wey pipo get for east, bikos of wetin dey apun gree say make dem make di declaration wit dia authority.
Na di reason wey make di whole Ndigbo and oda tribe wey no be Igbo, wey sacrifice, wey dem no fit forget gree protect di republic wey still small
As di war dey end sef, wey Biafra don fall, wey evribodi don settle, Ndigbo go back go protect Nigeria, wit clean mind, strong determination and courage, so e go fit work,
Di context of new Nigeria kasala and disagreement for dia point of view wey dey deep na bikos of one neo-capitalist state wey dey go backward, and di chain of di productive forces, wey dem chain, wey no fit produce di material of hin existence again.
As di new Nigeria kasala dey grow, wey e no dey progress and e slow, di simple tins like tribe, culture and religion dey struggle to preserve, express and recreate diasef.
ova-all, e dey easy to carry retirement flag, wen dey no understand how socio-economic infrastructure dey important if dey wan build kontri wey go survive.
South Sudan wey be Africa last born still dey breastfeed as dia condition now worse pass dia former condition.
Notin show say Biafra current leader wey like to dey make noise know anythin about how dem dey build or create kontri
Even if dem dey independent, to built state no dey di real deal, to dey command pipo witout respect , make di fascist leaders like Emma Powerful wey dey threaten to kil pipo don show already.
Ndigbo too posh to get leaders wey be thug and tout, wey no understand say Igbo political culture and framework na to dey consult elders.
Mr Nnamdi Kanu wey been dey command dem, no know any village for Igboland apart from hin own, dey claim to be dia leader like say na hin own, pipo wey be say he no know how dem dey live except for di moni wey hin dey send give dem from abroad.
Mr Emma "di Powerful" wey be dia media and publicity secretary don use hin arrogance and petty fascist inpunity spoil Igbo basic framework wey be say na to dey consult pipo and to dey agree for somethin generally before dey do am.
Na only organisation wey thug full dey threaten to destroy pipo wey no gree wit am.
But dis new threat wey Mr Emma "de Powerful" issue say he go send pipo go meet dia forefathers sake of say dem no follow am, don too much.
Sake of dat one reason, dey suppose find way restrict hin and hin pipo to avoid kasala
Onunaiju dey write from Abuja
Education for Nigeria don spoil finish bikos of di greed wey di leaders of association wey relate to am get
Old syllabus and way wey dem dey use teach na anoda kasala wey don add the ones wey dey ground.
For inside news wey straight, di headline dey show di koko of di news
I been dey imagine wetin di men wey bring Union Jack down, kom use Green-white-Green cloth replace am, di cloth wey be symbol for hope for dat early morning for october first 1960
E for don be like di great dream logic of di marine wey plant di America flag for Okinawa for 1945
sometimes, I been dey dream say I be one of dem
I go dey imagine say I be like dem and den if I reach house afta di ceremony, as my mind dey sweet me bikos of freedom and di blank canvass put before my veri own means.
I go go bed, go nirvana, go wait for morning so I go fit wake for mornin, go work.
E don reach sixty years since dat time
Even though say na only 30 years I be, I don live for di bad dream of Nigeria history for all di year one by one for dis sixty year journey, I don feel evri disappointment and evri sorrow wey pesin fit feel bikos say dia kontri fail.
E don reach sixty years now wey all my dream leave, some die, bikos ravishin drought wey follow dis land wey get plenti water .
Odas don fly comot
wetin do us?
I remember one artwork wey dey tok about sometin like "Age of Discovery" for Internet wey I see.
Inside,one man stand ova anoda man wey sidan for hammock wit power.
Dis suppose Amerigo Vespucci representation as he dey wake America continent of dat time make dem join mankind league as di last continent.
Na me and my brodas dey do house work for holiday wen we dey grow up.
Me sef remember wen I dey pretend say I go sleep back afta Subh so I no go do my house work and my brodas go kom vex wake me, make I no cheat dem.
Unlike America, dey don know Africa since beginnin of time, Indeed, na she first wake, she wake di rest sef but na she dem no know pass for di family, maybe bikos she go sleep back wen her siblins go dey work take discover fire and wheel.
Pipo like Joseph been call her Dark Continent
Since den, Africa no get any popular culture wey pipo know kom still accept apart from bloody, rooten and poor mindset wey reach to make one teenage band wey kom from America from di 80s feel say na dia moral duty to kos rain wey go stop  di drought wey wan carry dem go by force.
Odawise she go die
E no dey ancient pass dat one, wetin she need na rain, nature, di same tin wey dia ancient forefathers sef need dat time.
Shey na wetin apun be dat?
Shey we sneak go bed back, afta we wake di oda pipo for we world
And shey we go sleep back afta dey wake us di second time?
Wu go know say Africa, togeda wit Nigeria go spoil so tey, dem go dey wait make some teenager wey no sure say dem no dia right from left dey give dem charity.
No be me
Shey Conrad correct?
Shey na my duty to dey tok truth sake of say I dey honest, to wetin hin think say my pipo dey do
Shey make I fly go out like di rest of my dream?
Maybe make I do am.
How we take reach der?
We enta one car wey get engine, di sound good and e dey sleek, e kom life like Noah Ark as we dey go for 1960
We suppose dey rocket ship dey go Mars, instead na inside mud we sink put, for one Jalopy wey hin engine no good.
Before awa eye wey don dey gnash, di heart of darkness kom be my home, and my home kom be "di oda world", di opposite of civilisation, place wia be say tin wey no reach man level dey yeye man intelligence wey dem dey use boast and dia grace.
I don resist Conrad for long time now and di sun don dey set, I don tire to dey fight
I dey ready to surrender, my situation wan resemble di of Chief Joseph of Nez Perce native America wen dey subdue am
I don read hin sermon for hin pipo afta he surrender somewia  and I no fit stop myself as I dey tok am
Dey kil awa chiefs dem
Lookin glass don die.
Toohoolhoolzote don die
All di old men don die
Na di young men tok say, Yes or No
Di pesin wey lead di young men (Olikut) don die
E cold and we no get blanket
Cold dey catch di small pikin dem die
My pipo, some of dem don run go hill, and dey no get food and blanket.
Nobodi know wia dem dey, maybe cold wan catch dem die
I want get time look for my pikin dem and see how many of dem wey I fit find
Maybe I go find dem among pipo wey die
Hear wetin I dey tok, my chiefs!
I don tire
My heart no well, e no hapi join
From wer di sun dey, I no go fight again foreva
I don decide for my mind say I go surrender, follow wetin my enemy tok
I don decide to follow awa dreams dem go di exile wey dem dey
I go join di queue wey dey long reach like one mile for America or Britain or Canada embassy kom fly go
Afte like three weeks afta October 1st 2020 as I dey drive from Dape, one ghetto area for Gwarhinpa, I notice sometin,
I hear say he disappoint dem bikos he don change side.
We want make more pipo dey goment wey go dey criticize goment, wey go still dey open dia yansh for public.
Na di same flag wey dey my head wey i no like be this.
Green-White-Green
But for di middle wia di two green meadow wey leave space for di white valley, three word sing melody wey for no mean anytin to me before di world break.
Dis one show say di writer dey di place wey I dey tok about wer evritin take apun.
na dis be di mandate for Mr President, say make we reactivate abandoned farms and develop new ones for security
di Governor of Ebonyi state dey eager
hin dey total support of achieving hin dreams
so, Ebonyi state don commit to work with NALDA to engage di teeming youths into full agricultural productivity
The Governor, however, request say make  di NALDA consider di production of fingerlings and poultry for hin proposed intergrated farm estate, adding say  make dem dey import 90 per cent for di states poultry  from Abia and Cross Rivers states
di first question wey i wan ask
shame you for public kom dey beg you for back
di police wey dey Ogun state don arrest four suspetcts say dem abduct a 13- year old pikin for Ado Odo/Ota local government Area of di state.
di suspects na John Nelson (21), Adeleke Ayotunde (29), Adekunle Basit (20) and Abey Fagbemi (20).
dem arrest dem based on a complaint wey dem lodged for  di Onipaanu Divisional Headquarters by one Adejumo Odunowo ; wey be di papa for di victim
di complaint tell di police say hin daughter , Susan Odunowo go errand wey her mama send am at about 6.pm for May 6, and say she no no return home
hin tok say hin later get call from persin wey demand N500,000 ransom to set di victim free
Abimbola Oyeyemi, wey be di tok tok pesin for di police, tell di newsmen on Tuesday for Abeokuta say afta di report , di DPO wey dey Onipaanu, CSP Bamidele Job, detailed hin detectives make dem go unravel those wey dey behind di act
according to him, for May 8, di detectives trace one of di suspects to Cele area wey dey Ota where dem arrest am
