Oluwasegun Ajuwon: E dey wrong make di sport ministry to put eye for only ball.
Di Chairmo for Aso Table Tennis Club, Dr. Olusegun Ajuwon don tok say di ministry for sport and di administrator don too put eye on top ball.
E dey bad for di oda game wey dey.
As im dey tok from Abuja recently, di pesin wey dey tokabout Tennis tok say dem corporate organisations and individuals twey go fit sponsor more table tennis tournaments.
Ajuwon don tok say hinclub dey try make dem develop di game for FCT and beyond.
You don committed to table tennis game.
Wetin dey always ginger you?
I no fit tell you wetin di ginger be.
Wetin I fit say be say I like to dey play di game.
I like to dey play table tennis.
Na di game wey dey easi.
Wetin I mean be say, you no nid any tin wey wey cost do play table tennis.
Na for my hostel for school I begin to dey play table tennis.
Di school do concrete slabs  for us to take dey iron cloth.
But na im turn our first table tennis board.
We dey always put two pangolo and one stick make e be net.
We go use kpako or cardboard do bats wey we go use play di game.
Ball dey always dey wey we go paly.
I dey think maybe na where I see ginger to take play tennis
I get chance to play golf.
but e be like say na for rich pipo.
So I face table tennis bicos say e dey simple and e good for exercise.
Table tennis na one of di game wey dey safe pass wey pesin fit play.
Shey you go tok say dem dey try to dey develop di game of table tennis for Naija?
I no too like Big Broad Naija, BBN, but I see say dem dey promote table tennis for do last one wey dem do.
Any time wey dem dey free na table tennis dem dey play.
E dey wrong for ministry for sport for di state and di federal level to put eye for only football.
I think say e dey wrong bicos say no be evri bodi fit play for di high level.
But table tennis fit make plenti pipo dey busy.
To too dey put eye for football wrong but e don be normal tin.
And di place wey we from copy football, dem too dey bet for Europe, especially for UK.
Betting dey too much for di game and na why evri bodi sabi am.
Here for Naija, we dey bless witi youth dem wey sabi table tennis well well.
So make we try dey do am for our house.
E dey easi to begin.
And we fit put plenti pipo for dia for any time.
Na wetin I dey beg for be dis.
Shey you go tok say tournament dey plenti to make di player dem dey dey busy?
Make we put eye for how to dey host competition evri time
E no must to dey big but make we dey carry all di state come like wetin Aso Tennis Club dey do.
E fit be local but make we dey do am like that for evri month abi evri two month, competition go dey.
Inside other benefit, dis one go help comot di eyes of dem pikin for things wey no good
Na how much di Aso Tennis Club dey contribute give say make sport grow for FCT?
Before we kari dioda states join, dis competition dey only for FCT.
Afta time don pass small, we start to dey call di states wey dey near us put.
For did time, wetin we go do be say we go find one coach for FCT wey go dey go all di secondary school to tell dem about di competition.
Ajoke Ojo and three pipo wey be her mate gada finish from one secondary school here for FCT 
Na witi dis tournament we dem sabi dem.
So di Aso table tennis championship na for di FCT, make di pipo wey dey Abuja use am well.
 Di tournament no go comot for Abuja.
Any plan dey wey go make am dey sure say dis tournament go be evri year?
Wetin I sabi be say e go dey continue bicos say we don dey see plenti pipo wey don like am and get power to support us.
Dem dey readi to give.
E go do you for bodi say to sabi say  wetin we dey use do dis competition, as e be like say e big, no reach any tin.
Our budget no reach N5m.
And I dey sure say one year reach to garther N5m.
So e dey sure say di Aso table tennis championship go dey hapun for evri year.
As e dey so, na how many company dey put money down for di Aso table tennis tournament?
For di 2021 own, we get one big sponsor but we no go tok him name.
We dey hope say we go see plenti pipo wey go support us make we no go dey worry if di time don dey reach.
We dey also hope say if di economy dey beta, we go kari plenti company come make dem sponsor us join.
For three years ago, we dey get hope but di economy dey too bad so if we go any wia dem go say.
You sabi wetin dey hapun.
But we still dey hope say we go get company wey go dey dey with us.
Na how much help FCT and di sport Kansu dey give table tennis and all di game?
I think say dem fit do beta bicos say all di player dem dey go luk National Festival wey just finish for Benin City no see help kolet like dat from FCT Sports Council.
I think say we fit do pass di one wey we don do.
E get plenti player wey get talent for FCT wey dem dey wait to discover dem and train dem.
Police don arrest 4 pipo say dem kill one man wey be wan do wedding for Kwara.
Police for Kwara don arrest four pipo wey dem think say dem kill Olokose Ojo, pesin wey dey work for di University of Ilorin Teaching Hospital, six days before him wedding.
Ojo wey just be 30 years plus, dey work for di National Health Insurance Scheme unit for di hospital.
Dem tok say na di pesin nebo wey dey live beside him house kill am and na him be di oga for di pipo wey kill am, say, e take sence kari am enta one bush for Patigi say im wan help am buy three cow wey im go use for di wedding for N350,000.
Dem kill am kon cut him body afta dem don collect money wey pass N1.2m for him account witi him ATM and dem dey ask for N12 million to free di man from di wife wey e wan marry Ilori Oluwakemi.
Di police don comot im body for ground and kari am go for UITH mortuary wia dem go test am.
Di police don tok di name of di three pipo wey remain, Mohammed Chatta, Jimoh Abdulateef and Madi Jeremiah, and dem don dey police custody say dem go kari dem go court if di Judiciary pipo finish dia strike.
Di police PPRO, Ajayi Okasanmi, wen im bin dey tok about where mata reach, tok say di suspects don confess for dia statement say dem kari am go inside one bush for Patigi say na dia dem tie all di cow wey im don pay money for say dem con shoot am as e wan reach di place.
Dem say dem bury di pesin wey dem kill for di grave wey no deep for inside di bush and dem don comot him head and arm for mini ritual.
Company wey dey do food and beverages don dey fall down quick quick, TUC.
Di Trade Union Congress (TUC) don tok say how di government policy and Covid-19 take affect di food, beverage and tobacco sector for di country no good, di sector done suffer close close and bad market.
Di presidio for TUC, Quadri Olaleye, who still be di Presido for di Food, Beverage and Tobacco Senior Staff Association (FOBTOB), na him tok am for Abuja for di 14th National Delegates Conference for di association.
Na evri bodi sabi say di COVID-19 put eye for di food, beverage and tobacco industry as na dem be di main tin wey dey make di Gross Domestic Product (GDP) dey rise.
Di pipo for di association wey dey work well well na dem make sure say food dey inside di time of lockdown.
Na di bad tin be say as dis industry dey important for di economy, dem neva dey even give am 10 percent of di attention wey dem dey give oda sector for di economy.
Di moni wey dem dey take produce don cost but di government neva do any tin to take help dem witi money of to cut rice for tax.
Instead na block dem block us witi  make we no fit buy any tin from anoda country and dem kon force us make we go back go dey buy dem for inside di country.
Olaleye tok say, no be say we no want to dey do togeda for di country, but di time wey dem tok am don make plenti industry no too get mouth again.
He tok say all di company wey dey under FOBTOB don sack like 1,478 worker from 2015 reach 2021 say e don even make di revenue for Naija come down.
He tok am again say na our hope make di government go wake up from how dem dey  waka  like snail come lead well as to lead well be for pipo wey dey serious.
Di government must start to dey face di problem wey dey make pipo dey get work for hand, sekuriti problem  and make dem settle evri tin wey don dey spoil for we country.
Ekiti Police don catch 2 big tif.
Di Rapid Response Squad (RRS) for Etiki Police Command don arrest two pipo, Abbar Wasiri and Aribisala Timileyin, say dem go thief for Adebayo area wey dey di capital of di state.
Dem tif N210,000 and some plenti things wey dey valuable, as dem enta three house for Monday around dat kain 1:30am.
Di police tok say for May 9, 2021, around 1:30pm, one pesin wey be Barrister Ago Oguntuase for Ado-Ekiti, kom di RRS office wey dey Ado-Ekiti kom repot give dem  say some pipo wey im no sabi kon tif for im office and dem tif for two house join for dat night for Adebayo area for Ado Ekiti, for May 8 and dem carry N210,000, two computa and plenti tins go.
Dem Police  as dem hear di information, di RRS go arrest di two pipo wey dem dey think say na dem do am as per wetin dem don hear before.
Di PRO for Police (PPRO), ASP Sunday Abutu, wen dem dey follow am took, tok say di two pipo don gree say na dem do di tin and dem carry di police go dia house wey dem see 265 cloth wey be for pikin and adult dem, 14 canvas wey be for pikin and adult, two computa wey dey complete, one ceiling fan and two law report book wey be for different different complain pipo kolet back
Abutu still tok say as dem touch line di mata more more dem kom see say one of di pipo wey dem catch na be sekuriti wey dem kolet to dey guard wia  dem go thief.
As di PPRO don tok, dem still dey touch line di mata and wen dem do finish, dem go carry di pipo go court.
Mellawella, Di Oga Commissioner for di Police for Ekiti State, Mr.Tunde Mobayo, don call evribodi for di state to dey sekuriti conscious and make dem dey tell di police if dem see pesin wey dem no sabi for dia area.
Five match wey make Atletico Madrid win La Liga.
Atletico Madrid don win di LA Liga for di second time for inside eight years on Sunday as dem win 2-1 over Real Valladolid wey make dem be di Champion for Spain.
Na di five match wey make Atletico be Chapoion for Spain be dis:Atletico Madrid 1- 0 Barcelona, for November 21
Na Yannick Carrasco score wey make Atletico win Barcelona for di first time for more dat ten years and push dia unbeaten enta 24 matches.
E go be dis result wey give Atletico beta head to head record pass Barca, wey dey number 10 on top table without Gerard Pique wey don get injury for three months.
Di internet don bring fundamental shift enter economy dem wey no near each oda bikos of brier enter ross-border trade and investment, wey distance far, time zone and language and wey national goment regulation different.
E-commerce dey foster direct access to market wey no near and e dey promote globalisation and commercial activities plus e dey komot distinction between domestic and foreign companies to di extent wey e no go possible to know wia di product from kom.
E-commerce no dey limited to buying of product alone, e include e-mail, plus oda communication platform dem, all di informate or service wey company fit offer customer on top net, from pre-purchase information to aftasale service and support.
Di major significance wey e commerce get dey for di fact say e dey encourage system of tradin wey be single world, wey access through electronic means to take get good and services dem dey facilitate from different parts of di world.
Most of di statue wey dey for ground for inside nigeria dey lag behind toward di development and growth of e-commerce in particular and di whole ICT. 
For Nigeria, plenty legal research and study don dey conducted.
Plenty for inside di study dem carry opinion say di legal system for Nigeria ey lag behind for legislation wey involve ICT and say di statutory law dem wey don dey ground no dey adequate to take address some of di legal issue wey dey affect e-commerce.
Dis issue dem include electronic evidence cybercrimes, security and data production, e-payment system and inevitably trans-border issues, plus plenty oda ones.
Therefore, need dey to bring out legal and regulatory measure wey dey proper, to take govern di regime wey just dey kom.
Dem don tok plenty times say for inside Nigeria, significant effort to take regulate e-commerce-related activity demstill dey di stage of Sraft Bill before di National Assembly.
E dey important to know say, even wia dem pass dis bill into law, Nigeria fit still face new legal issue for dis area wey go call for legislative intervention.
Wit di speed wey di internet dey take work on top commercial transaction for Nigeria, especially for inside banking and communication sector of di economy, di best wey dem fit suggest be say di legal issues and problems dem wey dey confront e-commerce presently for di kontri should be addressed directly and espeditiously, for di interest of di teeming population of Nigeria customer dem.
To achieve dis, make dem pressure di National Assembly to take pass bill concerning electronic commerce as top priority so dat dem go enact dem into law as quick as possible.
For small time, make awa court take giant step to interprete di traditional law dem wey dey ground in a liberal way make dem take cut gap in order to make di laws dem get ammend to electronic transaction, particularly for di emerging trend of dis information age wey we dey.
Indeed, dem argue say legislation no be di only means wey electronic transaction and attendant documentation fit dey legal.
Di court fit also adapt to recognise electronic transaction for di absence of legislation or private contract.
As former Justice Bungham don tok am before: di common law dey di hand of judges di same kind facility [as law merchant dem] make e fit adapt to di need of di general public, principle no dey alter, but old rules to dey apply di change, and new rules go begin exist.
We dey hope say goment go adopt dis activism wey Nigerian judges de do for inside judiciary, Supreme Court judges sef dey involve, expexially for area wia awa existin legislation dey grossly inadequate, comprehensive or elaborate enough to take address legal challenges for inside new technological advancements.  
Dis one go set better precedence to make sure say e-commerce consumer dem get protection, to bring investor dem and bring economic development plus stability inside di kontri.
Di koko issue for contract inside e-commerce na documentation and signature.
Di provision for inside section 4 of di statute of Fraud, 1677 or  Lagos State Law Reform (Contract) Law and awa various statute on real property and landed instrument dem, all of which require make dem write certain contract dem and execute dem duly.
Di question now be say shey electronic sign-off dey constitute valid sign-off contract by email or by binding?
Dem still neva settle many of dis issues dem even for inside UK although some decision dey favour toward to interprete electronic signature
So marks for inside email wey ey satisfy di tradional requirement of writing and due execusion.
E-commerce transaction na transaction wey no involve paper wey dem dey do through magnetic material like tapes or disk.
Dis one dem be contradiction to di transaction wey be say na paper dem dey take do am wey dey embodied for permanent form and typically expressed in words and figures wey dem dey use signature authenticate.
Dem no fit alter dat kind transaction without say dem alter di face of di document.
As e concern signature, di provision for inide section 93 (2)(3), evidence act 2011, electronic signature wey relate to data message go conveniently satisfy any requirement for signature wey dem take hand sign as long as say e dey sufficient to take identify an electronic record to di person.
Di  provision for inside article 7 of di United Nations Commission on International Trade Law (UNCITRAL) model law for e-commerce 1996 dey equally trite on top dis issue.
Thus, for di purpose of establishing proof of electronic signatures. 
To dey use password, identification, user names etc fit suffice.
Hence one fit safely tok say electronic signature for purpose of execution dey admissible for evidence provided say dem certify and incorporate am for electronic communication during any e-transaction.
Also, oda legal challenge dem wey dey affect e-commerce include di formation of contracts. 
Di element for better formation of contract include offer, acceptance, consideration, intention to enter inside legal relation.
Di question be say, for which point dem fit make offer wit regard to electronic business transaction or now to differentiate between invitation to treat and offer electronic transaction, at which point we fit tok say dem make intention to enter legal relation?
E-commerce require confidence and trust di satisfaction wey dey transmit order or invoice neva get any matter and e dey kom from whoever e appear to kom from.
Need dey for guarantee concerning level of privacy/confidenciality for information matter.
Lastly, di alarming rate of cybercrime for inside Nigeria, plus high level of illiterate.
No doubt say electronic transaction na aspect of commercial transaction for Nigeria and e don kom to stay dis time.
Make di goment go pass to dey make law, make dem activate as dem go take dey use di electronic platform for dem commercial interaction and for delivery of goment service. 
you fit reach Abanikanda Happiness Wuraola  via twitter
Chad don pass new chartes as dem call Deby son president
Chad don pass charter wey declare Mahamat Idris Deby as President, even as rumour dey social media say he don die.
Mahamat don take over to take replace im papa, Idriss deby wey dem kill dis week.
Di charter tok say di 37-year old wey be son to late war veteran, na im dem name transitional leader quick quick on Tuesday as head for military council afta im papa death, e go dey do work of president for di republic and head of di armed forces dem.
Di charter repeal di preceding constitution and dem go implement am as di basic law of di republic, according to di temrs wey dey inside am.
Dem also don name di young Deby as supreme head for armed forces, as e tok. 
Deby son don oversee di security of im papa when im be head of di elite presidential guard and he dey appear along wit im papa often.
Di best wey dem take know Mahamat Deby na as top commander of di forces inside Chad wey dey help United Nation peacekeeping mission for inside di restive north of neighbouring Mali.
Im sign one decree for Tuesday as he set out one military council wey get 15 generals dem, including imsef and 14 odas wey dem know say dey loyal to late president.
Di task wey dem give di council na to move enter free and democractic election withing 18 months.
Mahamat Idris Deby na chair for di military transition council, di council of ministers, di counil of superior committees of national defence, as di charter take tok.
Di new head of state go dey declare legislation wey di 69 members of di national transition council adopt, wey Mahamat name directly.
Di Transition Charter wey get 95 articles, e also guarantee freedom of opinion, conscience plus worship.
Dem don set transition goment, wey di new president go name di members. 
Di charter tok say dem don free all member of army wey dem call to di transitional goment from all military work.
Law for Chad
Di leader wey dem kill, im rule wit strong hand for lmost 30 years, he give to wound wey im get wen im visit battlefield wia Chad soldier dem dey fight rebel group for di north, as di military announce for Tuesday.
Calling for calm, di army also announce curfew for 6pm and dem close di border for di kontri, as dem suspend di constitution and dissolve National Assembly.
However, politician wey be opposition for inside chad don reject di army appointment of President Idris deby's son to take over fter im papa die.
Expert dem tok say under di law for inside Chad, di speaker of parliament suppose don kolekt power aftr Deby die, no be im son.
Wetin di constitution tok be say if di president n dey abi e die, then di speaker of di parliament go take charge of di kontri for 40 days and so dem go put transition in place until dem do election, Hiba Morgan wey dey Al Jazeera dey report from capital, Ndjamena tok for ealy Tuesday.
[But] di military announce ay dem don dissolve di legislative assembly and dem don dissolve di constitution, so wetin dem do be say dem replace di constitution wit dem own set of rules.
Dem fit komot Chelsea points afta di brawl wit Leicester
Chelsea dey face deduction of point from FA for di team as dem fail to kontrol dem players, as Mirror report.
Inside seven years, dem don catch di team dey show hot temper to opponents seven times.
Di recent brawl for inside one match on Tuesday night Leicester mark di seven encounter wey Chelsea get wit Premier League teams.
Na katakata mark di match wey apun last week between Chelsea and Leicester among players of both teams.
Wit di same kind of offence for di past, di FA decide say dem go punish Chelsea.
Leicester sef dey face charges for dem role inside di brawl wey involve players and coaches as Ricardo Pereira take challenge Ben Chilwell.
For 2016, dem also charge Chelsea for indiscipline wey make dem warn dem, afta dem appeal against 375,000 dollar fine for di part wey dem play for one burst-up during match against Tottenham.
If e affect dem, di point wey dem go komot go affect dem season very well as dem dey enter final campaign to take get spot for top four.
US Africom for Nigeria? Heck No! 
Overpaid, oversexed and over here.
Dat na di resentful and contemptuous opinion many British pipo get for di thousands of American GIs wey station for inside several military bases for Britain durin di Secon World War.
Di gum-chewing, brash, hard-drinking and womanising  soldier dem wey from America comedey frequently get into pub fight and knife fight weu dey dangerous wey dey kos bad feeling for di yanks among di locals.
And dis don be di pattern wey America soldiers dem dey take behave evriwia for di hundred of America military base oversea from Okinawa for inside Japan, Stuttgart inside Germany, Incirlik and Diyarbakir for Turkey and Pampanga inside  Philippines.
Na why i dey upset, like plenty Nigeria pipo, say na for virtual meetin last week wit di di Secretary of State of di United States of America, Antony Blinken, na dem report say president Buhari ask United States to consider as dem go take relocate di African Command (Africom) of im military wey dey for Stuttgart for inside southern German city of presently kom Africa.
We dey thingk am say wit dis kin call, president Buhari dey make way for Nigeria to host Africom.
For di first place, na breach of protocol for  President Buhari to do dat meeting wit di American Secretary of State.
Dem suppose do di meetin wit Blinken's Nigerian opposite number, Geoffrey Onyeama, who o kom carri di detail go meet president later.
Yes, America na superpower and all, but protocol na protocol and dem soppose follow am strictly  for evri circumstance.
We understand say Nigeria dey face big internal security wahala wey be like say e pass di best effort wey goment and security establishment for inside di nation dey make to take tackle am.
Terrorist insurgency wey no dey tire for di North East banditry, kidnapping inside di North West, farmers/herders clash dem all over di kontri and as dem dey target and kill security and law enforcement personnel dem and oda Nigeria pipo plus di destruction of institutional building for di South East, na dem join take be di cokctail of insecurity wey don dey ravage di kontri.
But even at that, di call to take host Africom on top Nigeria siol when we consider m against various issues and implications of dis move to Nigeria difficult to justify.
Africom na one amng nine of dat kind command wey di America military establish say make e dey serve America strategic interest around di world.
By dem rule and way of operation, dis commands, particularly di ones wey dey outside America like Africom, dem no set dem up primarily to concern demselves wit security and law enforcement issuefor dem area of coverage.
Dem only do so when such issue dey affect di interest of America directly for di area and for such situation, dem no dey mandated to yield dem modus operandi and share intelligence wit di local security and law enforcement agancy dem 
If dem set Africom up for Nigeria for instance, e go be island on im ownas e go restrict access to Nigerians of all category and establishing a jurisdiction withing di teritorial area of di base wey go dey virtually off limit to Nigerian security and law enforcement agancy dem.
As e dey always apun wit America military base wey dey outside America, Africom go be forward operating base for disruptive intelligence operations and e go source for act of sabotage and destabilisation against host kontri.
For dis particular case of Africom, part of im original concept na to kontrol as di strategic influence of Nigeria dey grow for West Africa and Africa as we get successful peace enforecement efforts for Liberia and Sierra Leone and awa beta record of peace keepin around di world.
Di one wey dey before Africom na di Africa Crisis Response Initiative (ACRI) wey di Clinton administration set up to take counter di strategic interest of Nigeria for inside Africa.
Di Secretary of State for president Clinton, di dour-faced California attorney, Warren Christopher, be visit a nomba of African countries secretly to sell di idea. 
But bikos Nigeria na di target, he pointedly komot am from im itinerary.
Senegal, wey no far from Liberia and Sierra Leone, na im suppose be di coordinating base of di ACRI and though dem see am initiative to facilitate assistance of America to African humanitarian issues, im secret protocol dem mistake for military and dem target Nigeria strategically.
Due mainly to undisguised hostility to di idea from France, which was averse to seeing di Americans trying to butt into an area it considers its exclusive sphere of influence, dem review di concept of di ACRI.
For di review, wey draw di expertise of america Military, intelligence, political and academic personalities and institutions wey di America congress carry kom for dem secret sessions, di Americans dem consider and realise di need to set up one AFrican command to add to di oda command wey don dey already and dey cover oda continent for inside di world.
Thus, to follow on di reccomendation of experts wey gather, wey dem kom form all angle of political and security establishments for inside America, na di Bush Junior administration set Africom up wit mandate wey wide pass to contain Nigeria but also to keep eye on top di strategic penetration wey Chinese pipo dey do for inside Africa.
Na as US Central Command (USCENTCOM) take be to Middle East and Asia, na so Africom go be to Africa, as e base for Florida, European Command (EUCOM), as e base for Stuttgart, Germany, is to Europe and Southern Command (SOUTHCOM), also based in Florida, is to Latin America and di Caribbean.
Di presence of French military don surround Nigeria already as dem dey for Niger, Cameroun, Chad and Benin.
Di America pipo also get drone base for inside Niger.
To add Africom to di mix for inside Nigeria go amount to a complete capitulation of awa strategic interest to both France and America.
As we get am for mind say awa strategic interest plus profile for Africa no dey always follow wit di one for France and America, to host Africom for Nigeria go be di same thing like make we allow wolf enter chicken cage.
Notin dey inside di insecurity cahllenge wey dey face di kontri wey awa armed forces no fit cope wit. 
Dis one na afta di military force wey eventually secure Liberia and Seirra Leone against army of insurgents wey dey well-entrenched and organised for inside di kontri dem from a long logistical supply line thousands of mile;  di army of Joshua Dogonyaro, Victor Malu and Maxwell Khobe, to mention few of di plenty gallant Nigeria soldier wey distinguish demsef for di operation dem.
E dey regretable say di Nigeria military, don fall from high standard wey dem take know dem, dem dey struggle now to cope wit di activity of non-state actors internally.
But intrinsically and essentially, di military for Nigeria still carry di capacity and capability to defeat dis threat to awa nationl security if dem get di correct leadership, doctrine plus motivation. 
We need all di assistance and coopration wey di America pipo fit give us if dem wan give us.
But as dem don hold us for hand to take host Africom with awa circumstance in view of im antecedent and implication to awa strategic interest, for awa soil.
Upon say dem dey face challenge, Plateau target 7m metric tons of Irish potato
For Nigeria, na Plateau state be nomba one wey dey plant Irish potato as dem dey produce am for nine of di 17 local goment area wey dey di state.
Di Potato Value Chain Support Project of di African Development Bank (AfDB)initiative don Plateau as state wey get 90 per cent of di potato production for inside di kontri as kontri like Chad, Ghana, Niger, Benin and oda ones dey get large supply of potato from Nigeria. 
Di large potato production for inside Plateau State, according to PotatoPRO.com, wey be leading source for informate for global potato industry, don make Nigeria di nomba four big kontri for inside sub-sahara Africa.
However, farmer dem tok say dam wey no good reach and bad road network, plus as di cost of fertilizer and oda farmin input kontinu to dey stand as major setback for di production of potatoes for inside di nation and to export.
Oda challenge wey dey contribute to low yield and loss for harvest to di potato value chain include disease like blight and bacterial wilt, plus poor seedlings. 
According to di National Bureau of Statistics, Plateau State dey among di ten poorest state for Nigeria as dem poverty rate pass 70%.
However, di state get comparative advange to take boost economic activities by improving di competitiveness of di potato commodity value chain.
Di project Coordinator  for di Potato value Chain Support Project, Thomas Muopshin, tok say though di visibility of di tuber crop dey evident for nine local goment area inside Plateau, Na Bokkos and Mangu LGAs be di hub for potato.
Na dem dey produce potato pass any LGA fir di kontri.
However, Muopshin tok say adaptability research indicate say di remainin eight LGA for inside di state also fit plant potato, dat one go make all 17 LGA wey dey for Plateau fit produce tuber, especially for inside dry season.
However, di Association of Potato Farmers (APF) for inside di state, tok say unless dem address di challenge wey dey face di value chain, increase production and export of potato go continue to pass di national. 
Chairman of APF for inside Plateau state, Lazarus Makut, for one interview wey he do wit daily Trust, tok say di inadequate small dam, especially for remote area wia dem dey plant potato, and bad road plus high cost of farm input kontinu to dey affect potato output. 
He tok say di cost of mechanised farmin wey fit increase production quick quick don dey expensive as di majority of farmers na small scale producer wey dey unable to afford mechanization. 
Anoda farmer, wey be Martha Mamgup, wey dey plant potatoe for inside Ampang town for Mangu LGA. tok say water wey no reach durin dry season dey affect potato farmer and harvest dey low evri year.
Bekos of dis, she tok say, di majority of farmers dem search for location of borehole to farm to take access irrigation water for dem farm.
Martha also explain say di high cost of fertilizer dey prevent plenty farmers from improvin quantity plus quality of yield, she add say wen fertilizer no reach, e dey affect di crop output.
Di cost dey also prevent many of us from expandin di business.
So, to get fertilizer no be dey easy for us.
She tok say di construction of more dam plus borehole for irrigation go lead to plenty production of potatoes.
If di watre no reach for di crop, e go dry and e go later die and day na why some farmer wey get di resources dey prefer to dig boreholes for Mangu for irrigation bikos, without am, season farmin go bekom difficult, as she tok.
Irish potato for one market inside Jos 
Production to reach 7million metric ton afta dem complete lab
Wit potato production inside Plateau State wey don jump from 1,656,650 metric tons in 2017 to 2,359,890 metric tons in 2020, di establishment of Potato Value Chain Support Project and dem expect make diconstruction of tisue culture lab kos make production triple pass seven million metric tons by di time wey 2021 go end.
Di officer wey Monitor and Evaluate state's Potato Value Chain Support Project for di state, Baleri Yakubu, tell Daily Trust say dem expect make di state start production of six million of potato evri year afta dem complete di tissue culture lab at di end of 2021 but e dey optimistic say production fit pass seven million metric tons evri year.
However, Yakubu tok say mak di state goment tackle oda challenges wey farmers dem dey face, especially di one of fertilizer as well as dam and road network as dem dey expect make farmers dem apply proper potato farming regulation to take achieve expected target.
Our correspondent hear say di tissue culture lab, wey dem intend to take improve potato yield for di state by providing seed wey clean wey dey resist pest and oda disease dem wey relate to potato na im dem expect say go commence full operation in few month dem. 
Yakubu tok say e dey certain say di advent of di lab go improve income for farmers and revenue for di state goment and e go also help food security for inside di kontri.
Farmer for inside Plateau State, however, believe say di tissue la, if e dey fully equipped, go reduce di cost of treatment for di crop when disease affect dem.
Dem also hope say better quality seed go dey available for affordable price.
FG neva return 4.2m Ibori loot to Delta Accountant General
Di Office of di Accountant General of di Federation (OAGF) reaveal for Wednesday say di Federal Goment neva return di 4.2 million loot wey dem recover from former governor James Ibori to delta Goment.
Dem still dey wait for di money afta dat dem go resolve di issues dem wey wit am before dem take any further action.
For now, dem neva return any moni enter Delta state,as one statement from di office reveal, wey di director of information, Press and Public Relations, Henshaw Ogubike sign.
Di statement tok say dem neva resolve di issue of di 4.2million wey Ibori loot.
For di previous comment wey Accountant General for di National Assembly make say dem don return di loot to di goment of Delta, Henshaw Ogubike tok say: Di Agf dey only general comment about money wey dem rcorver as e relate to state goment dem.
Di three Super League stronghead no gree against UEFA coercion.
Super League three Real Madrid, Barcelona and Juventus insist for Wednesday say dem remain committed to take modernise football even as UEFA dey threating to discipline dem.
UEFA don open formal disciplinary waka on Tuesday against di three clubs dem wey no gree to give up on di Super League project wey dem don abort.
For one joint statement, Juventus for Italy, and di two Spanish side tok say dem remain committed to take modernise football through open dialogue with UEFA.
FC Barcelona, Juventus FC and Real Madrid CF wish to express dem absolute rejection of di insistent coercion wey UEFA don dey mentain towards di three institution wey relevant pass for di history of futbol, as di statement tok. 
Dis attitude wey reach to raise alarm dey constitute breach of di decision wey courts of justice dem make, wey don make clear statement to warn UEFA to stop to take any action wey fit punish di clubs dem wey found di super League when dem still dey on top di legal matter.
Therefore, as UEFA take disciplinary proceedings dey incomprehensible and na direct attack against di rule of law wey us, wey be citizen for European Union, don build up with democracy, e still be lack of respect toward di authority of di courts of justice sef.
 China don give reach 140 million COVID-19 vaccines
China don administer 139.97 million doses of COVID-19 vaccines as of April 4, 2021, as di National Health Commission (NHC) of di kontri tok.
China dey work to make sure say dem vaccination effort for major area and key sector industry as e base on di overall plan of di kontri, inoculating di eligible population as wide as dem fit reach and to make progress in stages, as Wu Liangyou, wey be deputy director of di NHCs Disease Prevention and Control Bureau.
Di kontri don dey gather resources to ensure inoculation for city wey get large and medium size, city wey get prot, area wey get border wey get high risk of infection, plus dem give priority to key group wey include employee for inside public sector, student dem and faculty for inside college and universities, plus service staff for inside big supermarket dem, as Wu take tok, and e add say vaccination for oda group sef don dey for progress.
For present,  Beijing, Shanghai plus some oda places for inside China don give senior citizenswey wan kolekt di vaccine, wey dey above di age of 60 and patients wey get chronic diseases COVID-19 vaccines, wey get beta physical condition.
He Qinghua, wey official for di NHC note say di commission go advance di vaccination campaign with order of importance, dem go follow di priciple of informed consent, voluntary participation and free inoculation.
Di kontri dey coordinate regular prevention and kontrol wit im vaccination efforts, to make sure say di regular responsibility of local goment dem and di one wey dem don komot eye dey fulfilled, and to dey advance dem vaccination campaign in manner weu dey more secured and orederly and forceful, as e tok am.
Besides, China don take step to take include more pipo for dem vaccination campaign to ensure dem health, di official add.
So far, China don approve COVID-19 vaccines wey five enterprises produce for conditional marketing or for emergency use.
Phase III of three vaccines dem wey dem neva activate and one adenovirus vaccine show say dem efficacy meet di requirement of National Medical Products Administration for China and di World Health Organization.
Phase II trial for di recombinant protein subunit vaccine wey dem appove for emergency use don show say di vaccine dey safe and e fit cause strong immune response.
All di COVID-19 vaccine wey China adopt don go through clinical studies wey follow relevant standard, wey national drug regulatory organization dem approve and dem begin dey use am afta e pass strict examination, as Li Bin wey be deputy head for NHC take tok.
All vaccines suppose dey monitor and make dem temperature get record from time to time to make sure say dem meet requirement on temperature environment and transportation.
Li add say Health regulator for inside China don also enhance effort for di training of health worker dem, require say make dem obey operating instructions, so dem go fit guarantee di efficacy and safety of di vaccine. 
Wema Bank dey do essay contest for pikin dem
Wema bank Plc dey host creative essay competition wey go test di creative writing ability of young children wey dey age of five to 12 years.
Di 2021 Royal Kiddies Essay Competition wey dem tag Write and Win, aim na to develop writing skil, promote creativity, imagination capacity, reward creativity and drive dem excellence in dia learning process.
Ten kids go emerge for inside screening process wey go dey transparent, credible and thorough.
Di three essay wey kom top go kolekt Huawei tablets and Royal Kiddies branded T-shirts.
Di remaining seven pipo wey enter final go get N20,000 prepaid gift card each for school supplies plus branded T-shirt.
Di essay competition go dey open to children wey dem parent don open, plus dey fund Royal Kiddies Account or wards, and entries go close bu May 24, 2021.
From Hushpuppi to Abidemi Rufai Sandy Tang
Twelve months ago, dem arrest Ramoni Abass (37 years) wey dem know as hushpuppi for June 2020 for Dubai alledge say im do money laundering  from business email compromise fraud and oda scams dem wey dey target firms and one English premier league club.
Di total money wey im make na $435 million afta in dom defraud 1,926,400 victims.
Afta a year,  Federal Bureau of Investigation (FBI) also arrest  Abidemi Rufai (wey dem dey call Sandy Tang), Senior Special Assistant on Special Duties to Ogun State Governor, Dapo Abiodun for inside John F kennedy Airport, concerning criminal complain say e scam Washington State Employment Security Department of $350,000 (N144,375,000).
Di money wey dem tif na relief money for pandemic wey Washington state design for pipo wey fit don loss dem job bikos of di COVID-19 pandemic.
Na during lockdown di fraud apun and di investigation bureau begin dey track di alleged fraudster wey for be dey make law for Nigeria Federal House of Representative if e no loss di Ijebu North/Ijebu East/Ogun Waterside Federal Constituency election to Adekoya Adesegun wey be  Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) person.
Dem do di fraud by stealing identity of Washington residents wey pass 100 as dm dey fill false claim with di Employment Security Department (ESD) for pandemic-related unemployment benefits.
Dem create new e-mail account for each identity wey dem steal, make dem for identify di claim with different pesin to escape automatic fraud detection system.
After dat, dem don pay pass  $288,000 so im bank account inside America between March and August 2020.
Cybercrime na global threat to pipo, organisation and kontri dem.
Nigeria dey loss pass $128 billion to cybercrimes evri year.
By di time 2021 go end, di world go don loss total of $6 trillion.
Till date, e pass  40 Nigeria pipo wey dem dey or wey FBI  still dey investigate for dem complicity inside fraudulent scams. 
Di allege unemployemnt benefit fraud wey Rufai do go dey under wetin I don call COVID-19 fraud for Nigeria.
Dis na scam wey dey use loopholes wey COVID-19 pandemic don cause to dey scam pipo, goment pr organization dem.
During di COVID-19 lockdown for inside Nigeria, cybercriminals dey do dem frauds along di interventions from goment and private sectors and scamm plenty and some of di  scheme dem  still dey till date.
Domino pizza fraud dey, federal goment cash palliative fraud, N20, 000 Dangote relief fund fraud and promo sales fraud among oda ones.
Wen some dey wey dey cyber-criminality outside Nigeria, some youngster dem dey do am inside Nigeria.
Di Economic and Financial Crimes Commission (EFCC) dey arrest dem, also try and convict dem. 
To understand di culture wey dey sustain cyber-criminality fit help serious goment to fight di crime.
Di family na di di small worldfor inside di larger society.
Na di place wey dem suppose nuture normal human beign for di society.
Apart from di fact say plenty family for Nigeria dey inside dungeon of poverty and e dey hard to take care of dem children, some of di  children don bikom breadwinners, as e be, e no legit.
Ethical behaviour training for plenty house na challenge as dem don dey arrest parent plus dem children wey dem gather do cyber-criminality.
For some oda places, yahoo boys mama dem dey form association to take celebrate dem pikin success nd justify di criminal thing wey dem do.
For di religious seting, pastors, alfa and traditinalist dey make home and dem dey benefit from yahoo-boyism. 
Moral teachingdon komt for materialistic Pentecostalism to enter.
E get one viral video wia some boys dey spray money while pipo wey be like say dem be shepherd for inside white garment church dey enjoy di captive di moment, as dem member wey di female youth wing of di church dey lead dey record di act of shame.
Pikin wey dem born for 1999 wen Nigeria enter democracy again na 21 years now.
Sadly, dem grow to dey appreciate lie as a way of life from politician dem mouth (and for plenty cases from home) wey dey decieve pipo to vote for dem nd dem no dey fulfil di promise wey dem amke for compaign.
Lying sef na di foundation of di sociology of hushpuppism.
Youth dey socialise daily for inside corruption by pipo dey dey for public office.
Dem dey see how di system dey give farudulent pipo soft landing (for public or private).
Shey dem dey ask how many fraud and corruption allegation wey dem don investigate and discharge wit punishment when di accuse dey guilty? 
Di plenty of cases end wit off-the-mic like as di Nigeria Delta Development Commission (NDDC) case take end like family affair.
Di youth dem dey see as celebrate flamboyant lifestyle inside dirty.
Dem dey see how poor politcal aspirant dey bikom millionaire withing months wey dem enter office.
Dem dey see how traditional institution don bikom cash and carry wen dem dey give chieftancy title.
Tertiary educational institutions, with few exception dem, dey award undeserving honours in exchange for money. 
All of those weu mismanage monet dey get soft landing.
To add to dis list of culture wey dey nuture cybercrime na di lyrical glamour wey some Nigeria musician dem dey give cybercrime as dem dey present cybercrime as work and game wey evribodi dey do and say no be crime.
If we elect fraud pesin enter legislator, e go make law against di crime wey e dey involve?
Di process wey parti leaders dem dey take give parti nomination to di pesin wey get high bid need review if we wan stop to dey import problematic tokunbo things enter awa political system wey don already loss moral.
E dey unfortunate say di critical reasoning of parti leaders dem go low when dem show dem money.
 Dem provide platform for dubious character to take do cover up and di society dey worse with dem action.
Greed dey also cause cyber-criminality.
Di FBI agent wey dey incestigate Rufai, Donald Voiret tok say greed na powerful motivator.
Unfortunately, di greed wey dem allege dis defendant dem dey affect all taxpayer.
To move forward, we no fit dey live inside sin, dey expect grace to abound.
Make Nigeria sanitise dem anti-coruption system and make dem put accoutability policy in place to take track lifestyle with material accumulation.
We must give youth for inside Nigeria hope by creating employment opportunity, reduce poverty plus review reward system dem. 
Di EFCC need to invest inside technology and expose dem detective to modern cybercrime investigation procedure dem.
Di commission need to finish investigation before dem go arrest suspect as FBI do before dem arrest huspuppi and Abidemi Rufai Sandy Tang.
Unless dem tackle di culture wey dey  sustain cybercrimes for inside Nigeria  wit social social engineering, cyber-criminality go kontinu to spread. 
Dr Tade, wey be sociologist write dis piece pu for dotad2003@yahoo.com 
DRC president wey be Tshisekedi don enter chair for African Union
President for di Democratic Republic of Congo, Felix Tshisekedi enter chair for di African Union on Saturday.
Im enter office for di first day inside di 34th Ordinary Session of di Assembly of Heads of State and Goment inside Addis Ababa.
Im dey kom afta president for South Africa wey be Cyril Ramaphosa as di rotating chair for di organization.
Di Au go aim to address di bad impact of COVID-19 for di continent.
Di union 
official theme for 2021 na Arts, Culture, and Heritage: Levers for Building di Africa We Want.
Despite kontri and continent-wide kontrol measure sem, di impact of COVID-19 don carry plenty human, financial and soci-economic cost put for Africa pipo, as Tshisekedi tok.
Di crisis don however give us di opportunate to re-examine awa socio-economic priorities and work towards sustainable and inclusive economic growth wey go allow woman and girls dem to contribute to awa society for di fullest.
We must to rely on awasef more and dey find collective solution to awa problem dem.
Tshisekedi tok say di DRC during im time as head for di union dey look to elevate African voices.
E go also focus on sustainable development by and for Africa.
We go work to make sure dem integral well-beign, peace and security, health care and strong response against COVID-19, plus food security.
Agricultural transformation, education, gender equality, climate justice, for pipo and good to dey move freely, and freedom of speech and religion plus to enhance awa common heritage: language dem, and memorial sites of di history of pipo for Africa, wey go dey centre for ouw agenda , as di president take add.
New wahala for inside Lagos PDP concerning LG polls
One fresh wahala don dey gather for inside  Lagos State chapter of di Peoples Democratic Party (PDP) concerning di release of guidelines for di conduct of di local goment elections dem wey dey kom wey di Chairman of di state wey be Engr Deji Doherty release.
Engr Doherty wey don dey get battle with plenty of im colleagues for di State Working Committee (SWC), wey lead to im suspension recently, be release di guideline for Friday.
E go fit remember say di State Independent Electoral Commission (LASIEC) don release di timetable for di elections wey go hold for Saturday, July 24, 2021.
Inside di internal strife wey dey linger for di State PDP, di Chairman release di guidelines, which as we hear no good for di eyes of most of di executive member wey tok say dem no carry dem long.
One member for di state executive tok say di chairman plan di timetable unilaterally  and he no involve oda executive member dem.
We later hear say di oda faction of di parti oppose Doherty fit counter di embattled Chairman dis over di guidelines.
Di executive member wey tok for condition to dey anonymous tok say di position of di member wey dey vex go enter public dis week, e insist say dem sideline key member of di executive. 
How e dey feel to born inside pandemic By Dil Afrose Jahan.
When news of death dey evriwia, one new life bring hapines plus hope
For January 1, 2020, one new morning, two red line change my life.
I get belle and I dey hapi
Na mamzing start to new year.
Na di most remarkable year of my life.
All of a sudden, evriting change.
My daughter Roshomon Tara was born at di end of di first lockdown in Dhaka, Bangladesh; she is now nine months old. I born my pikin Roshomon Tara at di end of di first lockdown for Dhaka, Bangladesh; she don enter  nine months old now.
She be di reason I bekom mother for di middle of global crisis.
No be only her dem born, but na also new me, mama tara, wey spend di whole pregnancy inside lockdown for house and born di pikin for emergency condition inside di emergency.
Tara don see di world wit mask and isolation.
Her grandma dem dey also fear to touch her or kom near her if dem no wear mask.
If pandemic be no dey, my journey to take enter motherhood go different.
Dis Mother Day dey very special as my pikin don dey for my front, dey look me dey smile.
For di last mother day, she dey grow inside of me.
Di only thing wey no change, meanwhile, na di pandemic.
Na 16 weeks belle dey inside me when di pandemic apun, and di world enter lockdown.
I be dey struggle to survive di pandemic with my hormonal and physical changes.
Di 22 weeks dem be like war.
My husband, Sina Hasan na musician, and all im concert dey cancelled for dat time.
I be freelance journalist since January 1, 2021.
So we be dey depend on wetin I don save already, and we spend all my savings.
Our parent and two journalists association dem come forward to help for di main time.
I be dey fear evrithing.
Most of di time, e be like say na die
dey knock for awa door.
I be dey adapt to new life wey say na online we dey click and dem dey deliver awa things or home-delivery.
I get to dey wait for one week make dem for take deliver groceries like day.
I even dey fear to send di only family member wey dey live wit me, my husband to komot go buy food storage.
So, I no too dey eat.
Beside sef, I no fit go for my antenatal check-up as dem take give me time.
And I be no dey sure if my pikin dey grow welwel abi if development dey take place timely.
I be dey sorry for my unborn pikin say I dey bring am inside world wey different from as e ever be.
Na tele-medication help me pass some hard time for inside di last three month dem.
I be forget di face of my  gynaecologist.
I no fit imagine s she go take look if she no wear PPE.
I need informate  about risks, precautions, and how I fit get emergency medical help.
plenty informate be dey flow around.
For inside dis informate wahala, mother dem wey get experience my mama, and my mother-in-law fit only dey support me and no be say dem meet me for pesin when i be get belle.
Traditionally, experienced mothers and mostly older women for inside di family go help new mother dem wit dem experience plus observation. 
I be don get plenty panic attack bikos I no get information and understanding.
 So I be dig experience of mother dem wey give birth durin dis time.
I see social media as lifeline.
I read plenty exciting experience for social media when I be dey follow one group wey gey over 100,000 woman wey get belle and wey dey give pikin breast as dem dy support each oda to take survive di pandemic.
Different media group for di platfrm don help pass 100,000 woman wey belle and di ones wey dey give pikin breast as dem dey share experience plus informate durin di lockdown.
Na one di group help me find heakth care fcility to take do emmergency ultrasound afta heavy bleeding fir inside di lockdown.
Anoda group be help to stop anxiety and di depresion wey dey follow childbirth.
I be dey vex say I no fit meet my parents, relatives, or friends to take  share di joy of say I welkom  new member inside di family.
My daughter was born on August 25, 2020, at di same hospital, Azimpur Maternity, wia I was born decades ago. I be born my pikin for August 25, 2020, for di same hospital, Azimpur Maternity, wia dem born me decades ago.
And she meet anoda child one on one when she be enter four months old for December 31, 2020, when Tara and her papa go di rooftop with me to see di fireworks. 
Anoda fimily with two baby, wey be my neighbour wey I dey meet for di first time also go dere to go tok byebye for 2020.
Every day na, and e still be  gift, to consider di recent statistics of increased Covid-19 cases.
When news about death full evriwia, di new life bring hapines and hope.
For mother dem, e no different from say dem win war as dem born pikin inside pandemic and dem dey care for di new pikin alone, to confirm di safety wey high pass for dem pikin. 
Socially, emotionally, and physically, dis time fit challenge person. 
Thanks to di light wey dey shine inside di eyes of di baby dem.
Thank you my pikin, my daughter, for who I be mama and a successful fighter wey survive dis pandemic.
Dil Afrose Jahan don kolekt di National Geographic Society's Emergency Fund for Journalist dem.
Na  National Geographic Society support dis work.
Di national question, insecurity and di declaration for inside Asaba.
By Segun Tomori
Recently, governor dem for inside souther Nigeria be meet inside Asaba and dem make some kind resolution on top di state of di nation, which dem don dey call Asaba declaration.
Di meetin dey kom on top di matter as insecurity for di kontri don dey worse, agitation by some kind ethnic jingoist and as di matter murderous herdsmen menace dey generate nationwide attention.
Indeed, di bi-partisan nature wey di meetin get plus di unanimity wey di 17 governor dem display show say dem mean serious business. 
Restructuring inside  di context of true federalism and di ban of open grazing form di koko of di declaration. 
Major light follow be to bring state police, devolution of power, to review revenue formula to take favour federating unit plus di need for national dialogue to take discuss di nation question.
As dem suppose condemn di way gobernos dem dey take drag leg on top financial autonomy for state legislature and judiciary and e no follow di spirit of true federalism which dem dey call for, planty for inside dem resolution na tenet for di ruling All Progressives Congress (APC) wey di committee wey Gov. El=Rufai lead on top true federalism recommend.
One go expect say di leading light for inside APC go take advantage of di bipartisan nature of di Asaba declaration, and di support of di major opposition parti to take begin di process to address di issue.
Instead, we see attempt to take play to di gallery and for some quarter,  subtle censure of di governor dem.
Di El-Rufai committee don recommend devolution of power, resource control, state police, local goment autonomy plus review inside revenue frmula for favour of federatin unit among dem.
President Buhari don give support for local government, state legislature and judiciary autonomy since, as im back amendment for inside di statutes and issue Executive Order 010. 
As di state of di nation take be, wey security and economic don bikom big challenge, na dis two sector dem suppose get di untimate attention togeda.
Despite as dem rate Nigeria as kontri wey get highest GDP for inside Africa, we still neva make better effort wey reach to translate am to take improve standard of living or di majority of awa kontri pipo. 
For instance now, awa annual budget wey reach $35 billion, e dey very inadequate to take cater for di need of 220 million Nigeria pipo. 
South Africa wey get about 58 million pipo get National budget wey reach $75bn for 2019 and her Social Protection Programme reach 17m of im populatiom
Di effort wey di Buhari administration dey make, though na new way and e dey commendable, na just drop for inside ocean and e no dey adequate to make required impact. 
Na here devolution of power and resource kontrol go enter.
Solid minerals and natural resource dem no get any business to stay pass one day inside Exclusive list. 
Almost all di state wey dey di kontri get natural resources wey fit sell market wey dem fit explore to tak create wealth and generate di foreign exchange wey  di kontri need. 
Di present system wia state dey go Abuja to go kolekt federal allocation for inside di kontri dey breed indolence, e no follow di principle of true federalism.
Just as di El-Rufai committee take propose, say make dem review di revenue formula to take favour states since dem go add more responsibilities to dem. 
On top  state police, e dey undesratndable say dem dey fear say governors dem go abuse am, but like Richie Nortondon tok, To escape fear, you have to go through it, not around it.
For too long, we don dey waka round fear of abuse of state police, we don turn blind eye to di centralised Nigeria Police Force wey don dey overstretched and wey don bikom inefficient and big problem.
As vice-President Osinbajo tok some years ago, State Police na idea wey im time don kom.
We have to address awa fears and overcome it.
One for di way na to enact legal instrument to take establish di State Police Regulatory Commission (SPRC), along wit constitutional amendments dem wey go permit state police.
E go dey similar function wit Federal Police Service Commission (PSC) but e go get wider power to take exercise appointive plus regulatory function dem.
Do ban on top open grazing wey di governors dem restate no be nwe thing, e dey part of di fulcrum of di National Livestock Transformation Plan (NLTP) wey National Executive Council (NEC) approve.
Di International Crisis Group (ICG) don put di NLTP as di most comprehensive effort wey Nigeria don make to date to take overhaul di inefficient and grosly underperforming livestock system.
For di core na strategy to take  curb migratory or open grazing and thus lower di risk of conflict between herders and farmersdem, therefore, beggars belief that some myopic, sef-acclaimed ethnic champions choose to lampoon di ban on pre-historic, nomadic open grazing. 
Make  di federal and stae goment move very fast to fully implement dis new plan so we go fit put dis farmers-herders clash wey dey apun fromtime to time behind us.
Di convocation of National Dialogue, wey be major demand of di Asaba declaration fit no dey necessary since report from di 2014 National Conference plus recommendations of di Gov. El-Rufai -led APC committee on True Federalism dey.
Di two report be make far reaching recommendation wey di governor dem wey we elect and dem legislator for inside di national assembly fit agree on, instead of make dem waste resource wey no dey on top anoda jamboree.
On to di issue of separatist agitations dem, make dem bring modalities  to take do referendum as e be inside di constitution.
E dey almost certain say plenty majority of Nigeria pipo wan live togeda, dem no mind awa differences.
To do dis go take di sail komo for di wind of divisive elemnet dem, wey dey fan fire of hate and discord.
di Southern Governor dem don affirm dem commitment to one United Nigeria on top basis of justice, fairness and equity, so must evri patriotic Nigerian.
Though we get challenge dem like evri oda kontri, we must listen to awasefs as US President Joe Bidden dey often tok.
Tomori dey live for Abuja
Two officer dem don die as IPOB jaguda pipo put fire on top police station
E neva reach 24 hours afta di new commissioner of police wey dem appoint for inside Anambra, Christopher Adetokumbo Owolabi, resume, na im jaguda pipo attack Obosi Police Station in Idemili North local government area for inside di state and kill two officers.
Di jaguda pipo attack di police station late for Wednesday, dem free all di pipo wey dem detain before dem set di station on fire.
One pesin for di police station wey di thing affect tok say plenty jaguda pipo enter and attack di police station around 11pm.
Im identify di officer wey die as Inspector James and Awalu.
Di source tok say dem kill di victims inside one filling station wey no dey function again ey dey close to di police station.
Di source also tok say when oda police officer dem wey dey on duty be notice unusual movement of di unknown gunmen, dem run and di pipo wey attack get time to take burn di police station down.
Meanwhile, di police for inside Anambra don confirm di killin of two of dem men.
DSP Tochukwu Ikenga, wey be di Public Relations Officer (PPRO)for di command, wey confirm di attack, tok say di state commissioner of police don dispatch one tactical team to take assess di incident on di spot.
Di tactical team wey di Assistant Commissioner of Police lead di tactical team get instruction to see on di spot assessment of di place.
Dem also tell di team ti try identify and catch di jaguda pipo wey do di attack, as he take tok.
Ikenga, wey add say di bodi of di two police don dey for nearby morgue, he tok say dem don start investigation on top di matter. 
NEPC, Commonwealth collaborate on  top production of professional service export data
Di Nigeria Export Promotion Council (NEPC) and di Commonwealth Secretariat London wan collaborate to take produce reliable data on top export for professional service for inside Nigeria.
When e dey tok for di inaugural meeting of di National Consultative Committee for di International Trade-in-Services (NCCITS) wey hold under di Commonwealth Secretariat London, di Executive Director/Chief Executive Officer of the NEPC, Mr. Olusegun Awolowo, tok say Nigeria no get readily accessible and reliable data on top trade-in-service.
Awolowo tok say dem don try before to create awareness on top di trade-in service sector of di economy, including as dem create National Strategy for Export of Professional Services for 2010.
He tok say di Commonwealth don help Nigeria to develop one road-map for di sector for 2016.
Di oga for inside NEPC tok say di current focus for collaboration wit di Commonwealth Secretariat na on top data/statistics collection and management.
He tok say dis one dey critical to awa effort for export as e go fill di gap for collecting or capturing data from relevant institution in order to take generate, analyse and use statistical information on top trade-in Service dem as e take be globally.
NITDA, firm go launch tech startup fund for July
Di National Information Technology Development Agency (NITDA) and one firm wey bease for United States Mass Challenge don sign agreement to financially support between 10 and 15 start-ups from July, to reach dem full potential withing 12 months. 
Director General for NITDA, Kashifu Inuwa Abdullahi tok  dis on Tuesday durin one virtual media stakeholder engagement wit officials of MassChallenge dem. 
Abdullahi tok say dem design di initiative to take identify and accelerate top start-ups dem wey base for Nigeria and grow dem business to serve di Nigeria and global market.
Di DG fo inside NITDA wey tok say dem go launch di initiative for July add say e go improve tech innovation and entrepreneurship for inside di kontri.
Start up ecosystem wey dey vibrant dey highly critical to di future of awa kontri and na Vital to take find solution to awa various challenge dem.
Innovation na prominent way to take create properity for all and to take lift kontri dem komot for inside poverty.
Di CEO of MassChallenge, Siobhan Dullea, tok say di firm don suport over 2,900 start-up across di world and say di firms dem don generate $3.6 billion revenue and create 86,000 jobs dem.
Kidnapper dem carry two woman inside Abuja council
Kidnapper dem don carry two woman, Christiana Isa Attah and Favor David, behind Anguwar Kpokpolobi community inside Naharati, Abaji Area Council, FCT.
Mama wey born di two victim, wey be Mrs. Ruth Attah, na retired school teacher, tell awa reporter for her house sayna around midnight for Saturday di incident apun. 
She tok she be dey sleep and di pikin dem dey inside room when di kidnapper dem enter di house afta dem jump fence wey no too high.
She tok say dem break one window to take enter di room wey her pikin dem dey sleep and carry komot wit gun for hand.
 When di girls notice say dem dey try to break window, dem run come my room to hide, but di kidnappers be follow dem come my room, and dem carry all of us komot, as she take tok am.
According to her, di kidnapper be leave her afta dem some few metres wey dem don pass house when dem notice say she no fit waka bikos of old age.
Na afta we cross river, wey I no fit waka again na im di oda gang member tell me say make i dey go back house as dem komot wit my two pkin dem, she add.
One pesin wey dey stay di area, wey wan dey anonymous, tok say di kidnapper do di operation for more than one hour as dem dey shoot up to scare pipo from dem.
He tok say no security man come here when di kidnapper dem be dey shoot inside air for pass one hour.
Daily Trust hear say until dat very day, di woman and her pikin dem dey always sleep for neighbour dem house and dem dey go back home bikos dem dey fear kidnapper as dem house na just few metre from di river.
We also gather say of di di daughter of di woman, wey be class teacher for di area be dey prepare to do wedding for next month.
Di toktok pesin for di police command inside FCT, that one na ASP Maryam Yusuf, no gree pick call or reply text message wey dem send to her fone to take confirm di latest kidnap incident for di area.
why I dey run for gov inside Anambra Anglican Priest
One Anglican Priest, Rev Godwin Okonkwo, don tok say im dey race for di November governorship election inside Anambra state bikos im wan bring di fear of God and knowledge of prudent use of resources to show on top governance matter for di state.
Okonkwo wey follow Daily Trust tok on Wednesday shortly afta im follow im supporter dem tok for Awka, di Anambra state capital, tok say di state dey lag behind in terms of good governance.
Di pipo wey dey dere for now neva begin manage di resources of Anambra state for di good of di Anambra pipo.
I believe say we fit do better pass as we dey manage di resources of di state.
Time don reach make we move from lukewarm attitude of leadership to better leadership.
I dey for Apc to change di poor outing wey di parti get for di state for past years, as he tok.
Barty don beat Kvitova to take play last four match with Badosa
Ashleigh Barty go take on Paula Badosa for di semifinal of Madrid Open afta beating Petra Kvitova 6-1, 3-6, 6-3 for Wednesday.
World No 1 Barty dey  chase her fourth singles title for di year afta she win for  Stuttgart 10 days ago. 
For di last four she go face di woman wey beat am komot for inside quarterfinal for Charleston in early April.
For Wednesday, di Australian be komot as top against pesin wey don win Wimbledon two times plus 2015, 2018 Madrid open winner Kvitova.
Wildcard Badosa become di first Spanish woman for di tournament wey don dey for  12-year to make di semi with her 6-4, 7-5 win over eighth seed Belinda Bencic.
Dem parade 22 mummies of Pharaoh dem inside Egypt
Na twenty-two mummies of pharaoh wlk for di street of Cairo on saturday evening for one stunning royal procession from Egyptian Museum on Tahrir Square to di new National Museum of Egyptian Civilization (NMEC) in Fustat.
Na di event mark as dem take launch NMEC officially.
Against di backdrop of fireworks, di mummies 18 kings and four queens travelled in order of age on purpose-built gold-colored pharaonic chariots, equipped wit an air ride suspension system to absorb vibrations, and bearing di name of dia occupants in Arabic, English, and hieroglyphics. 
Seqenenre Tao II wey rule Upper Egypt around 1,600 BCE, lead di parade, as Ramses ix, wey rule for di 12th century BCE bring up di rear.
As e follow di strict international standard for di transport of artifacts, dem place di royal remain for state-of-the-art sterile display cases to guarantee dem immaculate preservation.
Na  60 motorcycles, 150 horses, and a pharaonic music ensemble wey  renowned Egyptian maestro Nader Abbassiconduct follow di mummie. 
Di procession start with a 21-gun salute, circled the obelisk for di  Tahrir Square wey dey close, and then proceeded along di Nile to NMEC, wia Egyptian President Abdel Fattah El-Sisi personally welkom di mummies to dia new permanent home in Fustat, di National Museum of Egyptian Civilization. 
Di parade wey last for 40-minutes catch participation of 12 celeb for inside Egypt, as 200+ global TV channels broadcast am.
Di pricelees artifact dem go spend di next two weeks for di NMECs laboratory, wia dem go prepare dem for installation inside di Royal Mummies Hall, wey dey for di valley of di kings.
Dem go open di Royal Mummies Hall to visitors for April 18, wey don jam with World Heritage Day. 
To promote di launch, NMEC dey offer 50 percent discount for entry ticket price to di Central Exhibition Hall for visitor from April 4 go enter 17.
To add join, representatives of local and international media get di opportunity to take picture and video di artifacts inside di Central Exhibition Hall for free on April 4 and 5.
Overlooking Ain Al Sirafor di heart of di historical city of ustat wey near Babylon Fortress, NMEC na one of di largets and most important archeology museums wey dey di world. and di first to last for di whole civilization for inside Egypt. 
Uproar apun for Kano prison concerning illicit drugs
Pandemonium be dey inside Kano central prison for Kurmawa for Thursday evening over bad drug.
Di uproar begin when di warder dem for inside di prison be detect and sieze cannabis, wey dem allege say dem bring for inmate for Thursday evening.
When dem contact am, di Public Relations Officer of di Nigerian Correctional Service (NCoS) inside Kano state, Musbahu Lawal Kofar Nasarawa, confirm di matter, e add say dem don set committee to take find out how di cannabis take enter into di centre.
He tok say, pesin bring cannabis enter di prison and awa operative dem kolekt am, so dem begin shout, dem tok say make we give dem.
We don set up committee already to take find out how dat kind illicit drug get into di house; whether dem put am inside di food wey dem bring come for one of di prisoner or pesin conive wit some of awa operatives.
Di action no get anything with jailbreak, na just uproar, we don already reinforce order back for inside custodial centre, as e add.
Rumour e dey say di prisoner dem wan break di jail to take attempt to escape as dem dey reject di food wey dem give dem to take break fast, on top say dem kolekt bug donation from philantropist dem.
Di toktok pesin for NCoS don debunk di rumour, e describe dem as baseless.
Daily Trust be report say di 100 years prison wey dey for Kurmawa area, behind Palace of Emir for di metropolis na di biggest custodial centre for inside di state.
FG dey call for  global action against terrorism, drug trafficking 
Di federal goment don urge world leaders dem to give international cooperation strength as part of effort to successfully fight terrorism and to dey carry drugs, plus oda kind of crimes dem.
Dis one na even as Nigeria take express concern over di incident of bad financial flow from economy wey dey develop to economy wey don already develop for di world.
Dis one dem dey part of di position wey Nigeria present for di conference of United Nations Commission on Crime Prevention and Criminal Justice wey dey go on, for inside Vienna.
Toktok pesin for National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA), Femi Babafemi, be tok as di Chairman/Chief Executive of di agency, Brig-Gen.
Mohamed Buba Marwa (Retd), wey present di position of Nigeria for item 6C and 7 for di meeting as im tok say as nation dey deepen cooperation and strengthen di processes of combating di financing of terrorism and prevention of terrorists make dem no for benefit from ransom payments, e also dey important for dem make dem no overlook trafficking of bad drug dem.
E also dey necessary t put eye on top and control as illicit traffic dey spread, drug wey dey affect brain, wey dey lead to violence. 
Nigeria also dey worry say di link wey dey between terrorism and oda form of crime like corruption, bad flow of money, money laundering, don dey grow, illicit trafficking in drugs, cybercrime, trafficking in pesin dem and smuggling of migrants, as Marwa take tok.
When e dey deliver statement from Nigeria for item 6C on Wednesday, Marwa tok say as nation dem dey renew dem desire to take improve international cooperation to address evri kind crime, Nigeria dey urge all state, once again, to make sincere effort, to address di cause from di root, wey include; poverty, economic deprivation, inequality, drug abuse, plus oda socio-economic factors.
When e dey present di statement of di kontri on item 7 for Thursday, Marwa tok say, Nigeria notes with great concern di incidence of illicit financial flows, we dey pass through di financial system evri year, from developing and developed analysis.
To take advice di pipo wey dey do dis bad, wey include financial institutions wey dey act as enablers, make state parti dem make sure say illicit financial flow, when dem track am, no remain for di custody of financial institution but make dem transform am into escrow account, preferably in development banks pending return to countries of origin.
For dis regard, we dey call for implementation of di recommendation of di facti panel wey dey for support of access recorvery and di agenda 2030 for sustainable development.

Election for inside Uganda: President Museveni dey get early lead, rival dem tok say na fraud
President Yoweri Museveni don take early lead inside pesidential election for Ugand, according to result wey first dey enter from di electoral commission for Friday morning.
Dis one na as im main rival don tok he get proof say fraud don enter di election.
As e don get 29.4 per cent of votes from ballot wey dem vote on Thursday, Museveni don win 1,852,263 votes, or 63.9 per cent as main opposition candidate wey be Bobi Wine get 821,874 or 28.4 per cent, as di commission take tok just afta 11.00 a.m. (0800 GMT).
Wine allege fraud  
Wine wey be singer wey kom becom lawmaker wey don kolobi young Uganda pipo wit call for political change, tell news conference on top Friday say he get video of proof say fraud dey durin di vote, and say na as di vote go end in peace im want.
He don tok am for one tweet early say he get confidence say im go win despite say fraud and violence plenty.
Museveni, wey don lead di kontri for inside East Africa for wey get 46 million pipo for 34 years neva tok anytin as at noon.
Internet blackout
For Wednesday, di goment order say make dem block internet till further notice, a day afta dem ban all social media and messagin app dem.
Wine and im supporters use Facebook to take show live coverage of im campaigns and news conference afta he tok say many media outlets no gree to host am. 
Dem spoil di election campaign wit deadly crackdown on top opposition candidates and dem supporters dem.
Di capital for Uganda wey be Kampala wey dey buble normally dey quiet for Friday, wey be public holiday afta di vote for Thursday, as dem close most shop dem.
Soldiers dem patroll wit  leg  for  inside rain in a suburb wey Reuters visit. 
Commission head, Simon Byabakama, assure di nation on top live TV for Thursday evening afta polls don close say result don dey  enter for di national tally centre despite di nationwide internet blackout. 
We no dey use local internet to take transmit result, we dey use awa own system,  as e tok, without say we give details of di system.
No wori, result go come, Byabakama tok join
New wave of pandemic don hit more for inside Japan prefecture dem.
Japan donreadi to expand di present state of emergency to cover three more prefectur dem, as di goment tok for Friday.
Dis dey follow as di infection of coronavirus don dey wide for inside di kontri ahead of Tokyo Olympics for summer.
Di prefecture for inside Hokkaido, Okayama and Hiroshima dey likely to get di measure from Sunday go enter end of May, as Economic Revitalisation Minister, Yasutoshi Nishimura, tell news pipo.
One panel of experts endorse di proposal, as Nishimura wey dey in charge of di coronavirus response by di goment take tok.
Di northern island of Hokkaido report recordof  712 new infection on  Thursday as di western prefecture of Hiroshima also see record of 219 new cases for Wednesday. 
As di infection dey grow make Hiroshima and Okayama cancel torch relay wey suppose apun for nest week for dem public road dem.
International Olympic Committee President, Thomas Bach, suppose to participate for di torch relay event in Hiroshima on May 17.
However, local organizer dem tok say dem don postpone Bach travel to Japan before di games.
Di postpone na as di goment take extend di state of emergency inside Tokyo plus three oda prefectures dem until until di end of May, and dem add two more regions wey be Aichi, Fukuoka for inside di measure.
Di goment declare di state of emergency for di four prefectures dem for inside April, dem request make bar and restaurant stop to dey serve alchohol and make dem no dye offer karaoke service again.
Experts dem don give warning of say variants wey dey more contagious fit spread quick, especially as dem dey take roll coronavirus vaccine dey very slowsince dem launch am for mid-February.
Only one per cent of Japan's
Dem don vaccinate 125 million of pipo fully.
Farmers go benefit from mechanised farm for inside Jigawa
Di Malam Alu Agro Allied Company, wey be farm wey dey on top 100-hectare of land inside Faru village, along Maiduguri road, Birnin Kudu Local Government Area of Jigawa State, don dey change di prception inside mechanised farming for Nigeria, di GM for di Mansur Dau Aliyu tok.
As dem take establish di farm almost five years ago, as we gather, na direct response to di call by di administration of President Muhammadu Buhari tok say make Nigeria return to agriculture as di mainstay of di economy for inside di nation, pass as dem dey rely on top iol as di source of revenue for inside di kontri.
Each cattle get nomba tag wey dem attach to am for ear.
Founder for di company, Farouk Adamu Aliyu, wey be former member for inside House of Representative key into am, di GGM add. 
We dey do greenhouse farming.
We get 10,000 square-metre wey be fully automated soilles greenhouse, wia we dey produce tomato.
