We also get two 250 square-metre greenhouses wia we dey produce oda greenhouse vegetable dem, plus anoda 500 square-metre greenhouse, wey we dey use as nursery.
Dis greenhouse dem na all dey foreign-oriented, wey we don install to take produce variety of vegetable. 
Na only tomato wey dey produce for di 10,000 square automated soilless greenhousedem; and we produce an average of 10 to 11 ton of tomato evri week.
We be get anoda 10,000 square-metre locally fabricated greenhouse.
We also get livestock section, wia we get over 300 herds of cattle, some camel, goat and sheep, as e take tok am.
Daily Trust hear say di farm also get fishery unit, with about 50,000 fish inside di pond. 
Similarly, one forty-ton per hour fertilizer blending plant wey dem install for early part of di year, as we take hear, don dey produce reach 300 loads of NPK fertilizer under di Presidential Fertilizer Initiative.
We don import equipment wey fit install 120,000 capacity for poultry system.
We hope say we go dey produce reach between 3,000-4,000 crates of egg for inside one day, as Mansur take tok.
He tok say di farm, also get plant wia dem dey do diary, wey dey produce 2,000 litres of milk inside one day, he add say dem also get about 150-200 hectres of land elsewia wey dem leave for open field farming plus cultivation of rice and oda crops dem.
Masur tok say major pipo wey dey buy di tomato na premium customers, notably, big big hotel for inside Abuja and Lagos, plus some oda location.
He confirm, however, say di main market for di product na mainly inside eastern part of di kontri like Enugu, Onitsha, Owerri.
However, he admit say apart from di small customers dem wey dem get for Kano, dem no too dey see dem tomato product for local market fpr some kind reason.
First na di fact say di tomato wey dem produce form dem farm na special specie and di second reason be di fact say Jigawa na major area wey dem for dey produce tomato.
You know say tomato na common product for here, so ouw price high small pass wetin dey open market.
So, essentially, pipo no actually dye look awa side, dem dey fell apprehensive wit wetin we get bikos dem believe say e dey cost.
And when you get product wey dey available for evriwia, e sure say pipo go buy di one wey cheap pass.
Na one farm hand dey feed di fish dem.
As dem ask about di average lifespan of dem tomato product, he tok say, if you give di tomato evritin wey e take, i mean say nutrional supplement wey you take feed am as e dey grow, if you give am all of dis things dem, di tomato fit last reach three weeks afta harvest.
But even without am, e go last for minimum of one week, no be for refrigeration, and no be for inside presure and plenty heat.
You fit put am on top table wia better ventilation dey.
E fit last for average of 10 days, but if dem provide evritin as e take require (evri nutrient) e fit last reach one month.
We don experiment am, but then, e no dey apun as you dey always want.
Di farm na source of employment for pipo wey reach 200 inside di village wia dem locate am.
He also tok say di company get some pipo to kom train di youth for di araea on information technology skil dem.
He tok further say most of di equipment wey dem use for di farm na from Turkey, except di fertilizer-blending machine, wey dem import from China.
He tok say even di farming method na like as e be for Turkey, bikos dem get Turkish partner wey dey help dem to maintain di standard, but quickly he add say di company dey conscious to allow Nigeria pipo to dey run di tachnical aspect of im operation.
As e dey reflect on top di effect of COVID-19 on top di operation of di company, Mansur tok say, Malam Alu, as oda corporate entities for di kontri, suffer from devastating effect of di virus. 
For Mansur, youth for Nigeria no get excuse to remain unemployed with di kind opportunity wey agriculture dey provide, e note say di pipo wey dey lokk for white-collar job make dem adjust to di reality and go back to agriculture.
He believe say Nigeria don dey do wetin im suppose to done do long time before, e note say if di kontri don take dis step, dem for don corner di present economic wahala.
2023: Lawmaker to seek better deal for Southern Kaduna 
Di member wey dey represent Jaba Constituency for di State House of Assembly for inside Kaduna, wey be Samson Monday Dikko, he call on better pipo to kom togeda and map out strategies wey go salvage Southern Kaduna Senatorial District and dem pipo for 2023.
As e tok afta one meeting wit stakeholders for Kagoro, Kaura Local Government Area for Kaduna State for di weekend, Dikko, wey dey aspire to be senator for inside di Peoples Democratic party (PDP), tok say di pipo wey suppose care for Southern Kaduna pipo don abandon dem.
Na di time for di entire Southern Kaduna pipo to get am right.
We need to transform awa region and improve security, education, health, agriculture, economy, employment and empowerment for di teeming youth and we go do am wit non-governmnetal organization wey get name, as e take add.
Di Director-General of di Campaign Organisation for Dikko, wey be Timothy Chindo Kwassam, tok say di destiny of di pipo of Kaduna South Senatorial District go deu dem own hand if Dikko represent dem for inside senate for 2023.
For evrithing wey dey under di sun, e get reason.
So as Dikko dey kom for dis critical period of time no be ordinary coincidence, but na divine play from God to take liberate di region from evrithing wey dey hinder am from growing and to compete with oda region dem, na so Kwassam tok. 
3 Africa pesin, no Nigeria pesin dey among, as City, Chelsea dey contest UEFA Champions League final
No doubt say football fans dem for inside Nigeria dey wait eagerly for di 2020/2021 UEFA Champions League finals wey go apun tonight wey two English clubs dem Manchester City and Chelsea go contest for inside di Estadio do Dragao, Porto in Portugal.
With view of di fact say UEFA Champions League na one of di biggest football competition only next to FIFA World Cup and di Olympic football event, level of expectation don dey increase as giant for inside English Premier League don dey set to fight for di di prestigious diadem.
As Manchestre City neva win Champions league title before, chelsea win dem first and only title for 2012.
Therefore, even as football pundits dem don tip City wey just win premiership number seven to win dis night, Chelsea go enter into di contest wit betta credentials.
Dem be former chsmpion.
However, as Thomas Tuchel wey dey lead technical crew for inside Chelsea neva win Champions league, im opponent for inside Manchester City dugout, Pep Guardiola don win am two times.
He win am with Barcelona for 2009 and for 2010.
Therefore, plenty dey to expect from di actors dem wey go komot enter di field for Estadio.
do Dragao for Porto and di men dem wey go take charge of di technical area. 
Interestingly, even as both contestants get only three African players in Riyad Mahrez (Algeria, Manchester City), Hakim Ziyech (Morococo, Chelsea) and Edourad Menday ( 
Senegal, Chelsea) di interest of Africa for di final don drop. 
For Nigeria here, wia Chelsea and Manchester City dey enjoy plenty followers dem from passionate football fans dem, expection don dey cause fever, and e don lead to interestin realignment.
Fans of di oda clubus wey dem don komot for oda stages of di Champions League do re-align demselve with either Chelsea or Manchester City as dem interest take dey diverse reach.
Di consequence be say di final na one of di topic wey dem dey tok pass for inside sports at di moment and fans of di premiereship club don kontinu to dey predict as di finalresult fit be.
However, as be like say almost evribodi don dey wait to savour the football artistry wey dem fit display, some pundits dem dey as nomba of African players for di final of di biggest football competition for earth don dey reduce.
If we follow history for inside UEFA Champions League, na only 24 African footballer dem don contest and win di trophy with dem European clubs.
E sad say African football  legends like Liberia's George Weah wey dem vote as World Footballer of di year for 1995,
Rashidi Yekini of Nigeria, Mohamed Aboutrika of Egypt, Roger Mila of Cameroon, Jay-Jay Okocha, Sunday Oliseh, Taribo West and Victor Ikpeba of Nigeria, Rigobert Song of Cameroon and Hassam Hassan of Egypt no win Champions League as dem sabi ball reach.
Although Mo Salah (Egypt), Sadio Mane (Senegal), Joel Matip (Cameroon) and Naby Keita (Guinea) dey di big stage when Liverpool be win dem 6th UEFa Champions league title for 2019, di first African wey win di trophy na Bruce Grobbelaar of Zimbabwe.
He achieve di feat with Liverpool for 1984.
Na Algerian legend Rabah Madjer wey win am with FC Porto for 1987 and Abedi Pele (Ghana) for 1993 with Olympique Marseille follow am, before Nigeria 
duo of George Findi and Nwankwo Kanu lift am  with Ajax Amsterdam for 1995.
E also dey record say na Geremi Njitap of Cameroon be di first African to win di title twice in 2000 and 2002 with Spanish giants Real Madrid, Samuel Eto'o of Cameroon kom win am three times with Barcelona 2006, 2009 and 2010 with Inter Milan.
Oda African wey don win di highky coveted trophy na Ibrahim Tanko (Ghana)
Borussia Dortmund 1997, Samuel Kuffour (Ghana) Bayern Munich 2001, Benni McCarthy (South Africa) FC Porto 2004, Djimi Traore (Mali 
) Liverpool 2005, Yaya Toure (Cote d'Ivoire)
Barcelona 2009 & 2011, Seydou Keita (Mali) Barcelona 2009 & 2011, Sully Muntari (Ghana)
Inter Milan 2010 and McDonald Mariga (Kenya) 2010.
John Mikel Obi (Nigeria), Michael Essien (Ghana), Salomon Kalou (Cote d'Ivoire), Didier Drogba (Cote d'Ivoire) wey win am with Chelsea for 2012 and Achraf Hakimi (Morocco), with Real Madrid 2018 complete di list of Africans wey don win di UEFA Champions League.
To come close to home, di last time wey Nigeria pesin win di trophy na 2012 when Mikel Obi dey among AFricans wey lift di trophy with Chelsea at di expense of Bayern Munich.
Afta dat achievement by di former captain of Super Eagles, Nigeria do see oda talented players dem rise, like Ahmed Musa, Wilfred Ndidi, Kelechi Iheanacho, Alex Iwobi, William Troost-Ekong, Leon Balogun, Ola Aina, Isaac Success, Chigozie Awaziem, Tyrone Ebuehi, Moses Simon and lately Victor Osimhen
But none of dem don feature for di final of biggest club competition for Europe.
Di reason no dey clear.
Na di di top five club for Europe Real Madrid, Bayern Munich, Barcelona, Manchester United and Liverpool dominate di competition.
Unfortunately, Nigeria players dem don fail to enter highly rated clubs dem for Europe.
Na hope of Nigeria football stakeholder say very soon di new generation of players dem go break barrier and begin to play for clubs wey get potential to win di UEFA Champions League.
If dis one fail, den di football fans wey dey for Nigeria go kontinu to dey live with di agony of watchin finakls of di UEFA Champion League dey kom and dey go, without di presence of any Nigeria player.
As Nigeria pipo dey wait for di next Super Eagle player wey go rise to di top of di European club competition di way Find George, Nwankwo Kanu do am with Ajax for 1995 and Mikel Obi for 2012, na few hours remain for di 2021 all English clubs final.
For di end, victory go dey for di Manchester club wey dey hunt for dem first title ot di Londeners wey dey prime for di second itle and di football league wey dem dey watch pass for di world, Premiership go be ultimate winner.
Eyimba don force FC IfeanyiUbah to 2-2 draw for di Oriental derby
Enyimba FC be kom from behind to secure one 2- draw wey dem deserve for dem week 14 fixture wey dem reschedule against oriental broda dem FC IfeanyiUbah for di Aba international stadium,
Di orietal derby see say Eyimba make three changes to di team wey loss for Rivers United on Sunday.
Sadiq Abubakar be return afta weeks wey dem don lay am off while Anthony Omaka and Victor Mbaoma enter di starting line up again.
Di first 28 minutes of di game see as both sides dem dey try to hit first but na di visitin side draw first blood through Saidu Adamu wey pokee am home from close range afta Uche Onuoha be head Evans Ogbonda cross go meet am.
As di away side get full kontrol of di game, dem get more confidence and dat one leave di host to dey scramble to get back into di game as di first end for 1-0 in favour of di visitors.
As dem restart di second half, IfeanyiUbah kontinu to dey press for di second goal and dem get di reward wey dem deserve when Saidu Adamu get im brace afta im get Awazie square pass over di line for di 61st minute.
As di second goal sting dem to life, Eyimba begin throw evrithing for dem arsenal to get back inside di game.
For inside di 78th minute, dem presence pay off as Reuben Bala reduce di deficit for Eyimba for one lucky fashion.
Na Sharp Uzoigwe keep out im initial header but di ball roll back to am and ovr di line.
Di goal be give Eyimba some hope as dem kontinu to press for plunty nomba to secure a point at least
And dem get dis for 90th minute through Imot Obot.
Following dis result, Eyimba don move up to 5th position with 31 points from 17 games with two more outstandin matches dem. 
Meanwhile, FC IfeanyiUbah still dey inside relegation zone as dem get 17 points inside 19 games.
Farmers dem dey apprehensive as planting season begin with erratic rain dem
As wet season don begin for most part of di season, farmer don begin palntin with fear as rain dey erratic and e fit threaten production.
Rain dey unsatble for Benue, Nasarawa, Niger, Kaduna and part of di Federal Capital Territory (FCT), and plenty farmer dem don plant dem crop.
For di 2019/2020 wet season, erratic rain for di north and mid-season draught for di south-west make farmers dem loss money due to crop failure.
Musa Yohana and Halima Thomas, farmers for  inside  Doma and Lafia, Nasarawa State, tok say dem don plant maize, groundnut plus oda crops dem like casava and yam but fear say dem fit get anoda horrible experience like last season when dem dey forced to plant maize and groundnut two times.
I loss my yam last year due to heat wey dey too much bikos rain no fall welwel.
Dis year, we don dey second week for May but rain neva dey fall welwel.
And I don already plant 15 measure (about 20kg) of groundnut.
If e kontinu like dis for anoda one week, I fit loss all di seed dem, as Mr Yohana take tok.
Like dem, plenty farmer around di FCT don plant too, but dem get big fear for crop failure as experience last year.
For Benue state, For Benue state, awa correspondent reprot say farmer don begin to cultivate land and plant crop on top complain say rain no fall.
Some farmer wey don prepare dem farm earlier in di tear tok say dem no fit begin to dey plant until one week ago, as odas dem just begin to clear land at di wake of di rainfall three times withing two weeks wey pass.
One farmer for Otukpo, Ada hyacinth, tok say di ground still dey too strong to cultivate bikos di rain no dey fall frequent.
Anoda farmer wey be Felix Tor, for Makurdi tok say im just plant melon and maize on di farm wey im just clear despite as rain no dey consistent.
Tor be however express fear say di nature of di rainfall fit affect di well-being of di crop.
He pray make di yield do better in di end.
But Vitalis Tarnongu, we don dey clear im 1,000 hectares of farmland for di federal Unversity of Agriculture, inside Makurdi (FUAM), tok say as di rain dey fall dis year go make am begin to plant maize towards di end of May.
Tarnongu tok say one plant breeder for inside University don advise am to wait until May 20 to start to dey plant im maize bikos di nature of di rainfall since di season don suggest say e possible make rain no fall for two weeks.
Di sate chairman of di All Farmers Association of Nigeria (AFAN), Aondongu Saaku, describe farmin as business wey worth make dem take risk on.
Saaku tok say farmers wey dey see am as business don take di risk to plent dia crop already bikos without dat kind risk dem no go reap at di end of di day.
Meanwhile, Dr Teryima Iorlamen, wey be seed system specialist for FUAm, tok say farmers dem fit go ahead to plant dem root and tuber crops as e follow di prediction of rainfall wey NIMET make dis year.
Iorlamen tok say di period wey dem expect say farmers dem go wait don pass, e stress say di prediction of NIMET on top rainfall pattern inside Benue State, which dem (experts) dey work wit, don indicate say rain go stabilise for di state between April 18 and April 30, 2021.
We fit assure farmers now say rain don stabilise, accordin to prediction wey NIMET make.
Anything wey different for now go be dry spell.
I don advise farmers dem to check water logging capacity for inside dem field so dem go fit plant dem crops as dem suppose plant am.
Rice like plenty water, so time neva reach to plant am.
But farmers dem fit enter root and tuber now, dat one include yam, cassava, maize and melon.
We believe say di rain don stabilise.
Senate dey mourn late Army Chief, Ahmed Gulak
Di Senate, on Tueday, be hold one minute silence to take honour di demise of former presidential aide, Ahmed Gulak, wey dem kill with strong eye on sunday for Owerri, Imo state capital.
Dis one follow motion of  Deputy Senate President and chairman of di senate on top senate Constitution review Committee, Ovie Omo-Agege, for di floor of di Red Chamber.
Omo-Agege be draw attention of im colleagues dem to di kill wey dem kill Gulak, wey di lawmaker dem hire to assist im committee on top di amendment wey Nigeria pipo one do for inside di constitution.
Gulak be serve as consultant to di committee and e enter Owerri for di public hearin on top di review of di 199 constitution.
Though di programme be don  end on Thursday, Gulak stay behind and komot on Sunday. 
Dem kill am as e dey go airport for Owerri  on im way to Abuja.
Omo-Agege described Gulak as Nigerian wey no dey do tribal something, wey give im best to di service of di kontri. 
Also, on Tuesday, di Senate be urge federal goment to immortalise di late Chief of Army Staff, Lt. Gen. Ibrahim Attahiru.
Di red chamber be also observe one minute silence to take honuor Lt. Gen. Attahiru, wey die for plane crash near Kaduna International Airport.
Dis one follow point of order by di Chairman, Senate Committee on to Army matter, Senator Ali Ndume.
NIN/profile code: NANS don raise voice concerning disenfranchisement of students by JAMB
Di Kaduna State Chapter of di National Association of Nigerian Students (NANS) for Tuesday tok say thousands of candidates no go take part for di Joint Admission and Matriculation Board (JAMB) dis year
examination on top  hitches for dem  NIN/Profile code. 
NANS chairman for inside di stste, Axiz Huziafa Bello, for inside one statement weu dem issue  yesterday for Kaduna be disagree with di JAMB.
Bello be call for extension of di electronic registration instead of as dem dey risk di life of students dem to travel to di headquarter of JAMB for dem states for manual registration.
He note say di news bulletin wey dem release on Monday wit di title Issues surrounding the 2021 UTME registration: Option available for genuine candidates who made attempts but could not register, show say di management don fail to show sorry face for di hardship and agony wey di candidates dem dey face.
 He appeal give prominent Nigeria pipo to prevail on top di management of JAMB to stop to make things hard for students dem inside Nigeria as dem dey try to get higher education and develop demsef.
He urge di examination bodi to extend di registration period and postpone di exam to do justice and fairness.
Police don arrest 16 pipo as suspect for cultism matter for Enugu, dem recover firearms
DI police command for Enugu state don arrest 16 suspect dem withing two weeks, one female sef dey there, for cultism and say dem get firearms wey dem no suppose get.
Di command be also recovertwo cut-to-size locally-made guns,one locally-made pistol, two live cartridges, six mobile phones, on powder subsatnce wey dem suspect say na heroin and weed wey dem suspect say na Indian Hemp.
Di Public Relations Officer for di Command, ASP Daniel Ndukwe, tok am inside one statement wey dem carry give di News Agency of Nigeria (NAN)  inside Enugu on sunday.
Ndukwe tok say na joint operation wey police of di 9th Mile Police Division dem carry out make dem achieve di feat, Anti-Cult Unit and personnel of di Nigerian Army, 82 Division for Enugu.
He tok say di joint operation be take place between April 19 and may 4, and e stretch hand reach council area for inside di state.
dem included: Cornelius Uche, 31; Ifeanyi Umeneze, 22; Chijioke Anachuna, 34; Chibuzor Umeayo, 28; Chinedu Okeke, 23; Ozinachi Obadike, 22; Ifeanyi Nwagbo, 27; Chigozie Okeke, 18, and Chikamso Odinwankpa, 18; dem arrest all of dem. 
Dem arrest dem for May 4 withing Ezeagu Local Goment Area afta dem do plenty bloody cult clash dem.
Oda dem included: Ozor Chidubem, 22; Amina Inalegwu (female), 18; Benard Bright, 20; Ugwu Chidera, 21; Ani Chukwuebuka, 23; and Onoh Obumneme, 20; wey dem arrest on April 19 at about 3:30 a.m.
Dem arrest dem along Enugu-Makurdi Expressway, 9th Mile, Udi L.G.A. as dem wan go plan one bad cult activity, according to wetin preliminary investigate don show.
Anoda of di suspect, one Uchenna Aniagozie, 28, wey dem arrest on April 28  say im involve for one deadly cult clash sometime wey don pass for January.
He tok say preliminary investigation don show say all of dem confess say dem be member for inside Vikings Confraternity.
Di toktok pesin for police tok say dem go prosecute di suspect dem as dem suppose do am once di investigation wey dem dey do don conclude.
To dis end, dem don call upon residents for di state to dey follow wetin law tok, make dem dey vigilant and make dem report suspect quick quick for police station wey near pass.
He add say residents dem fit call di Command emergency hotlines on top 08032003702, 08075390883, 08086671202 or 08098880172.
How cassava don dey  is become gold inside Benue 
For inside Benue State, farmers don dey expand dem fields almos evri season to take increase production as cassava farin don bikom better business for inside di three senatorial district dem.
Although na di state dem know as state wey dey produce and chop yam pass for inside di kontri, cassava don dey reign gradually.  
As such, dem tok say more farmers dem don dey plant cassava.
One cassava farmer for di Gboko area of di stste, Titus Atondo, tok say he begin to plant di crop for many years now.
Atondo tok say cassava farming no dey too get plenty challenge bikos farmers only need to spray di farm once to repel weed, den dem go wait for harvest.
Cassava chips don dey very expensive now.
I get large cassava farm wia I dey make money and my family sef dey chop some of di produce, as e take tok am.
 Faith Ben don dey prepare large land for inside di Ugboju area of Otukpo Local Goment Area to take cultivate cassava as soon as rain start to fall, dis one na as dem dey demand for di product welwel for her vicinity.
Di demand for cassava dey high welwel nowadays.
From di tubers go enter di di one wey dem don process, e don bikom crop wey dey bring money.
Na y I dey enter di farming be dat.
She add say na for business alone she dey do am.
For im own part, di stste chairman of di All Farmers Association of Nigeria (AFAN), Aondongu Saaku, admit say dem don dey chop cassava for di state pass yam sef.
Saaku tok dis one bikos dem dey chop cassava for many variety, unlike yam.
Meanwhile, di Director  of Agric Science for di Ministry of Agriculture and Natural Resources, Thomas Unongo, explain say cassava farming don dey do well for di state in recent times bikos no aspekt for di crop dey wasted.
Unongo wey get farm wey be three and  half hectres for Apir, Makurdi tok say for di past two years, im don dey cultivate di land with new varieties of cassava wey di International Institute of Tropical Agriculture (IITA) dem release.
Apart from say dem dey kontrol weed, na one of di crops wey cheap pass to grow.
To produce rice dey cost between N200,000 and N300,000 for one hectare, as yam dey cost between N150,000 and N200,00 per hectare, but input for cassava production with stems for farmer dey only cost N150,000.
And wia dem get light vegetation, e fit low reach N100,000.
He tok say e dey chaep and di output/return on top investment na one of di highest for Benue now.
Unongo further note say  di challenge of farming cassava for di state dey on top  insecurity as herders attack dey worse. 
He allege say herders dem dey komot di stem and tuber for dem cattle.
However, he advise say to get better yield, pesin go need to apply weed kontrol three months afta dem palnt am, e stress say wen dem allow weed to grow for insie di farm, dem dey invite pest like grasshoppers dem.
He tok say inputs like fertlizer, herbicides dem, among oda things dey necessary, he add say need dey to dey do farm sanitation, wey go help against attack of rodents dem.
Unongo maintain say as d old variety of cassava go last reach two years before harvest, with one year maturity, di new improved varieties get maturity period of five and seven months, but na eight month better pass for harvest.
Cassava farming don dey turn to gold for inside Benue bikos di state dey near to north, wia dem no dey produce di crop.
Also, the produce, especially garri, don dey cost more bikos  vendors dem don dey  evriwia for villages dem mopping up di chips wey dem desire to sell go Northern market, as he take note am.
Begin agric revolution now, na wetin Bode George and Gen Olanrewaju tell Sanwo-Olu
Prominent indigene for Lagos under di name of Eko Pataki don ask Governor Babajide Sanwo-Olu to begin to revolution for agriculture inside di state.
Di indigene dem make dis call against as di recent decision to take block supply of food to di south by di Amalgamated Union of Food Stuff and Cattle Dealers in Nigeria (AUFCDN).
As dem dey raect on top di development yesterday, di group tok say need dey for goment to redirect dem policy towards to broad agriculture investment in order to help food surficiency for di state. 
Dis one dey inside joint statement by di leader of di group Chief Bode George, and its trustees, Gen Tajudeen Olanrewaju and Mr Gbadebo Dallas.
Di group cahrge di governor to engage di plenty youth wey no get employment for di state to take drive di agricultural revolution.
Part of di statement read say: di recent action of di Amalgamated Union of Food Stuff and Cattle Dealers in Nigeria wey no allow trailers dem to bring tomatoes, pepper, onions and all kind o foodstuff enter south suppose wake di leadership of lagos State to redirect dem policies to take widen dem investment for inside agriculture. 
Lagos State wey be awa foremost concern as Eko Pataki make dem begin impress into immediate duty for huge workforce of di youth wey no get employement for inside di IBILE traditional enclave, as dem dey turn awa vast and enriched land into agricultural holding.
From Ifako-Ijaiye to Imota, from Epe to di rolling fields to di mangroves of Badagry, Lagos State dey blessed wit agricultural fields wey get nutrient wey fit quickly turn to farmland wia different kind of crop like  tomatoes, lettuce, pepper, beans, rice, corn, yam, potatoes, cassava go reach many odas wey dem fit plant to take enhance awa sef-sufficiency for food production.
Na awa candid advise to Governor Sanwo-Olu to quickly re-order di state priority to take make sure say awa state bikom di new food basket for di kontri to thereby trigger new agricultural revolution for inside di state of excellence.
China wan raise di proportion of middle-income earners
Di consumption of China don dey continue to rise for recent years, and dem dey optimise im conumption structure.
Last year, di total retail sales of consumer goods for inside di kontri  reach 39.2 trillion yuan ($6 trillion), and final consumption be contribute 54.3 per cent to di GDP of China. 
DI result na say China still be di second-largest consumption market for di world.
New business like online shopping and influencer marketing don experience rapid development.
For 2020, dem show over 24 million levestream on top e-commerce platforms, online sales of national entity becked di trend and grow reach 14.8 per cent. di express delivery industry handle 31.2 per cent more parcels dan last year.
China don turn largest market for online retailing for eight years straight.
Di robust recovery of China's consumption, despite di severe impact of COVID-19 don show di strong resilience and huge development potential of di Chinese market.
As major force for consumption, na pillar di middle-income group be for di economy.
For present, China get 400 million middle-income earner dem wey dey account for around 30 per cent of dem population.
For kontri dem wey don develop, di distribution of household income dey always come for olive shape form wey dey sharp for di two end and e plump for di middle. 
For oda words, for kontri wey don develop di middle-income group dey usually accpount for 60 per cent go reach 70 percent of di population.
Dem dey consider dat kind structure as say dem dey healthy and good for economic and social development.
In contrast, China way still far to take expand di size of im middle-income group.
Vice-Minister of Commerce Qian Keming tok say with 1.4 billion pipo, China get large market and huge development potential.
For di next fifteen years, dem expect say make di nomba of Chinese middle-income don reach 800 million, wey go generate robust momentum for consumption upgrading plus bright prospects.
According to di 14th Five-Year Plan of China, China go work to increase di income for graduates of universeties dem and vocational schools, skiled workers and migrants workers dem for di next five years.
Experts dem believe say e dey possible and necessary to put dem for di middle-income group.
Graduates of university and vocational school dem  plenty and are dey well  educated and get skil, wey make am possible for dem to  become middle-income earners. 
Most pipo for dis group, with dem degree of education and competence no go wan do simple and repetive work, so e dey possible say make dem bikom middle-income earners, Su Hainan, wey be contract research fellow with China Association for Labor Studies, tell People's Daily during one interview.
According to di latest statistics from di Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security (MOHRSS), China get over 200 million skiled workers wey take 26 per cent of dem total job, up from 20 per cent few years ago.
More dan 50 million of dem be skiled worker.
For recent years, skiled workers no reach for China, and dem income don kontinu to det rise.
Di MOHRSS issue one guideline recently, wey dem encourage enterprises to institute annual salary system and offer special award for skiled talents, esecially di ones wey get high skil.
Su tok say migrant workers na major part of workforce for inside China, many of dem sef dey well educated and dem get skil, and dem no dey able to do complicated and innovative works dem.
Last year, di nomba of migrant worker for inside China reach 280 million, plus 180 wey work out of town.
Di average income wey dem dey get per month stay for 4,072 yuan.
Plenty among dem don dey get close to di threshold of middle income if dem take terms of household calculate am.
To make part of dem imigrant worker to become middle-income earners dey necessary to take marrow di rural-urban income gap, to take improve di competence of workforce and accelerate rural vitalization, and e lso dey feasible to am, as Su take note
As di income of dis major group go rise for future, dem go expand di size di middle-income group for China, dat one go turn di household income distribution to olive shape.  
By dat time, dem go don further actuvate di consumption vitality of China, and di kontri go release more dividends to di world.
Aba dey go agog as Gov Ikpeazu golf tourney don start
Over 25,000 players dem from across Nigeria and West Africa dey try get laurels currently for inside di maiden edition of Governor Okezie Ikpeazu open golf championship wey start on wednesday, May 19 and e go end for May 23 for di famous Aba Golf Course. 
Di Governor wey start di tournament charge di player say make dem enjoy di game plus di hospitality of di pipo.
He tok say make dem find time to take visit major shopping centers dem for Aba to buy memorable things to dem houses.
Di governor be also promise say im go kontinu to dey support di sport and assure say im administration go construct new golf course for Ohafia to help awareness and participation for di game.
He tok say, I pray say golf wey be unifyin game go kontinu to dey unify us for Nigeria and also give di health benefit of engaging for di gentleman game.
For im remark, di National Director of Competitions, Professional Golfers Association of Nigeria (PGAN), Johnbull Dangofa inform Ikpeazu say as im don go round di historic city, di peace ey dey and di good infrastructure wey di governor do please am. 
Di president of Aba sports club,Chief Jerry Kalu don express di appreciation of members to di governor for di support wey di state goment give to take make sure say di take off of di competition smooth. 
He tok say more than 250 golfers don register to take part for inside di tournament.
One letter to DSS and oda intelligence agencies dem
Una suppose dey smart.
I know say na from police you for evolve just as many oda agency dem. 
As you take komot from di police you suppose clean pass dem, make you smart, make you dey quick for your feet.
Shey na politics come over una?
I hear say di National Security Adviser, Monguno, for di first time since dem appoint am years ago, wey he dey sound very eloquent with im Queen's English.
Make dem polish am, afta all im na one of dis ajebutter Nigerian wey get priviledge to attend Kings College back in di day.
From im speech I dey hear and I dey see one mind wey dey organised and intelligent, functional brain, and i wonder why and how Abba Kyari take manage to cage dat kain pesin and Buhari dey look.
Munguno later go on to allege say plenty inside di arms wey Nigeria pay for under di recent military chiefs wey don turn ambassador na im dem no fit find.
When im see say dem don dey ruffle feathers, im try to walk back wetin dem allege say im tok.
Some few days afta dat apun, we hear di news say Buhari be stop some weapon acquisition wey he wan make from Dubai through third parti dem.
Di report put Monguno for bad light and e wan expose im hypocrisy.
Shey we go ever get way to komot for inside dis insecurity maze?
We no longer dey hear from di leadership for inside DSS.
Afta di initial gra-gra and controversy dem don silent.
No one dey hear or dey see Yusuf Bichi anymore, but we dey see smart DSS chaps dem inside dark suits ad goggle wey dey do dem bodiguard service to di high and mighty.
We even dey see dem on top few occasion wey dem go dress like ninja, dem go complete like balaclavas plus some out-of-this-world machine guns dem.
But na there e for end.
E be like say di president no care about di efficacy of DSS and so dem sef don jejely withdraw enter dem cocoon.
Some politics dey go on for there.
Di police, we sabi dem problem; that one don tey.
I  don dey write so I no go draw attention of dis bodi dem kom my side
But well I go dey available for dem attention if dem take am personal.
I dey write as concerned citizen of Nigeria.
I dey fear say intelligence no dey for dis kontri anymore.
I dey prompted to write specifically bikos di nation don drift totally and even as we accuse politician say dem don sleep, no excuse for awa intelligence services dem to dey snore too.
E dey be like say dem don abandon Nigeria for di hand of element like kidnapper, secessionist, fake news agent dem, online terrorist, plus oda form of terrorist.
Who no know say security for di level of intelligence don loss?
wiaas Nigeria don kom disrespect di police, but many still dey fear di intelligence service dem seek of say we dey see dem as elite corps.
At least dem no fit see dem for road dey kolekt money from bus drivers dem.
However, pesin fit confirm say wit di rifeness of crime, di way di society don dey fall apart, di intelligence service don loss dem bite and famed prowess, especially for inside dis goment. 
How one group wey no get face wey dem name FUNAM dey plant dat kind plenty wahala for inside Nigeria society and we get intelligence service wey dey komot eye?
Whoever e be wey dey put statement out for FUNAM dey play small pikin play for inside di mind of Nigeria pipo but even professor dem dey believe dem.
Dis one na bikos, for di end, for dis kontri we dey very emotional.
However, di intelligence service don komot eye as if say dem no see as all dis things dem dey go on.
I google statement by FUNAM so I go fit get some direct quote for dis article and one statement from 2018 pop komot
wiain na dis same FUNAM claim say Nigeria na dem only inheritance and say di whole of Nigeria go reach di Atlantic na dem get am, say Plateau na dem indigenous territory, even as dem dey claim say na dem do some bad bad kilin dem. 
For recent times, di same group claim say na dem attack Benue Governor Ortom, and only dem no see am kill bikos of some kind small error for communication.
Di group further tok am say dem intension no get doubt: TO KILL AM.
Dem go fulfil di mission one day and e go dey very soo too.
Furthermore, we warn pipo wey dey collabo to take work against Fulani pipo for inside Nigeria: WE GO GET YOU NO MATTER WIA YOU HIDE
We tok am clearly, we go confront any state or individual wey dey oppose RUGA
Any State or individual that opposes ranching, we shall get you.
Speak against ranching or RUGA even for internet: awa fighters dem wey no dey make noise go find you and dem go fix you
For di next few month wey go follow, FUNAM go attack some strategic human and material assests for inside states and non state group dem or individual wey we know say dem dey do anti Fulani campaign. We go hunt you down for your house, for your wrk place, inside your car, for your street.
a matter of time.
Pipo sign dis document but dem neva catch any person, and awa intellingence serveice dem neva declare say na fake.
From my own humble perception dis satement dem be like pikin tok, wey pesin wey dey look for wahala, wey wan make pipo vex, wey wan cause disunity write. 
Di statement also take eye away from di real pipo wey dey do di bad.
I be don dey on top plenty WhatsApp group dem wey I dey try to calm pipo down and bring dem attention say dem dey manipulate dem mind.
But why I dey do work wey DSS suppose do?
Even Ortom don call press conference before wia im for read anoda statement wey di group put for online to di extent say Benue state na dem own and dey e dey sweet dem to kill Tiv pipo dem!
Plenty Nigeria pipo don dey hail Ortom say im na governor wey love im pipo on top im public show dem.
However, dem must catch pipo wey attack am. 
We hear say police don catch some fishermen for inside di area.
I don dey careful as dem put evri crime for Nigeria on top herders dem.
Shey no be say we dey give oda criminals dem space to ride on top awa sentiment?
Shey wetin we dey tok be say with all resources dem wey awa intelligence service dem get, pesin no dey wey fit find di pipo wey dey dump things for online, wey dey stew up di mind of Nigerians, wey dey kos wahala evriwia and wey dey get pipo prepare for war or make nation scatter?
Shey na di best wey we fit do be dis gentlemen?
Interview wey Harry-Meghan do: Queen dey sad, as Buckingham Palace take tok am
Queen Elizabeth II don show say she sad concerning di interview wey her grandson, Prince Harry, and im wife Meghan do.
Di Duke and Duchess of Sussex for di interview narrate di conversation wey dey for air about 
how dark Archies
(pikin wey dem just born) skin fit be and how dm no go give di pikin royal title plus police protection.
However, Buckingham palace tok for inside one statement on Tuesday say di palace no dey hapi with di challenge wey di grandson Prince Harry and im wife Meghan dey face, and dem go take di allegation of racism for di royal family seriously.
Di whole family no hapi to hear di full extent of how challenging things don dey for Harry and Meghan for di last two years.
Di issues dem wey dem raise, especially di one wey concern race, dem conmcern di palace, as di palace tok for inside one statement wey dem release on Queen behalf.
While some kind recollection dem fit vary, dem atke all of dem very serious and di family go chook eye put for private.
Harry, Meghan and Arcie go always be family member wey we love very much.
E pass 12 million viewers wey view di British broadcast of di interview wey Oprah Winfrey do with Meghan na d Prince Harry on top monday.
Di interview be also attract 54 percent share for di television audience as at dat time.
Hearn tok say Fury vs Joshua got apun for inside Saudi Arabia for August
Saudi Arabia go host di world heavyweight boxing title unification fight between Tyson Fury and Anthony Joshua for August, as promoter Eddie haern tok am on Tuesday.
Joshua dey hold di IBF, WBO, WBA, and IBO title dem as fellow British pesin Fury na holder of di WBC belt. 
Na August seventh, August fourteen.
I thingk say no be secret say na for Saudi Arabia di fight go apun, as Hearn tell Sky Sports television.
Na di same pipo wey we follow deal for Andy Ruiz, di event dey spectacular.
As partner dem do fantastic as well, he added. 
Joshua be win im belt back from Joshua won back his belts from Mexican-American Andy Ruiz Jr for Diriyah, for di  outskirts of  Saudi capital Riyadh, for December 2019.
(II) Why secession no be di silver bullet to di problem wey Nigeria get (II)
Di pipo wey dey do say make Nigeria break up put am on top three main reason dem; di amalgation of northern and southern protectorate for 1914 wey born Nigeria, di charter of sef determination for inside United Nation plus lack of representation and marginalisation for inside di affairs of di kontri.
The mind say na di amalgamation of 1914 wey secessionist group dey say be di foundamental move wey cause plenty inside di current challenge dem wey dey face Nigeria need make dem challenge welwel and debunk am totally.
For dis regard, e go benefit us to know say amalgation be don apun earlier for 1906 wia dem merge di Lagos colony wey don dey since 1862 wit southern protectorate.
Like di 1914 amalgamation wey follow wey dey enervate di secession pipo dem, di amalgamation wey apun for 1906 too na force dem take do am between entity dem wey no dey willing and dem get little or no cultural similarity.
Wetin di pipo of costal state for inside Niger Delta region get culturally and historically wit Yoruba pipo of southwest?
Wetin be di historical and cultural link wey di Igbo wey dey for east hinterland get wit Yoruba for dat matter?
 As far as we fit see am, di reason to take reject di amalgamation of 1914 go reach for di one of 1906 on top say na force dem force di two against pipo wey get different history and culture.
Why secession pipo dey only tok about di 1914 amalgamation to take press dem demand and dem dey neglect di one wey apun for 1906?
Di reason dem dey simple bikos for dem own narrow political tok wey dey try justify North vs South secessionist agenda na di 1914 amalgamation enter am pass.
E no go form beta strategy if dem dey also tok about di amalgamation wey dey essential, by import and effect, and e dey similar to di one wey apun for 1914.
How e go take look for instance if Oduduwa secessionist tok say na bikos of si amalgamation for 1906 di Igbo wey get different history and culture don kom dominate di economic and commercial life inside Lagos and as such di Oduduwa dey seek to komot for di marriage with Igbo wey di British pipo be force on top dem.
or di Igbo dey say na di amalgamation of 1906 kos the bad nature of economic infrastructure wey dem concentrate put for Southwest wey dey carry dem (Igbo) kom invest for Lagos economic zone rather than di East wey go dey convienient pass?
Anoda falacy wey dem carry concerning di 1914 amalgamation be wey Nigerian entity dem represent sign be say e supoose expire afta hundred years wey mean say na 2014.
Say Nigeria still dey exist afta im expiry date na somethingg wey secessionist dem still dey try to instigate oda Nigeria pipo against and make sure say dem end of dis joinjoin wey don expire as dem dey call am.
Again dis one na near tok wey no get leg.
By 1914 di British don get full and total kontrol of di territory wey we dey cal Nigeria now and all di entities as dem be don dey under British rule.
Dem don establish di British colonial rule on top Nigeria and na dat one make di amalgamation pure administrative measure by colonial overload wey im no need permision from im subject to carry am out.
For this regard di amalgamation no fit get time to expire as dem dey claim, and e no get.
If time ever dey for di amalgamation to take expire as dem dey claim, e suppose be for di end di British colonial enterprise wey be say at di same time no be British go determine am.
If any genuine document dey wey carry di terms and condition of di 1914 amalgamation wey include pipo wey represent various pre-existing Nigerian entities plus clause wey dey state di clause for di expiry, na di work od di pipo wey dey pray for Nigeria to break up to present am as proof.
For any case, even if such document dey, as Nigeria take get independence for 1960 e no go dey valid again bikos na evri entity for Nigeria dey take part wit di representative wey dem elect to take discuss and agree on top di new kontri.
If di kind agreement wey dem dey carry about di amalgamation dey anywia and if di parti dem wey follow tok about di independence agree to retain am and dem include am inside di independence constitution, e for don bikom relevant constitution and legal case for di secession entity to take cite dem agitation.  
On top di issue of di UN provision on sef-determination as dem take cite am for dem secession action, e dey important make dem get two important point for mind.
Di UN no be world goment wey get executive power to take stamp dem will on top national goment dem.
Kontri fit use di principle of sovereignty to take block any resolution wey UN make if dem see say e no follow dem national interest.
Although Nigeria follow sign to di UN charter wey di provision of sef-determination follow, e fit and dem get right to block attempt from any group withing wey wan break di kontri if dem use dat provision.
Thus even as e dey unlike say any group break away from Nigeria and UN support am, Nigeria fit use dem sovereign right to stand against such move.
But di thing wey dey more significant be say although di UN charter dey providde sef detrmination, di UN don place great onus to take seek dem credential and case comprehensively.
Di process to take ssek and to eventually get di support of UN for sef-determination bid dey very complicated and covoluted one wey fit take year to set and e still fit no get success at di end.
Those seeking to invoke di UN principle of sef-determination for dia secessionist bid must first of all prove say dem get di mandate of di pipo of di area dey seek to represent through popular elections or referendum and not through di media or internet. Di pipo wey dey try to evoke UN principle of sef-determination for dem secessionst bid must firts prove say dem dey do wetin pipo for di area wey dem dey represent want wit popular election or referendum no be through media or internet. 
Dem must to show proof say di area wey want do secession dem don dey deny dem or say dem no get adequate representation for local, state and national level of di goment of di kontri.
We go conclude am next week
Lebanon don start dem COVID-19 vaccination drive, PM tok say im go wait for im turn.
Lebanon be start dem COVID-19 vaccination drive for Sunday as dem take inoculate di head for critical care unit for dem public hospital wey big pass, na di 93-year old Lebanese actor plus comedian wey pipo celebrate Salah Tizani follow am.
As dem dey fight rise of infection for recent weeks wey pass wey don pass di power of dem healthcare system, Lebanon kolekt 28,500 doses of di Pfizer-BioNTech vaccine on Saturday,na di first set inside 2.1 million dose wey go dey kom stage by stage throughout di tear.
Di delay to take sign deal to buy vaccine and di to take rollout inoculation program don cause fraustration inside Lebanon.
Di World Bank, wey help wit money to buy di first batch of doses, don tok say dem go monitor as dem dey do di inoculation drive to ensure di shot go reach pipo wey need am pass.
I no dey kolekt vaccine today bikos today no be my turn and di priority na for di medical sector wey don do dem duty and present big sacrifice,
Hassa Diab wey be caretaker Prime Minister tell reporters dem for inside di Rafik Hariri hospital wia dem for put di first coronavirus case inside Lebanon for quarantine about one year ago. 
Tizani, wey dem sabi pass with im stage name Abou Salim, encourage evri pesin to go get di vaccine.
For pipo wey dey fear to kolekt di vaccine, I swear on top God, na protection for dem, as e tok.
Di kontri don also book 2.7 million dose through di global COVAx scheme for kontri dem wey poor and official
say dem don dey tok for some 1.5 million doses of di AstraZeneca vaccine.
Di total nomba of dose wey dem don order so far go cover about half of di pipo wey dey inside Lebanon wey pass six million, wey include at least one million refuge from Syria. 
Lebanon don dey under 24-hour curfew for almost one month, di goment begin to dey lift some kind restriction dis week.
BIC don launch 2021 Art Master contest
BIC don announce dem don launch dem art competition wey dey for di whole continent wey go see to grand prize of $2,000.
Di giant on top station sellin dey serach for ball pen artist wey get talent say make dem submit dem exceptional artwork for opportunity to take name dem as ARt Master for inside Middle Eats and Africa , on statement wey di company do for Sunday indicate am.
Di BIC Master competition na im dem first do for inside South Africa for 2017, and as e dey follow di success, e grow reach all of AFrica for 2019.
Deputy General Manager, Lucky Stationery Nigeria Ltd and Senior Sales Manager West & Central Africa, Mr Guillaume Grou tok say wit awa culture for Nigeria wey dey diverse, we dey excited to dey launch di edition of BIC Art Master Competition for dis year wey dey act as platform to take showcase African talents dem.
Di grand prize for di competition na $2,000, one personal gallery online and opportunity to feature as part of di BIC Art Collection.
Di second prize winner go carry $1,000 cash prize komot, and di second runner-up go win $500 cash prize.
Dis contest dey open for pipo wey dey Africa and Middle East alone.
FG get N392bn as tax from company dem inside 3 months
Di federal goment don get N392bn as Company Income Tax (CIT) from breweries dem, telecommunication company plus odas inside di first quarter of 2021. 
According to data wey National Bureau of Statistics (NBS) publish on top CIT yesterday, di amount pass di N295.72bn wey dem generate inside di fourth quarter of 2020.
Daily Trust be also observe say e high pass di N295.68bn wey dem generate inside di first quarter of 2020.
Di growth on top tax revenue inside first quarter of 2021 dey further represent 32.82 percent quarterly increase and 32.84 percent yearly increase
Breweries dem, bottling and beverages generate di highest CIT wey reach N23.26bn and professional services wey include telecoms dey close to follow am  with N18.17bn.
State ministry and parastatals dem generate N17.35bn  
As textile and garment imdustry generate di one wey low pass wey be N13.49 million.
Mining dey higher at N34.40m as Automobiles and Assembles generate N73.57m.
Di report show say di amount wey dem generate inside di first quarter, 152.33bn na from local industries dem as dem generate N184.59bn as foreign CIT payment.
NBS report say di balance of N55.85 na im dem generate as CIT for oda payments dem.
Di impeachment article of Trump don head to U.S.
A second impeachment trial for former U.S president, Donald Trump don almost carry one step close.
Di House of Representative for inside U.S dey prepare to forward di article of impeachment to di senate.
Carrying di charge of incitement o sedition, dem go read di article for inside di second chamber of congress at 7 p.m on monday evening (
Trump dey face unprecedented second impeachment trial base on charge say im incite pipo make pro-Trump rioters for stand up and storm Capitol for January 6.
According to wetin dey inside impeachment rule dem, as di indictment article dey arrive na im go trigger di start of impeachment trial, na im go be di first wey president wey don komot for office go face.
However, senate leader dem agree to modify di rule to take deliver di impeachment article for Monday evening and dem go delay di actual start to Feb. 8.
Di attack for Capitol.
Violent pipo for im supporters be attack di Capitol just afta im use fiery rhetoric for rally to take promote election fraud wey no get base. 
Di attack wey wan hold di certification of di president now Joe Biden win for di November election, kill at least five pipo including police officer.
For inside di senate, dem need two-thirds majority to convict.
E dey unclear how Republicans fit join di Democrats for dat kind vote, wey fit also bar Trump from holding any office again. (dpa/NAN)
Court convict 39 tricycle, bike riders without permit
One mobile court wey dey sit for inside Benin don convict 39 pipo say dem dey operate tricycle and motorcycle and dem no get permit.
Di prosecutor, Mrs P O. Ovbiagele don tell di court say dem catch di 39 pipo around Benin-Agbor road side, wey dem dey ride bike and tricycle without permit.
According to Ovbiagele, di offence get punishment under section 9(4) and 27 of di second SChedule of di Edo Traffic Control and Management Agency Law, 2010.
Di pesin dem wey dem accuse beg say dem dey guilty and make dem dey soft wit dem.
Di chief Magistatrate, Mutairu Oare, thereafta, convict di 39 persons dem and he order dem say make dem pay N5,000 fine per person, and make dem go get di rider permit withing 24 hours.
According to am, if dem no gree get di permit, dem go charge parking fee of N1,00 on top di bike and tricycle dem wey dem impound on daily basis.
Oare be also tok say six week dem and dem no comply, dem go forfeit di tricycle and bike to di state goment.
Gunmen dem don kill traditional ruler plus 3 oda pipo inside Benue
Gunmen for Wednesday be kill traditional ruler, chief Hyacinth Ajon plus three oda pipo for separate incident inside two local goment area for Benue State.
Di traditional  monarch wey die say dem kill wit one person, Benjamin Anakula for Tse Zoola community of Makurdi LGA as dem take kill two oda pipo wey dem no give dem name for Guma area of di state. 
Person wey old pass for di community, Aho Zoola, allege say gunmen wey dem suspect say dem be herders attack di village around 2:00 am, dem dey shoot anyhow, and dem kill di two pipo.
According to report from one among media aide of Governor Samuel Ortom, im narrate say di attack dem do for dem rural abode na surprise for dem bikos dem no get any issue wit herder dem.
Di media aide wey be  Jimmin Geoffrey, don state say di governor be dey return from one burial inside di area when im stop by to take pity wit di villager dem wey no get place to stay again and e assure dem say e go do evritin wey dey possible to take bring security pipo to di area.
Similarly, di chairman for inside Guma LGA, Caleb Aba, be tell newsman dem for inside Makurdi on to telefone say na Wednesday dem kill di two oda pipo for inside Mbayer-Yandev council ward of Guma.
Aba however be point finger to herder wey im suspect behind di killin for im domain.
Dr Mahmud Tukur: Tribute to distinguished accomplishment 
For di end, no be year for pesin life count, but di life wey dey inside pesin years   Abraham Lincoln
Di small space wey dey here no reach to describe di late Dr Mahmud Muhammad Tukur, politician for inside Nigeria and former minister on top commerce and industry matter  for di administration of General  Muhammadu Buhari.
Tukur wey follow among one small clique of policy advocates for Northern Nigeria, die for April 9, 2021, for 82 years old.
Dem don bury since for Yola, inside Adamawa State.
Dr Tukur na di 1st indigenous Director of di Institute of Administration, Kongo, Zaria.
He kolekt di mantle from Prof. S.S. Richardson for 1967 go reach 1975 when im bekom first vice-chancellor of di Bayero University for Kano, 
Now recall say na  late Sir Ahmadu Bello, di Sardauna of Sokoto, who when im attain independence of nothern Nigeria, declare for front of Sir Garwin Westray Bell wey be di last Governor-General for 1957, for di Lugard Hall inside Kaduna, say di commitment to train di manpower for di north, which according to dem, we go rely on top di attainment of improving di health, prosperity, hapines of awa pipo wey discrimination no ge dey on ground of tribe or creed of which Dr. Tukur and small oda nomba wey dey distinguished be di  pipo wey dem first recruit.
Some don tok di journet of Presido Muhammadu Buhari into politics no go complete without Tukur.
Yes, doubt no de, di description wey dem give Tukur say im dey among di intellectual powerhouse na true since im na contemporary wit pipo like Mamman Daura, Liman Ciroma, Adamu Ciroma, and Hamza Rafindadi Zayyad.
Mahmud Tukur be firm, tenacious and resolute man wey lead life wey get impact, man wey get deep conviction and inner streght, wey serve North without corruption and e enhance di betterment of democracy for di kontri.
Under am as Director, Institute of Administration, Zaria, im supervise and superintend di building of di intelligentsia fo North and e be dey deeply committed wit strong sense of duty to take build Nigeria wey dey equitable.
E dey safe to deduce then, say entire genre of civil servants dem past and current, executives dem for private sector and political elite for di North be pass through di hand of di late scholar wet affect evri facet of education and see to di upliftment of manpower no be only for im region but for Nigeria in general.
President Muhammadu, for inside tribute to Tukur, tok say geberation dem go remember  Dr Mahmud Tukur service to di nation. 
E get passion for Nigeria wey go dey prosper, get strong economy and dey unite.
Na proud nationalist e be.
Buhari remeber say as Minister of Trade for im first comin as Head of States, Dr Tukur be introduce plenty scheme wey revive di local industry, e boost export and give real meanin and effect to import substitution to regenerate di indigenous manufacturin secor for di economy.
He pray give Almighty Allah to accept am for Aljannah Firdaus and give im family, friends, di Adamawa Emirate Council and di pipo for inside di state di strenght to bear di great loss. 
Indeed, di enviable position and competence of Tukur be increase im public profile for Nigeria.
Indeed e go take to do plenty good things to take build good perutation, therefore di contribution wey Tukur put to take develop di education sector durin im time for Bayero University and im tireless effort on top peacebuilding process and socio-economic development of Norther Nigeria no sometin wey dem fit forget.
Late Tukur, wey dem born for 1939 inside Yola, Adamawa State, get im first degree for International Affairs and Political Science for di University of Wales  (wia im receive Elizabeth Morris Memorial Prize as im graduate first for im class).
He also obtain Master's Degree in Public International Affairs for di University of Pittsburgh and  PhD. in Public Management for Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria, Kaduna.
He also study for Northwestern and Oxford university dem.
Di deceased be Fulbright-Hays Fellow, senior I.U.C. Fellow and associate member of St. Anthony's College, Oxford (1974).
He enter history as di first Vice-Chancelor for Bayero University, for Kano.
For im career as public servant, di scholar wey dey prominent and get fame worldwide be serve for di  Adebo and Udoji National Wage Reviews and committee wey dratf Constitution of 1976, he also be member of di sub-committee on top citizenship right,  fundamental right, Political Parties and Electoral System wey Alhaji Aminu Kano be Chairman for.
E be member of di National Constitutional Conference (1994\1995) and di Committee for vision 2010 (1997).
For 1984, when Major General Muhammadu Buhari be dey do military regime, Federal goment appoint am as Minister for Commerce and Industries.
A business executive, late Tukur be chair for di activities of Fukarabe Industries Limited, Kaduna, and e fulfill di obligation of plenty corporate dictatorship dem.
Leadership and Governance in Nigeria: He be Coordinator for Policy Analysis Limited and write and join pipo to write plenty book dem, wey di one wey prominent pass na:
Di Relevance of Values, wey dem publish for 1999. 
Na three wives dem survive am, nine children and plenty broda dem wey dey distinguished, wey include di prominent global industrialist and business mogul wey dem worldwide Alhaji Bamanga Tukur, wey be former Governor for inside Gongola State wey no dey again, one time Minister of Industries and  past chairman for di People's Democratic Party (PDP) and Late Engr Hamman Tukur former Director-General for Federal Ministry of Petroleum Resources and di first Chairman, Revenue Mobilization and Fiscal Commission.
We dey commiserate with Nigeria pipo on top di quench of dis courageous academic, who apart from say na match-maker, be get more distinguished career for service give di nation.
Nigeria go surely miss di statesmanship of Dr Mahmud wey dem born for inside Adamawa, na enigma durin im lifetime, he display genuine magnanimity and moral courage, and e always dey put interest of nation above di one of ethnic or group. 
Im reputation na say e dey follow due process, im na indeed bridge builder, e dey always readi to use im wisdon plus knowledge wey im don gain over di years for di good of im kontri.
Dr Tukur be man of peace and im deligence and professionalismno dey questionable wey im death na great loss for Nigeria.
He be live life wey get impact and contribute plenty to Nigeria and e don put im name for platter of gold for inside di history of di kontri.
All of us must to keep im service patriotic duty for peaceful and secure kontri.
Make di federal goment immortalise am as per make dem name anything wey dey follow education or di Institute of Administration ABU Zaria as im remebrance.
Indeed Nigeria don loss rare gem, na patriotic Nigerian par excellence, na academic extraordinaire and na great author, wey don serve dis nation wit merit, man wey get strong character and convistion wey live life wit impact wey any pesin fit wish for, as e follow im well defined role for di growth of humanity and im untiring commitment for inside nation-building.
we no fit forget im contribution for di history of awa nation and continent
For di end, as Abraham Lincoln don assert, no be year inside pesin life count, di life wey dey inside pesin years.
Make Allah SWT uplift im work and grant am Aljannar Firdaus.
Muhammad Gombe, wey be media practitioner, dey  write from inside Abuja 
Benue dey warn say food crisis dey kom.
Di state goment inside Benue be raise alarm for weekend concernin food crisis wey fit apun unless dem address di challenge of Internally Displaced Persons (IDPs) dem for inside di state.
Executive Secretary for State Emergency Management Agency (SEMA), Dr. Emmanuel Shior,  be make di observation for one toktok session wit newsmen for inside Makurdi.
Shior tok e don bekom necessary to sound di alarm as many for inside di IDP be farmer wey dem don chase komot for dem ancestral land wey attack of herder dem kos for more than two years now.
Na di herders be di reason why di IDP dey for camp till date, small small attack still dey apun for Torkula and Idyer inside Guma, Moor for Kwande, and some community for inside Agatu and Logo, as e tok am.
Di oga for SEMA tok say e dey worrisome say di state get pass 500,000 IDPs for inside eight camp across di state along wit odas wey scatter for dem relative house as state goment kontinu to spend big to take care for dem.
He explain say, we don spend billions of naira to take care of IDP since 2018.
We get eight official camp dem wey be house for over 500,000 IDP dem.
He however add say Governor Samuel Ortom don put di IDP disengagement plan down make sure say IDP dem return to dem house safe, e note say wit di kind high nomba of IDP for inside di state, e go dey difficult to just close camp down, especially as smallsmall attack dem still dey apun and dem house neva safe to return.
Elche 0-1 Atletico Madrid, for May1.
E don remain small make Atletico surrender say dem no fit win Elchessay and dia lead ontop table give Real Madrid
Fidel Chaves miss one penalty for 91 minutes.
Fidel shot hit post wey make Atletico hold dat 1-0 wey give dem two point pass Real Madrid and dem still dey front of Barcelona wey dem go meet for Camp Nou.
Barcelona 0-0 Atletico Madrid for May 8.
Barcelona get chance to comot di title for Atletico hand as dem dey home but na Atletico dey carry di first half and Barca no even try for di second half.
E kon dey beta for Atletico afta Sevilla beat Real Madrid for di second day, di twopoint wey Atletico dey dey lead kon still dey like dat for di weekend.
Atletico Madrid 2-1 Osasuna, for May16.
As e remain nine minute, Atletico score Osasuna 1- 0 for di Wanda Metropolitano and Real Madrid.
Dey go ontop for LA Liga, di title for dia hand as dem win Athletic Bilbao.
But Atletico kom change evrithing  as Renan Lodi equalise for 82 minutes and Suarez score for 88 minute and plenti fans dey joli outside for di car park for di stadium.
Na dis one make Atletico dey on top and e kon remain only one game wey dem go win.
Real Valladolid 1-2 Atletico Madrid, for May 22, Atletico sabi say na to win go give dem di title even if to say Real Madrid win Villarreal or dem no win.
But dem do am for di way wey dey hard, dem from back kom win afta Valladolid don dey win before as Oscar Plano score.
But Angel Correa kon equalise and Suarez score di winning goal, na strong race wey kon finish wit winning wey tight.
Dem arrest Abia big drug supplier wey dem dey find since wit 100kg of cocaine and weed.
Di National Drug Law Enforcement Agency (NDLEA) don catch Chibuike Apolos, wey be one of di main pipo wey dey always dey supply drugs for Abia state, for one early mono raid for di place wey im dey always hide for Mbawsi for Isialangwa North area for di state.
Di pesin wey tok for di agency, Femi Babafemi, tok for Wednesday for Abuja say dem don dey find Apolos for NDLEA Abia State Command since February afta dem catch one China Ukeleonu, wey dey for di video wey dey evriwia for January 2021 wey show one man wey dey sell drug for di street.
As e take tok, na bikos for di development dem kon dey find Aplos wey be 38 years.
Afta dem don catch am, di goment  for Abia state don mark him house wey e dey hide say dem go break am down, na Babafemi tok am.
He still tok say di Oga commander for di Abia State Command NDLEA, Bamidele Akingbade, dey tok say dem don dey follow am since February for dis year.
As God dey do tins, we kon hear say e just collect plenti weed for Edo state.
Even as sekuriti wahala dey for di South East especially for Abia, State, di command still go for di operation wey make dem arrest Chibuike Apolos wey get 10 bags of weed wey weigh 100kg, dem see 1.6 grams for cocaine, one gram of heroine and five gram for methamphetamine.
Inside dis kain one, di Command for di Agency for Taraba State don catchcatch one Lawan Gambo wey be 61 years old say e carry 58.50kg of Cannabis Sativa.
As di state commander for NDLEA, Suleiman Ajadi take tok, di pesin dey carry skunk wey dem put inside plenti sack of beans doti wey dey dey give animals chop inside Yobe state wen awa  men catch am.
Di rep dem dey greet NDLEA say dem well done for di drugs wey dem seize.
Di pesinwey dey represent Ado/Ogbadibo/Okpokwu Federal Constituency, Dr. Francis Ottah Agbo, don greet di chairman for di National Drug Law Enforcement Agency, NDLEA, Brig-Gen say e well done.
Mohammed Buba Marwa (rtd) for di new way wey e dey take fight drug wey don help am seize plenti drug for di country.
Di lawmaker, who still be di Chairman for di Narcotic Drug Committee, don praise Marwa as e dey clean di health sector as e dey stop plenti narcotics and drugs wey no reach standard for di country.
Di lawmaker inside one tok wey im media pesin, Andrew Agbese, tok for Wednesday, tok say di NDLEA Oga, before e reach six month wey e enta office, don carry di agency leg put for track to dey burstburst plenti place wey dem dey sell drug and to sieze and destroy plenti bad drug.
Agbo, wey be di tok pesi for di Minority Caucus, tok say NDLEA for di leadership of di foma Military Administrator for Lagos State, dey remember di time wey Prof. Dora Akunyili dey NAFDAC wey fake medicine, di one wey don expire and di food wey no reach standard no plenti.
I don dey always tok say make dem do beta, carry plenti pipo join, and put moni ontop NDLEA to fit do wetin im suppose do to tanda wit drug abuse and pipo wey like drug for di kontri
I don tok am plenti time say di NDLEA go nid plenti support to fit do dia work.
But I dey surprise say even wit di small we dey ground, di agency, as e dey under di leadership of Gen. Buba Marwq, don achieve plenti time as dem dey carry fight criminals and dis one don give me strong chest as di Chairman for di Narcotic Drugs Committee say make I still dey push for wetin go make di agency fit work wella
E dey very clear say Marwa na di new Sheriff for town and e don prove am as e dey comot all di drug baron, syndicate and di traffickers dem, Na so e tok.
Daily Trust tok say d agency for recent time don sieze plenti drug and dem don catch plenti pipo for di kontri.
Di vigilante for Bayelsa don catch 4 pipo wey go buy phone wey dem tif.
Di Vigilante for Bayelsa don catch one pesin wey dey repair phone and anoda three pipo wey dey buy phone wey dem collect wit gun for pipo for di state.
Di sekuriti wey be for di state follow di Chairman, Doubiye Alagba, for weekend, catch four pipo and one repairer wey pipo sabi wella, say dem dey buy phone wey dem thief wit gun for Yenagoa.
We hear say di vigilante dey work as dem don hear say dem rob one Mr. Lawrence Oworodo and dem collect him phone and sometins wit gun, and as dem trace di phone reach one Audu John for Biogbolo for di state capital.
As di sekuriti don look ground, na why dem arrest three pipo wey dem dey suspect who dem tok say dem dey among di pipo wey don dey buy phone wey dem thief for di state.
Alagba, as e dey yarn di news pipo for Yenagoa, tell dem di name of di pipo wey dem catch, Audu John, Dominic Diezibe, James Believe and David Emmanuel.
We kon like dis mata bikos say na gun dey take rob di for di pesin wey get di phone.
One of di problem wey dey Yenagoa today na pick pocket crime like dis one.
I call am pocket crime bikos say all dis criminal go dey waka about wit gun wey dem do for Nigeria and dem go use am thief beta tin from pipo wey just dey go dia work dey hustle evriday.
Na one phone tracker dem use arrest all di four suspect.
Dem track di phone reach one pesin wey be Audu John, wey dey live for Biogbolo for Yenagoa, and na im carry us go arrest di remaining pipo wit one phone repairer Amarata, Mr. David Emmanuel.
Police tok pesin for Bayelsa State, SP Asinim Butswat, confam say dem don arrest dem say dem dey police custody and dem bin dey do investigation.
Ministry, CODE wan track Kaduna N6bn project.
Di ministry for budget and di National Planning go join bodi wit Follow di moni for di Connected Development (CODE) to track di constituency project for Kaduna wey be N6 billion for di 2020 and 2021 budget.
Di minister for Budget and Planning, Prince Clem Agba, who still be co-chair for di Open goment  Partnership (OGP), nah in tok dis one as dem Follow di moni kom im office.
E tok say di Eye Mark App, one website and application for phone go soon comot wey go dey make citizen dem dey write any tin wey consine di project of dia community and wia di work reach.
Di Programmes Associate, Mr. Kingsley Agu, wey lead di team tok say CODE join bodi wit di MacAurthur Foundation dey set di pace wey go start governance and budgeting reforms from one campaign to take deep citizen interest for goment spending and tackle any tiin wey corrupt.
Agu add join say di colabo wit d ministry dey good for to joinbodi fight corruption, illict financial flow and to dey track  to finish, development of projects for village make di pipo fit dey see good water, standard health care and primary education sef.
Di pesin wey get WikiLeaks, Asange don dey deny for bail even as di US extradition block.
Di pesin wey get WikiLeaks, Julian Asange, must to dey custody for Britian as di US dey appeal say one court decision wey fit block im extradition to face di charges say e leak secret document, na one Judge tok am for Monday. 
Judge Vanessa Baraistser, wey no gree give am extradition for Monday, tell di Magistrate wey dey Westminster Court say if dem am, Assange no go wan surrender for di gearing for future.
Mr. Assange still get how im go run comot before all di hearing process go finish, she tok.
Make mata no too bad, di United States suppose fit change my mind.
If Mr. Asange run comot before dem finish to dey hear, dem go don loose di opportunity wey go make dem do am.
For outside di court, Laywer Stella Morris, wey be Asange fiancee and pesin wey don born two pikin, tok say di decision na big disappointment say make di US Justice Department comot di charges.
One lawyer for di US goment  don begged Baraitser before say make im no release di Australian publisher, kom tell am how e take plan to challenge im decision to block block im extradition on top mental problem.
We don submit on behalf of di United States say som tins dey wey dey stop bail for Mr. Asange, na Clair Dobbin tok am.
She kon tok say no condition fit guarantee im surrender for future.
Im history to  dodge di extradition go United State don show say e fit do any tin to see say e no apun. Na so Dobbin tok.
Di court suppose dey under no doubt say im wan run comot and say e point finger to go political asylum, wey be bigfish from Mexico, she add join.
Mind to run comot.
Asange wear suit and mask for him mouth go court, two days afta dem don deny say make dem carry am go United State on to say e fit kill him sef for dia. 
Edward Fitzgerald, wey be him lawyer, tok say dem suppose free am afta im don use 15 months to dey wait for di extradition proceedings.
Baraitser decision on  Monday don change any mind wey im get to run comot. E add join.
Di court don tok and wetin dem tok be say make dem free am.
Dem dey find Asange for Washington wia e go face 18 charges wey consine di 500,000 secret file wey dey tok about dem military campaign for Afghanistan and Iraq for 2010.
Di US dey claim say nah im help di intelligence analyst, Chelsea Manning, tif di 2010 document before im put di confidential sources outside for di world.
E dey risk 175 years be dat, if dem send am to prison, but Asange and im Lawyer dem don tok am say politics don enta di mata
Dem don keep am fordi high sekuriti prison for SouthEast London.
Dem no answer dem one time wey dem tok say make dem give am bail say e fit go catch Covid-19
Asange don see wia im go hide for di Ecuador embasi for 2021, afta Sweeden don tok say make dem arrest am say im get case for sexual assault.
E don spend seven years for di South American countrys London mission before di governmoemt for Quito tok say im no be dia citizen again.
Di British Police drag am comot con arrest am for 2019.
Dem put am for prison for 50 weeks say e don breach im bail term as e take consine di case for Sweeden, wey dem later drop bikos say beta evidence no dey.
Di UN tok say di sentence no good.
E dey wicked for no reason.
Di enemy dem for Asange don cause make clbre dey for media freedom even as di Judge wey dey hear di case don tok say e no get case to answer.
For Monday, Baraitser tok say e go don sabi wetin fit hapun before e leak di secret document kom outside, and wetin e do pass di work of a journalist.
But she tok say di extradition go dey oppress am and e fit affect im brain for di US penal system, wey fit make am kill him sef.
She no gree wit wetin di US experts tok say dem go keep Asange make e no do any tin to im sef say oda pipo like di US financier, Jeffrey Epstein, wey dem disgrace, don manage kill dia sef even as dem dey always dey watch dem.
Dem dey torture one UN reporter.
Nils Melzer dey clap as dem block im extradition, e kon tok say make dem free am and give am som tin for wetin im eyes don see, wey make dem put am for detention wey no get any reason.
But e tok say Baraitser don confam wetin dey for di US mata wey be say dem dey make di national journalist be like criminal.
Di United States don tok say di ruling no dey good say dem don dey receive call from WikiLeaks and di right and media freedom group say make dem drop di appeal.
Di group wey dey always fight for di media pipo, Reporters Without Borders, tok say as dem no give am bail for Wednesday na wickedness.
Di editor-in-chief for WikiLeaks, Kristinn Hrafnsson, tok say make di president  for US wey dey go, Donald Trump, and di pesin wey go dey dia afta, Joe Biden say make dem release Assange, as im dey sure dem say justice go prevail.
Ahmed Musa wan make di NPFL kom back against Adamawa Utd.
Kano pillars don tok say dia new signing, Ahmed Musa, go play im first match against Adamawa Utd wey don dey relegation for Sunday, May 16.
Na wetin tok pesin fot Pillars, Alhaji Rilwanu Malikawa,  tok for Sunday as dem play draw draw wit Warri Wolves for Ozoro.
Di Pillars wey dem reduce to 10 player dem for di first half carry di lead wit Auwalu Malam Ali for 58 minute before Mark Daniel kom score di equalizer for di host for 86 minute wey make di forma Nigeria Champion carry 1-1 draw. 
Malikawa tok say di Pillars don go back Kano wia dem go go prepare wella for di next match wey dem get wit Adamawa United. 
Di tok pesin tok wetin di Technical Adviser for Pillars, Ibrahim Musa tok, say di tin wey remain for us na to go focus on top di match wey we get wit Adamawa United FC for day 21 for Ahmadu Bello Stadium for wey dey Kaduna next week.
To dey follow relegatin team play no dey easy but we go try say make we win plenti point so we go fit stay for wia we dey and watin we dey targer for di season.
Pipo wey dey work for University tell di FG say: Campus sekuriti men nid gun.
Di Oga pata pata for di Senior Staff Association for Nigeria Universities (SSANU), Mohammed Ibrahim Haruna, tok say im pipo no dey safe for campus again. 
E call di Federal goment  make dem register gun for di sekuriti men wey dey all di campus to dey protect di school.
E dey follow di nes pipo tok for Abuja for di weekend afta dem finish di Natioanl Executive Council (NEC) meeting for di association.
E tok say e go help all di sekuriti agency wey work don dey choke.
We dey here to tok mata wey plenty.
Di mata wey big pass na di sekuriti mata for we pipo who dey work for inside di university.
Our pipo no fit travel as dem like, dey no fit waka around as dem like, anytime wey dem do am, dem dey kidnap dem.
E no dey acceptable!
We dey call di Federal goment  make dem put license for awa  sekuriti pipo wey dey for campus, make dem dey train dem evri time and dey monitor dem.
If dem do dis tin, di sekuriti problem for awa  school dem go reduce, na wetin Haruna tok.
