E warn di goment  make dem no kill di academic activities for di tertiary institution again as dem dey do like say di Memorandum of Action (MoA)  no consine dem.
Na di two of dem sign.
E tok say na only three tin out of di eight tin wey dem don ask n aim goment don do small for inside.
E tok say di association fit continue di strike wey dem stop if dem no settle di mata wey dey make dia pipo dey  bikom  poorer as we no expect.
Biden don make history as he tok say di kilin, wey don be like one century, of di Armenians na genocide. 
Presido Joe Biden don recognize di Ottoman Empire kilin and as dem deport di Armenians like one century ago say na genocide.
Di declaration na break from hin predecessors and be  risking inflaming tensions wit dem Turkey, natoally
Biden don tok say aspesident candidate him go recognize di Armenian treatment, wey take place for modern day Turkey, as genocide
Americans don long call U.S president make him do am so, but  Turkey, wey be key natoally,don warn U.S against am,long maintaing say di violence dey part of bloody clashes during world war I
DI  Turkish goment wey be President Recep Tayyip Erdogan neva respond to Biden designation, but hin foreign miniters don warn before for dat week say declaration go make relation worse
Ties wey dey between di two allies don increase for recent years, although Biden don finally tok to Erdogan on Friday
Biden don tok say aspesident candidate him go recognize di Armenian treatment, wey take place for modern day Turkey, as genocide
Previous presidents don avoid to dey use di label even as dem don make di traditional,annual proclamation honawaing anniversary
each year on dis Friday, we remember di lives of all those ho kpeme for Ottoman era Armenian genocide and recommit awaselves to prevent dat kind atrocity from apuning again Biden tok am for him statement
Beginning on April 24, 1915, wit di arrest of Armenian intellectual and community leader for Constantinople by Ottoman authories
One and half million Armenians na hin dey deport, massacre, or marched to dia death for one campaign of examination
Di statement dey expected, especially afta wen before candidate Biden mark last year remembrance day by saying silence na complicity
we no too fully acknowlege, commemorate, and teach awa pikin about genocide, di word neva again lose dia meaning him write, con pledge to back congressional resolution wey recognise di Ottoman Empireal action as genocide
Resolution to recognize di genocide pass di house and senate for 2019, but
Former President Donald Trump, like him predecessors,neva join am
On Wednesday, na over 100 bipartisan members for congress send letter to Biden wey dem dey call on am make him use him proclamation to officailly label atin apun for genocide
Di Ottoman Turks deport around 2 million Armenians wey start for 1915
Around 1.5 million Armenians na hin dey estimate wey dem don kill
Di Turkish goment agree say fight during di war kill many, but e don long denie say di treatment of di christian Armenians by di Muslim Ottomans amount to genocide and tok say di death toll dey lower
over two dozen kontri don recognise di atrocities as genocide , according todi Armenian National institute, wan Washington base group ey advote for di genocide destination
Biden statement carry no legal implication, and even if di state deparment dey follow up wit a formal declaration, automatic sanction or oda penaltie ey kick in
For hin final day wit former President Donald Trump for office, di Trump administration declare di Chinese goment treatment of Uighurs and oda Muslim ethnic minority as genocide, witout implementing sanctions
But di comment wey shake U.S Turkish relation already dey on ice over litany of disagreement, and wey fi damage relations between Biden and Erdogan, wey get good relationship wit Trump
Trump dey always tout hin friendship wit di strong president and repeatedly pull punches against hin goment until hin hand dey force by political pressure,includin from congressional Republicans
Minneapolis don reach $27m settlement wit Floyd family
Di family of George Floyd, di Black man wey kpeme wen white police officer for Minneapolis arrest am, don reach $27 million settlement wit di Minnesota city, di family lawyer dem announce am on Friday
Di settlement na di largest pre trial settlement for one civil right wrongful death case for US history; na di family lawyer tok di statement
Minneapolis police officer Derek Chauvin dey currently face trial wey dey face murder and manslaugher charges wey dey get connection wit Floyd
Three oda officer dey also face di charges
Dem bury Prince Philip for royal vault wey dey St Georga chapel
Prince Philip cofffin na hin inter for di royal vault of St Georga chapel
Na on top catafalque on top marble slab sey put am and  eletric motorput am inside di vault.
Di vault na hin dem create between 1804 and 1810 for George III, wey kpeme for 1820 and hin dey one of di three king wey dem bury der.
Di order two na George IV and William IV
Dem play horn as hin coffin dey go down
Archbishop of Canterbury give blessin before di choir sing di national anthem, make God save di Queen 
Di member of di royal family look up as di choir sing wen di queen bow her head
Dey con lead di 94 year old king comot for di church, by di archbishop di family member kom follow
Prince William, her grandson na hin dey see dey glance back for di vault as him leave hin pew
For di funeral procession wey comot from Windsor Castle do di chapel na hin Queen Elizabeth II, wey dem carry wit car
Na her first appearance for public since di death of her husband
Philip coffin na hin dey drap wit hin personal standard and dey con drive for one green military Land Rover Defender
Di pikin of Queen Elizabeth and Prince Charles, Prince Anne and Prince Edward waka for di back of di Land Rover
Earl of Wessex, Prince Harry, Peter Philips, Prince William, Vice Admiral Tim Lawrence, and di Earl of Snowdon sef follow for di procession 
Queen Elizabeth II follow dey back of di car
For di eight minute procession, na hin di king Troop Royal Horse Artillery wey dey East lawn of Windsor Castle dey fire gun
Dem farmer wey dem kil for FCT community
32 years old farmer, Yusufa Adamu, na hin dem hack to death for Gada Biyu village for Kwali Area Council for di Federal Capital Territory FCT
Wan resident of Gada Biyu, Abdullahi Yahaya tok say di incident apun for Friday evenin wen di Adamu dey com from hin farm wey dey kom attack am wit machete
Accordin to am, di family of di decease raise alarm afta wey dem see am for house for Friday and say member of di vigilante mobilise go di farm for Sunday wia dem discover di bodi of di farmer wit machete cut
Di tok tok pesin wey dey FCT Police Command, ASP Maryam Yusuf, neva reply to di text message wey dem send to confirm di incident
Anode INEC office na hin dey throw fire for Imo
Anode office wey be Independent National Electoral Commission INEC own na hin dey set ablaze for Imo state
Daily Trust gather say di location wey dey Okwudor for Njaba Local goment Area for di state na hin dey burn down for Sunday mornin
Di incident dey apun less dan 24 hours afta dey burn Atta police station, customary and high court down for dat same local council
INEC Public Relation officer for di state, Mrs Emmanuel Opera, confirm di development
last week, INEC raise alam ova di burnin of dia office nationwide, dey tok say di action fit undermine di conduct of future election
Di commission tok say no fewer dan 41 INEC office na hin dey burn for only dis year
How support tool, order fit uplift 41.5m MSMEs
Nigeria Micro, small and Medium Enterprises MSMEs industry no dey optimise as e suppose be upon dia critical role for national development
although MSMEs contribution for di Gross Domestic Product GDP neva clear bikos of lack structure and data, di narrative dey change fast 
 Accordin to data wey di small and Medium scale Enterprises Development Agency of Nigeria SMEDAN and di National Bureau of Statistics NBS, e dey about 41.5million MSMEs for Nigeria
Togeda, dia account na about 50 percent for Nigeria GDP
To dey grow  consciousness na critical role MSMEs play for economic development
Afta job creation, MSMEs dey critical to dey improve di livin standard of citizen  wey local capital formation
Dey kom hep drive innovertion and competition for developin economies
As dey wan boost di growth of MSMEs, plenti MSMEs-supported programmes don dey from di federal goment thru di Development Bank of Nigeria (DBN), Bank of Industry (BOI), Bank of Agriculture (BOA), SMEDAN and di Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) wey don be di  biggest enabler of small small business dem.
Di CBN intervene wit di growth of MSMEs, 
Apart from say public sector sponsor initiative, private sector entities dey wey dey strive to support MSMEs sector
One of dis na di MTN Revv programme wey dey hep small business think well, make learn dia operation well join so e go allow dem mitigate di effect of COVID-19 pandemic.
Dis year, 200 MSMEs na hin dey select make e be part of MTN accelerator programme, yello 200, from across di kontri
Di participant don get series of 11 master class by season facilitator pass various subsector for di economy
For di graduation ceremony recently, some beneficiaries and coodinator speak for di programme
olubukola Ogunmola wey be di CEO of Wanbuk and Device wey dey produce pap, tok say him get plenti benefit
awa workforce don dey grow to allow us meet di demand of awa growin customers
Anoda beneficiary, Daniel Ikwong, CEO of Future IDEAS tok say: I been dey well equipped wit best practices dem and I enjoy every bit of the Yello 200 onboardin experience wella; di business no go be di same again.
Also, Raheem Yusuff Olatunji wey be di CEO, Yutex Entertainment tok say for am, di programme na for rewardin experience
now I be beta manager for my business
E fit don apun for beta time bikos di effect of Covid 19 pandemic  wey dey on top my company plenti
Di chief Enterprise Business Officer, MTN Nigeria
Lynda Saint Nwafor tok say wit MSMEs wey go dey account for 94% for all business for Nigeria and 84%  for employment
awa goal na to empower MSMEs wit di tool to make dem thrive for di economy
Modupe Kadri, Chief Financial Officer, MTN Nigeria, tok say: We don always believe SMEs as wheels wey dey drive any economy and if you position dem for growth, e mean say you dey empower and you wan enable dem wit di right digital solutions.
Make we no do ojoro, Coca Cola Nigeria Limited and di Whitefield Foundation, e no tey wey dem empower pass 20,000 person wey get business skil for di 36 state of Nigeria through di special intervention programme SIP
Dem tok say through SIP, dey don fi support di livelihood of young Nigeria pipo wey dey follow di economic effect of Covid 19 pandemic wey hit 2020
By di end of di programme for April, di pipo don complete thre different stage of course wey season facilitors dem dey do
As dem dey do graduation recently, di Director, Public Affairs, Communications and Sustainability of di firm, Nwamaka Onyemelukwe tok say: We notice say unemployment rates dey rise wit poverty rates as dem reach one peak, and as a socially-responsible company wey focus on refreshin di world, we also dey committed to makin difference for di lives of pipo and communities dem.
Founder, Whitefield Foundation, Olufunmilola Johnson tok say, We dey excited di success of SIP and dis initiative apun bikos of di nd to hep make more successful people wey go grow our economy for Nigeria.
One beneficiary, Anu Oshilaja, wey be founder of Annyz Fabric Bags, share her life-changin story on top di impact of di programme and di fundin wey she collect to use further her business.
dem give bag wey dem use hand do to important women wey dey di event
Reason why Katsina farmers dem record poor harvest
Zobo farmer for Katsina State don record decline for product even as small rain fall dey dis year
Di farmers tok say di poor harvest na as bikos of di absence of affordable fertiliser from di beginnin wey rain season and invasion of dia farm by di herdsmen wey kom from Niger Republic
Dey kom dey lament continue say di relocation of some of dia market and lack of goment support dey part of dia major challenge dis year
Dey kom observe say di heavy rain wey fall, wey dem record toward end of season no favour di roselle plant, e no make dem grow to dia usual height, wey go don enable am to produce seed wey good wey fi produce zobo
farmer wey dem sabi wella Malam Abdullahi Kwangwama
Malam Abdullahi Kwangwana, wey be zobo farmer for Mani Local goment Area for di state,  for wan interview wey Daily Trust do, tok say from di beginnin of last season na hin manure or fertiliser to apply to plant no dey, situation wey slow down hin growth
Malam Kwangwama tok say,we no get any fertiliser from goment truout di season, and na dat one make am difficult for plant grow early
Di  small bag wey we fi buy for market for N12,000 per bag kom late and e no fi help grow high reach chest, wey e dey normally high reach so tey e go fit produce plenti seed
No too plant plenti food crop dis year
And I only fit harvest 60 bag of hibiscus dis season, against 85 bag wey I get last year
I get two wife and eight pikin, six of dem dey school, and na di only hope wey I get to feed dem and to dey pay dia school fee
goment wan support us to dey produce zobo for commercial quantity for domestic use for Nigeria and export, wetin dey need do na to make adequate plan to provide plan for di provision of fertiliser for cheap price and support farmer to dey access loan wey no get interest wey fi allow us hire pipo, kom cultivate more farmland
Na bikos say buyers dey always wait for produce, and wey dey to do well
Di roselle seed coat or cover na hin dem dey use produce d popular zobo juice for Nigeria, wey dey consider use for di treatment of stomach pain, high blood pressure, weight loss, among odas
For some kontri, dem dey use am for tea production, colourin, dyein, drug production and bicosmetic
anoda farmer and merchant of zobo, Ali Makeri, complain say one of di challenge wey dem face na di relocation of di market by di authority of Mashi Local goment Area, wey am tok say e dey affect patronage
Accordin to am, di market don relocate plenti time to different place, wey far from Mashi main market
Hin later tok say even if we pay revenue to di local goment kom create job for ova five time dem dey relocate us from one bushy area to anoda
Once wey dem discover say we don settle, kom develop one particular place, dey go don kom ovanight kom take us go anoda place wey neva open
Di last one na for dis year wen dey bring us kom here, close to di Mashi Ultra Modern Market
E dey far from di main market and awa customer dey fear to kom here, for security purpose
Therefore, we dey beg di chairman make he reason wit us and make he give us permanent and convenient place wey go dey close to di main market because most of our customers kom from different parts of di kontri; and dey go dey comfortable if we dey close to di main market.
On top di mata say whether zobo farmer for Katsina State get di capacity to produce large quantity for export, Makeri tok say; why dey no fit
Na hundreds of man and woman wey be hibiscus farmer dey for Katsina State bikos say e dey bring moni.
Last year alone, we sell am for N8,000 per bag from di beginnin, and for some point, e reach N20,000 per bag
wetin we need na support
If goment fit attract investor here and dey kom build factory wey fit supply us wit fertiliser, equipment and loan to hire more pipo, I fit assure you say we go generate more revenue for Nigeria
anoda farmer, Malam Yusuf Gwani Gobirawa for Kaita Local goment Area complain say herdsmen from neighbourin Niger Republic invade dia farm before dey fi finish harvest dis year
Him tok say awa hibiscus no ripe well wen we notice di herdsmen from Niger Republic arrive kom start to dey push dia animal for awa farm
Howeva, di member wey dey represent us for House of Assembly intervene through awa tradition ruler and dey kom tell us say make we quick harvest anythin wey remain for awa farm in order to avoid clash wit dem herdsmen
I get only 45 bag instead of 70 to 80
I dey expect dis year
awa borders no dey secure
goment need check di activity of dis herdsmen from Niger Republic by closin di border, especially if e kom towards di end of season so we go fit peacefully harvest awa farm produce
You no say wetin we dey depend on pass na local manure from awa domestic cattle
But now, we no fit carry awa animal comot from home
Even for house, we dey get sleepless night to protect dem so dem no go steal dem
We dey helpless for di hand of di rustlers
dem dey sell zobo for Dankama, Mashi and Maia adua market for di state
Di current market price dey between 7,500 and N8,000 per bag
 E dey expected ro reach N20,000 before di beginnin of next season
Di major producer of di crop for Nigeria na dem Katsina, Kano, Bauchi, Borno, Gombe and Jigawa State
For 2017 di Nigerian Agricultural Quarantine Service NAQS disclose say di county generate $35million witin nine month for 2017 from zobo export
Lagos East Court of Appeal uphold Abiru victory
Di court of Appeal don dismiss di appeal wey  di candidate of di People's Democratic parti PDP don file for December 5 lagos East Senatorial by election, Babatunde Olalere Gbadamosi
Di judge wey dey preside, Justice Daniel Kallio dismiss di prayers of di pesin wey dey appell wey wan upturn di victory of di All Progressives Congress (APC) candidate, Senator Mukhail Adetokunbo Abiru, bikos dey no get merit.
For di rulin wey dey hear virtually, the court said PDP and its candidate dem appeal no get merit .
E later affirm di judgment of di Federal High Court, Lagos.
As dem use dismiss di appeal , di Court of Appeal tok say di residency of candidate to election no bequalifyin or disqualifyin factor.

e fi be Adolf Hitler dey wrong but di way di decendant of hin alleged six million victim behave for di middle east, e dey tempt pesin to ask, for di risk to dey dub anti-Semite; shey Hitler dey right
Dis question go continue to dey excite  for view of di unspeakable and despicable atrocities wey Jews commit for Palestine wey dem occupy.

and di proof of dis fit find successive Israeli offensive for occupied Palestine wey lay bare di vunerability for di overrated Israeli Defence Force IDF

why Abia like dry porto pass airport Gov. Ikpeazu
Di goment of Abia state, Dr Okezie Ikpeazu don tok say di state under him admistration go like build dry port instead airport
As governor of di state I dey think of dry port
I don hear pipo dey ask why e no fit be airport
I wan take dis opportunity to officially respond to di issue of airport
for me, di need for dry port go serve di economic  interest of my pipo beta dan di need to airport
I dey hapi to acknowlege di fact say neigbourin state to Abia get airport
He tok say; wetin dis mean na say witin 100 kilometres radius, Abia go get access to airport,  wetin u no fi find witin hundred kilometres radius na dry port 
Di governor tok say airport for Abia go serve less than 10 per cent of di Abia populace and business interest, to dey consider say dat kind airport go get operational cargo status
Be like say di way to go na to look wetin go serve pesin, na 95 per cent of good u go find for di seaport for Apapa and One ports include di one wey dem delay for three month wey dey for pipo of Abia
As di governor, di question  wey I ask myself na, I fit for any way wey I fit lift dis burden wen I bring dem to point to dey import or export goods of Abia
He tok say; Na way I think say na dry port go serve di business interest of my pipo pass airport 
Inflation rate don drop to 18.12%, first for 20 months
Inflation rate don drop to 18.12 percent  for April from 18.17 percent wey dey record fo March, na e di last report tok
Di decline inflation rate wey dey slightly for 0.5 percent na di first for di last 20 months since di kontri record steady rise
Di rural index rise by 0.95% for April, down by 0.57% from di 1.52% wey dem record for March 2021
Food inflation rate don decline to 22.75% for April from 22.95% for march
Di raise for food index na price of coffee,tea, coca, bread and cereals, soft drinks, milk, cheese and egg na e kos am we don notice am
For Evri month, food sub index increase from 0.99% for April 2021, down to 091% point from 1.90% wey dem record for March 2021
Analysis of di report show say di food inflation for April dey high for Kogi for (30.52%), Ebonyi(28.07%) and Sokoto(26.09%)
Di followin state record di last food inflation Auja(18.63%), Akwa-Ibom(18.51%) and Bauchi(17.64%)
Di increase wey high pass na hin dey record for price of pharmaceutical product, vehicle spare part, and personal groomin wey dem establish, major household good, fuel and lubricant among odas
Gov Sule throw weight for back of Keffi Polo  tourney
Di Governor of Nasarawa state, Engineer Abdulahi Sule don throw hin weight for back of 2021 Keffi Polo tournament wey dem bill for 21-28 for June for Keffi
Sule tok say sport no be di only veritable tool for fosterin friendship, national unity and cultural understandin but also magnet for international diplomacy and global investment
Hin tok say di state dey proud to host and support di Keffi Ranch and e be choice sport for polo as way to showcase to di world say di state welkom prospective investor
Sule also commend di founder of Keffi Polo Ranch, Hon
Ahmed Wadada of hin tenancity, zeal and commitment to di promotion of di game for di state
Always believe to dey give back to di society
Na huge pleasure to champion di birth of polo for here and kom use di proceed benefit di orphange and education for Nasarawa state
I don dey lucky my little effort dey yield result hin tok
Tournament manager, Bashir Mohammed tell Polo Royals say di 2021 edition go beta as hin tok say many team don indicate interest to di for top laurel for di week-long fiesta
Wike, Amaechi bicker on top insecurity for Rivers
River state Governor Nyesom Wike don counter transport minister Rotimi Amaechi claim say hin link insecurity for River to Unempolyment
Amaechi don make di comment wen di defection of two former commissioner for Wike administration to di APC  for Port Harcourt
Hin don counter di imposition of  curfew for Rivers argurin say hin take di war to di camp of dem criminal wey dey terrorize di state wen hin be governor
for one statement way Wike tok, special assistant on media, Kevin Ebiri, di governor call di minister comments out
unemployment  wey dey fuel insecurity for Kaduna, Plateau, Borno, Yobe, Ondo, Ebony, Imo, Niger state wey dem All Progressive Congress APC him query
Hin tok say di minister, who be di governor wey just comot for di state get any modicum of sincerity, hin go attest to di fact say security na di sole responsiblity of di federal goment
E dey know say Amaechi na di wan wey appoint Evri Commissioner of Police wey dem post to River state since 2015
so, if security failure dey, na hin we go blame, hin point out
Governor Wike describe di minister yan on top di current imposition of curfew for di state, followin di recent attack of police formations, as unfortunate
Maybe, di minister dey hapi say di member of di proscibed indigious pipo of Biafra(IPOB) dey kill innocent policemen, wey dey protect live and property
so Amaechi dey hapi say di weapon of dis slain security personnel na hin dem hoodlums carry comot

Phil Mickelson no be di first middle age person to change hin Diet and kom engage for brain trainin for quest to feel and perform beta, but hin first to win major golf championship afta wen hin be 50
Wen Mickelson performance for PGA Championship go provide more wey no too late to pad dem career resume wit anoda major victory
E no get any reason why golf no fit be di gamewey pesin fit play for life if you dey take care of your body and you do am di right way, di Californian tok dat one afta hin beat Brooks Koepka and Louis Oosthuizen by two strokes for Kiawah Island on Sunday.
Group wey base for US plan to receive basefall for NIGERIA
Di international Sport Association (ISA) global sports bodi wey base for US, don indicate hin readiness to wake baseball and softball game for Nigeria
To dis end,  e don finish plan to build baseball sports academy for Ilorin for di first phase of di audacious project wey dem dey expect to gulp million dollars pass di kontri to develop young talents
Di president of the ISA, as he dey follow journalists tok, Jason Alan Charles, wey lead di members of the organization to di state tok say development programme go train indigenous coach dem wey dem dey expect make dem bring out di best for di young pikin dem.
He tok say; We get intension to achieve all dis one with di construction of academics,to dey train indigenous coach dem through coachin clinic, courses, classes, online video and manual among oda to avail dem requisite knowledge and ability to excel and produce world-class talents in baseball.
Accordin to ham, di programme, wey dem dey expect make e start for August for Kwara state, go focus on to dey find young talents for baseball across di state from age six to university undergraduates
Di state Director of Sports, Ibrahim Alarape sef tok, He praised ISA for di choice of Kwara state make dem control dibaseball game development programme, he tok say di sports academy go bring enthusiasm among lovers of di game.
Team Nigeria Japan camp dey open for July 3 for Tokyo Olympics
Di Federal Ministry for Youth and Sport Development don show comprehensive plan for Team Nigeria to win medals for di Tokyo Olympics
Accordin to di road map wey di Permanent Secretary of di ministry release, Nebeolisa Anako for Thursday, di final stage of local campin go apun for May 15 to July 6 for Beyelsa, Abuja, Lagos and Port Harcourt
Track and Field National Olympics Trails go apun for June 17 and July 19, as di Africa Athlectic Championship go take stage from June 22 to 26
Di last phase of di campin go be for Kisarazu, Japan, from July 3 to 23, wen di first batch of dem athletes go enter di Game Village for di Olympics proper
Nigeria  go present like 80 athletes for 10 sport for Tokyo Olympics
Wrestlin, taekwondo, table tennis, male and female baseball go dey part of di event wey Nigeria don qualify for
Order na track and field, weighliftin and rowin, canoein and sailin
Nigeria decide to narrow down her participation to sport wia she get competitive advantage to win medals
Miniter  for Youth and Sport Development Sunday Dare don maintain say Team Nigeria go improve for her performance of di last two Olympics, wia she win only two bronze for football track and field 
Meanwhile, di Nigeria female rowin team depart from Lucerne, Switzerland, on Wednesday to participate for di fnal Qualifiers for di Regatta event for di Tokyo Olympics
Ahmed Musa fit comot Pillars for June
Super Eagles captain, Ahmed Musa, don give hint say hin fit comot for Kano Pillars for June
Di former CSKA Moscow and Leicester City striker join Pillars temporary bikos say hin no get club for months
Although him refuse to say hin di next place wey hin dey go hin tok say next month, hin go know
For one interview wey hin do for Wednesday, Musa tok say no be ham go advise Nigerian players wey dey Europe to return NPFL
I no fi tok for Evribodi
Na only myself I fi tok for
I dey hapi to kom back Nigeria to kom play ball
Na mata of time
Maybe for di next month, I fit dey for Nigeria again
I dey hapi say I kom back house kom play
for now I no get concrete information but for next month, you go sabi Musa tok about di next place wey hin dey go

World number five Stefanos Tsitsipas kom from set down to kom beat Lorenzo Musetti 4-6,6-3,6-0 for Sunday and kom reach ATP final for Lyon
For Sunday final, di 22 years old Greek go face Britain Cameron Norrie wey race pass Karen Khachanov 6-1,6-1 for semi final
Norrie,25 don play for Saturday morning afta wey hin beat French hope Arthur Rinderknech 6-3,3-6,6-3 for quarter final wey dem suspend ovanight wit di  last set wey neva still play
Musetti,19, kom inside di event as alternate but make di plenti of hin chance wit win over seventh seed Felix Auger-Aliassime, Sebastian Korda and Aljaz Bedene
Di Italian teenager grab di  first set but Tsitsipas kom small small take charge
E dey important say I get dis kind match, Tsitsipas tok ham for place wey dem follow play afta di match
E make am dey humble and focus on top some detail thin wey hin fi improve kom beta on top for clay
I gats stay calm
E dey difficult make pesin dey set down and kom go refresh hinsef and kom anew for second set

TAJBank expand, dey open 3 branch for Abuja
TAJBank, na no interest bank, wey dem open three branch for Abuja as dey drive financial inclusion wen  dem dey offer innovertive financial service to dia customers
Potential customers na hin dey notice for di new technology power branch wey dey Wuse, Garki and Gudu market as dey com open account
for di openin ceremony for Abuja
Wuse market, di bank Chairman Alhaji Tanko Isiaku Gwamna tok say branch dey part of di bank mission to serve as catalyst for dem Micro, small and Medium Enterprises(MSME)
Sustainable growth for Nigeria
Hin tok say by launchin dis branch for location wey dey particular to di ebiko system of di businessman and woman, we dey fulfill awa mission to make seam bank solution wey all busniess fi access
Since di bank don open for December 2019, e don record  plenti feat wey include record profit for hin first year operation
Hin plan to quick expand hin branch network and extend hin service to six geopolitical zone
For hin tok for di event, president of di National Association of Nigeria Trader(NANTS), Ken Ukaoha advice TAJBank as dey bring interest free bankin services to traders wey dey Abuja
for true we go meet strength wey be di relationship symbol
NALDA go engage 2,000 fish farmer, 1,040 wey be soil scientist for Borno
Di executive secretary of di National Agricultural Land Development Agency (NALDA), Prince Paul Ikonne, tok say di agency di engage about 2,000 fish farmers and dem go start di trainin of 1,040 soil doctors for Borno State.
Ikonne tell journalist dem for Abuja afta meetin wit di governor of Borno state, Professor Babagana
Umara
Zulum, say di discussion wey dey between NALDA and Borno State goment na awa fish farmin programme, wey we dey engage pass 2,00 faremer
Born State don submit dia complete list and don provide place
As we dey tok, contractor don dey di site and for 10 place of project
Di governor of Borno State don fully key inside Mr President idea to achieve food security, irrespective of di challenge wey di state dey encounter
Di governor dey make ham easy for di NALDA to function and for farmers to dey for house as dem dey farm him tok
Di NALDA(angency wey dey direct to di President)President tok am last month approval to engage 30,000 soil doctors and extend service provider di kontri
Di trainin go start for Borno state for early next month
Hin tok say di  agency go forcus virtually Evrithin for di agric chain for di state bikos dey get good infrastructure for di place and plenti machinery and equipment, as processin mill
food security Nigeria don rise again as CBN carry up intervention
Di rice pyramids don return for di kontri
Di maize pyramid don return too
Dis dem pyramid don dot di skylines for state like Kebbi, Niger, Katsina, Jigawa, Ekiti, and di rest
for oda like Lagos, Edo, River and di rest, CBN finance industry dey wey dey maximize di farm produce to make somethin
Remember say di pyramid dem dey dat time lose for Nigeria until di Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) wey Mr Godwin Emefiele dey lead, initiate new focus on top agriculture, industries, small and medium scale enterprise dem and oda area of di real sector.
Adults for Nigeria wey still young wey dey for dat kind 30years neva see any agriculture produce pyramids until wey e no tay wey CBN make ham apun
Wen CBN launch di Anchor Borrower programme ABP for five year wey we don use comot, e no for true anticipate di scale of success di programme go record and di impact across di kontri
Five years wey we don use pass, Nigeria agricultue landscape don change from good and e no get region or state wey dey behind
E dey significant to note say di benefit don almost distribute from di north to di south pass N700 billion wey dey don release for di target crop and animal, and dia value chain
As he dey tok recently for Ado Ekiti for di public unveilin of the Ekiti rice pyramid project and flag-off of di wet season rice cultivation, di CBN Governor, Mr Emefiele, tok say ova N300bn of di moni wey almost reach N700bn wey dey don already distribute on top agriculture, dey don share am for di southern part of country includin Lagos, Edo, Ekiti, and Ondo state dem.
Hin tok say 21 agriculture commodity na e dey target pass di rest wey be Rice, maize, wheat, oil palm, cocoa and di rest
He tok say;From di beginnin till date, we don give 3,107,890 farmers moni for di cultivation of 3,801,397 hectares across 21 commodity through 23 Participatin Financial Institutions for di 36 State of the Federation and FCT.
Emefiele tok say dem fit see di positive impact of di Anchor Borrower Programme or all ourr agrarian community as e don bring hope kom di farmin population through di timely delivery of agricultural inputs and di provision of  market wey get guarantee for dia outputs for price wey di market go determine. 
Hin tok say ABP don fit support some of awa macro economic objective as to dey allow employment opportunity wey dey drive financial inclusion and to dey provide access to finance for awa rural community
For under 2020 wet season RIFAN CBN partnership, hin tok say CBN finance 221, 450 farmer for di cultivation of 221,450 hactare for 32 state
Di pyramidswey dem open today dey part of di harvest from di different field from di South-West and oda neighbourin States to demonstrate di spread of di movement and provide evidence say rice production dey viable for all di State wey dey di Federation.
hin tok say pass RIFAN, CBN support number of prime/private anchor
Omoluabi farm( Ekiti), time seller(Ogun), Wems Agro(Ondo) and di rest dey wait disbursement for 2021 season
CBN big support for agriculture na to ensure say food dey sufficient, empowerment for dem small farmer and to dey help save foriegn exchange for Nigeria as small food import dey apun
CBN don continue to carry up investment for di agriculture space
E don start di 2021 wet season farm investment
Emefiele tok say we get optimistic outlook for di 2021 wet season
We go bring to bear our learnin experience ova di past years, adoption of hybrids dem and high yieldin varieties dem, supply of inputs wey go dey on time to take advantage of di plantin seasons dem, and good market linkage use sustain our effort to dey increase production.
We don plant minimum one million hactares of rice through combination of RIFAN farmer and prime/private anchors for each plantin seeason for 2021
awa backward integration dey drive wit rice millers e dey also gain momentum as we intend to finance some millers to grow dia own paddy for dis wet season
He tok say; We get aggressive production plans for maize, wheat, soybeans, cassava, sorghum and cassava, 
Di governor sef indicate say di CBN go dey hep states wit moni to clear land as land clearin na big problem for farmin.
Land clearin, access for irrigation, and availability of high yieldin seeds don remain di greatest challenge to increase agricultural production for di South and we don provide long term finance option dem wey go dey give more land for agricultural production nationwide.
Dem create di Accelerated Agricultural Development Scheme (AADS) and di Private-Sector Led Accelerated Agricultural Development Scheme (P-AADS) say make dem solve dis issue for di State Goment and Private Sector players respectively.
He tok say; Di provision of oda farm wey relate to di infrastructure like irrigation facilities, rural access road, mechanization services, logistics and post-harvest handlin activities fit dey under dis intervention. 
He tok sef say if farmers pay dia loans, CBN fit put hand for more areas thus urgin di farmers wey benefit from the loans make dem pay back.
Loan repayment na di hallmark of every credit wey pipo collect and the sustainability of di programme dey on top farmers ability and willingness to repay dia loan, and we dey engage dem wella wit dem to increase dia trust for di system.
The pyramid dem wey dey unveil  today na harvests from di financed fields dem wey dem been submit as part of loan repayment by farmers dem under di RIFAN-CBN programme.
He tok say;To further create value and transfer dis gain across di value chain, we don map rice millers wey go dey off-take di paddies, and we go track di release of dia outputs to di market, as we dey strive to manage inflation and grow di rice value chain in Nigeria. 
To support di growth wey dem record for dis drive to attain self-sufficiency for food production and to moderate price dem of agricultural commodities, Mr President don approve di resuscitation of di Nigeria Commodity Exchange (NCX).
A vibrant commodity exchange enhance post-harvest handlin, guarantee effective pricin for farmers dem, minimize di adverse effect of middlemen and commodity hoarders and ultimately transfer to gains from primary production  oda nodes of di value chain.
Considerin di kind huge market and high population of Nigeria wit di urgent nid to end poverty, it don successfully demonstrate di nid to luk inside by takin advantage of di available fertile land, perennial river bodies and human resource dem for di production of rice.
Di first two year of di programme(2015 reach 2017) record significant increase for rice production wit decrease for rice importation
For example to dey carri rice kom kontri from Thailand fall 644,131 metric tone for September 2015 to 20,000 matric tone for September 2017, wish account for drop pass 90%
Di success so far record dey possible bikos of di Anchor borrowers program wey Federal goment introduce for conjunction wit di Rice Farmers Association of Nigeria (RIFAN) dat one no not only improve rice production but don also enhance di quality through de-stoning.
 hin tok say; E don see di increase for di number of local rice mills
He tok say federal goment share di moni to di Anchor and in conjunction wit di participatin States, for land clearin, provision of seeds for plantin, inputs like  knapsack sprayers, tube wells, pumpin machines, ploughs, combined harvesters, rice millin machines and production lines, packagin na hin dey provide.
Furthermore, analysis of di ABP programme show say funds wey dem provide for low interest make am possible: easy access to rice farmers dem; economies of scale as plenti of farmers na hin dem enlist into di programme; enhance di rice value chain in form of finance for primary producers go processors  handlers  wholesalers  storage  marketin (branding)  export; improvement of farmers dem fortunes; and employment generation.
Di remainin na food sufficient, so tey poverty banish and insecurity, generation of revenue as farmer go pay tax and improvement for economy as naira gain value
Hin kom note say di ease of production of rice wey be di staple wey get value pass for Nigeria don successful practice and celebrate for some state like Kebbi, Jigawa, Sokoto, Niger, Kwara, Ebonyi
E dey grate say today , Ekiti State don now join di train as participant for di Anchor Borrowers Programme of di CBN, wey dey partnership wit National bodi Rice farmer Association of Nigeria wey Anchor Borrower lead
Bode George describe constitution review as charade
former Deputy National Chairman of di pipo Demcratic paryi (PDP)Chief Olabode George, don describe di constitution review wey dey go  by di National Assembly as charade
Hin tok say di position wey dey unanimous of di Nigeria pipo na total overhaul of di present constitution addin, nothin else go do
Accordin to am, genuine remedy make dem go check di report of di 2014 Constitutional Conference again, wey he note say dey don generally applaud sake of di sweepin breadth of hin equity and democratic balance to correct di prejudicial and unworkable structures wey dey ground now.
For one open letter to  Senate President, George fault di process of di constitution review wey dey go on, especially di public hearin wey apun last week, as he note say plenti pipo na hin dey purposely deny di openness of democratic contributions.
Hin tok say di hearing dey stage manage, anchored for prejudice, frame for puppeteerin indentification
Alternative view na e dey cast aside, fling inside pit
Dis one no correct
Dis no dey just
e really dey show say di Committee no dey ready  for true and thorough representation wey be di will of Nigeria pipo
e appear say to dey work wit script near predetermined end
di contribution dey narrow, over partisan, one side, lackin for plural contribution logic
Nigeria pipo no dey gree am
Di structure of di present contitution too get ojoro, e get flaw and e dey mingle wit inequities, he say mare review no go dey enough to correct all di glarin wrong wey dey afflict Nigeria state
PDP leader tok say as a believerfor di unity of di Nigerian state, he tok say di nation fit emerge stronger and better only wen all di component units form our nation fit get sense of belongingness and general accommodation wey em no go dey look tribe or sectarian belief, wen evribodi  go be di same witout ethnic bias, wen merit na di sole determinant of public positions.
We fit only achieve am wit dem pipo and constitution
Na wetin we suppose work for be dis instead charade and present jamboree wey Senator Ovie omo Agege 
 E don do for all dis false and misleadin engagement
Make we renew awa nation through as we dey pursuit di truth and resolve on di fairness doctrine
Dia in reside di national salvation; hin add
Wan love letter wey dem write give Mallam Nasir el-Rufa
I been don make my mind up to write give you openly before I see di viral video by Dr Shadi Sabehwey dey beg you do wetin you wan d wit human feelins regardin di 20,000 staff of the Kaduna State Goment wey you propose to sack.
I too agree wit Dr Sabeh say pipo say make dem kip pipo for service just to play dem as social service
Nigeria no fit afford am now
awa Economy no dey develop 10th as US economy take be
Na 1930s wen e go through di Great Depression
Howeva, Dr Sabeh dey right to extend say Keynesianism don back world ova and goment must necessary think about di impact of hin policy on di pipo wey hin dey service
We know say for Nigeria, goment unfortunately no  believe say dey kom here kom serve di pipo, but na awa duty to work togeda to change dat unfortunate misunderstandin and disconnection
E get oda issue wey dey kom from Kaduna state presently
For true di state under your goment dey don again mention am as one of di best governed and we hear of your achievement for infrastructural development
Di danger to dey travel to Kaduna don hamper many of us to kom see dem achievement, but most pipo know say El-Rufai na man of achievement and stickler for standards
Di Federal Capital Territory(FCT) no fit forget you in hurry
plenti pesin rue your absence as minister
plenti go remember you for dread
Unfortunately, plenti of di village wey you clear and plenti of di shanties wey you demolish don kom back dis time wit vengeance
wetin?
Di goment over time don make no plan for dis poor folks, and human being  like water and must find dia level
If u dey fly go Abuja for any point for time, make you look down from di window of your aeroplane and u go see how bad shanties don metastasize since you don comot
Any minister wey go try and correct dis anomaly go get millions of dem refugees for hin hand
for your time, na 500,000 refugees we don get
For 2006, Nigeria get di second highest number of displace pipo for di world afta wey Iraq due to hin action
I remember say I write give you den through my Daily Trust column, dey appeal for di same thin wey Dr Sabeh dey call for human face
I quote timeless Chinese wisdom as dey remind you your vision na one year, kom cultivate flowers
If na 10, cultivate trees
But if na eternity, cultivate human
Di idea den na say make e go easy on you hard rhetoric say anyone wey dey earn less  dan N50,000 make e return to village, bikos Abuja no dey for di poor
You tok say dis na national TV and e dey unfortunate and unfeelin
Na for sure say most bourgeoisie thin wey pesin don eva tok for office
If anybodi wan lay claim say Abuja be dia inheritance, e for be dose Gwaris wey dem displace from dia ancestral land, plenti time witout compensation
For what point Abuja bikom playground/inheritance for di nouveau riche
As we dey watch TV for 2006, families wey no get place to stay inside rainy season, wit dia mattress on dia head and dia little pikin for dia hand, we hear di storie of pipo wey kil diasef bikos both dia house and dia business na hin dey destroy di same day.
I learn from one lady, who dey act as secretary to some of your meetin dem dat time , how you take enjoy displacin dose poor pipo at once, how Drs Oby Ezekwesili and Okonjo-Iweala dey beg you no change your mind and dem use style call you sadist as you comot for di meetin go demolish anoda place.
E sound much like di folks dem for di south of di USA wey dey take joy to dey hang demsef anoda negroa
Kaduna no only get bloat civil service but also problem wit indiscriminate buildin of all kind structure wia dey suppose be like Evri wia for Nigeria
Abuja claim to get master plan which no one suppose see, derfore making am political plan no be geographical one
Kaduna no be Abuja, and di pipo wey dey der fi no get di mettle to sand Hurricane Nasir, as we take do here for Abuja till 2007 under your Iron grip
You know say u fit easily craze wen dey turn you on
You confess am yoursef
You no care which pesin ox dem kill and dis fit be good attribute to turn like our kontri around , but e fit dey deadly for plenti plenti poor folks, especially for Kaduna wey be simply agrarian and civil service state.
Compensation go dey for example dose one wey u go demolish dia house and shop
Anyone dey hear dia tor iof how dey kom about di land or space or dey don tell dem to go back hell?
Na True say make we strive to achieve glistenin city in in oda to achieve accolades from far and near, no to mind di human coasts
Make goment calibate solely to appeal to di whim and fancies of di moni class
look Banana Island and Turnbull Street for Ikoyi
Di oda day, di well feed owners of property der push one video wia dey fiilm how dia pristine space don encroach by poor invader
E remain small make dem call di poor pipo as vermin
Di pipo no be di invader but lack of integrated, inclusive plannin
As educated wey we claim be, we no choose to learn di nuance lessons from di place wey we visit for abroad
How anybodi fit think say di model of Banana Island go work foreva wen provision no dey on how servants, drivers, gardeners and oda low pipo weey dey dis oga for mansion dem go survive; how dem go eat dia lunch, how them go live and sleep close to wer dey suppose resume for 4am evri day?
Style and tech for 2021 Nissan Ariya
more auto firms dey investigate heavily for electric vehicle production wey dem describe as di future of automobiles
One of di EV offerin wey dem just reveal na di Nissan Ariya
Dis na high tech electic SUV wit 310 mile range
E kom wit stylin wey no change dramatically from 2019
concept car wey get di same name
Nissan join di SUVs market segment for 2016 wit di launch of di Qashqai
Di company for hin last statement, say di Ariya na di ultimate expression of style and technology
Power and Range
Power kom from two electric motors, but dia output, range and how plenti wheels dey drive depend on which model dem choose
Even di entry-level two-wheel drive 63 kilowatts per hour(kWh) model fit take you 233 miles between charge and punt comot 215bhp
 87kWh version of Ariya dey above dat one, wit range wey increase go 310 miles and power wey boost reach to 239bhp, and den versions of di two cars wit Nissan new e-4orce four-wheel drive system (and lower ranges later) sef.
Den for di top of di range sit  di Ariya e-4orce 87kWh performance, wey offer reach 389bhp and range of 248 mile
for term of chargin, low power versions of di Ariya include 7.4kW charging cable, wey di more powerful versions kom wit 22kW three phase charger
Di Ariya fit support chargin for 130kW
Di Ariya kom wit V-Motion grille wey feature 3D pattern wit di brand new logo wey light up thank you 20 LEDs
for more style, Nissan dey offer six two tone paint and fawa full-bodi colawa combination, wey dey part of dem na di signature Copper paint
Black roof dey part wit two-tone paint
Set of sporty 19-inch aluminium wheel kom strandard and di 20-inches dey optional
Di space and di price
Two-wheel drive version of di Ariya get 466 litre of space available for dia boots to allow user to pack more holiday luggage but di four-wheel drive versions of di Ariya get small space
for di interior, two large 12.3 inch display for di infotainment screen and drive instrument gauge cluster
E kom wit Apple Carplay, Android Auto, and Amazon Alexa
Di slim profile Zero Gravity seat dey hep provide additional legroom for both front and back seat passenger
Di Ariya EV platform make am easy for dem engineer to free up cabin space for unique ways, as to dey mount di climate control system under di hood wia combustion engine go don be
Transmission tunnel no dey necessary wit Evs and di Ariya flat floor dey generate plenti passenger and cargo space
Verily na time to ask for help
Sake of dia accomplishments ova di years, many readers not fit really understand  wetin apun to di military for di last many years, particularly as e dey affect di fight against di Boko Haram insurgents, bandits and di insolent kidnappers dem.
awa military don get distinguish record for di field startin for regional and international peace kipin
For independence for 1960 wen we join di United  Nations, we don immediately start to contribute awa armed force personnel to peace kipin efforts
Dem tok say awa troop don acquit dimsef creditable for Congo 1960-64, Tanzania 1960-62 and Pakistan 1965-66
By di time wey awa civil war break out for 1967, awa troop don already get fightin experience wey fi don kom to help crush well armed and determin secessionist movement for mere 30 month
afta, dis prowess  of awa troop make dem dey very sought afta by di United Nation weneva and wiaeva conflict dey, to contribute to peace kipin force and international military contribution
awa troops don serve Evriwia
For 1978 we dey Lebanon as part of UNFIL, Chadfor 1981, wit Iraq border UNIMOG for 1988, Kuwait UNICOM for 1991, Angola 91, Namibia 89, Cambodia 92, Yugoslavia 92 
Na true near home for Sierra Leonne and Liberia, awa troop and di resource Nigeria commit make di difference for those kontris to fall apart or to remain intact
For 2007 dis kontri dey position wet we fit get confidence for di ability of our Army as force wey strong, say hin be voiced opposition to AFRICOM, one combatant command wey USA create to dey watch ova Al Qaeda and oda terrorists operations for Africa.
Di USA back down to dey establish di command post for Africa soil, bikos Nigeria,  South Africa and Libya voice dey loud opposition to di plan
In fact, Nigeria too dey belligerent for hin opposition say di goment tok tok pesin tok say we no only reject AFRICOM for Nigeria soil but also e no go wan see am for Africa kontri dem
Di  rejection dey loud and clear and di US gats accede, make dem allow AFRICOM berth for Stuttgart, Germany wia e go maintain oda combatant command, since dey don close world war II
But honestly we must admit say thins don turn away for awa armed force for di last 10 years
Di fight against Boko Haram armed insurgent don run inside quagmire
no be only dat one but oda form of insurgency  don crop up for di form of wholesale to dey flourish kidnappin industry and oda form of bandit
nobodi fi don dey able to accurately pinpoint why di fight against di Boko Haram insurgents wey plenti consider as ragtag assemblage, don confound awa armed force
we think say awa force don lack material and di whole nation raise for unison to support di President wen dey want billions direct from Federation Account to buy arms
dey draw moni, dey spend am and maybe dey buy arm but condition merely deteriorate wit insurgency kom precarious kom dey spread across di nation
Governor Sani Bello tok plenti wen hin warn Boko Haram fighter don raise dia infamous flag for hin domain and dey walkin distance of Abuja. di Federal Capital
Mohammed Ali Ndume, wey be di senator wey dey represent Borno South don dey Evriwia for di media lately, dey decry say di deficits for di war effort
Senator Ndume suppose know, bikos hin be di chairman of di Senate Committee for di Army
Vibrant and Passionate, Ndume neva don dey dey short of  word advancin di kos of hin constituency wey dey presently besieged by Boko Haram insurgent
Hin gah put am plainly across say di entire arm force lack di of material to accomplish di myriad of assigment before dem
on top dat dey lack di number wey dey need
dat go maybe explain why despite dia pedigree, awa arm force dey bogged down by number of ragtag brigands
 To kom worse mata, di casualties dey raise by di day
Di glory statistics wey Samuel Aruwan, give few days ago, Kaduna state commissioner of internal Affairs and International Security, dem dey fear reach
Hin report say for three month between January and March 2021, bandit wey dey terrorise Kaduna State don kill 323 and don con abduct 949 citizen
I think say similar figure fit show up from neighbour wey dey Katsina, Niger and Zamfara State if dey kip  statistics
Time don kom for change of heart, maybe do wetin fit don dey unthinkable  some year ago
I dey hapi say dey don win di President for di argument
Dis one sho wella wen for one televised virtual meetin wit di US Secretary of State, Antony Blinken he specifically ask di US make dem reconsider relocatin the US Africa Command (AFRICOM) from Stuttgart go Africa so e go dey close to di theatre of operations and e go hep strengthen di ongoin efforts to check di security situation.
I see di exchange close and clear I see di President grimace wen hin kom to di point for hin speech wia hin ask di US to move AFRICOM  kom Africa
Na di kind surrender wey only Generals understand, as painful duty to save territory, fightin men and material
42nd Kaduna fair KADCCIMA don strategise to develop economy
Di Kaduna Chamber of Commerce Industry Mines and Agriculture(KADCCIMA)for Monday dey organise seminar to discuss strategies wey go aid for di development of di nation economy through domestic production
As he dey tok for di seminar on Monday as part of as wetin dey don plan do for di ongoin 42nd Kaduna International Trade Fair wit them, Promotin Domestics Production to use Mitigate di Current Economic Challenge dem, di chairman of di occasion and di Managin Director of di Bank of Industry Lagos branch, Dr Aliyu Dikko, tok say white-collar job no dey again.
Hin,derfore,advise Nigerians especially di youth to embrace entrepreneurship as plenti opportunity dey for private sector
Di Kaduna Chamber of Commerce Industry Mines and Agriculture(KADCCIMA)for Monday dey organise seminar to discuss strategies wey go aid for di development of di nation economy through domestic production
Alhaji Adhama point say textile industry don face major set back due to say plenti challenge like electricity and advocate say Nigeria need mordern restructurin like restructurin wey dey  super
Hin con urge di goment and di private sector to look back kom figure out wia di problem take start from so as to treat di problem kom find lasting solution 
Di Governor of Kaduna State, Nasir El-Rufai wey dey report say Permanent Secretary led, Kaduna State Ministry of Business, Innovation and Technology, Dr Haliru Musa Soba tok say di theme of di 42nd Trade Fair fit am wella as many businesses still dey try survive from di setback wey COVID-19 pandemic kos.
Hin tok say di ministry don establish business clinic so as to attend businesses  to dey regularise cusinesse
Akwa Utd reclaim top spot as dey draw wit Rangers
Akwa United for yesterday play goaless wit Enugu Rangers for Uyo for 2021 Nigeria Professional Football League, NPFL week 22 fixure but claim di top spot wit superior goal difference
For Sunday, Kano Pillars wey dem force to draw 1-1 for Katsina United move go di top of di table wit 41 point wen Akwa United wey neva play Ranger kom down enter second position wit 40 point
Na e make am be say, di draw for yesterday ill-tempered draw wit Ranger return di Promise kiper to di top of di table wit 41 point for Pillars wey get inferior goa difference wey be plus 8  drop go second
To go by di recent performance wey Rangers, wey make dem see suffer 0-1 for dia against Rivers United for last Sunday, Akwa United see favour to win di maximum point
Afta wey dem play fruitless first half, Akwa United make triple substitution for di 65th minute wey dey use comot Mfon Udoh, Ubong Friday and Ikechukwu Nwani for Nasiru Jibril, Wisdom Fernado and Ibrahim Abubakar Aliyu
Di introduction of di trio prove impactful as Akwa United turn di heat on Rangers defence as pesin wey dem carry enta Aliyu force save Mutawakilu Seidu for di 66th minute
Ranger kom get dia chance for di 80th minute wen dey give free kick  for di arc afta wey Dare Ojo foul Ibrahim Olawoyin but Kelvin Itoya fire am straight for Akwa United wall
Di  visitor kom end di match wit 10-men followin di marchin oda to dia Ivorian import, Issif Traore wey foul Charles Atshimene for di edge of di goalie
Di resultant free kick for added time na hin Olisa Ndah waste wey hin shot am wide from close range
As access to fertiliser dimsa farmer devise means to dey generate manure from neem
As di hope to dey get goment subsidise fertiliser dis farmin season dim further, some farmer for Jigawa State don adopt di technique to dey turn neem leaves inside fertiliser
di farmers especially those for Maigatari Local goment Area say dem decide to shift attention towards usin local methods of enrichin dia soils for beta productivity as a result of di spike in di price of inorganic fertilizers
NPK fertiliser now bi costs over N12,000 per 50kg in di open markert, and di usually subsidised one by di federal goment which usually sold for N5,000 may not be feasible dis year
Di Minister of Agriculture, Mohammed Sabo Nanono, don tok say di federal, goment go, from dis year, hands off for buying and selling of fertiliser but go play a supervisory role
Plenti stakeholder don interprete di minister stand to mean goment witdrawal of fertiliser subsidy, so tey  farmers no get option dan to buy from di open market
as di rainy season don be for plenti part of di kontri, farmers dey forced to find manure by any means
Dis na di major reason wey make new innovertion dey among di Jigawa farmers
how farmers take use neem leaves for manure
neem leaves wey fall from di tree dey heep by di farmers dem kom put for inside gutters and drains kom leave am to decompose
One of di farmers tok say dem dey dry di decomposed leaves before dem finally take am go farm
Many farmers wey dey for town agree as although di practice kos blockage of dia drains, e get beta impact for dia soil
Mallam Imrana Adamu, one farmer for Maigatari tok say him don dey into di practice for some time now and him dey satisfied wit di way di compost dey help am maintain di fertility for him soil
But unlike some farmers for di town wey use drains dey carryout di process, Mallam Imrana tok say him use him side dey decompose di organic fertiliser
Him tok say, mix di dry neem leaves wit ash, con sprinkle water put for di mixture con allow di process take hin course
I fit assure you say e dey veri effective for di enrichin of di soil
I don dey practice am dey see positive result, I still dey pracrtice am
On top di efficacy and effectiveness of dis practice, Dr Yunusa Muhammed Shuaibu, lecturer for di Department of Crop Production, Abubakar Tafawa Balewa University (ATBU), Bauchi, tok say di practice na form of decompostin wey speed up mineralisation con enrich di soil as e dey supply nutrients like phosporus wit calcium to am
Rilwan, wey be Corp member, contribute dis piece from Jigawa State
Pinnick been inaugurate NFF Technical and Development Committee
Di president of di Nigerian Football Federation, Mr Amaju Pinnick for yesterday inaugurate di Technical and Development of di federation, wey charge di members dem to dig deep inside dem purse of quality knowledge wit experience make dey for steer Nigeria football go higher level
All members dem for dis special committee collect appointment based on track record and wealth of experience
Di NFF get high confidence in you and una ability make una enhance di technical prowess of awa National Teams make dem fashion brilliant and workable policies
witout any sweet tok, di technical and Development Committee na di engine room of di NFF
We sabi wetin you fit contribute individually and collectively to uplift di standard of di Nigeria game
On awa part, we go give all di support wey you need to succeed for dis mission
Ibrahim Musa Gusau, Chairman of Chairmen wey represent Mr Pinnick, tok for di inauguration for Abuja
Di committee get Chairman, Alhaji Ahmed Yusuf Fresh, wit Chief Felix Anyansi-Agwu as Vice Chairman
Members be Etuburn Paul Bassey, Alhaji Aminu Balele Kurfi, Barr
Isaac Danladi, Alhaji Dahiru Sadi, Mr Victor Ikpeba and Alhaji Mutiu Adepoju
Di NFF Technical Director, Mr Austin Eguavoen na di Secretary
Understand Nigeria democracy, dictatorship and spirit of nationalism for chad
Kalid Yusuf Tebo
Di operation of political parties for democracy na systematic, flexible and elastic wen dem compare am wit political parties outside democracy
Howeva, political parties for democratic state dey distinctive wit dose for non-democartic states, especially for dia mode of operations
Sometimes, dem share partial similarities and roles
Yet, di roles for dose wey dey democracy no dey distinguishable from to advocate transparency, accountability, integrity wit quality of choosing representatives for favour of national interest
Nevadiless, for Nigeria, Buhari na di president and commander-in-chief for di army forces.
Him been go through rigorous democratic political parti process before him go emerge victorious for pre-primary, primary and post primary elections
As member of political parti, him be like any oda member and possess no legal proceedin use influence di servin governor, servin senator and member house of reps for under di impression of di same political parti for democracy as far as say good governance na di mata of di day
Dis gats do wit parti political exercise for rulin ova di affairs of hin members wen di need kom
Contrastingly, Buhari participation for decision to make hin minimal compare to di late by Chad bikos of dia policital system differences and leadership modus operandi
Buhari dey less sensitive for governance, hin dey less powerful over some national affairs and hin dey effective legislatively
No be like by pesin wey dey sensitive, wey dey powerful and wey dey strong bikos of hin non democratic identity and policitical ideology
make we say, di edge of governance for Chad na e dey say e get sef center feature witout collective effort wey di pipo make wey dem dey rule
In fact, di system allow larger portion of corruption and manipulation of single interest, meanwhile silencin di voice of dia member durin policital tok, public opinion and to dey make decision
for di sake of democracy, and sense  of nationalism for Nigeria, no one fi or go personally decide to do wetin anythin between executive, legislature and judiciary
no mata how patriotic di persin fit be
one most act accordin to di constitutional guideline as well as to dey pass hin idea to di three tiers of goment for critique, suggestion and support
for example, if Buhari dey eager to kpeme for di battlefield, hin must first identify di legality of sacrificin hin life constitutionally as President of Nigeria wey wan fight Boko Haram in favor of national interest
Hin must understand say hin ability politically and democratically before hin go pay di price
Anyway, Nigeria no be Chad, for here we dey operate democracy no be military and dictatorship
for Chad, by say dem adopt political parti for unitary system of goment wey dey link to dictatorship
By di way, di system wey hin enjoy delibrately lack  check and balance if dey compare wit di bicameral legislature
If you fit remember, di Dbys political party na Patriotic Salvation Movement; di party dey built on spirit of nationalism and di aim na to produce patriotic mindsets wit sophisticated ideology and spiritual high sense of nationalism.
wetin dey surprise
by di one wan remain and hin answer di clarion call of hin parti MPS
True nationalist for tru tru
Khalid Yusuf Tebo na hin write from Yobe
why we go address food price instability CBN
Di Central Bank of Nigeria(CBN) don warn say hin economic and financial policies go amount to nothin if di problem wey dey around food price volatility fit no address as nation
Di governor of di bank wey high pass, Mr Godwin Emefile,make ham for remark for message to di input distribution flag off and loan recovery drive under di RIFAN-CBN Anchor Borrower Programme (ABP)
Emefiele, Mr Edward Adamu deliver hin message, CBN Deputy Governor, Corporate Services, note say wit population of about 200 million people, to dey import any major food item will continue to dey drain di kontri external reserves, export our jobs go kontris dem wer dem dey produce di food items and spoil our commodity value chains as we no go dey able to guarantee di supply of raw materials for di agro-allied companies.
The CBN governor, wey dey stress di commitment of di present administration make dem get sef-sufficiency for rice production by di end of 2020 dry season, note say di Anchor Borrowers Programme don prove to be game-changer for di financin of smallholder farmers for Nigeria as e don change agricultural financin and e still be di heart of di kontri agricultural transformation initiatives.
Hin tok for di programme say, pass to dey be tool for economic empowerment, job creation and weak redistribution, don galvanise financial inclusion for rural communities
On loan recovery, Emefiele tok say despite di devastation wey plenti flood incidentsfor di 2018 wet season kos, farmers been dey submit produce and cash as part of dia loan repayment but dem beg di association make dem intensify efforts for dat side sake od di partnership and sustainability of di programme.
The CBN governor tok say afta rice, the Commodity Association Windowdon expand to cover more commodities like maize, cassava, sorghum, soybean, ginger etc and e hopesay di efforts go contribute to the national aggregates and hep hin drive go economic diversification.
Dem fit force all of us for good for di space of ginger equality
Femi Adeyemo
Na undisputed fact say for di history part wey plenti pass, women neva enjoy equal right
Na only sevaal decades wey don pass, di general belief wey dey surround women role dey restricted to duties for house, to dey born pikin and to dey work for kitchen
Dis perception bring plenti amount of disregard and prejudice against women, no be only for di family and community level, but glarin misrepresentation and stereotypical portrayals for mainstreal media
Pass all, dey no allow women to dey make important decision makin, leadership position, access to high education and professional aspiration
Make we say one of di notable shifts for di movement for woman right na di Women Strike for Equality for August 26, 1970
Di strike wey take place for di United State to celebrate di 50th anniversary of di passin of di 19th Amendment, wey effectively give women for America di right to vote
Na like 50,000 woman gadther for di protest, and for dat time, e dey noted to be di largest gatherin wey dey represent  women for history
Di strike get specific goal, wit equal opportunity for di workforce and free child care
For today, movement wey dey respoonsible for political rights for women na hin dey use view ham, social equality for relationship and inkom equality for di United State and for di world
For Nigeria, gender inequality don heavily pervaded society
Woman carry like 49:33 per cent of di Nigeria population, wey dey approximate to 99.13 million for total
Howeva, female participation for formal and informal structure, get and kom carry key decision makin remain insignificant
Dis dey largely bikos of discriminatory social norms, marginalization and economic disparity, wey dictate di live of women for Nigeria
Accordin to NOI Polls, wey wan identify socio-economic challenges wey women dey face, di result show say 42 per cent no get financial empowerment, 35 per cent no get moni, 33 per cent no get access to good education , 19 per cent don dey domestic and sexual abused, and 17 per cent face gender discrimination for employment.
howeva, recent development for Nigeria and pass di world, na proof say thins dey change
year wey pass, if u don tell pipo say woman do hold executive position for organisation or political institution, plenti go don show disbelief
On March 1, 2021, Dr Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala, wey be one Nigeria political figure and economist, bikom di first woman and first African wey go serve as di Director-General of di World Trade Organization, na landmark achievement for women and Africans evriwer for di world.
Di victory,and plenti oda, don bikom clear sign say female empowerment, eqality, and leadership dey necessary to foster positive change for society
we need all hand for deck to close gender gap
We don make great progress for gender equality and we no fit allow ham make e erod
we need act now to ensure say wen we continue to dey respond to di health and economic crisis, we go kom find way to progress women economic empowerment and equality, for education, for house and for workplace
For P&G, we go kip to use di voice of awa company for forum as we see equal to drive tok and action for issue wey mata
Na wetin Adil Farhat tok, di Managin Director pf Procter and Gamble Nigeria, for di company flagin of gender equality summit, WeSeeEqual Summit, wey dem dey partnership wit di UN Women
During di summit, Dr Zainab Bagudu, di First Lady of Kebbi State describ di #WeSeeEqual Summit as platform wey dey inspire to motivate change for Nigeria towards gender inequality, as she dey tok di importance of collaboration between private and public institutions for di fight against gender inequality.
E dey important make individual and organization make dem recognize say we fit dey force for good for di space of gender equality
awa joint effort as citizen wey we be, neighbours and humans go ensure say di opportunity and resource wey we need to secure and preserve gender equality
We need new, radical collaboration wey fi focus on di financial source, but make dem bring all awa partners for di start
make we  look 70s, 80s and even large part of di 90s, we fit tok am as say na significant improvement to dey reduce gender inequality for Nigeria, no delay  we still dey for back
Wen you luk di 17 action points of di Development Goals wey dey fit sustain, wey be di global roadmap wey you fit understand pass to shared human progress,e dey impossible to overlook di centrality of hin call for gender equality and to dey reduce inequalities.
Indeed,E no dey probable say di world fit reach significant success for almost any action area of SDGs  as dem dey ensure quality health care, education and sanitation for evribodi to reduce poverty, end hunger, provide productive employment or enable strong institutions  witout say dem achieve wella for gender equality and dey reduce inequalities.
Private organisation gas play dia part to facilitate gender equality
Also, need go dey make evribodi take space and amplify gender equality, to see say beta future for all woman
Mr Femi na hin write from Lagos
EU leader na hin sign Brexit deal as UK MPs debate ratification
European Union leaders dem don signed, get dia post-Brexit trade deal wit Britain and dey send am go London on top one RAF jet on Wednesday,as dey put dia seal on one drawn-out divorce hours before di Ukend dia half-century European experiment.
Ursula von der Leyen and Charles Michel wey dia two be UE chiefs, di head of di European Commission and European Council, smile for one brief televise ceremony to put dia name to di 1,246 page Trade and  Cooperation and agreement
Di road too far
Time don reach make we put Brexit  for awa back
 Von der Leyen na hin tok say; Na for Europe dem make awa future
Britain go comot for Europe single market and custom union by 11:00pm(2300GMT)for Thursday, di end of hard year and of post-Brexit transition period wey dey mark by serious and tortuos trade negociation
but first di hafty document, wey dem bound for blue leather, na hin dey fly wit Royal Air Force go London for Prime Minister Boris Johnson to join hin signature, as di UK parliament begin rush debate on top di deal before dey rish deadline
Introducin di legislature make dem ratify ham, Johnson tell lawmaker hin herald new relationship wey dey between Britain and EU as sovereign equal, wey friendship join dem, commerce, history, interest and value
 Hin tok say; Wit dis bill we dey go be friendly neighbour, we go be friend and ally di EU fi have
He add say; London and Brussels go work togeda weneva our value and interests na di same, as we dey fulfil di sovereign wish of di British pipo make dem stay under dia own sovereign laws wey dia own sovereign parliament do.
dem dey anxious as dem dey wait
Michal echo di sentiment for Brussels, as he dey vow say two side go work shoulder to shoulder on top major issues, includin climate change and future health pandemic
Johnson goment only publish di accompanyin UK  legislation for Tuesday afternoon, e no reach 24 hours before dey start di debate for parliament and one hour afta wey EU sign
Di goment wan ram all stage of di 85 page Europe Union(Future Relationship) Bill through di Commons and House of Lord for one day, before Queen Elizabeth II go formally sign am for law
Di last-ditch deal comot di prospect of one cliff-edge separation wey go don see quotas and tariffs slapped on top all cross-Channel trade, exacerbatin strains for di middle of di coronavirus pandemic, wey hold Britain pass most oda place dem.
But di British fisherman don accuse di goment say dem sell dem out, as service wey dey account for 80 percent  of di UK economy dey largely omitted
Di city of London don face anxious wait to learn on di kind basis wey e fit continue to deal wit Europe for di future
Theresa May, wey for three year Brexit dominate premiership end for 2019 afta wey she fail to win support for close future relationship wit di bloc, wey she voice her unease for di agreement
We get deal for trade wey  benefit di EU, but no be all deal for service go benefit di UK na hin she tell MPs
Deal wey dey thin
Di legislation don dey ready to pass, as e go be, afta wey influential faction of arch-Brexiteers for Johnson
ruling Conservative give dia blessin to di EU agreement for Tuesday, and di main opposition Labour parti give signal to hin reluctant backin
upon say misgivin wey dey among sone of hin own MPs, wey plan to comot or vote against di agreement, Labour leader Keir Starmer tok say neutrality no be option to give stake for Britain
Dis na thin deal, I get plenti flaw, but thin deal dey beta pass make deal no dey. Starmer tell MPs
Dem lawmaker wey kom from di pro-Europe Liberal Democrat and Scottish National parti(SNP) tok say dem go vote against am wit di SNP using di issue to push for fresh referendum for di independence of dem Scotland
Di only way to regain di plenti benefit of EU membership na to bikom independent state for di art of Europe one more time, dia leader for UK parliament, Ian Blackford na hin tok ham
Di agreement impact go play out for di comin month, wit UK business brace for custom red tape wey dey don avoid for decade for cross-Channel trade
Meanwhile from January 1, free movement of pesin from Britain to di EU or kom Britain no go dey again
For under di compress legislative calender, di European Parliament go debate di Brexit deal afta New Year, but dem expect dem make dem nod am pass
Pendin dat wan, EU member state give dia green light for Monday for di accord to take provisional effect before e rish Thursday deadline
FG don launch new national policy on top virtual meetin
Di Federal goment for Monday don formally launch di national policy on top virtual engagement for public insttution
E even commission Emergency Communication Centre wit four digital economy centre pass di kontri
Di Minister of Communications and Digital Economy, Isa Ali Ibrahim Pantami, wey launch di new policy, kom commission di projects virtually for Abuja, tok say tins don shift to virtual engagements for official circles dem for di world, bikos of COVID 19 pandemic, e kom make dineed for a policy make dem give legal impetus to dey thins virtually for public institutions dey necessary.
Di policy wey dem approve by di Federal Executive Council for 14th of Octomber, 2020 na hin dey develop wit collaboration wit di office of di Head of di Civil Service of di Federation na hin Pantami tok
Hin tok say di policy go institutionalise framework and standard wey dey witin Ministry, Deparment and Agencies of goment as well
Companies wey goment get wey dey use virtual engagement as administrative procedure for service and significantly reduce bcause of governance
He tok say in line wit National Digital Economy Policy and Strategy, di facilities wey dey commission under di National Information Technology Development Agency and the Nigerian Communications Commission supervision go enhance security, create digital jobs, promote knowledge-based economic growth, increase wetin pipo dey produce and e go improve commercial and administrative methods.
Hin tok say digital economy project na hin dem dey carefully teach and execute efficiently wit view to see say di sustainable growth  of Nigeria digital economy
Dem activist don fight dirty on top mismanagement of millions wey dey for Odumakin burial
Di controversy wey dey for burial moni of late activist, Mr. Yinka Odumakin, go deep again on Thursday as di memorial committee slammed members of di accountability committee sake of di N10 million wey dem feel say dey no manage well, wey pipo raise for di burial.
Di committee describe di accountability comitee member as say self seekin infiltrator masqueradin as Civil Society Activist
Daily Trust report say few days afta di burial of Odumakin for Ife Moro, Osun State, some members of di burial committee question di management on top di moni
Di burial wey take place on April 24
Dey subsequent set up accountability committee wey we know as Odumakin  Accountability Resolution Committee wey indicate di memorial Plannnng Committee(MPC)  and tell am make im refund N7.9m to Odunmakin family
To dey react to di accountability committee report, Comrade Awa Bamiji of di Civil Society and Pro-Democracy Movement Memorial Initiave, 2021, dismiss di allegation
He warn members of di accountability committee make dem stop dia divisive reactionary orchestration of disaffection wey dey witin di movement or make dem ready face di wrath of di majority and genuine Leaders and Elders dem wey dey di Civil Society Movement.
Hin describe one Declan Iheakaire as one of di key actor wey dey behind di issue, alleging we Ihekaire specially request and collect N20,000 fuel hin personal car reach and from Osun state
Na allegation wey be illegal disbursement wey be N5m
