Him also con accuse oda cornerin and to dey share N5m, say dis na part of di evidence already wey comply wit di help of dia Legal Associate
To reach here, we don already instruct our legal advisers maka dem approach di Law Court immediately to press charge for willful defamation, Obtainin by Force under duress and Physical Assault against dem and dia pipo sef if dey continue dia wicked and malicious ways of assault wey no get reason and smear campaign wey dem call as resolutions of dia dubious accountability gang.
As di conscience of di kontri, di leadership of di Civil Society and Pro  Democracy Movement na hin dey strongly condemn, disown and e distance hinsef from di divisive activities of dis pretenders and Infiltrators dem, wey no get significant reputation and scruples.
wen dey contact dem yesterday, Comrade Ihekaire tok say Awa Bamji wey sign di statement na hin make dem arrest
Hin tok say dem bring am kom inside di committee as sub-committee member
and him no dey part of any meetin wey di Memorial Committee hold wey be say issue of di disbursement of funds na hin dey raise
Ihekaire note say plenti pipo na hin dey shut comot from di platform bikos say di committee no wan give account of di fund wey dem receive
Him tok say some of dem open Odumakin Real Accountability Platform kon add Awa Bamiji and Comrade Wale Okunniyi
but dey comot
But him state say di committee do dia work kom find out say dey actually embezzle N7m plus
Dey don go to dey beg pipo to give dem  soft landin and di committee member dey say no dem no dey back down
We go address press conference on top dis
Him even tok say hin no dey move by di threat of legal action wey dey against am even as hin dismiss di allegation N5m wey dey corner corner
Him don threaten earlier and now dey don write petition against dem to EFCC, Force CID and pipo don dey beg on dia behalf
We suppose call di pipo wey don dey beg on dia behalf say dem neva show any kind remorse
I just tell u di truth and nothing wey pass di truth
we go need sanitize dem civil soiety
dey suppose feel remorse and kom out kon say dem dey sorry
Dey even suggest say dey suppose ostractize from di activity of civil society hin tok
Na attempt to implicate Odumakin family
Di accountability committee later kom issue anoda statement, say di claim wey Bamji make na unsubstantiated tori wey dem design to implicate Odumakin family
e insist say di sum of N9.3m wey dey out of di N9.9m wey di committee raise na e dem blow on top burial jamboree
on top N5m wey dey tok say dey don corner, hin tok say,di only place wey di sum of N5m wey dey mention dey di budget and na e dem list as donation by Lagos State goment toward di burial of late Odumakin
Oda South West Governor wey dem be Ekiti and Osun State make donation of staggerin N1,000,000.00k and N2.500.000.00k respectively on top di same purpose
Details of di income and thins wey dem buy analysis as Wale Okunniyi and Awa Bamiji submit am, go dey here wer we go fit peruse am.
Meanwhile, di total amount wey three (3) South West Governors donate, (N8.5m naira only for total) na him dey list as part of di total money wey dem waste on top yeye thins, multiple charges for di same thin, heavily padded relevant and irrelevant material dem, overloadin and  provisions wey dey don too ovacharge for non existin expenditures
Dat is, if any dey, di statement go add
As e dey hot: Bayern don win dia ninth Bundesliga for  row
Bayern Munich na hin dey don confirm say na dem be Bundesliga champion for di ninth straight season for Saturday afta wey England winger Jadon Sancho score twice for Borussia Dortmund wit 3-2 win wey dey win for di second place for RB Leipzig
Di result for Dortmund mean say Bayern be champion before dia home game wey dem go play against Borussia Moenchengladbach for Saturday evenin.
England winger Jadon Sancho na hin score twice for Dortmund house win wey crown Bayern as champion even wen dey no kick ball for dia house game against Borissia Moenchengladbach for Saturday
Before dey even start wella, Bayern don get unassailable 71 point to Leipzig 64
be like say anyone don eva bikom champion before wen team bus for di way go  stadium
Dortmund head coach Edin Terzic congratulate Bayern
Julian Nagelsmann, di  33 year old coach wey go comot RB Leipzig to take over for Bayern next season, offer tense congratulation for title wey hin deserve to hin future employer
Di victory na e lift Dortmund enta di Champions League place, but Eintracht Fankfurt fit knock dem comot for di fourth place if dey beat Mainz for Sunday
Even witout dia star stricker Erling Braut Haaland, Dortmund dey 2-0 up for di start of di second half thanks to di goal from Marco Reus and Sancho
Leipzig fight back wit Lukas Klostermann header before Dani Olomo kon return am back only make Sancho carry di winner wit superb footwork
Di club meet again for Thursday for di German Cup final for Berlina Olympic Stadium
We show plenti morale, di game sef no get anythin to do wit di final for Berlin,  but tru tru, we wan win for Thursday too, Reus wey score na hin tok am
Dortmund get hope to get Haaland kom back from thigh injury before di cup final and even wit dia top-scorer wey dey watch for wia hin sit down, di host still race inside di lead afta only seven minute
Reus span out Lukasz Piszczek pass, sprint for back of defence and take beautiful back-heel ball from Thorgan Hazard before hin sweep hin shot past Leipzig goalkiper Peter Gulacsi
Dortmund goalkiper Marwin Hitz no comot for di second half afta wey hin get injury wen hin collide wit hin centre back Manuel Akanji before di break wey dem replace am wit Roman Buerki
Dortmund double dia lead six minute afta wey dem get break wit  superb piece of skil wey Sancho do, wey cut back inside afta wey Raphael Guerreiro pass and kon fire hin shot for far post wit superb accuracy
Di visitor return one goal back for 63 minute wen Emil Forsberg float ball from corner wey Lukas Klosterman steer hin header pass Buerki
Leipzig draw level wen South Korea striker Hwang Hee-chan break clear for Dortmund defender Mat Hummel and square am for Olmo wey tap house from place wey near
Howeva, Sancho grab di winner wen hin flick di ball give Guerreiro, take return pass and tap house to give Bayern di title
Ndidi, Iheancho Leicester City win dia first FA Cup afta wey Tieleman scream
Youri Tielemans hit sensational winner to hep Leicester City get dia first FA Cup for one 1-0 victory ova Chelsea on Sunday, in front of 21,000 fans at Wembley  wit Ben Chilwells 89th-minute effort wey VAR  tok say na offside.
Na di biggest gatherin of dem supporters for inside stadium since coronavirus pandemic don start and dey treat dem kon show some kind drama for di 140th FA Cup final
Leicester fans don get perfect view as Tielemans fire brilliant shot inside top corner of di goal for dia end for 63 minute
Na goal wey worth winnin any final cap superb performance from Belgian
Na game of small clear chances up e be until dat point but dey kom force  Kasper Schmeichel into two fantastic saves at di oda end, pushin a Chilwell header onto di post and then pullin off anoda wonderful stop to deny Mason Mount, as Chelsea dey desperate to find response 
Former Leicester defender Chilwell think say hin don do am, wen Caglar Soyuncu clearance go comot am, but VAR rightly sort di Chealsea man don stray marginally offside for di build up
Leicester, wey lose key defender Jonny Evans sake of injury midway thru first half, still dey and, 52 years afta dia last appearance one FA Cup final, dey able to carri di trophy up for di first time, as dey add anoda remarkable chapter join dia story, followin dia 2015/16 Premier League triumph.
Pakistan don block social media amid anti-france protest
Pakistan on Friday block social media platforms dem sake of fear say activists of one radical Islamist group fit use di technology kos violent protests against last year depiction of di Prophet Muhammad in France.
followers of far- right Tehreek-e-Labaik Pakistan(TLP) one group wey support di kontri controversial blasphemy law, don block road kom choke streets for deadly protests wey start on Monday
di protesters wey demand say di goment fulfil early promise to expel di French ambassador by April 20, ova di publication of cartoon wey dey show di prophet last year
At least 5 pipo wit two police officer don kpeme inside di protest, wey don prompt di France embassy inside Islamabad make French nationals comot for Pakistan for some time
Dem don block social media for few hours make troublemakers no use am for Friday prayer wey pipo go gather, one official tell dpa
Facebook, twitter, Instagram, WhatsApp wit TikTok dey inaccessible for inside di kontri, wit Islamabad di capital join
Political parties, Islamist groups wit militant organisation like Pakistan Taliban wey rely on social media platform use connect wit dia followers
How young farmer use 350 fowl take make N750m farm
As dem take dey call am Farmer in suit, him tori tell us as hard work, innovation, passion, wit determination fit make person break comot from inside poverty
Di tori of Usman Ali Lawan, wey suffer plenty challenge wey dey face  most Nigerian youth, na inspiration for odas
Last week, awa reporter visit Lawan farm for di outskirts of Keffi, Nasarawa State, him tori explain him journey as e don be
afta him first degree for Business Administration from di Ahmadu Bello University (ABU), Zaria, kom start stint for inside oil and gas, Lawan use him savings take do master degree for Energy Studies for di United Kingdom (UK) wit hope say job go dey wait for am
dey broke, broken, no get house con dey owe join
E been hard to find beta job, so I start dey apply for all jobs
Inside di first six months afta I return from (UK), I apply for 500 jobs inside Nigeria
I been ask pipo for help
I been dey find any job, him tok
Inside di period of joblessness, dis grandson of one peasant farmer remember say him fit do somethin for agriculture
Na dat time I start to make efforts kom dey prepare mysef bikom farmer
and I wan be farmer wey go fit support oda small small farmers join hand for sustainable wit profitable farmin
Dat na wetin inform di establishment of my farm, USAIFA Agro-Allied Limited, wey start operation on April 3, 2013, wit 350 fowl, him tok
Today di farmer capacity don grow from 350 fowl enter 28,000
For fishery, e get di capacity for 100,000 of 1.5kg fish, 45 tonnes of fish wey dem process wit 200,000 fingerlings monthly
facilities wey dem use do goat farmin, heliciculture (snails) wit cuniculture (rabbits) dey under construction
di farm get modern meat wit fish processin facilities, wey get substantial structures for office, feed mills, meetin room, cold room wit warehouse
di farm don develop circle wey di waste product of one process fit do input for anoda
for instance, wen di poultry and fish use feed, dem go collect all di waste take do organic fertiliser
dis, we ensure say Evri waste product for di farm dem go use am as input for anoda process to use create ebikosystem wey waste go dey reduced pata pata, Lawan explain
Lawan get anoda plan for di farm sef. We don ready no be for only commercial farm, for agric-business institute so oda young farmer dem go fit get access to see as farm dey work, kom learn get di knowledge join
wen dem ask di farm worth, him tok say, we do evaluation recently and di business get worth wey pass N700million
Di asset of di facilities get value of N350m
wen you put di goodwill, awa experience, brand, all di validation and awa turnover for inside seven or eight years, plus di turnova wey dem project inside di next five years, den di business get value of N750m
him further tok say, moni dey important for di business, but I neva actually see am as key driver bikos I sabi from di beginnin day if I put dat for mind I no go fit go far
say you think say you need moni do Evrithin
and you no get
na spirit killer
enterpreneurship na lonely journey, so you no go want anythin wey go discourage you
you go wan dey move ahead
so I think say my snag for problem solvin na him important pass so I hold am tight
I try look for alternative means use get moni
Although him no get any fundin from any bank, hin been use oda means like bootstrappin
him explain Bootstrappin as simply means wey you go use di resource you get to use create somethin wey get value weda na to get invoice sale from suppliers or advance payment from customers
those na some of di methods we use to make sure say cash flow stay strong
and we been grow di business, but di one wey important pass, na levarage onntop fellowship and grant opportunities
inside di next 10 years, Lawan wan get 10,000-hectare farm estate to use grow maize, soybeans and groundnut, take prove say young pipo fit actually make livin wit decent inkom from farmin
you fit wear suit for farm instead of for banking hall, him tok
Nigeria to partner wit Egypt for youth and sport development
Di Minister of Sports, Sunday Dare don tok say Nigeria go partner wit Egypt use explore area of mutual benefit for youth and sport development
Di Minister wey make us know yesterday on top di sidelines of di
General Assembly of di Association of National Olympics Committee of Africa, ANOCA, for Cairo tok am again say di fact say sport dey play key role inside international relations wit unity and youth empowerment
As two pacesetters for di continent, di youths of Nigeria and Egypt fit get plenty milage, if we explore area wey dey mutually beneficial for us
Dis meetin dey timely bikos e dey kom for time wey we dey prepare for di Olympics, Dare tok
to answer, Egypt Minister of Youth and sport Development, Professor Ashraf Sobhg tok plenti dey to achieve if youths dey properly mobilized wit sports
Di future dey youths hand so dem must dey get proper trainin to use meet di challenge of new world orders, him tok
Dare use opportunity use introduce di DEEL, wey be digital skil programme, dey assure say di two countries fit collaborate to use benefit for di initiative
Food security; Egypt canvas urban farmin
Di kontri coordinator, Open Forum for National Biotechnology for Africa chapter, Dr Rose Gidado don beg federal goment make dem promote urban agriculture to use mitigate food scarcity
Gidado, wey be deputy director, National Biotechnology Development Agency, Abuja, make di call for interview wit di news Agency of Nigeria (NAN) for Lagos
she tok say urban agriculture go address issues wey dey surround insecurity for plenti part of di kontri
Gidado tok say hydroponics, aeroponics and aquaponics na all new urban agriculture techniques wey dem suppose promote
she tok say dem suppose promote greenhouse farmin technology for to use boost food production wit self-sufficiency
as she take tok, hyfroponics na technology dem dey use grow plants for inside nutrient solution wey dey supply all nutrient elements for plant to take grow
dem dey do celt weda dem use or dem no use insert medium, like gravel, vermiculite, rock wool, peat moss, sawdust, coir dust wit coconut fiber
Aeroponics na innovertixe technique dem dey use mist roots, wey dem go suspend for air wit hydroponia solution
plant get support wit hole dem make inside styrofoam panel
Aqia[pmocs, mean say make dem raise fish wit plant for di same water source
Di fish dey provide di fertilizer for di plant and di plant root dey filter di water for di fish
Greenhouse na type of farmin wey crops dem dey cultivate crop inside place wey dem protect con cover
di advantage of celt na to pursue pest and disease
e get comparable yield advantage to crop dem grow for open
Urban agriculture go allow pipo dey practice farmin for inside dem house and enviroment and dat one go increase food production
We get urban agriculture, and goment suppose promote am
Urban agriculture go mitigate against issue of herdsmen, Boko Haram, banditry and di remainin one
wetin we go need do na to promote urban agriculture
Dey need  teach pipo how to farm for on top dia rooftop,for container and polytine bag; na wetin she tok be dat
Sallah wey be Edo trader dey make brisk business
Even as di economy  don downturn wey COVID-19 kos, trader wey dey Benin prayin ground for Benin-Auchi Road dey make brisk business as dem Muslims dey celebrate Sallah
Di trader wey dey sell cap, clothin mats, beverages and oda items tok say business dey good and say dem no regret to kom di area to sell dia item
One of di trader  wey be Muhammed Kabir, tok say hin  make plenti moni for short time
Kabir, wey dey sell garment wey dem dey use for prayer tok say for short period him  10 pieces of dem
Na wetin I dey usually battle to sell for di day be dis
Anoda trader wey be Abdullahi Abubakar, wey dey sell cap, tok say if evri oda day be like today, I no go complain of bad market
Today na Eid day and pipo dey kom to di prayer ground wey dem no go wear cap, so I use di opportunity to make good business
Before dey start prayer, I sell 17 cap wey range from N1,500 go N3,000
Accordin to am, him barely manage to sell 10 cap for any oda day, addin say hin go get moni to celebrate Sallah
For Ordinary day, I dey manage to sell 20 caps or so him tok
For him part, Musa Koro wey dey sell mats thank Allah for di Eid el-Fitr, him tok say him make good sale today
Plenti worshipper no kom di prayer ground wit mat so dey kom end up to buy from us
I make profit wey dey over N5,000 for short period
Oda trader wey dey sell ice cream,  sachet water and bevarages  tok say di market dey good and say dem dey smile go house
Dey also wish say e go be evri day for dia business to thrive wit  for dat kind high rate of turnova
CBN don task to dey fund road transport
Di Central Bank of Nigeria(CBN) and di Ministry of Finance, Budget and National Plannin, dey don task dem to dey create special intervention wey dem find to develop road transportation infrastucture
As e dey tok on Monday for di Nigeria Transportation Commissioners Forum and Federal Ministry of Transportation Annual Retreat 2021, di Minister of State, Transportation, Sen. Gbemisola Saraki, tok say, We understand how e difficult to involve to dey access fund, especially wit di high-interest rate regime.
We dey explore wit CBN and di Mnistry of  Finance intervention fund dedicate  to road transport sector wey dey similar to wetin obtain for Aviation and oda sector of di economy
She kom tok say di ministry wit relevant stakeholder dey work to get environmental sustainable transport sector
She kom tok say di ministry dey aggressive to promote di use of technology wey dey road transport sector
Di minster kom tok say di NITT dis year  dey embark for National Transport Data bank project, wey go dey di beginnin to dey develop awa national intelligent trasport infrastructure
Di actin Chairperson of Transportation Commissioners Forum, Rahmatu Mohammed Yar'adua tok say di Forum dey necessary dat time bikos of di nid to effectively implement various resolutions of di National Council on Transportation, coupled wit di desire to coordinate activities of plenti groups of Nigerian Transport Sector.
She kom tok say e need to adopt technology for road transport operation make e reduce accident
Why Nigeria go need adopt dairy policy wey dem proposeAgric minister 
Di Minister of Agriculture and Rural Development, Alhaji Muhammad Sabo Nanono, don tok say high dependence on top dairy products wey dem import na hin make di urgent need for farmers make dem adopt di proposed diary policy dey necessary wen dey implement am.
For one stakeholder meetin wey Sahel Consultin organize thru di Advancin Local Dairy Development for Nigeria (ALDDN), Nanono note say wit 60 per cent of di dairy products wey pipo consume for di kontri na imported, di dairy policy wey dem propose go unlock di sector potential and e go put renewed interest for hin# development.
One statement wey Sahel Consultin tok for dat event wey apun last month na be say, make dem ensure a stakeholder engagement wey wide wella for di Nigerian dairy sector to critically review, make dem provide recommendation to di draft national dairy policy.
hin state di ALDON programme implement wey di group dey utilize systematic approach to catalyze vibrant local dairy sector to dey improve di productivity of local breeds wen dem dey promote local source milk
Issues wey Mrs Winnie Lai-Solarin highlight, di Actin Director, Department of Animal Husbandry Services (DAHS), Federal Ministry of Agriculture and Rural Development na di reflection of di strategic areas di ALDDN programme dey work on top to use unlock di potentials for di dairy sector.
For di breakout session wit various stakeholder, extensive discussion and recommendation wey dem provide to improve di propose dairy policy
Dey point am out say commercial feed and fodder production for Nigeria dey essential to intensify and facilitate di development of di value chain thru how dem go strengthen di demand and supply along di value chain.
Di Sahel Consultin statement note say di programme done engage 140 commercial fodder producers dem to cultivate 400 hectares of land through farmin of plenti kind of cereal, grasses and legumes to use produce silage and hay.
Wen dey implement diis policy, e go encourage farmers dem make dem adopt commercial production of fodder and make dem dey sell am for affordable price give smallholder dairy farmers to dey improve di animal health, productivity and household income.
Dis dairy production component of di policy dey also align wit one of di targets of di ALDDN programme  to increase milk yield of at least 75,000 cows from 15,000 dairy house dem wit like 30 per cent thru genetics and breedin improvement, increase access to animal dem health service dem and to dey train smallholder dairy farmers on dairy farmin practices wey dey improved.
Turaren Wuta: trade wey dey boom for di northern woman
Di art to dey make incense, wey dem popularly know as Turaren Wuta, na di new tradition to dose wey kom from di Northern region of Nigeria
Howeva, turaren Wuta don bikom popular household item wey pipo from different tribe for di kontri dey use
For dis report, Daily Trust Saturday show how profit dey di business to dey sell Turaren Wuta don bikom
Although incense na dem dey too use to dey freshen house and neutralise odours, e also serve oda different purpose
Some tradition believe say di smoke from di incense dey fortify di house against evil spirit like di one wey dem dey use for Catholic church, wen odas believe say hin scent na hin dey fi use attract man and woman
Some woman kom believe say di consistent use of Dhukkhan ( one type of incense) serve as aphrodisaic and e fit help for sexual exploit
Di popularity wey dey use of incense don grow reach di extent wey dem no dey appreciate by di northern tribe but na almost all di tribe wey dey di kontri
Incense or turaren wuta wey dem make locally
Dem dey use Turaren wuta as aromatherapy and as fragrance wey dem dey use for house, bodi or cloth
Aromatherapy na hin dem dey use for holistic healin treatment wey dey use natural plant extract to promote health and well being
E get different type of turaren wuta wey dey available and na from  variety of different material dem use make am
For Ngeria, di scent wey common pass na sandal wod, Kajiji wey dem ground, Hawee ball, sandal stick
Di Kajiji wey dem dey ground na plant wey grow for Maiduguri, wen Hawee stick na hin dem dey get from Kano
Apart say dem dey smell good, di business side of turaren wuta don dey aprt of human existence  for ages
Fatima Kannike na indigene of Maiduguri and hin specialise to dey make of turaren wuta
She be tell Daily Trust Saturday how di business take get profit for Nigeria
Fatima tok say; For Maiduguri, out of ten house wey dey street, e dey likely say 6 or 7 family dey involve for di turaren wuta business.
Wen dem dey make turaren wuta, Fatima tok say some of di ingredient na hin dem dey locally source and some dey kom from Senegal, India, Pakistan like dat like dat
She kom further explain  say di turaren wuta wey dey expensive pass na di one  wey get sandalwood and  firche wey dem dey get from crocodile skin
she tok say; plenti time , pipo believe say Prophet Mohammed(SAW) step on top very good ground wey di  sandal wood tree dey grow, therefore dey consider say e dey holi 
Wen she dey make her turaren wuta,Fatima prefer to use exquisite scented oils so e go make dey scent for di turaren wuta last for long time, wey fit be like 6-8 hours and most of her oil na from dubai
afta wen dey don mix my turaren wuta, I like to dey seal ham and kom leave ham for weeks to allow di ingredient marinate kom bikom more potent
Wen dem ask me how di process dey be, Fatima tok say to dey make turaren wuta dey very easy for am
So far say all my ingredient dey available, I fit do am for di comfort of my house
To dey make sugar syrup and to dey fry di incense woods e involve  before we go kom dey add di oil wey go need for di fragrance
Howeva, Fatima don tok say wen dem dey make turaren wuta, e dey good to dey always use firewood and di local fryin pan in oda to perfect di mixture
She kom advise make dem dey wear face mask to avoid catchin cold and hand glove so di hand no go burn
Wen ask her say how she dey get her customers dem, she tok say, most times, as she dey burn her incense for house, her neighboursdey get interest on top say dey wan know wer she dey buy incense wey dey smell good, di same thin dey apun for her shop.
Fatima customer base be mostly women from di North as plenti time dey believe say turaren wuta dey give di scent of Arabian wey get moni and dey kom believe say e dey help to dey attract man
she tok say for di place wey I kom from, turaren wuta na hin dey consider say e be important gift for women dem weddin, e even dey important pass to dey get fridge or TV 
Howeva, Fatima note say for recent time, she don receive female customers wey plenti wey dem kom from di eastern part of di kontri
Make we say dem her customer na woman, she get male customer too wey dey buy di bodi oil and incense for dia car
Turaren wuta(sandal wood, kajiji wey dem ground and halut)
Fatima get turaren wuta for different price and size, dependin on di ingredient wey dem use
Fatima dey sell her turaren wuta sef for litre for di pipo wey fit like join di business  and no go wan go through di stress to dey make am demsef
E depend on how big you wan start, to dey do di business no too nid plenti capital
for example, wit like 100,000 naira you fi get two or three varities wey be turaren wuta for litres to reselk, wit anoda moni wey be like 400,000
If you go fit buy three to five varieties of di scent
Apart say di turaren dey there
wuta, Fatima too dey make hurah wey be di bodi oil and di one wey dey fit use am for cloth
Plenti time, bikos of how di smell good, customer dey always dey indecisive about di kind scent wey dem want
Fatima tok say wen issues like dat arise, we go like burn each scent kom allow di customer to decide di kind scent wey dem like pass 
She kom advise dem her customer to dey use charcoal burner instead di wan wey dem go dey use electric burner bikos of experience, di electric burner dey waste di turaren wuta and e no dey burn well like charcoal
Fatima wey dem dey patronise hin scent pass na di sandal wood, kajiji wey dem ground and Halut
She no say dis particular scent  na hin dem dey sell finish di minute wey her customer no say e don dey
Fatima kom tok say di season she dey sell pass na rainy season, na bikos di smoke wey dey kom from di incense burner apart to dey kip di house warm so customer fi always wan buy more
Mrs Amina Kogi, wey be ardent lover of turaren
wuta tell Daily Trust Saturday say she dey spend at lease N20,000 evri month  to get different fragrance of turaren wuta for her house
If I wake for mornin, I dey tell di maid to burn incense round di house as dem dem dey do dat e dey make di house smell good and homely
Mrs Amina kom tell Daily Trust Saturday say plenti of her guests dey express joy on top di pleasant scent for her house and dey insist say dey wan get di persin connect wey she buy di incense from
Howeva, anoda persin wey dey sell turaren wuta  Rahanatu Ahmad for Abuja tell Daily Trust Saturday say she no believe say turaren wuta get any spiritual benefit aside am
scent wey sweet and e dey potent to dey clear or to dey diffuse odour wey dey bad/offensive
She add say di business get profit wen dey sell am for large quantity
Her turaren wey cheap pass na hin be N3500 and di one wey expensive pass na N23,000
Di price dey depend on top di size of jar
She dey produce Durot one special kind of turaren wuta wey sometime na medicine
She kom advise her female customer to dey buy turaren wuta to dey help dem fight infection and make dem to dey dey fresh and good
She tell awa reporter say pesin wey dey patronise her scent na di Desired orbs and Thirteen scent
Dem train dem Kano farmer on seed multiplication
Di Sasakawa Africa Association (SAA) wey dey collaborate wit di Kano State goment and di Islamic Development Bank, don conduct pre-dry season trainin of seed multiplication for dem farmer
Accordin to Sasakawa  wey be senior crop productivity enhancement officer, Mr Benjamin Adamu Shamaki, di trainin dey aim to ensure say healthy circulation of improve seed to di farmer
Hin add say 20 seed multiplcation farmer don support to dey breed improve rice and maize seed
Hin kom tok say di project dey target dry season farming activity for local goment wey don get access to irrigation activity
Accordin to m, di project na for all di 44 local goment area wey dey di state to enhance crop production, marketin and farm management technique
We get 20 farmers wey kom from 20 local goment area wit irrigation facility
Di project dey aim for all 44 local goment for di state
Hin tok say; We dey hope to dey continue wit di oda local goment wen di wet season start 
One beneficiary of di trainin wey kom from Warawa Local goment, Malam Rabi Bello, tok say e don learn plenti on top new innovation, him believe say him go change no be only di way him dey farm but di rest of farmer dem wey dey Warama irrigation especially di one wey dey do rice production
LG polls:Lagos APC tok say awa primaries dey successful even if violence dey .
Di Lagos state chapter of di All Progressive Congress(APC)  don tok say hin primary for Saturday wey dey ahead of di July local goment election dey successful
Dey call security agency to probe incident of violence for some local goment area and fish out di pipo wey dey do evil
Daily Trust report say di pocket of violence na hin dey record for some local goment area wey include Surulere wey dem fear say two pesin die
Di election no fit hold for Surulere afta di violence even for di local goment area  wey dem tok say dey under siege for Saturday as dem thug and dem cult loyal to some parti leader take control
But APC regret di violence, dey kom call security agency make dem go afta di perpetrators
Tok tok pesin of di party Interim Committee, Hon Seye Oladejo, inside one statement, congratulate di parti members dem on di primaries wey dem do wit success to elect candidates for di Local Goment elections to elect Chairmen, Vice-Chairmen and Councilors dem into di 20 Local Goment Councils, 37 Local Council Development Areas and 377 wards.
Oladejo tok say d exercise wey dey statewide see plenty members wey cast dem vote for dia aspirant wey dem prefer pass through d open secret ballot mode as di guidelines tok
him tok say; we acknowledge wit regrets di case dem wey dem report about skirmishes for few wards wit di fallouts of attendants
we feel for di victims of di incident
as we dey wait di formal reports of di electoral officials, we wish tell di security agencies make dem conduct beta investigation make dem fit bring di culprits kom face di book so dem go maintain law and order
di parti been tok am again say hoodlums, cultist wit oda outlaws dem no be members of di parti
by all means make dem resist all external force wey dey inside di progressive fold
 di statement add say;about di same mata, di parti want join aspirant wey dey provoke, make dem approach electoral Appeal Committee wey Mr Lawal Pedro (SAN) dey head to lodge formal complaints.
police arrest 6 IPOB members wey dem suspect and dey recover arms for Ebonyi
Di police for Ebonyi don arrest 6 members wey dem suspect for di indigenous pipo of Biafra (IPOB) and dey recover five pistol wit 12 live ammunition wey dey dey local.
Police tok tok pesin for di state, DSP Loveth Odah, tok am for her inside statement on Tuesday
Odah say dem arrest di suspects for operations wey dem run on Monday to use pursue hoodlums wey dey force pipo to stay for dem house, order of IPOB
Odah also tok say di police neutralise three arm robbers wey dem suspect, kom recover three cartridges, jackknife wit axe, cutlass wit some juju
She explain say as dem receive distress call say some hoodlums don barricade Ogbaga road, dey attack dem and dey put fire for cars, operatives reach der sharply
Di goodlums as dem see di police start to dey shoot dem
As dem dey shoot diasef, two members of di gang wound serious wound and some escape wit bullet wound join inside nearby bush, statement tok
Odah say dem recorver one shortgun wey dem make locally, one revolver pistol wit five live cartridges, one jackknife, one axe wit juju
dem burn one Toyota Picnic wit five motorcycles wey get different brands
dem attack innocent citizens bikos dem no obey di stay-at-home order wey IPOB give
Di victims wey get traumer don dey respond to treatment for Alex Ekwueme Federal Teaching Hospital, she tok
Odah explain say dem intercept two of di IPOB suspect for surveilance mission for front of police headquaters for inside di state
Dem recover one locally-made double barrel short gun wit four cartridges, Odah tok
She tok say dem kill one oda suspect afta polce and dem fellow security agency been engage him gang for gun fight for di Ikwo/Abakaliki expressway, Ikwo Local goment Area, as odas escape wit bullet wound
Beta effort dey ongoin to arrest di suspects wey run, Odah tok
Di upcomin Champions League final and di next pre-season, Tuchel believe, say e go show di best attackin midfielder and forward
Solskjaer dey turn United into winners again
Manchester United fit get big problem wit dem fan wey dey show active aggression toward di owners but inside di club new belief dey, new harmony and new confidence say dem fit achieve 
Di man wey dey responsible na Ole Gunner Solskhaer and afta him tok wit many United staff and supporters dis week, evribodi recognise say na time to praise di manager say him achieve plenti for inside eighteen months wey pass
Solskjaer na him pave way give Bruno Fernandes and Edinson Cavani and two of dem don prove say dem be excellent additions for United line up
Cavani don confirm say him dey stay for anoda season and na him belief for Solskjaer persuade am
Paul Pogba be like say him settle and dey hapi and him relationship wit di manager dey beta
Wen United fall back for match dis days, dem go back up, dem fight and plenti time  na hin dey no win
E get one thin, na to thank Executive Vice-Chairman wey dey comot, Ed Woodward for and na bikos na hin dey allow Solskjaer time to succeed hin job, kom survive di rough patch and kom turn hin player to winner
Solskjaer don kom be di important and di strongest foundation brick of di revitalise United and critic, staff and dem fan believe say dis na beginnin of golden era for di Red
Tell- make dem sign tale
Kane dey think about if make him comot
I notice significant silence wen dem dey play di match against Leeds for di weekend
Harry Kane wey dey usually run , even if e no plenti, pass oda player and constanly dey give order and instruction to oda players to play well well.
Wen dem play against Leeds him dey very quite and I think say I neva see am like dat before
I dey suspect say dis na tell-tale sign say Harry dey seriously dey doubt hin tenure for Spurs  and hin dey find way to comot
Wolves dey desperate for striker
Nuno Espirito Santos don last recognise say durin di transfer window hin must prioritise na #to sign new striker
Winger Pedro Neto and midfielder Ruben Neves dem be di leadin scorers wey dey pinpoint di weakness for Wolves strike force
Fabio Silver and Raul Jimenez na dem be di next for di list howeva Jimenez don comot  for action since November  afta wey him use fracture hin skull.
Wolves get 13 goals  less for dis season dan last year
Wolves board don promise Nuno say moni to sign goalscorer wey don himsef wella.
Dem go tell Jimenez for May 8th say if hin dey medically safe to play for final two games for dis season

Sir Alex na hin dey tok say him praise McTominay
Wen di great Sir Alex Ferguson dey tok about Manchester United,  hin dey always dey worthy to dey hear
Him admiration for Scott McTominay  dey immense and di master tok say di midfielder suppose automatically play for evri United game
Scott McTominay don dey emerge as one of United big player na Sir Alex tok ham
If you see say United pick dia team for important game, McTominay name dey always dey part
Hin be good character and hin be good great trainer
Na for wen him don be pikin of seven or eight na hin I don sign am
And him be actual centre forward
wetin be di highest praise wey player fit receive
Na three astonish football fact be dat
Manchester United neva lose any away game for di PL for like one year and four month
Adejobi tok am tok say durin most of di attack, di suspect don allegedly dispossess innocent pipo wey be dia belongin for di state
To further di command anti-crime measures, di police operatives join di Strike Team of the Command, on May 1, 2021, for 2 pm, dem arrest 11 cultists wey dem suspect and traffic thief dem wey dey attack and dispossessin innocent pipo of dia belongins for Railway Crossin, Ikeja, along, Ikeja-Lagos.
Di operative wey respond to one distress call from one of di victim(dey no tell di name) run go di area and hin arrest some of di suspect for action wen dey kom arrest di oda for dia hideout
Dey don confess to di crime
Di suspect also reveal say dem attack dia target wit iron rod, gun, cutlass and charm wen dem dey operate
Wen dem police dey do investigation, di suspect identify one of dia receiver wey be Idris Adamu, wey be 42
Dem immediately arrest am for Alade Market, for Lagos
Gold necklace of one of di victim and many oda suspect den thins wey dem steal wey be phone, necklace, watch like dat like dat
Na hin dey collect from hin hand him tok
He tok say police operatives dey interrogatin di suspects dem so dem go fit get more information on how dem dey operate, membership and accomplice, sodem go fit catch oda members of di gang and di pipo wey dey join hand wit dem to dey commit dis bad act dem for di area and across di state.
Di suspects dem na Sadiq Masaki, 22, Oladimeji Olatunbosun, 24, Adam Hassan, 21, Tunde Afolayan, 24, Michael Ademola, 22, Olamide Johnson, 20, Abiodun Opeyemi, 22, Oluseyi Agbaje, 21, Daniel Ayomide, 20 and Adebayo Tobi, 21.
Di Commissioner of Police, Lagos State, Hakeem Odumosu, has ordered that the Strike Team should profile the suspects and go after their gang members and conspirators as the command will not spare anyone who engages in any act of criminality, no matter its magnitude,he said.
Adejobi tok again say police oga also direct Commander RRS, di Commander Task force and oda tactical commanders make dem sectorise di state for easy operation and make dem carri all di traffic robbers dem and oda criminals so dem fit deliver di service wella, make securitydey for evribodi wey dey Lagos State.
Man United Liverpool game na hin dey don rearrange for 13 May
Manchester United postpone home Premier League match against Liverpool na hin dey don rearrange to 13 May, di league tok ham for Wednesday

Say dem reschedule di game mean say United go need play two games for di space of two days as dia house against Leicester City na hin dey don move forward a day to 11 May
Liverpool trip to West Bromwich Albion go take place for 16 May as dey don plan
Leicester blow Champion  Leaugue chance as Kane sign comot wit Golden Boot

Chelsea 2-1 defeat for Aston Villa don open di door for di FA Cup winner to take advantage kom move go fourth

Shior be beg federal goment, internation donor partner plus well-meanin individual and corporate organizations make dem kom help di state for dat regard, e stress di need for federal goment to release di N10billion wey dem promise Benue among oda state dem to take resettle IDPs.
Dem kill 12 for fresh attack inside Benue
Report be tok say gunmen don kill 12 pipo for inside several community of Ado Local Goment Area for Benue State.
Witness dem tok say dem carry out di attack on top di community dem at di same time betwwen nite for Saturday and early morning for Sunday for Tologa, Ndi-Obasi, Odoken all inside Ekile Council Ward of Ijigban District, Ado Local Goment Area.
Chairman of Ado Council, James Oche, tell journalist for Makurdi on telephone say dem kill 12 pipo durin one cordinated attack on five village dem for im area. 
Oche allege say di attack na reprisal by herders wey dem suspect afta some pipo wey dem belif say dem be IPOB member be cross over from Ebonyi state to im Ado Local Goment for Benue State and dem kill one old Fulani man wey dem tok say na Muhammad Isah.
I suspect say di herders be kom as reprisal bikos of one old Fulani man wey we konw as Muhammad Isah wey be dey live for one of di community dem wey dey affected wey dem share border wit Ohakwu Local Goment for Ebonyi State wey IPOB member dem just kill, dem cross ova kom di community for Ado, as he tok. 
Dem don contakt am, di Police Public Relations Officer (PPRO) for Benue Command, DSP Catherine Anene, neva reply to call and text message dem put through her telefone at di time wey we dey send dis report.
How to dey produce local covid-19 vaccine go take save Nigeria.
Di federal goment don tok di need to have home-grown COVID-19 vaccine for im 200 million population, e tok say local production of di production of di vaccine go savedi kontri di cost of importation as well as say e dey easily accessible and affordible.
DI minister of state on top health matter, Dr Senator Olorunnimbe Mamora tok say to achieve home grown COVID-19 vaccines for Nigeria, need dey to support research institute dem.
Na for di Nigeria institute of medical research (NIMR) he tok am for Monday, for Lagos during di commissioning of di next generation sequencing as well a stour of di project withing di institute.
According to di Minister, although vaccine be don dey for di kontri, we no go stop research institute dem from di one wey dem dey do resaerch put.
If we get awa own vaccine wey we do for awa home na di ultimate for which case, we no go dey look to any oda kontri for vaccine.
Na for awa own interest say make we make sure say we reach dat point wey we fit claim awa own vaccine.
Nigeria and 54 oda kontri dem neva produce one vaccine for dem pipo wey pass 1.34 billion.
Na vaccine wey dem produce outside di kontinent di kontinent dey rely on.
Di Director-General/CEO of NIMR, Babatunde Salako, reveal say di institute don dey get collaboration with di Usmanu Danfodiyo University inside Sokoto and di National Veterinary Institute inside Jos for robust research on top  vaccine development for Nigeria. 
Prof Salako be hint, as NIMR dey use Gibson assembly cloning for development multi-valent vaccines against SARS-CoV-2 virus  currently,  Usmanu Danfodiyo don dey employ bioinformatics and nanotechnology to take make DNA vaccines, and NationalVeterinary, for di oda hand, dey use reverse genetics for engineering New Castle Virus to express SARS-CoV-2 spike proteins.
Dis one na serious effort wey goment go support.
Di new sequencing machine wey dem just commission, im explain, dem buy to work on top di molecular surveillance and e go as well monitor di variant of SARS-CoV-2 for inside Nigeria.
Im insist say di machine go prepare di kontri to take fight against oda agent dem wey dey carry infection like lassa fever, Yellow fever, Ebola and oda infection agent dem wey genetic code dey characterize.
Gunmen dem don carry lawmaker inside Nasarawa and 3 oda pipo for Kaduna
Gunmen wey dem no fit identify don carry member of Nasarawa STate House of Assembly wey det represent Nasarawa Central State Constituency, Mr Ismail Danbaba, im driver plus two oda pipo to place wey dem no know.
Daily Trust gather say Danbaba, wey dey travel go Jos, Plateau State capital for one workshop along im driver and two oda pipo for im vehicle, dem abduct am on Saturday evening.
Di Chairman, Nasarawa State House of Assembly Committee on top Information, Mr Mohammed Omadefu, confirm di incident for Lafia on Sunday.
He tok say dem carry di lawmaker along Akwanga/Jos road wey close to di forest for Sanga Local Goment Area of Kaduna State.
Our correspondent hear sat dem ambush di legislator and dem carry dem away to destination wey dem neva know wit im driver and two oda for inside di vehicle.
Omadefu, wey dey represent Keana State Constituency on top di platform of  All Progressives Congress (APC), be inform awa correspondent say pipo wey abduct di lawmaker don contact im house but dem neva make demand.
He tok say: Di lawmaker for di Nasarawa State House of Assembly, Mr Ismail Danbaba, wey dey represent Nasarawa Central, na im dem kidnap yesterdayu for evenin wen im dey go one official function along Akwanga/Jos road for Sanga Local Goment Area inside Kaduna State.
Wen awa correspondent be contact di Police Public Relation Officer, Nasarawa State Police Command, ASP Ramhman Nansel, he tok say di incident no apun for inside Nasarawa state, so im no go tok on am.
He tok say: Abeg contact di Police Public Relation Officer for inside Kaduna State.
Nasarawa stete command no dey aware of any kind incident.
Dem kill 4 as police face-of with wit pipo wey dey enforce  IPOB sit-for-home matta for inside Ebonyi
Dem dey fear say dem don kill four pipo for shooting between member of Indigenous Peoples of Biafra and police for Ebonyi.
Early indicator na say dem kill one police officer and three IPOB member dey among di one wey dem kill, although Daily Trust neva get chance to verify di identity and nomba. 
Di shootin apun for Nnodo inside Ebonyi local goment area of Ebonyi State wia police face IPOB member dem wey dey enforce di sit-at-home order from di group.
Asource wey dey reliable wey no want make dem write im name tell Daily Trust say dem burn okada and car during di attack. 
And in order to take stop dem, dem mobilise di police go di area and e enter shootin level and pipo, na so he explain.
Di police neva put out any official statement on top di incident.
FULL LIST: Di 30 guest wey go attend Prince Philip funeral
Na only 30 guests go dey present when dem go lay Prince Philip, di husband of Queen Elizabeth to rest.
Prince Philip wey be 99 years die afta small sickness for Friday. 
Due to coronavirus pandemic, dem advise member of di public say make dem no follow for di funeral.
Di queen as report say face very difficult decision to take selekt di small group from di original 800-strong congregation of St George's Chapel for windsor, West London, wia dem go lay Prince Philip to rest.
Na di list be dis in full
Issue dem wey FG must fix to regain glory inside cotton matta
For di last two years, di production of cotton don dey gather momentum, but dem neva solve di challenge wey farmer dem dey face.
Farmer wey dey farm cotton mostly na smallholders, and production na largely through rain-fed system, using traditional farm tools and animal traction (animal drawn implements).
However, few don get access to tractor. 
For late 1980s, e reach 900,000 smallholder dem wey dey grow cotton, den hold average of 0.5 to 1.5 hectare for di total area wey dem estimate as 700,000 hectare across di kontri.
However, as di textile and garment industry don collapse, plus poor market, most of di farmer dem abandon production enter oda crop dem wey get better market.
Current production level
Dem estimate di annual demand of cotton for Nigeari at 88,000 metric tonnes of lint, wey reach 225,000 metric tonnes of seed cotton.
Until 2019, di total domestic production dey below 60,000 as plenty farmer dem dey struggle to achieve di average yield of between 400kg and 750kg of seed cotton per hectare despite di fact say some of di field prospect of about 2.5 to 3.0 metric tonne per hectare.
Statistics from di National Cotton Association of Nigeria (NACOTAN) show say di nomba of farmer dem under di association don grow from 90,000 for 2018 reach 134,000 farmer dem for di 2020 wet season.
For 2019, di farmers dem achieve 120,000 to 130,000 tonnes, wey amount reach increase of about 80,000 metric tonnes. 
For inside dis 2020 wet season, dem expekt make production reach 200,000 metric tones, accordinto NACOTAN.
Di current market
A farmer, Bala Sarkin Ruwa for Shelleng, inside Adamawa State, tell Daily Trust on Sunday say e sell di two ton of im cotton early for 180,000.
But im counterpart, Mr Joshua Dadi tok say he sell for N200,000 for January 2021, he describe di price say e fair.
Mr Anibe Achimugu, national president of di NACOTAN and managing director for ARewa Cotton describe di current price say e good for farmer dem, if dem compare to previous one.
For 2019, di price for one tonne be N205,000 for farmer dem. 
Dat one mean say one farmer be dey do over 100,000 profit directly into di pocket if e dey able to poduce 2 tonnes of seed cotton.
Di intervention an such say di Central Bank of Nigeria (CBN) wan jump start di sector.
And of course, you wan leave am, to large extend, for market-driven price dem and demand.
Now, di minimum price, at least for dis year, na N185,000 per metric tonne, wey still better pass make dem leave am on im ownand e no go encourage farmer dem, and so on, wia price dem be N150,000 per metric tonne.
I thingk say di minimum price wey dem guarantee since di intervention be don dey good, as e tok am.
Issue of quality seed 
Professor Ishiyaku Mohammed, the executive director for di Institute of Agricultural Research, Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria, tok say di institute don release 13 different variants of cotton seed dem wey get veri important economic attribute dat increase di income of farmer and provide different product for utilisation, either as fibre or for making textile product dem, or to even to provide oil.
Di farmer dem tok say lats year, dem access to better seed wey get quality dey improved, wey get potential yirld of 2.5 tonne per hactareif dem follow di best agronomic practice.
With dat, Achimugu tok say a farmer be dey jump for yield figure between 400 to 500 kilogram per hectare to 1.2, 1.5 and in fact, some be dey get reach 2.5 tonne per hectare.
You know say na how well you take manage your farm, di dedication plus skil wey you get, but i go tell you specifically say di lowest wey we record na around 700 to 750kg per hectare.
But farmer dem be dey hit 1.5 to 2.5 tonnes per hectare, e dey fantastic.
For 2018, di gederal goment, through di National Varietal Release and Naming Committee, be approve commercialisation of two transgenetic variety of cotton, MRC 7377 BG 11 and MRC 7361 BG II wey Mahyco Nigeria Private Ltd develop, as dem collabo wit di Institute for Agricultural Research (IAR) in di Ahmadu Bello University, Zaria.
To resuscitate cotton industry, a lifeline
Cotton na key component for di textile and garment industry dem bikos e dey provide fibre to take manufacture textile product dem.
However, di faith wey di taxtile industry get for inside di nation don go down to pulp for decade since di glorious years.
For di 1970s and di 1980s, di Nigeria textile industry be account for about 25 per cent of di manufacturing value added (MVA).
Na be largest employer of labour (e pass  600,000 people during the 1970s to 1980s) for di manufacturing sector afta public sector for di early 1990s.
However, expert don see di collapse of di textile industry wey turn Kaduna to household name for di kontri as high operating cost, wey dey result from poor energy supply, decay of infrastructure and proliferation of di market with textile dem wey cheap and di one wey dem smuggle.
Dem also force some to relocate go oda kontri dem withing di sub-region.
Among di 54 ginneries wey dey avilable for Nigeria, Only 22 dey function for very low capacity utilisation.
Di ginning capacity for di ginneries wey dey exist na about 650,000 tonnes of seed cotton but national production dey fall to less than 60,000 tonnes per year wey dey represent about 10 per cent capacity utilisation accordin by di data from di Raw Material Research and Development Council (RMRDC).
Dis trend get spirally limiting effekt on top di cotton value chain development localy, na im add to take kos make plenty textile industry (83) fold up between 1995 reach now, as di few wey dey function dey perform for low capacity utilisation, as Professor Hassaini Ibrahim Doko, the director-general, RMRDC tok.
Expert tok say to bring cotton value chain back to life and im glorious day dem, di federal goment must to champion di revival of industry dem wit many many policy dem and financial intervention.
FG must to tackle smuggling, cheap import
Di Director-General for di Nigerian Textile Manufacturers Association, Alhaji Hamma Kwajaffa, tok say smuggling plus cheap Chinese product na di probblem for cotton industry inside di kontri.
Despite say procurement act dey say make dem dey look for local content first, nothingg don change much as plenty inside di material wey dem dey use for uniform dey kom from China, as oda dem dey kom from China, Bangladesh and Pakistan.
Di original thing suppose be say we dey source all awa uniform locally from di textile kompany dem.
If you look awa school dem, Army, Navy, Air Force, Immigration, Customs etc, if dem dey source dem uniform locally, of kos many of di textile industry no for close.
Smuggling na awa actual problem.
You know say dealer fit go China; and for China, anything wey you ask for, dem fit do am for you.
Dem dey go China wit awa textile design and di Chinese go do am for dem as dem take want am, and dis go end up for market inside Nigeria, Alhaji  Kwajaffa lament.
Cotton farmer, through NACOTAN want make federal goment take cotton up as national asset and make dem introduce Nigeria standard, wey fit help di kontri get better gradin system, as well as to establish laboratory wey dem go take dey test cotton wit high volume instrument, e also tok say na dis one go take care of di issue dem.
Bandit dem affect production.
For di last two years, plenty cotton farmer dem no fit reach dem farm, bikos of di things wey bandit dem dey do along major production area dem.
E neva tey, wey di only textile company wey dey survive for inside Kaduna State be shut down operation and dem sack pass 100 staff bikos say raw material no dey as di farmer dem dey complain say bandit dem no allow dem reach farm. 
Stakeholder dem tok say make goment ginger dem security architecture make farmer dem fit return to dem farm as dat one na di only way to take reduce poverty for rural community dem.
Abdullahi Salisu Dayi, farmer for  inside Malumfashi Local Goment, tok say unless some wey dey spectacular apun to take favour di production of cotton, e doubt am if farmer dem go wan do am as dem do last year.
Climate change wey dey affect production 
Last year, many cotton farmer for inside Katsina, Gombe and Adamawa state dem be suffer erratic rainfall, wey do affect yield.
Some farmer dem wey speak wit Daily Trust on Sunday for Adamawa, Katsina and Gombe tok say heavy rainfall be affect dem yield welwel.
Joshua Dadi for Kem, Adamawa State, tok say im yield dey affected bikos say rain stop suddenly.
Although he get 4 tonnes for im two-hectare farm, di yield no reach di yield of 2019.
Hamisu Sani for Katsina tok say cotton farmer dem suffer most as di demand for di produce no be like as e be for rice, maize or soybeans, yet di price dey good for N200,000 per tonne.
He add say plenty rain wey fall be enter awa farm and e stop di crop to grow, and e also make di cotton ball make dem rotten for early stage.
Anoda farmer wey dey grow cotton for large scale, Alhaji Kamilu Kankara, tok say im also suffer low yield of di produce bikos say rain fall plenty.
Over di years, demand wey dey on top food don prompt make I withdraw gradually from massive cotton production.
E be like say na dis year worst pass for me as I harvest only nine bags from inside two hectare wey be dey give three tonnes of cotton, as e take tok am.
With population wey don grow pass 200 million and army of youth wey no get job wey dey waka for street, expert dem be tok make goment give priority to sector like agriculture big attention, both for budget, policies and financial intervention dem.
Farmers Cocoa production no dey progress for Edo
Cocoa farmer dem for inside Edo State don lament say lack of support from di state and federal goment dey hinder cocoa production for inside di state.
Di state chairman of di assocition, Thomas Ekpenriebe, be state dis for Benin wen im dey follow journalist tok on top di prospect of cocoa farming for di state.
He tok say di farmer dem neva get any support from either di state goment or di Federal goment, like input and funding, e tok say di development be dey affect cocoa production for di state.
As e dey now for Edo, we dey Ibadan and Ondo State to get new hybrid cocoa bikos di cocoa seed garden for inside di state no dey function, and nobody dey mange am.
Also, extension service no dey for cocoa farmer dem for di state.
For di 1960s, cocoa na im be di cash crop wey dem use to develop di kontri.
Today, nothing dey kom from di state or federal goment.
We just dey work on awa own and e dey affect cocoa production for di state and di kontri in general, as e take tok.
Di farmer dem call for support from di Edo State Goment to invest put for cocoa farming by make dem wake di extension service again, make dem re-establish cocoa seed garden to take avoid travel to oda state dem for seed and also to take generate more money for di state.
Di chairman be also lament about di acitivity of middlemen dem inside cocoa business for di state, wey im tok say dey affekt di profit wey dey on top cocoa.
When im dey call say make dem re-establish cocoa board all over di kontri, di board go serve as regulatory bodi wey go help cocoa farmer dem to know buyer wey get license and regulate price for di commodity.
He explain say currently, na Edo State get di best quality cocoa due to di concerned effort by stakeholder dem.
Ekpenriebe also point finger for climate wey no dey favour, COVID-19 plus say regulatory bodi no dey as major block for di sector.
Development on top entrepreneurship: Purpose and mindset
Afta colonial master dem arrive enter various part of wetin later bekom Nigeria, and di begining of introduction of Western-style administration, di need to train native oublic servant start.
As need for various service dey increase, di vacancy dem for trained manpower kontinu to dey plenty for many decadego reach di 1980s.
But for late 1980s, we don begin not to just dey saturate di public service dem, but be like dem don employ too much.
If any realistic and prudent thing go apun to awa public service dem ova di next one decade, e go be delibrate and systemic rightsizing, and dat na di polite way to say downsizing except for di military, di police and oda such service dem. 
Yes, obviously, pipo go die or make dem retire and need go dey to employ for replacement and for some kind marginal growth too.
But di vacancies combined no dey likely to meet up wit di rate graduates from high school and university dey komot from all around di kontri.
We have to, therefore, no be to accept di reality say di public sector neva suppose dey dere to just to employ graduates alone but also to gladly accept di truism say di public sector suppose, instead, focus on to develop di enabling environment wey go see to di creation and growth of business of all size dem for all sector and crany of di kontri.
If you ask me, successive federal goment dem for di past don do well to take encourage graduates to enter sef-develoment and business through program dem wit di Bank of Agriculture, Bank of Industry, SMEDAN, NDE, NIRSAL, etc.
But di call neva dey sufficiently loud and equivocal: Di goment must cease to dey create any impression say e fit employ di plenty youth , make dem honest and communicate clearly say employment opportunity dem dey limited for di public sector wey fit dey komot from time to time. 
Instead, make di goment kontinu dey focus on top to streghten di various interventionist and enabling program dem wey go facilitate di creation of employmeny by youth demsef.
Obviously, all di program wey we donmention before fit only succeed and dem go dey sustainable if dem put a sense of responsibility of accountability for inside pou youth.
Wit population wey pass two hundred million pipo and e still dey grow, more than sufficient local market dem dey for plenty product and service dem.
From abundant land wey dey fertile for agriculture all across di kontri, reach solid minerals inside most state of di federation; information technology, manufacturing and services, we be plenty opportunity for entrepreneurs wey seriuos.
Ova weeks wey dey kom, dis column go try to bring out topical issue on top entrepreneurship wey go help awa youth to understand opportunities amd how to take seize dem and create jib for demsef and odas.
Di starting point for any and evri endeavour wey dey worthy in life na two: purpose and mind-set.
One of di reason wey plenty pipo fail to achieve maeningful and sustainable success for inside business and life na bikos dem fail to identify di purpose of dem life from di begining.
 Even when dem fit boast of wetin be like outward achievement wey dey reasonable, dem fit still lack di internal satisfaction wey dey neccessary to kip dem motivated and going for di marathon wey dis life be.
Na lack of purpose be dey make us loss resources like awa time, money, effir dem, relationship, etc.
For di long run, we realise say e don deprive us of true meaning for di various sphere of awa lives and di cintentment wey go follow am kom.
Without any purpose or wit a weak one, e dey easy for pesin to sway komot form dem noble journey.
Entrepreneurship dey particularly challenging
If clear purpose wey get deep meaning wey dem internalise, you risk to miss your way or to give up when you hit headwinds, and plenty of am go dey for di journey!
Di next thing wey dey most important afta purpose na your mindset.
Either we know abi we no know, evrithing dey start wit awa mindset.
Successful entrepreneurs have an amazing perception of what dey want to achieve years and even decades before it becomes reality. Entrepreneur dem wey dey successful get perception wey dey amazing on top di thing wey dem wan achieve years and decades even before e go bekom reality.
Na di clearity of di vision wey dey dem mind dey kip motivation for dem inside and dem no dey show say dem tire outside.
And so e be like say nothing fit stop dem. 
For di conceptual development and production of di Snow White and di Seven Dwarfs, DI America pesin Walt Disney be face resistance wey no dey believable from financier dem, contributor and oda associate dem, include im broda, Roy Disney.
Gossip pipo for inside Hollywood dey call di project say na Disney's Folly.
But Disney dey very clear for im mind on top wetin im be wan achieve.
Im no gree to make im focus komot for di outkom wey im desire.
For di end, di projekt be cost whopping 1.5 million US dollars of 1938.
But for di first weekend wey dem release am, Snow White bring $8 million, wey be like $134 million for current dollar!
Dis level for confidnece neva no fit be by accident.
Na consequence of mindset wey don commit say e go achieve some goal dem wey dem don identify.
Ask any entrepreneur wey don dey successful, dem go gree wit dis tori on top vision, mindset and resolve.
Wit clear purpose and mindset wey dey committed, di nect thing wey budding entrepreneur need to aware about na what dem go expekt for entrepreneurship.
Entrepreneurship: Wetin you must expect for inside di journey go dey dis column next week.
Musbahu El Yakub na author, business consultant and entrepreneur.
Senator for inside Niger want make dem compulsory electric votin for 2023 election
Di Senator wey dey represent Niger East Senatorial District, Mohammed Sani Musa, don advocate compulsory use of electronic voting durin di 2023 general election dem.
As e dey follow news pipo tok on Monday for inside Abuja, Senator Musa tok say electronic voting go increase participation for election as e go allow make voter dem vote from anywia.
Di lawmaker therefore dey urge di Committee inside Senate wey concern  Independent National Electoral Commission (INEC) wey dey do work on top amendment of Electoral Act 2010, to include make dem compulsory di use electronic voting for inside dem final report to di senate at plenary.
Senate President Ahmad Lawan don tok say di National Assembly go pass di amendment of di bill before di summer recess wey be June. 
Electronic voting go increase di level wey pipo dey take participate bikos e go allow make dem vote for anywia.
E tok say e go also komot violence bikos di majoruty of pipo wey fit access di internet go prefer make dem vote for dem house or office dem instead make dem go polling station wey armed thug dem fit kos havoc.
Grazing wahala: why make state dem follow Zamfara template
Kwagga Dlama Zira Eliphelet na architect, designer and projekt manager for di Zamfara Rural Grazing Area (RUGA) projekt.
For dis interview wit Daily Trust on Sunday, he tok say dem fit use di model of Zamfara to take solve di crisis between herders and farmers across di kontri. 
Im opinion na say di best way to take implement di template na base on di peculiarity of each state, wit di overall interest of creating peace, jobs and economic opportunities.
Crisis dey di livestock sector for Nigeria, especially for di area of animal feeds.
Plenty stakeholder dey suggest say one of di to move forward na to create ranches for herders to take tame grazing crisis wit farmer dem.
As expert for dis area, to what extent you thingk say dis fit help?
Di farmer-herders crisis wey don kontinu to dey apun don chop enter di fabric of dis nation and e follow join di division wey we dey experience.
As matter of fact, ranching na di solution for dis problem bikos for evri well meaning Nigerian, RUGA, wey stand for rural grazing area, don dey wit us since 1946, but e be don dey dormant.
For inside 21st century, di best way to take float production for di livestock system na to get farm or ranches for full commercial production.
Open grazing and to dey travel kilometre don komot for date for inside evri strata of humanity today.
So dis one na opportunity for us to tap awa potential for inside agriculture, wey we don forget.
Di RUGA template wey suppose adopt dey unique and peculiar.
State dem dey wey no fit get RUGA or ranch dem, but dem get di potential o take benefit for big capacity, concerning livestock production.
Di farmer need to produce wetin di herder go use as raw material, just as di cow dung be manure for di farmer.
Make dem no force di RUGA on all state dem, but each state fit take advantage of am, base on im own peculiarity.
If di state dem wey dey for far north buld ranches, i expekt say make southern state wey fit get RUGA take advantage of am make dem put up large scale fodder of pasture production farming, wey go sweep plenty of awa teeming youth komot for di street dem.
Dis one na opportunity for governor dem and commissioner of agriculture dem to look inside how we fit tap dis potential dem.
 We no suppose see RUGA as program wey go kos division.
Wen di federal goment be moot di idea of national livestock program, some state, especially di south, say no to am, as dem tok say na way to take kolekt dem land give herders.
As expert wey you be, you fit torchlight how dem fit resolve am?
Di pipo wey dey sell di president no fit sell di idea welwel bikos, as a matter of fact, di issue of RUGA setllement no be to take kolekt land.
You no fit go inside Adamawa to kolekt pesin land, even if dem don mix with Fulani.
E no dey work like dat.
You go at peculiarity wey each state get to take decide if you fit establish settlement or not.
So make di president and im cabinet look inward and inside di peculiarity of each state.
Na why e be say today, despite na di main program of di president, dem neva still see am do.
Dis na bikos dem dey do am as say na di whole kontri.
Plenty goment farm dem dey wey dem don abbandon; dis na opportunity to take use dem.
Let us kom togeda to take negotiate dis project again and you go see say pipo go adopt di roadmap.
Make us make we get policy wey fit work for all of us, plus make di purpose dey sincere.
Make proper dialogue dey between state dem wey dey fit for dis project, and dis one go put harmony for di relationship wey we share.
Fear dem dey say e go difficult for di tradtional Fulani to stay inside ranch, how dem go attend to dat one? No be to stay inside ranch.
Just as indigenous pipo for oda part of di kontri dey reject dis bikos dem neva give dem sense of belonging to di project, na di same wit some indigenous Fulani wey no fit move bikos dem don internarry.
Fulani dey wey dey live for there.
For instance, inside Adamawa, some dey wey dey stay for one place, and dem fit show diffence for di ones wey dey do season movement dem.
So dem also fit adopt di system of say make dem dey oneplace if dem give proper orientation to dem.
Wetin I dey try tok be say make we find way to take stop di upward and downward movement.
Nobody go dispute di fact say fattening na when you kip cattle for one place.
Dis concept no be to imprison di herder but to provide new opportunity dem.
Zamfara na one of di state dem wey dey pilot RUGA, and you be key stakeholder for di project; wetin be di solution now?
Di project na bargaining chip for peace, so make economy for thrive.
When we be start work, dem tell us say before Governor Matawalle be enter office, di rate of bandits make di no dey accessible, but im dey able to bring peace.
Dis one no suppose apply for herder dem alone.
How we go take harness and build awa own farming community dem?
Which oda essential amenity and infrastructure dem we need to carry give awa farming community?
Shey na very good rural road go bring all di grass dem make dem kom out.
Shey na good canal dem wey go carry water reach wia di stream dem no reach, abi na borehole for interval to give good water, primary health care?
Some kind basic thing dey wey dem need to provide. 
But na right of di citizen and e no suppose be priviledge. 
Specifically, wetin you get inside di Zamfara RUGA project?
Di RUGA model get 23 item dem.
We get di road network, wey reach about 13.673 kilometres.
Di ranch dey for di Ranji Sakida Grazing Reserve inside Maradun Local Goment Area; and na 2,218 hectares.
Di plot phase be start wit about 100 hectare dem, but due to natural formation, e take about 300 hectare dem.
Dat one na for house and oda structure dem, but we expekt say make e take almost di whole place bikos of pasture production.
Oda reserve dey wey dem do for similar project dem, like Zumi Gidan Jaja wey reach about 36,200 hectare dem and di Dantsado Kuyanbana forest of about 10,000 hectare dem.
On top di pilot phase, di state goment be buy one pivot sprinkle system, wey get about 850 meter for diameter and radius wey reach 475.
Apart from di road dem, we get water reticulation, wey dey serve about 27 kilometre dem.
Water storage facility dey, four overhead plus four surface tank, each of dem dey carry 250,000 litre, all togeda go give you 2million litre dem.
Den we get industrial borehole wey solar dey power, wey dem 8 to each one.
We get 10 borehole wey dem don use hand sink.
As at December, di reticulation don almost reach 18 kilometres, for inside 27.
We also get health facility dem, wey include one primary health care with 30-bed capacity and theartre dem, outdoor patient department, one nursery to take deliver, dem attach am to di maternity. 
We no dey expekt case wey pass di capacity of di health care.
Veterinary clinic dey, wey get capacity to accommodate reach 1,000 withing im own confines.
And e get im own thaetre and isolation room dem, e include 12 paddocks.
Market dem dey wit open and close stalls and abbattoir dem.
But for di context of Fulani man, he no dey kill im animal for im environment, so e go carry am go far to kill, so di abattoir dey outside di ranch.
Na Maradun town di abattoir go dey.
We get 210 plot dem for herders, each measure reach 2,475 square meter, and dem divide to four.
Na six hundred square meter dem give for area wey dem go live make di herder fit build im hut di way he want am.
Dem divide di three wey reamin, fence and denarcate dem, each paddock get gate.
We provide squat system for dem and soak-away for each house.
For inside di 210  plot wey dey, five bedroom dem dey for Fulani or Hausa leader dem.
Two bedroom dem dey for ward head dem.
Religion facility dem dey: one eid ground, one central mosques and space wey dey outdoor wey fit take reach 1,000 pipo dem.
Also one Islamiyya dey attached to di mosque, plus one school, so dem fit get opportunity of Islamic and western education.
Oda space dem dey for future development.
Wetin be di economic benefit of di settlement for future time?
We get phase one and two.
Phase one na to provide di basic amenity dem to bring di herder dem back into cluster.
Di economic benefit be say e go attract investor dem all ova di world.
E go bring di production of meat, wey go later provide revenue.
E go open job opportunity for veterinary doctor dem, agricultural extension worker dem, company wey fit kom dey do milk, cheese nd manure production, bio gas, bone processing, hide and skin processing, animal feed for di blood, to combine am wit oda ingredients, then pasture production from farmer dem.
Di $250m fundin wey dem plan for national acrrier dey unsetle operator dem
One projection by federal goment to raise $250 million for di national carrier wey dem propose don dey make operator dem dey ask question for inside di aviation industry, as Daily Trust report am.
According to one document weu aviation ministry release last week, di federal goment expect make private investor dem raise $250m for di carrier wey dem dey propose as dem insist say dem go deliver di project before 2023 kom.
For inside di document wey give update on top di national carrier project and oda sub-project inside di roadmap, di Ministry of Aviation explain say dem don complete di  project development phase. 
Di goment explain say di next phase go be di placement of Request for Qualification (RFQ) for local and international media.
$250m approximately na im private investor  go raise to take start up airline
But stakeholder doubt di feasibility of di project, dem tok say investor fit no get will to put dem money for such venture.  
Rather, some of dem call on di goment to harvest di facility of di airline under dem management to set up di national carrier.
Di Managing Director, Flight and Logistics Solution, Amos Akpan tok say e go be big task for private investor dem $250m to take establish national airline.
He attribute di difficulty to plenty oda factor like return on top investment (ROI), business environment, and oda dem.
He tok say, to take position to attract investment dey more critical for now.
If di gestation of investment run enter di next goment wey dey kom for 2023, shey e go affect di agreement wey dem don establish wit dis goment?
Nigerians dem still dey experience discriminatory aircraft leasing agreement and insurance program dem.
We still dey try to effect di implementation of no duty on top aircraft spare part dem.
Di forex regime neva accommodate airline operator dem.
Interlining and cooperation still dey di  concept stage. 
Make we fix di platform or foundation first before we go fit build or launch on top am.
For im remark, aviotion analyst and Head of Research Zenith Travel, Olumide Ohunayo, state say no amount too small for national carrier if high credibility dey and contact with lessors, aircraft manufacturers and oda airline dem.
Group captain John Ojikutu (rtd), wey be aviation analyst, wonder wetin $250m go do for di project and di would-be investor dem.
Private investor dem go include foreign and local; how much be $250m for national carrier or how many aircraft dat one go buy?
How much di goment investment of 10% go be inside nationa carrier?
If we want national carrier make am now
or make we beta go for flag carrier and di goment go take rest from di journey wey im start for 1993 wen di national carrier bekom goment airline.  
But anoda analyst, Mr. Chris Aligbe, tok say to raise $250m for di project no go dey difficult, e note say many investor dem dey and dem dey will to put dem money on top di project. 
According to am, di $250m go dey more than enough to start di project depending on di strategy wey dem dey adopt. 
Di captain of Leicester flapp for one corner to punch di ball into im own net as e remain 14 minute make time end. 
With as di home side dey take chase winner, Bale be strike twice for inside di final 10 minute to also take im end im loan spell for Real Madrid on a high.
